shing tsha dang ni sug smel bcas/ /ku sum dang ni de bzhin chu/ /pi si ta dang kun du ru/ /de bzhin ri yi zhag dang ni/ /ri skyes dang ni sbu gu'i zhag /dri yi mar khu so dang ni/ /de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul/ /gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang / /rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni/ /

lus can rnams la phan byed pa/ /gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin/ /de ltar brgyad rdzas rnams ni/ /bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin/ /de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni/ /yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad/ /tsam pa ka dang ba ku la/ /nA ga ge sar ku mu ta/ /

ut+pal shi phA li ka dang / /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku/ /ku su ma ni nyid dag go/ /shrI ba la dang po so 'cha'/ /ka pi ta dang la ku tsha/ /ku ba dang ni brta ki/ /a ru ra dang ba ru ra/ /ba la ta ka skyu ru ra/ /e la rtsi dang pu na ka/ /e raN+Da dang ma ri tsi/ /de bzhin

du ni pi pi ling / /bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang / /yung ba dang ni ru rta dang / /bca' sga dang ni sgog skya dang / /rlan can gyi ni do ba dang / /nA ga pha la dkar po dang / /de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed/ /glang chen dgra dang ri mdzes dang / /'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang / /

ral pa dmar po smyo byed dang / /mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang / /ka dam+ba dang gser shing ste/ /de bzhin du ni shi ri sha/ /ka ran dza dang shri kru dang / /nim pa dang ni paM la si/ /de bzhin ga du ma dza ri/ /pa la sha dang tsan+dan gnyis/ /de bzhin a gar nag po

dang / /gur kum gur shing bye ka ra/ /sbrang rtsi mo k+Sha puSha ka ra/ /me tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang / /shun pa shing dang ro nyid do/ /khu byug zangs kyi gtsug phud can//bya rog dang ni gar ra dang / /rma bya thi bya phug ron dang / /drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed/ /ra dang

ri bong dang / /sa li ga dang phag dang ni/ /khyad par du ni byi ba rnams/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang / /de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang / /gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag /mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog /'di

dag skyes pa bud med kyi/ /stobs rnams skyed pa'i sman yin te/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /bza' dang btung dang bzhib pa dang / /ldag pa dang ni mur ba dang / /sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang / /bkru ba dang ni dril phyi dang / /bza' dang btung sogs

de dag ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog /de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /rdzas dang brgyad dag tu sbyar/ /sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang / /chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs/ /re re zhing yang

gsum gsum 'dod/ /nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te/ /'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o/ /dgra dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste/ /khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa/ /'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum/ /lhang tsher dang ni dngul

chu bzhi/ /bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga/ /dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste/ /bdun po yal ga 'dab sogs bcas/ /skam sa dang ni rlan can yul/ /mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni/ /rno dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin/ /rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag /cha mnyam dngul

chu'i 'bras bu ste/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa blugs/ /thal sman lan tshwas bu gar bsgrub/ /ro ni bska ba rnams dang yang / /lhang tsher dkar po'i skyo mo sbyin/ /dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog /skyed byed don ni rga

ba 'joms/ /cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de/ /'bras bus bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /sngon du gser shog blugs pa yis/ /rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin/ /de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang / /thal ba'am rdul ni blug par bya/ /dron mo blugs na skra dkar skye/ /glang

chen mgo yi bcud blangs la/ /seng ge'i tshad du btso bar bya/ /de nas slar ni phyung nas su/ /ar ka'i shing gi khu ba blugs/ /chos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms/ /tsan+d+ra dang ni ra sa na/ /sgog skya dang ni ker sa dang / /a tra pa ti'i rus pa dang / /de bzhin

du ni me tog gzung / /bya g+hI dang ni kun du ru/ /sa ri ba dang sen mo dang / /nor bu zla 'od na ge sar/ /thigs pa'i rgyun dang ka dam+pa/ /tsam pa ka ri so ba dang / /shi shu bil ba ut+pa la/ /rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru/ /'dzag dang dngul chu kha tshos bya/ /phyung na

sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur/ /khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing blugs/ /skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms/ /rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed/ /rnon po thal sman bcas pa yis/ /bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /lto skyes ma rnyings rdzas kyi las/ /

bcud dang bcud len mar zhag sngags/ /shi ri sha yi rtswas kyang gzag /mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya/ /mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso/ /gsos te 'khrus na 'bras bu'i lam/ /tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur/ /de nas pags pa shun pa

dang / /me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs/ /kha dang bska dang mngar ba dang / /tshwa dang skyur po la sogs pas/ /khyad par du ni btso bya ba/ /kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya/ /kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste/ /tshar gcad pa dang gnod pa yin/ /kha med pa dang thod pa'i

dbyibs/ /'od ma dang ni bya rog mchu/ /de dag btso ba'i zhi ga rdza/ /btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni/ /yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang / /bzhi ba chu ru 'bros pa'o/ /shin tu tshos par gyur na ni/ /'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang / /khrol khrol sgra ni sgrogs pa yin/ /btsir

dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang / /de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o/ /sbrang rtsir btso dang bu ram btso/ /glang chen btso dang seng ger btso/ /rnon por byas te btso bar bya/ /mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur/ /blo gros 'khrul ba med pa yis/ /rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya/ /

cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni/ /sbyangs nas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la/ /gi ri kar Ni'i phye ma ni/ /lugs las zlog pa'i lam btsugs la/ /tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso/ /du ru ska dang ba li ka/ /tsag kra mar de'i sa bon dang / /ba la ta ka shi

kru'i 'bras/ /pa ri tsa ta ku su ma/ /ut+pal ma li ka sa bon/ /bar dar rus pa ka si dang / /si ri sa sku sa bon dang / /sbrang rtsi po son pa la sha/ /zhi ga rje'u ni tshos pa dang / /de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir blugs/ /de dag gi ni rtogs byas la/ /yid la sems pa'i

'khrul 'khor gyis/ /bu mo'i bcud ni drangs te blugs/ /'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni/ /mang po'i bar du brtag par bya/ /lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni/ /de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur/ /bya

ba kun gyi lam gyis ni/ /byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur/ /lha yis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yi bar/ /stobs ldan bzung ba gnas su 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad dang ldan/ /dngul chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang / /sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal ba'i

gzugs/ /chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi/ /sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang / /de bzhin chang dang chang min dri/ /cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang / /bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing / /bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang / /yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring / /mig

ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste/ /stobs ldan sngo bsangs nu ma med/ /rkang pa'i khyad par sngar bshad dang / /sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan/ /sgrub po dbang po'i yon tan byed/ /de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te/ /rtsub dang mnyen dang yan lag mkhrang / /

stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin/ /de dag 'khyud las 'byung ba ni/ /rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de/ /rnon po dang ni lhang tsher la/ /thun mong du ni brten nas su/ /zha nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur/ /ro ni kha dang bska bar 'gyur/ /de nas rang skyur nang du ni/ /gci bas

btsos na nyes pa 'byang / /de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag dang tshil dang khrag /bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byang / /slar yang tsu ta dza ti na/ /tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni/ /pin dza ra dang tsam pa ka /smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu gcig /de dang

mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu/ /mnyes na nyes pa zad par 'gyur/ /de nas ma he'i rmig par ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la/ /zangs kyi phye ma 'khar phye dang / /mig sman phye ma blugs shing btso/ /tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /de yis bcings par

'gyur ba yin/ /de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis/ /sbyangs na snum zhing stobs ldan la/ /slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni/ /mnyes pas snum zhing rtsub par 'gyur/ /ra gan tsu ta'i shing dang ni/ /zangs dang yung ba la sogs drug /byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod

'gyur/ /de nas tsan tra'i shing dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang / /thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang / /ma hA ha ta mo k+Sha dang / /buSh+ka ra dang bar ta ki/ /ku ba sin du ba ri phye/ /bcas par mi yi rkang du gzhug /cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /rdo

yi gtun du mnye bar bya/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /btso rdza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang / /ka ra na da yi mchu yi dbyibs/ /bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong / /kha chen 'di dag bcing ba dang / /tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin/ /gang yang 'khrul 'khor

kha che ba/ /rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang / /'od ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang / /mtshon cha ral gri'i shubs 'dra ba/ /kang ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra/ /nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags/ /gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la/ /bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung / /

bzhi cha lus pa btso chen te/ /phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin/ /dngul chur brten pa'i dri ma ni/ /de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya/ /sbyang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang / /rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o/ /de nas lhang tsher rdul phye dang / /bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs/ /ban

du zhes bya'i phye ma ni/ /skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung / /lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi/ /cho ga yis ni so sor bcing / /de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya/ /gzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni/ /chu kha yi shing la brten par bya/ /lci ba'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung / /rdo ba yi ni

nang dag dang / /ba lang ma he sogs pa'i lhas/ /bye ma yi ni phung por sba/ /de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro sogs/ /tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag /la ba'i 'bras bu la la'i rtsa/ /kha cig me tog 'dab ma dang / /shun pa dang

ni rus pa'ang rung / /rnal 'byor ba yis longs spyod ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs lta bar bya/ /bcos pa'am bcos min yo byad ni/ /rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /de yang stobs can bcud bral ni/ /sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog

ni/ /sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te/ /khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin/ /dmar pos khrag kyang skyed par byed/ /dkar pos zug gzer skyed 'gyur zhing / /srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang / /ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing / /

nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching / /nyes pa dag ni brgyar ldan pas/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'/ /sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin/ /de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na/ /chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /dngul chu'i 'ol se gcig dang ni/ /rgya mtsho las

byung nyis 'gyur ldan/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas/ /sna sman ldag pa'i mchog yin te/ /khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du/ /rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya/ /de phan chad ni 'bras bu med/ /dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang / /khyad par

du ni bsad kyang rung / /sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang / /byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'/ /thams cad du ni snga dro bza'/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no/ /lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni/ /dgongs mo'i dus su bldag par bya/ /zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam/ /nyi ma la ni nyi ma

ste/ /de dang de nas sbyin par bya/ /de ltar yul dang dus dang ni/ /rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag /yid gzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni/ /bshad

kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /de ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /rnal 'byor ma

drug sgrub po la/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /ku lu tA dang ma ru yi/ /yul du gnas pa ma mo ste/ /sin+d+hu dang ni nA ga rar/ /rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no/ /lam bA ka dang sau rASh+Tar/ /gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin/ /kha ba'i ri dang kAn tsi na/ /gang

yod byis bcas mo zhes bya/ /bAn tsa la yi yul dag dang / /gr-i ta de ba tA dag na/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas/ /ka ling ka dang ko sa lar/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen za/ /pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang / /tri sha ku nir sbom dbang phyug /khaN+Da ro ha zhes bya

gnas/ /pul+lI ra dang dzA laM d+har/ /tsan Da li yi bud med gnas/ /o Te dang ni kAm rU yi/ /yul du bu mo chen mo ste/ /de bI ko Ti zhes bya dang / /rA me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod/ /go dA ba ri ar bu dar/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog /gser

gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /au D+yan yang ni de bzhin no/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang / /dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste/ /kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang

mchod cing phyag byas te/ /'di skad ces gsol to/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par dang / /zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni/ /gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang / /gang du sgrub pa pos thos na/ /the tshom med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de

dag thams cad mdor bsdus te/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i/ /gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa/ /legs

so legs so lha mo che/ /sgyu ma chen mor rang 'gro ba/ /bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /aT+Ta ha se'i yul gnas pa/ /zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste/ /rgyal po lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung / /rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo

de/ /ka dam+pa yi shing la brten/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /ko la ki ra ni dpal chen mo/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba/ /gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung / /grong khyer

der gnas drag shul can/ /ri yi rtse mor brten te gnas/ /me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong / /da ra nar ni bde byed ma/ /sme brtsegs chen po'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo ga ya'i mtshon cha bsnams/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo/ /

zhing der gnas par grags pa de/ /ta la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /gyen du 'bar skra zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /de bI ko Tar rna mo che/ /stobs po che yi skye gnas 'byung / /lha mo lag na mdung can te/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /

gnas der lha mo drag chen mo/ /b+ha dra'i shing la brten te gnas/ /k+She tra pA la lus chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya/ /bi ra dzar ni phyi mo ste/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya bsnams/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ba/ /zhing der

gnas pa me 'bar ma/ /a mra'i shing la brten te gnas/ /ha har dgod pa sgra chen po/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /e ru dar ni me lce'i kha/ /thod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje shak+ti bsnams/ /zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas/ /

grong khyer der gnas lha mo de/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che/ /pre ta pu rir dmar ser te/ /'jigs pa chen po'i spyan dang ldan/ /lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams/ /gcig pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o/ /zhing

der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dzA ti'i shing la brten te gnas/ /byin chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung / /e la pu rir bong zhon ma/ /rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung / /phyag na zhags pas 'jigs chen mo/ /zhing der myos pas yang

dag gnas/ /phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo/ /glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i/ /zhing skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o/ /kha che'i yul du ba lang rna/ /gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /dgra rnams

'joms la mchog tu brtson/ /gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ri yi rtse la brten te gnas/ /sbu gu'i byin pa can zhes bya/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo/ /'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas 'byung / /lcags kyu zhags thogs lha

mo de/ /zhing der shin tu myos par gnas/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dbye chen la ni brten te gnas/ /gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /rmongs par byed pa bzhin yangs pa'o/ /nA ga rar ni thong gshol ma/ /sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung / /

ro langs can ni 'od chen ma/ /dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol/ /gnas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de/ /spa yi shing gi ldum rar gnas/ /spu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /pU N+Da bar ta'i yul du ni/ /tsa muN+DI zhes bya ba ste/ /stobs po che

yi skye gnas byung / /kha T+wAM ga yis lag pa brgyan/ /lha mo spyod dang grol bar byed/ /sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa/ /bum pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /zhing de na ni yang dag gnas/ /dzA lan+d+har ni bzhin dngas ma/ /chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas 'byung / /rdo rje lcags

sgrog thogs nas ni/ /bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster/ /grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo/ /khang pa rtseg mar brten te gnas/ /ral ba gsum zhes bya ba yi/ /zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che/ /pre ta pu rir glog gi gdong / /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang

dag byung / /lha mo dbyig pa shak+ti thogs/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /drag pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+She tra pA la smad pa min/ /'ug pa'i gdong can 'jigs su rung / /

so ba der ni me lce'i gdong / /zangs gri lis ni lag pa brgyan/ /sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo che/ /shal ma li yi shing la gnas/ /bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /

tsa ri Ta yi yul du ni/ /ka ran dza gnas zhes bya ba/ /shak+ti gcigs pa'i skye gnas byung / /shak+ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra bA la stobs po che/ /sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyen skra can/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad/ /

au T+yan du ni lha mo che/ /gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs/ /shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i gzugs/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de/ /a sho

ka yi shing brten gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni/ /zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung / /lag na zangs gri phyar te thogs/ /dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo/ /gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /bdud

rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma/ /drag cing sngo la stobs chen ma/ /ral gri lag thogs lha mo che/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo/ /lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar/ /sA la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She

tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /ma ya pU rir 'dod ma ste/ /'jigs pa'i gdong gi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje shak+ti dge ba thogs/ /sgrub po rnams la stobs ster ba/ /gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste/ /'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas/ /der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i//

k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /pu tan ra ni a mra ke/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /thang gshol dang ni ga ya thogs/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed ma/ /da ru'i shing la brten te gnas/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /brtul zhugs chen po zhes

bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu dza na sa/ /khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan/ /pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dzi la'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed/ /rna chen zhes

bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas/ /bod yul du ni lhan skyes te/ /rang byung gi ni skye gnas byung / /chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs/ /zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /brag gi khyim la brten te gnas/ /

longs spyod zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o/ /mA la bar ni dbang bskur ma/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya thogs/ /sgrub pa po la rtag tu brtse/ /grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas/ /

skyes bu'i dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i/ /zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod/ /zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang / /dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu mtshan mo 'phyan pa dang / /rtag tu mtshan mo 'du bar byed/ /mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i/ /dngos grub

yangs pa ster 'gyur te/ /sgrub pa po yi las rnams ni/ /thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /me tog bdug pa de bzhin du/ /mar me dri yi khyad par dang / /gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar

mchod/ /sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs/ /bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog /g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul phug /grong dang bzhi

mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /sems can snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan

byad ma dang drag mo dang / /'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /

'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen mo/ /thod phreng phreng dang kha T+wAM ma/ /sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de nyid chen

mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad

kun nas 'dir spyon cig /oM kak+ka d+h+ya na ba pa ban d+ha na kha kha khA da nasar+b+ba duSh+TAn ha na ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a mu ka s+ya kA R+YaM ku ru hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT dzaHswA hA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/ /las rnams

thams cad sgrub par bsgom/ /oM bak+Sha bak+Sha sarba yo ge shwa ri hU~M hU~M hU~M dzaHswA hA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /gsad dang sdang dang bcing ba la/ /sgrub pos gtor ma'i de nyid kyis/ /las rnams

thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis/ /rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer ri yi rtse mo ru/ /'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par/ /'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster/ /gnas la sogs

par rtag gnas shing / /sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchog ster bar/ /sgrub pa po la the tshom med/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /ro yi bsgrub pa bshad par bya/ /rgan po ma yin rma med cing / /mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs/ /shin

tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /lha yi chu yis bkru bar bya/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod/ /ha hA hi hI hU~M hU~M he he/ /zhes bya'i dgod pa rnam pa brgyad/ /sgrub pa po yis chog bzhin bya/ /me la gnas pa'i sa bon ni/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba/ /spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la/ /sa

yi steng du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par/ /'bad pa yis ni myur du blta/ /sgrub pos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ /skye gnas dbus su rim bzhin blta/ /'bar phreng gi ni rgya mtsho ste/ /pho nya 'od dang bcas blta zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam

sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'du ba'i gnas nges pa dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste

brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams thams cad bsgrub pa dang / /de bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che/ /gang gzhan lus srul la sogs pa/ /de bzhin sngags

kyi phreng ba rnams/ /da ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ro la

g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni/ /mtshon gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang / /bu btsas pa yi ras dang ni/ /ba lang ko ba la sogs la/ /dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis/ /sgrub po mchog gis 'dri ru gzhug /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor

bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur/ /tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo/ /gzhon nu mo dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo dang ni tsa muN+TI/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i 'o/ /dbang po gshin

rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan dang ni gtso/ /sreg byed bden bral rlung gi lha/ /rim pa gsum pa'i'o/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /mig dmar dang ni gza' lag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /spen pa dang ni rA hu la/ /rim pa bzhi pa'i'o/ /tshangs pa

khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /ru dra skem byed sgo bzhir ro/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung po chen po'i khams rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso/ /'byung bo las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs/ /sgrub

pos cho ga bzhin du bsgrub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dbus su kun nas zlum por ni/ /ri mo mdzes pas bskor bar bya/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni/ /ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyi/ /dbus su khro bo chen

po bri/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ba ste/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /sku mdog sngon po drag chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bklubs/ /la zhon nyi mar bzhugs/ /sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par

mdzad/ /gar dang ldan zhing stag lpags mnabs/ /spyan gsum shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum/ /khrag gang ba yi gshol dang bcas/ /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyar/ /shar du mkha'

'gro ma bri ste/ /lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma/ /'jib byed lha mo nub tu bri/ /byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o/ /lha mo phag mo zhes bya ba/ /phyag bzhi yi ge hrIHlas byung / /sku mdog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs par byed/ /mda' dang de bzhin

gzhu dang ni/ /rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o/ /zhi ba mo ni pheM las byung / /mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /kha T+wAM Tam ru de bzhin no/ /gzhon nu ma ni ha~M las byung / /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi pa/ /mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum/ /

mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin no/ /tsa muN+Di ni ho las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /kha T+wAM dang ni thod pa dang / /gshol dang de bzhin Da ma ru/ /ba~M las byung ba'i tshangs pa mo/ /mdog dkar lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /pad ma dang ni thod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan

na mda' gzhu'o/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo ga~M las byung / /sngo bsangs mdog ste lag bzhi ma/ /mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng g.yon gyi lag tu thogs/ /khyab 'jug ma ni bam las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /chang dang chu yi thod pa

dang / /zhags pa kha T+wI de bzhin gzhan/ /dbang mo iM las byung ba ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje shak+ti thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang / /sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /ro yi stan

bzhugs spyan gsum dang / /stag gi pags pas rked dkris pa'o/ /shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ste/ /mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba spyi blugs pad+ma thogs/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /mdog sngon lag pa bzhi

dang ldan/ /mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog /lho ru ru dra bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi/ /rtse gsum mdung dang thod pa dang / /zhags pa dang ni bgrang phreng thogs/ /nub tu skem byed bri bya ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan//

shak+ti dang ni dbyug pa dang / /dpa' bo'i thod pa bgrang phreng thogs/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs/ /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang chen zhon pa ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang

ldan/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /me ni lug gi stan la zhon/ /kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa/ /me thab nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gshin rje ma he'i stan la zhon/ /kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug

pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /bden bral mi ro'i stan bzhugs pa/ /kha dog ljang khu lag bzhi pa/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /chu lha chu srin stan la bzhugs/ /kha dog dkar po lag

bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /rlung ni sha ba'i stan la bzhugs/ /du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ /ba dan dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /lus ngan gter gyi

stan la gnas/ /kha dog ser po lag bzhi ba/ /rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang / /rang rang dam tshig las byung zhing / /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs chen po/ /rang rang stan la gnas par bsam/ /

ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi/ /pho nya'i sgrub thabs de nas bshad/ /so sor stobs kyis tshar gcad pa/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /longs spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos/ /pho nya'i las ni

brtsam par bya/ /zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms byas te/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /dur khrod dang ni shing gcig tu/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /

de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su/ /drug drug tu ni byas nas su/ /de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /gnas la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin du/ /mar me dang ni dri yi chu/ /de yi chu yis bkang ba yi/ /bum pa'i

gos kyis mdzes par bya/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig gnas gyur cing / /de nas mtshan gcig gnas par bya/ /gnas sogs yang dag phyag byas nas/ /de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya/ /dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /de ltar

byas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par bsreg 'gyur te/ /bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni/ /nges par dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis/ /'byung

po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i/ /bu btsas la sogs ras la ni/ /tshon rtsi khrag dang bsres nas su/ /steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sen rtsi mar chen dang / /sha chen gyis ni bdug par bya/ /de la dri yis bsgos nas su/ /

de bzhin me tog mchod/ /lha mo chen mo mchod pa 'dis/ /me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes/ /shing gcig gi ni drung du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya/ /rgyal la sogs pa'i dus su ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni 'dri ru gzhug /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /

gzugs bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /gos ni ser po bgos par bri/ /lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar/ /me 'bar ba ni kun tu 'od/ /sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas ni/ /'bad de cho ga bzhin mchod bya/ /me tog dmar dang

dri la sogs/ /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yis/ /mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri bro/ /gsum par shing ni g.yo

'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni/ /sngags ni de la brjod par bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba/ /oM de be shwa ri hU~M/ phuHphuHphuH/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang

ba yi/ /dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa/ /byin gyis rlobs la nga sgrubs shig /de nas shin tu mdzes ma yis/ /bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang / /

gser zho gnyis ni ster 'gyur te/ /zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya/ /'dod la dga' ba'i 'bar byed ma/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /drag mo yi ni sa bon gyis/ /gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya/ /sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis/ /mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /

rtag tu sems can don brtson pas/ /'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab che/ /gzhan yang mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs/ /thang ka khru gnyis byas nas su/ /lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas/ /de nas ri mo 'dri ru gzhug /

dkar zhing dmar la shin du mdzes/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /lag ni sdigs mdzub lcags kyu thogs/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes/ /me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gsal/ /ha har rgod cing mig yon ma/ /sa la

khrag gis byugs nas su/ /gnas der bris sku dgram par bya/ /me tog dmar po la sogs dang / /dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma dgod/ /sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sgom zhing

zlos/ /'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya/ /oM DA ki nI hU~M phuHphuH/ bsgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni mdun du dgod/ /gsum

pa mdun du snang 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /dgra rnams bsad cing smad pa dang / /yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /

las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni pags pa la/ /'bad de thang ka brkyang

bar bya/ /'jib byed ma ni 'dri ru gzhug /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas

pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /lci ba yis ni byugs byas la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me sogs/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong / /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin/ /'bad

de bsam gtan gnas pas bzla/ /oM A kar+Sha ya phuHphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas su/ /zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ /'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi

ni ngu ba'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod/ /gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas/ /bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /

sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nas nyi ma re re zhing / /gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ /ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla/ /sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/ /'jib

byed ma yi mgo 'gems so/ /chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su/ /kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba glang la sogs ko ba ni/ /brgyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'drir gzhug /lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /

gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ha har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs/ /khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug /sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /

bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos/ /'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni char chen 'beb/ /gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun

du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM kriM kruM phuM phuHphaT/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi

zhes brjod par 'gyur/ /ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung / /nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog /gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs/ /bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang / /ji ltar

'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha yi bu mo'am mi mo'ang rung / /ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni

bsgoms nas su/ /de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te lnga brgyar bzlas na ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni/ /dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/ /kr-i zhes bya dang gsod pa dang / /hU~M gi

sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang / /gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /ba la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me sbar ba yi dbus su ni/ /

khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ /nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes pa/ /brjod cing sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur bas/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas shang kar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /dur khrod dang ni shing

gcig dang / /chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdor bsgrub/ /dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis/ /tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu/ /dpa' bo yi ni ras la bri/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul du bya/ /

sku mdog sngon po glang la zhon/ /lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /pho mtshan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs/ /ral ba'i cod pan mdung dang ldan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thob pa'i phreng bas rnam par bklubs/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan

na gshor dang ldan/ /bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su/ /'bum du bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/ /oM ka pA la mA la a la~M kr-i ta shir se hU~M hU~M/ /A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya ru drA ya sA hA/ /spyan

drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHru dra hU~M hU~M swA hA/ /'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /de nas de ni bsreg par bya/ /grub nas bya ba thams cad ni/ /byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /nor lha yi

ni sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu/ /sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu/ /khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya/ /kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes/ /zhal

gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams/ /thod pa pad+ma de bzhin no/ /rin chen gyi ni cod pan dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /bshang gci dang ni khu ba khrag /mchod pa nyid du sbyin bya zhing / /mi yi sha yis bdug byas na/ /

dngos grub nye bar byed par 'gyur/ /oM AHbadzra nA rA ya Na hU~M hU~M AHswA hA/ /spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma ma tsakra sA d+ha ya sar+b+ba a sur da man hU~M hU~M swA hA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis/ /lha ma yin ni kun gyi sgor/ /'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /

sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing / /rgyal srid dag kyang thob 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis/ /de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste/ /chu yi 'gram ni dben pa dang / /khyad par pad mo'i tshal du bsgrub/ /kha dog

ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas/ /zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / /mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams/ /sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis/ /bris

sku dag ni dmigs nas su/ /yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni/ /gur kum tsan+dan la sogs pa/ /dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing / /rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis/ /mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim de dag /b+ha ga'i dbus su sbyin par bya/ /oM bra h+ma A gats+tsha hU~M AHswA hA/ spyan drang

ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+hur+b+hu bsta twa bi du r+b+ba re Nu/ b+ha rgo de ba sa d+hi ma hi/ d+hi yo yon pra tso da ya ta /'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / /nor skyed pa dang mngon spyod sogs/ /las rnams thams cad nus

'gyur te/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg kun gyis 'grub/ /khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar/ /sgom pa dge ba byas nas ni/ /blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /

'bad de bris sku dmigs par bya/ /kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing 'khrug /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par

bri/ /dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang / /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje ral gri ste/ /gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams/ /mu sun di dang ba dan gsum/ /shak+ti dang ni bcu gnyis

so/ /oM a mo lha sid+d+ha sar+b+ba ar+tha me pra sA d+ha ya hU~M hU~M dzaHdzaHsA hA/ /spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHga hU~M swA hA/ /bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /de nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /lan cig bzlas nas thig le dag /sngags

pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur/ /rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste/ /dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang / /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /ma mo rnams kyi sgrub

thabs mchog /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /gza' rnams kyang ni bsgrub par 'dod/ /oM sar+b+ba ti thi nA k+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga le b+h+yaHswA hA/ gza' thams cad kyi sngags so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang po ste/ /swA hA'i mtha' can byin brlab ces/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam

sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu

pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes de nyid khyad par dang / /lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ /rtsa rnams gang la brten gyur dang / /de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /

bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis/ /de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso/ /bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du/ /dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i

mtshan nyid de/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin/ /dus ni myur dang ring ba dag /yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na/ /

lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi/ /snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su/ /de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa/ /lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni/ /de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang / /snying ga'i dra ba lte ba dang / /bzla

dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang / /mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs/ /dbugs ni chad cing chad gyur pa'i/ /lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru/ /'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni/ /'khor los dus

kyi bdag nyid brtsi/ /sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu/ /gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa/ /yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni/ /zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru/ /bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag //dus kyi grangs su

bstan pa dang / /nyin zhag dag ni brgyad du/ /de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod/ /nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'/ /gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du/ /zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /nyi ma brgyad du rlung rgyu na/ /de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni/ /rig

byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no/ /gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin/ /gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis las

ni mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu/ /sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag /lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni/ /nyin zhag brgyad dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyu na ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni/ /dbyangs kyi grangs dang

nyin zhag ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho zhes/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /gal te bdun phrag

gnyis su ni/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de/ /lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni/ /nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur de yi ni/ /tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du/ /g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyu na/ /lo gcig na ni gdon mi

za/ /gang zhig brgya phrag gnyis su ni/ /g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dang / /de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag /zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu na/ /de nas de yi

tshe tshad ni/ /zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni/ /brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /nyin zhag brgyad rgyu na ni/ /zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /de yi dus ni bshad pa yin/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru/ /

dri yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag /ji srid 'tsho ba bshad par bya/ /zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni/ /nyin zhag dus kyi grangs las ni/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni/ /rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni/ /de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu

gcig /nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba/ /zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na/ /zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gsum/ /sgo gcig

nas ni rlung rgyu na/ /zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho brjod/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang / /zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni/ /bcu gcig dag las mi 'tsho'o/ /nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgyu na/ /zla ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o/ /de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i/ /

grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya/ /bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni/ /bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin/ /cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du/ /bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/ /dus de dag ni bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor

pa rnams la ni dus/ /shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa/ /khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus las ni/ /de dag blta zhing yid ches bya/ /sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa/ /sna yi bar sha chad gyur na/ /nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med/ /cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas/ /

de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las/ /mig gi chu ni chad gyur/ /nyi ma lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba/ /steng du ltas te 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi/ /ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni/ /nyin zhag gcig las mi

'tsho'o/ /cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi/ /gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis/ /nyin zhag brgyad dag na 'chad/ /cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas/ /lce yi skud pa nag mthong na/ /lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi/ /cha

shas bcu gsum brten pa yi/ /de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/ /'byung bdag ni ma lus 'dren/ /srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni/ /mgrin pa'i blo na gnas pa'i rtsa/ /steng du bltas pa zhes

grags kyis/ /nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bco lnga gnas pa yi/ /steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na/ /zla phyed na ni gdon mi za/ /cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag /lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa/ /sen mo'i khrag

ni med gyur na/ /nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal/ /slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni/ /gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi na/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /cha shas brgyad gnas pa yi/ /byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /de bzhin

steng du bltas pa yis/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi/ /bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas/ /chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas/ /de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi/ /pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /

steng du bltas pa'i mchog dbang phyug /mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni/ /grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis rtsis pa la/ /bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag /lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang / /sum cu rtsa drug

brgyad kyis/ /zla ba la sogs bzhin/ /rim gyis rim gyis dbri bar bya/ /lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni/ /bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni/ /lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje

sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu ba'o// //sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa

ni gang bar gnas pa yi/ /yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar blta/ /de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/ /bshad kyis lha mo mnyan par gyis/ /sngon du bdag nyid sbyang

byas la/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i/ /pad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag /slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste/ /rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang / /go 'phang

gnas pa'i gnas nas ni/ /kun da zla 'dra rtag tu dag /rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog /rten du gyur ba'i pad+ma gang / /zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs/ /gong bu gnas ba zhes byar brjod/ /de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya/ /dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi/ /gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur/ /dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na/ /dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog /bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na/ /sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur/ /'thor bas

sna tshogs rdul du bya/ /rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes dbrog pa'i cho ga dang / /gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom

par bya/ /rlung gi dbus su me yis ni/ /yang dang yang du dbye bar bya//A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ba yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /bsnun dang ldan

par bsam par bya/ /'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te/ /bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya/ /'jug pa 'byung bar mtshon bya ste/ /de kho na nyid mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms

na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /nyi ma'i lam nas ngang phyung ste/ /lha mo cha shas ldan par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs nas ni/ /rlung dang me yis 'bar ba dag /de yi rnam shes

bzung nas ni/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug /bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nas su/ /'og gi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /ji srid zad par byas bar du/ /de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa

dang / /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/ /de nas gzhan lus la 'jug pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor ba yis bcings nas su/ /rtag tu srog dang rtsol ba

bya//khyod kyi gnas su sbyar nas ni/ /rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste/ /rim gyis sbyor bas phye nas su/ /cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis/ /sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /rang gi lus la sbyar bar 'dod/ /'gro dang

'ong ba'i bye brag gis/ /mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod/ /gang gi ring nas thos gyur ba/ /de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi/ /bsam pa

rjes su shes par bya/ /sgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi/ /sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /gang gi lam nas bsams na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par/ /zhugs te nyan pa gnyis su ni/ /'jig rten gsum dang

'dres nas ni/ /me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes mig gis mthong 'gyur

ba/ /shin tu ring na gnas pa yang / /sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong / /bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang rung / /de kun nga yis yang dag bshad/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang / /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /thar pa'i dngos

grub rab ster ba/ /mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha/ /thig le gzugs can mtho ris te/ /steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni/ /myur du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /

rna bdag ni grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i sgo las te/ /de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o/ /chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung / /thar ba'i lam las gzhan du 'gro/ /sngon du bum pa brtsams pa

yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yis bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yis bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dbugs

ni bum pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ /rlung gi sa bon rtsa bar te/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra dang sgra yis

'phul bar byed/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ /dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur/ /de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ni/ /mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya/ /rnal

'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i/ /sngo chen bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /sgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la/ /steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya/ /chu dang skya rengs ldan pa dag /g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la/ /zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste/ /dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog /

cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnyings dang smin pa 'joms par byed/ /lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis/ /nam mkha' 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bye brag gis/ /rkang pa'i 'khor lo sbyar byas te/ /yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas/ /nam mkha' la

ni 'gro 'gyur zhing / /mkha' 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su/ /lha yi lus kyis kun tu rtse/ /ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar/ /de srid nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur/ /slar yang lugs las zlog pa yis/ /kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar

ba ni/ /rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed/ /rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar/ /rang gi kha nas byung nas su/ /bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par bya/ /nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu/ /'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin/ /rlung gi

lam nas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la thim par gyur pa dang / /de yi sems ni bzung nas su/ /bdag la gzhug ste me la ni/ /bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas/ /de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar shes bya

ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang / /lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma dri

med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi

rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang / /seng ge rnam par rol ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /g.yas

kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /g+ho g+hu/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /gu g+h+ru/ mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa ni/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma 'o/ /

mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar rdebs pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor mo rdebs pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /rda~MSh+Tu/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gan d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus

reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/ /b+ha k+She yo/ lag pa rtsa la 'ju byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwi ra ti/ lag pa snying gar nyed byed na/ /da ni nga'i yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru

tsa pa ta ba ta/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shu n+ya tA/ /lag pa brkyang ste ltor rdebs na/ /phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o/ /kri kas ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas za bar 'dod ba'o/ /tsan+DA li ka /mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /zhe

gnag gtum la drag pa'o/ /nI la dan ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston/ /a na~M ga u ta/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dang / /da lta 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur gti/ /kun tu lta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/ /ta ra ga na/ tshes

gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg /gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o/ /sa ma tsha ya/ 'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing / /lag pas

lag pa bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor zas byin zhes bya ba'o/ /dzir na pa ta/ /lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /da ltar 'grogs la 'dong zhes pa'o/ /sa la ba ta/ /mthe bong yis ni srin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o/ /so ma/ mthe bong

khro bo bza' la sogs/ /sUr+ya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rnal 'byor pa dang rnal

'byor ma rnams kyi dag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de/ /glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas/ /e ba~M si ta a ru ni na b+ha/ dza ni te ma d+h+ya ma ga ma A ga ma d+ha ma pA si ni

sA sA sA/ /ni ga ma sA sA sA/ /ri ga mo b+hu pa ti/ sa ri ri sa ri rI sA sA sA/ /ma d+h+ya ma/ a d+ha ma sA sA sA/ shru ta ni sa sA sA sA/ sa ni sa ri tag+ha ma g+ha ma/ a d+ha ma d+ha ma sA sA sA/ ba ba ma ya ba ba d+ha na mo zhes bya'o/ /shar du me'o/ /gshin rjer ni bre'o/ /nub tu ni

mi'o/ /byang du ni ku'o/ /me mtshams su ni d+ha si'o/ /bden bral du ni ma ka'o/ /rlung mtshams su ni tu ku'o/ /dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o/ /a ni sgur po'o/ /i ni zla ba la skyes pa'o/ /u ni lha'i bla ma'i 'o/ /e ni pa ba sangs kyi'o/ /o ni nyi ma'i bu'i 'o/ /

a~M ni gza'i bdag po ri bong can no/ /a ni nyi ma'o/ /gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga las/ /zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya/ /zla ba ka rka Ta la dbang / /nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste/ /gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa/ /rA si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod/ /sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod

kyis bshad/ /skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi/ /bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs pa/ /gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya/ /zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang / /

skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan/ /gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te/ /sgang gshong rA si tshad ma ni/ /gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod/ /b+ha dra yi ni nyi ma la/ /dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba yi/ /gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni/ /rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa/ /de ni de yi 'chi

dus yin/ /sus kyang bskyab par mi nus so/ /khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la/ /lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang / /smyo zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi/ /gza' lag dang ni snar mar ldan/ /nyi ma bzhi pa

de la ni/ /dgongs mo 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /dgun zla tha lha mo che/ /skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni gza' lag bcas pa la/ /'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa/ /nyi ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la/ /skar ma mgo

dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni pa ba sangs 'dzom zhing / /nyi ma snga dro'i dus la ni/ /karka Ta ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la/ /skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni spen par ldan pa la/ /seng ge'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla tha

bcu gnyis la/ /skar ma nag par ldan pa dang / /gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni/ /skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni/ /bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la/ /skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang / /gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni/ /srang gi mi ni 'chi

bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la/ /nag pa dang ni mig dmar la/ /sdig pa'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla tha tshes dgu la/ /skar ma gro zhun ldan pa dang / /gzhu yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de dag nges par ldan gyur na/ /'chi 'gyur

bden par nga yis bshad/ /ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la/ /skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la/ /chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la/ /skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla bar bcas pa

la/ /bum pa'i mi ni zad par 'gro/ /ston zla tha sgyu ma che/ /nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la/ /skar ma nam grur ldan pa dang / /gza' ni spen par bcas pa la/ /nya yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sngon du skye dus shes bya ste/ /phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya/ /gzhan du

dus ni smra ba dag /thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur/ /skye dus shin tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya/ /tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa/ /de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i

mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar gcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /A li kA li mnyam byas la/ /sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po sogs/ /bltas te ming ni gzung bar bya/ /cha shas ldan la snying stobs can/ /de yi rigs ni shes par

bya/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang / /nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams/ /de yi rigs su rab tu grags/ /lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni/ /sngags rnams thams cad de las skyes/ /skye bo thams cad skyed

byed ma/ /des nam zhes bya bar brjod/ /a yig dang ni de bzhin A/ /ka tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan/ /ta pa dang ni ya sha ste/ /sde dgu yi ni yi ge'o/ /i dang slar yang lha mo I/ /de bzhin gzhan yang kha tsha Tha/ /tha pha dang ni ra Sha nyid/ /sde tshan gnyis pa

yin par brjod/ /u dang lha mo de bzhin U/ /ga dza Da dang yang dag ldan/ /da ba dang ni la sa ste/ /de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin/ /yi ge e dang de bzhin ai/ /de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+ha D+ha/ /d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin/ /'di dag sde tshan bzhi pa yin/ /o yig

dang ni au yig dang / /aM zhes bya dang tsheg drag bcas/ /slar yang nga nya Na na ma/ /'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin/ /kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang / /lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya/ /de dag skye bo thams cad kyi//skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas/ /yi ge bcu

gnyis sgyu 'phrul che/ /'tsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod/ /de dag rA si zhes bya ba/ /skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de bzhin 'og dang steng du lta/ /brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid/ /gnyis po gnyis su brjod pa yin/ /rkyang pa dang ni

sbyar ba ste/ /ring dang thung dang pham dang rgyal/ /de las steng gi rgyal ba ste/ /'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi/ /gza' dang rA si skar ma rnams/ /nyi ma la ni gnas de 'char/ /rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod/ /dbugs rgyu ba

dang yang dag ldan/ /thams cad rA sir shes par bya/ /karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra/ /de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang / /cha shas drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang / /khyu mchog dang ni bum par

bcas/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan/ /gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /nya dang lug dang de bzhin du/ /gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dag /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur/ /slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi/ /

gza' rnams 'char bar bshad par bya/ /'bras bu'i mig dang ldan par bya/ /ltas chen 'byung ba mnyan par gyis/ /nag mo dang / gtsigs ma dang / 'jigs su rung ma dang / rga las 'das ma dang / log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag mo'i gzugs can ma

dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang

ba ma dang / sum cu'i dbang mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'jib byed ma dang / lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni/ /ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ster/ /nyis 'gyur du ni byas nas su/ /dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan/ /

ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su/ /ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya/ /nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang / /drag mo'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid/ /nag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang / /drag mo sum cu'i dbang mo dang / /'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma/ /bcu po 'di dag

rtsub por grags/ /bag ma len dang bkra shis dang / /grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa dang / /lam du dpag dang thab mo dang / /chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs/ /ltas de las ni 'bras med pas/ /dge ba'i las rnams mi bya ste/ /rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che/ /

bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya/ /dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na/ /drag po'i las kyis smos ci dgos/ /lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni/ /phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa yi/ /rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gza' gang yin

pa dbyangs zhes bya/ /dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang / /rA si nyid du shes par bya/ /dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin du/ /skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs su blta/ /phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par/ /'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /g.yo ba 'char la g.yo

ba'i las/ /brtan pa la ni mi g.yor 'gyur/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pas gsal/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can

gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //da ni gza' dang skar ma ru/ /bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyis nyon/ /nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni/ /

thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la/ /bya ba ci yang mi 'grub bo/ //zla ba yi ni bzhi dang drug /mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga/ /gza' lag gnyis dang bzhi pa la/ /gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur/ /bla mas dang po gsum pa la/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /

ngan spong gi ni gnyis pa dang / /bdun pa la ni shes par bya/ /dal ba yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed/ /rigs 'char ba ni de dag gi/ /dus ni yongs su chad par bstan/ /de dag thun mong mtshan nyid de/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gzhan bshad nyon/ /lnga

nas nyi shu lnga yi bar 'di dag ni brjod bya ste/ /de las bcu gsum gsum gyi bar du re re spel bar bya/ /dgun zla tha chung sa nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug /gsum zung zla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mda' yon tan/ /thig le de dag gi ni 'tsho ba yang dag bshad pa

yin/ /lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni/ /lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni/ /de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya/ /de nas sgrub pos shes bya ba/ /gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /zla ba gang la gnas pa yi/ /dang po skar ma bgrang

bar bya/ /nyi ma yi ni chu tshod dag /ji snyed 'das pa de snyed ni/ /zla ba'i gnas skabs rgyu ba'i phyir/ /de ni drug cur bsgyur bar bya/ /slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan/ /drug cu ru ni bsgyur byas la/ /mda' dang sreg byed ro yi ni/ /dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad/ /

bcu gnyis dag gi nang nas ni/ /lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya/ /lhag ma'i cha shas de yis ni/ /skyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lhag ma'i chu tshod du ni brjod/ /dang po'i zla bar rab gnas pa/ /de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur/ /

gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste/ /gsum pa 'chi ste gsod par 'gyur/ /bzhi pa dgod de tshim par 'gyur/ /lnga pa nor te rnyed par 'gyur/ /drug pa rims te lus 'jig 'gyur/ /bdun pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /brgyad

pa 'jig rten brlag par 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu par gnas pa yis/ /lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur/ /bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing / /sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung / /bcu gnyis pa ni longs spyod de/ /

bde ba chen pos rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis/ /zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi

rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa/ /de rnams dbye

ba ci 'dra dang / /dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs/ /rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag /'di la bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dus kyi bgrang ba lus med cing / /thams cad du ni

thams cad gnas/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa ste/ /lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye/ /dus nyid dus ni med pa dang / /'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min/ /bden pa dang ni pa min/ /lha khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid/ /gang

zhig khyod kyis bshad pa ste/ /don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /lus las 'das shing dri med pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs/ /skye bo kun la sman slad du/ /dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nad med rlung

dang bral ba dang / /khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang / /ran par za zhing tshul bzhin rgyu/ /de yi mig 'dzums gzung bar bya/ /mig 'dzum mig ni btsums pa ste/ /mig 'dzums drug la cha shas ni/ /gcig ces bya bar brjod pa yin/ /yud tsam drug ni skad

cig ste/ /skad cig drug ni thang cig yin/ /thang cig drug ni yin/ /dus kyi bya ba 'dis/ /sum cu tham par bsgyur ba la/ /yi ge lci ba'i dus zhes brjod/ /yi ge lci ba bcu la ni/ /srog gcig ces bya'i dus su bshad/ /de ni bcu gsum bsgyur

ba las/ /de yang gnyis su bsgyur ba ni/ /srang gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /srang ni drug cu tham pa la/ /chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa yin/ /de brgyad thun gcig zhes bya'o/ /de bzhi la ni nyin gcig go/ /nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa la/ /mtshan mo'ang de

dang mnyam par bshad/ /chu srin nas ni sbal pa'i bar/ /nyi ma 'phel bar brjod pa ste/ /lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyis/ /nyin re zhing ni spel bar bya/ /chu srin las ni 'das nas su/ /mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'bri/ /tshad ma de dag bstan pa'i

phyir/ /zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la/ /snod ni dpangs su sor brgyad dang / /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /legs pa nyid du brdung bar bya/ /gser ni 'ol se sum cu las/ /sor drug pa yi tshad tsam du/ /thur ma legs par brdungs nas ni/ /thur ma de yis bu

ga ni/ /zangs ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbug /chu ni rnyog ma med pa las/ /srang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya/ /srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te/ /skye bo rnams la phan phyir bshad/ /chu tshod de ni yud tsam ste/ /thun phyed dang ni thun gcig dang / /nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad

kyis ni/ /rim bzhin zla phyed zla b.raspel/ /zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te/ /de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod/ /nyi ma 'gro ldog gnyis la ni/ /lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems

dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad

par bya/ /tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal/ /de bzhin du ni nab so dang / /me bzhi lha mtshams de bzhin du/ /nam gru sa ri gro zhun bcas/ /lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin/ /snar ma gre dang chu stod dang / /khrums stod dang ni bra nye dang / /lag dang mgo dang chu smad dang / /

khrums smad mi yi tshogs yin no/ /smin drug dang ni mchu dang ni/ /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /skag dang nag pa snron dang ni/ /sa ga dang ni snrubs rnams ni/ /srin po yi ni rigs yin par/ /bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad/ /smin drug rgyal ni ra yin te/ /mgo dang snar ma klu

yin no/ /lag dang snubs ni khyi yin te/ /lha mtshams na ba so phag gi rigs/ /mchu dang gre ni byi ba'o/ /skag ni byi lar bshad pa ste/ /nag pa sa ga stag yin no/ /dbo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni/ /khyu mchog zhes ni bshad pa ste/ /stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya/ /me

bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis/ /ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog /tha skar dang ni khrums smad gnyis/ /rta yi rigs zhes bya bar grags/ /chu stod dang ni gro zhun gnyis/ /spre'u'i rigs su brjod pa yin/ /bra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis/ /glang po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /

mon gru dang ni mon gre dag /mi yi rigs su yang dag gsungs/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru/ /lha mo ngas ni bden par bshad/ /chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dang / /ne'u le'i rigs su grags pa yin/ /mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad

kyis nyon/ /rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos/ /skar ma mi yi srog yin te/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do/ /skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dag /bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lug dang srang dang karka Ta/ /chu srin dag ni g.yo bar

brjod/ /sdig pa bum pa seng ge dang / /khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste/ /nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni/ /bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o/ /lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang / /mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs yin te/ /pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang / /zla ba mo yi gzugs

yin no/ /gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis/ /ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gza'/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje

can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //tshes dang skar ma gza' 'char ba/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /ro hi ta yi

tshes la ni/ /smin drug dang ni mig dmar la/ /'gron po lam du 'jug par bzang / /tshes de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur ba'o/ /ma ka ra yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang mig dmar ldan pa la/ /gzer dang 'joms sogs 'byung bas na/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /

swa p+na yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe/ /nag po nyid du shes bya bas/ /tshes de'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ /ro hi ta yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la/ /bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed/ /raN+Da yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang gza' lag bcas

pa dag /kun tu 'dzoms par bshad pas na/ /mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang / /sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni/ /bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan/ /de yang nag po'i dus zhes bya/ /b+ha dra yi ni tshes dag la/ /gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan/ /tshes de rnyed pa byed pas

na/ /sbyor ba po yis bsten par bya/ /mi ki ra yi tshes la ni/ /mon gru lha yi bla ma dag /gal te na ni 'dzom gyur na/ /'bru dang nor rnams zad byed par/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /tshes ni bcu gsum dag la ni/ /skag dang lha yi bla ma dag /

gal te 'dzom na nag po pas/ /nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /pr-i Sha b+ha yi tshes la ni/ /stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang / /gal te khrums stod 'dzom na ni/ /tshes de rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing / /dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed/ /

br-i d+d+hi ka yi nyi ma ni/ /chu stod dang ni pa ba sangs/ /gal te 'dzom na nad kyis ni/ /gdungs shing 'joms par the tshom med/ /'byung po yi ni nyi ma la/ /bra nye dang ni pa ba sangs/ /'dzom na gshin rje'i mche ba ste/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /kur+m+ma yi ni nyi

ma la/ /smin drug dang ni spen pa ru/ /gal te 'dzom par gyur na ni/ /rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang / /bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob/ /byA ku li yi nyi ma ni/ /skag dang spen pa ji zhig ltar/ /'dzom na gdung bar byed pas na/ /nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang / /

zla ba nya yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na/ /tshes de shin tu spang bar bya/ /me yi mtshams su mi kir bri/ /gshin rje ru ni raN+Da ste/ /srin po ru ni kur+m+ma bri/ /chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste/ /'jigs byed du ni byA ku li/ /gter

gyi phyogs su swa pa na/ /mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri/ /shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad/ /b+ha dra nas ni raN+Dar te/ /byA ku li dang pr-i Sha b+ha/ /'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni/ /rigs mchog ma ni khyod la

bshad/ /khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra/ /swa pa na dang kur+m+ma ni/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste/ /rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin/ /nya la me mtshams gnas pa ste/ /stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas/ /de ltar de dag dbus su ni/ /gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba

nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /ri mo mnyam du lta bas na/ /des na shes rab can gyis spang / /zhi dang sdig par lta bas na/ /lta ba'i chad pa 'byung ba ste/ /myur du gsod par byed pa yin/ /sgra gcan gyi ni rgyu ba yi/ /dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye

brag gis/ /blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las tshes grangs

dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /lus can kun gyi rnam shes te/ /lus las 'das shing dri ma med/ /lhun po dang ni ti se dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bigs

byed sogs/ /shar gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang / /lan tshwa can dang 'o ma yi/ /rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang / /'og dang steng du gang gyur pa/ /khams gsum ma lus zad par bya/ /gzugs

la sogs pa'i phung po dang / /skye mched khams rnams zad par bya/ /'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams kun zad bsams te/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan

nyid rnams/ /mnyam nyid stong pa nyid du blta/ /thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni/ /ba glang rmig par grong khyer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor can gyi cho ga bzhin/ /sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom/ /de dbus yid kyis bltas nas ni/ /der ni mtshan ma brtag par

bya/ /me mar lta bus zhi bar 'gyur/ /dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang na/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtha' mar du ba'am gnag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin/ /rlung gi mdog ltar rab

'khrugs na/ /de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur/ /'od zer dkar po long long pos/ /blo ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub shes bya/ /bkra shis kyis ni lam ston yin/ /cho ga 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang / /gzhan gyi gzugs sogs

dbu ma rnams/ /de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed par bya/ /ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni/ /gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na/ /sems ni myur du thar bar 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /bram ze gtsang ma

gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin kun dang sbyor/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po

chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //ye shes khyad par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag can ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol mo mnyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lci bar gyur pa sum cu pos/ /dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa/ /sems kyis byas pa'i las tshogs kyis/ /bsgom par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i/ /sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro/ /srid pa'i zhags

pas rtag 'jigs pas/ /de yi 'gro ba mi mthong ngo / /'du shes rnam pa lnga dang ni/ /lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro/ /lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta/ /lha min ye shes khro ba'o/ /ye shes zhan pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non/ /byol
