song ye shes blun pa ste/ brten pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /rgyu yi ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs su ma smin dang / /bla ma'i lam ni sun 'byin pa/ /de dag kun gyis

mi shes te/ /gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che/ /las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis/ /

ye shes bye brag sprul pa yin/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa can/ /gnod sbyin lha min grub ba po/ /klu dang byol song gsang ba pa/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci/ /mi dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmyal ba la sogs gang gyur dang / /gsal ba'i gzugs

su mngon brjod dang / /phra mo sgo nga las byung ba/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /brtan pa la sogs thams cad dang / /rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang / /sa dang rdo dang brag la sogs/ /thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pas/ /thams

cad snang ste gzhan du na/ /ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul bas/ /de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phyi rol bstan bcos

sun 'byin pa/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/ /snying po las kyang snying po mchog /rnal 'byor bstan bcos mtshon par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje

sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje

dril bu'i mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /rdo rje'i blos ni shes par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mngon spyod kyi/ /rdo rje dag ni thams cad kyang / /gser la sogs pa legs par brdung / /rdo rje kun gyis shin tu brgyan/ /cha gsum du ni bzung nas su/ /

cha brgyad ska rags legs par brgyan/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu/ /rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /chu srin las ni byung ba yi/ /rtse mo pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba

ste/ /rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol/ /cha gsum gyi ni tshad dag la/ /dbu ma cung zad ring yang rung / /'di ni thun mong tshad yin no/ /rtse mo kun gyi dbus ma zlum/ /phyogs sogs rtse mo 'dus pas gnas/ /dbus na mi zur brgyad dag tu bya/ /dbus kyi cha

yi tshad ldan pa/ /gnas pa lte ba zhes bya'o/ /rin chen ma ra ka ta ltar/ /de yang cung zad zur brgyad bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus dag ni/ /so sor cha ni gsum gsum 'dod/ /steng gi pad+ma zla ba ni/ /drug cha kun nas zlum por bya/ /de dag la ni seng ge'i sna/ /nas

phyed tsam du mtho bar bya/ /mche ba yi ni mthar gnas pa/ /de ni drug cha zhes byar grags/ /cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /so so ru ni dgu dgur 'dod/ /cha gsum bla ma'i mtha' ma ni/ /steng gi cha gnyis spangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang de bzhin no/ /'dab ma la ni

gang gnas pa'i/ /chu srin cha gcig nyid yin te/ /de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod/ /rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas/ /chu dang zheng ni mnyam por bya/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de/ /gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa/ /cha la sogs pa

sngon du ni/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin ldan par bya/ /pad+ma zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /chu srin gyi ni mche ba'i gzugs/ /'og gi chu srin las byung ba/ /chu zheng ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /rtse mo ye shes rang bzhin 'byung / /kun gyi dbus su rnam snang ste/ /shar phyogs su ni mi

bskyod pa'o/ /lho ru rin chen bstan pa ste/ /'od dpag med pa nub tu dgod/ /byang du don yod grub pa ste/ /rtse bzhi la sogs lha yin no/ /pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /mkha' snying kun tu bzang po

dang / /gnod sbyin bdag dang 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sa snying sgrib sel de bzhin te/ /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /'dab ma brgyad la ji bzhin brtag /dbus su ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /bcu gsum gnas su thim par bya/ /gzhan yang 'dab brgyad lha mo

brgyad/ /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrogs dril bu nyid/ /lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di/ /phyogs kyi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /slar yang de bzhin lha mo bzhi/ /skul byed rin chen sgron ma

dang / /de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga nyid de/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/ /ro langs ma ni nub tu gnas/ /lho ru de

bzhin tsaN+Da lI/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ste/ /dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /gdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste/ /rtse mo dag ni gdengs par bya/ /de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs po ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'dul

byed pa'o/ /zhi la zhi ba'i lha nyid de/ /rigs kyi rim pa'i cho gas dbye/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do/ /cha lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa ni/ /spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar

grags/ /rna cha cha drug tshad du bya/ /mgul do cha ni bzhi pa ste/ /snying gar cha lnga pa ni gzung / /gsang ba dang ni lag par yang / /cha drug pa ni gzung bya ste/ /ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes 'phel/ /

cho ga'i bya ba 'di nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /de nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje'i ska rags phreng gnyis bya/ /shel sgong dri ma med pa ltar/ /dra ba dra ba phyedapas

brgyan/ /cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas brgyan/ /dbus kyi khog pa zab pa dang / /thams cad dga' byed bcud kyi gnas/ /de nas pad+ma rin chen dang / /ut+pal ku mu da yis brgyan/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cha brgyad du/ /lha

mo la sogs brgyad du grags/ /de yi steng du lha mo ni/ /sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya/ /shar phyogs su ni sgrol ma ste/ /de bzhin byang du gos dkar mo'o/ /nub tu bdag mo'i ming can te/ /lho ru sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya/ /mdog mdzes

sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma/ /de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma'o/ /nam mkha'i phyogs kyi dbus su ni/ /gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang dag gnas/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bu'i dbyibs/ /gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs su ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes rab

bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/ /de yi dbus kyi stan la ni/ /steng du pad+ma rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo dgu pa bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te/ /thams cad spro zhing sdud pa mo/ /oM ltar mchog ni stsol bar 'grub/ /bya ba thams cad rab sgrub ma'o/ /ye shes

rdo rje'i dril bu ni/ /rtse mo dgu pa de bzhin no/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba ska rags byas/ /pad+ma mchog gi 'dab ma dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /lha mo yi ni mtshan mas mdzes/ /shar gyi phyogs su

pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dkar pos mdzes par bya/ /gshin rjer pad+ma sngo dmar te/ /nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma dmar/ /byang du ut+pa la ni bri/ /bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbus na ni/ /lha mo yi ni zhal gcig bri/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o/ /gzugs mdzes bskor bas yang

dag gnas/ /steng gi pad dang rdo rje ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi ye shes dbyig pa ni/ /zur brgyad pas ni mdzes par bya/ /dril bu 'di ni lha mo che/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /de nas dpa' bo'i dril bu ste/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba'i skra

rags ldan/ /de bzhin du ni shes rab dang / /bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dra ba dra phyed dpyang bar bya/ /sor dgu ru ni yangs pa ste/ /kha ni sor lnga'i tshad du bya/ /de las cung zad lhag bya min/ /rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu

pa/ /skal ba bzang po thams cad dang / /dbang phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi/ /'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ster/ /de bzhin phun tshogs thams cad dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub mchog ni

gsal bar ster/ /da ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /dril bu'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /khar ba las byung sgra snyan byed/ /khong stong dang ni bum par ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri la sogs mtshan ma can/ /dra ba dra ba phye pas spras/ /chu srin las ni byung ba

yi/ /ye shes lnga yi rnam dag pas/ /rtse mo lnga dang bcas pa ste/ /ska rags gnyis gnyis dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan/ /de bzhin ska rags gnyis dbus su/ /pad+ma la ni pad phreng gnyis/ /rin chen la ni rin po che/ /de bzhin ska rags ldan par bya/ /don yod grub

pa zhes bya la/ /ska rags gnyis dbus ral gris brgyan/ /kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas/ /dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ /kun la'ang 'khar ba'am yang na ni/ /lcags gsum las byung dril bu ste/ /cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /rdo rje'i

rigs la ba glang gdong / /ska rags rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ /bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi/ /kha khyer cung zad gru bzhir bya/ /ba glang gdong ni myur ba ru/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed/ /nad med stobs ni rtag ster zhing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog

par byed/ /sngar bstan rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ /rdo rjes mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /rin chen dbang sogs thod pa dang / /rang rang mtshan ma shes par bya/ /sor brgyad dam ni bcu drug gam/ /nyi shu las ni lhag mi bya/ /ji ltar nus shing rjes mthun par/ /

bsgrub pa'i dbang pos de dag bya/ /kha yang cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /sor mo lga las gzhan pa spang / /lha mo 'di ni dril bu yi/ /sgrub thabs rgya cher bstan pa ste/ /thun mong gi ni rgyud kun las/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro

kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang tshad kyi cho ga'i

rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /dul zhing cha lugs mdzes pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /rnal 'byor bzo

yi cha la mkhas/ /thams cad du ni 'jam par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/ /rtag tu gtong la dga' ba dang / /bsam gtan sbyor la mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i

sems bskyed pas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon skyob ste/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag mkhas/ /mgon med rnams la gnyen ltar brtse//mdza' sdug gis ni legs pas lta/ /sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms/ /dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus/ /

phyag rgya brda yi sbyor ba rig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la/ /brda yis sbyor ba ston pa dang / /gnyis med sbyor ba mi phyed gnas/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo spyod la gus/ /dbang bskur don gyi yon tan 'byung / /gnas sogs mthong ba'i ngang tshul can/ /

de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gsol pa/ de lta bu'i slob dpon la ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /yan lag byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom

nyid/ /spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar yon tan rang bzhin lus/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu blta/ /ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par/ /ye shes can gyis

mtshan shes nas/ /de lta'i bla ma 'bad de bsten/ /gang yang khro dang sgyu can dang / /ngag ni shin tu rtsub pa dang / /yon tan dag gis chog shes pa/ /de ni bla mar bsten mi bya/ /gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang / /las kyi de nyid bshad kyis nyon/ /khro dang bcas shing

rtog ger gus/ /na so dag ni yol ba dang / /gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang / /zhen dang chags pas bcings pa la/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen ni/ /de la bshad par mi bya'o/ /gang yang nga rgyal med pa dang / /sgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing / /de bzhin chos

la mngon par dad/ /de la man ngag sbyin par bya/ /gzhan du na ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyi ni gsang ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /lha yi dam tshig spyod pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs gsang sbyor ba/ /dmod pa dag tu gang byed pa/ /skrag

pa kun dang bcas bzhin du/ /mnar med par ni myur bar ltung / /slob dpon gyi ni mal stan dang / /lha ma dang gdugs dang na bza' sogs/ /nye ba'i longs spyod thams cad dang / /grib ma 'gom par mi bya zhing / /co 'dri bar ni mi bya'o/ /gal te byas na

dus kun du/ /de ni kun tu gzir 'gyur zhing / /don nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas gzir 'gyur te/ /mchod rten bshig dang sdig mtshungs pas/ /de bas grib ma'ang 'gom mi bya/ /slob dpon smod byed gang yin pa/ /rmi lam

du yang dngos grub med/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal chog sogs rim pa yis/ /sngon du bslab pa sbyin par bya/ /dngos

po rang bzhin med par ni/ /mthong ba byang chub rim pa ste/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams ni/ /ngo bo med la dngos mthong bas/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ste/ /de ltar rnam bcur phye ba

las/ /dkar po yis ni dkar 'gyur la/ /nag pos de bzhin 'bras gnag 'byin/ /des na de dag spang bya ste/ /sems can rnams la tshig rtsub dang / /tshig 'khyal smra ba spang bar bya/ /snying rje yi ni sems kyis su/ /'tshe dang gnod

pa spang bar bya/ /bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang bla'i/ /srog chags gsod pa de ltar min/ /rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis srung zhing / /bla ma'i bka' stsal thams cad bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnal

'byor pa/ /du smra ba thams cad dang / /sems can kun la skyon brjod min/ /gzhan gyi bud med spang bya zhing / /log pas 'tsho dang rnyed la sogs/ /de bas thams cad spang bar bya/ /dga' bdag la spyod pa dang / /gtor ma dag gis dus sogs la/ /

dam tshig spyod bar byed pa yang / /bza' dang bca' sogs tshod zin bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams/ /sems can mgu las dngos grub 'byung / /de la dang por re zhig slob mas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la

btsugs la lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang / /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha

mo/ /bdag nyid chen mo rnams dang ni/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dzo pa swA nA ya A t+mA nAM ni r+ya ta yA mi hU~M/ sar+b+ba A tsA r+ya pU dzo ba swA nA ya At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi hU~M/ sar+b+ba sa twa pa ri trA Na a r+the A t+ma nAM nir+yA ta

yA mi hU~M/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la/ /slar yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ khro dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / /tshig rtsub zhe gcod spang bar bgyi/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang srog gcod dang / /rku 'phrog dag ni spang bar bgyi/ /longs spyod rgya chen spang

bgyi zhing / /des dang bcas pas chog shes bgyi/ /gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phyi rol bstan bcos spang bar bgyi/ /zhes so/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sdom pa'i cho ga bla na med/ /dang po bla ma dam tshig ni/ /thob pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung / /

bstan dang de bzhin nges par bstan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /bstan pa dag ni longs spyod yin/ /nges par bstan pas mya ngan 'das/ /bshang gci la sogs bza' ba dang / /rigs dang rigs min de bzhin gzhan/ /sngags rnams kyi ni man

ngag gis/ /ming sogs cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /slob mas dngos po bsgoms nas su/ /mya ngan 'das pa bstan par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad bya zhing / /du yang ni smra bar bya/ /ma byin par ni blang bar bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par

bya/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya'o/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing / /sngags kyi yi ge bzlas mi bya/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed par dka'/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yi/ /thabs kyis rnal

'byor pa yis rnyed/ /bdag nyid lus dang gzhan gyi lus/ /bdag nyid bde mchog byang grol te/ /bdag gi lus la ma chags shing / /gzugs brnyan sogs 'dra'i lha ru brtag /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje

sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang / /dam tshig dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas mkha'

'gro ma rnams ni/ /sa rnams la ni rnam rol pa'i/ /sngags kyi 'byung bas rol pa ste/ /da ni yang dag bshad par bya/ /oM k+Sha mA~M k+Sha mA~M phaT phaT/ ka ra ka ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ /hIM hIM/ hA~M hA~M/ da ha da ha/ ku ru ku ru/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ hU~M hU~M/

ki li ki li/ pha sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba lam+bi na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hra hra/ A kaD+D+h+ya a kaD+D+h+ya/ tsi li tsi li/ si li si li/ sa b+ta phA tA la ga tA b+hu dza~M ga sar+b+ba~M bA/ ta r+dz+dza ya ta r+dz+dza ya/ hrauM hrauM/ pheM pheM/ hrIM hrIM/ d+hi li d+hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bI

re shA ya ma hA k+kalpA g+ni san+ni b+hA ya/ /dza TA mu ku Tot+ka TA ya da~M Sh+Sha ka rA lo gra b+hi Sha Na mu khA ya/ /sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ni/ byA g+h+rA dzi nA m+ba ra d+ha rA ya/ ma hA d+hU mrA na d+ha kA ra/ wa pu ShA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ /oM hU~M swA hA phaT/ oM shrI badzra he he

ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra swA hA/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha na ma hi/ swA hA hu/ bau ShaT he/ hu~M hU~M ho/ phaT ha~M swA hA/ oM hIMhIM hU~M/ heM heM hA/ oM ba~M/ ha~M yo~M/ hrA+eM moM/ hreM hriM/ hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha badzra bar+Na ni ye/ badzra

DA ki ni ye swA hA/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA~M/ bid+yA rA dzA hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badzra DA ki nI bar+Sha bar+Sha pa ya hU~M b+hu swA hA/ oM g+hi li g+hi li/ bar+Sha bar+ShA pa ya hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho/ /Tha Tha

Tha swA hA/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ /oM ka ka k+Shi ka ka ru dri ka ka in ba ha ri Ni/ a mu ka s+ya dzI bi ta~M shI g+h+ra~M A gats+tsha ka ki ya thA su khaM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba ti thin k+Sha tra gra ha ma~M ga le b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM a mu ni ka s+ya i nu ni pa si mu ni ha tha lA~M g+ha le hi pha De i a mu ka s+ya mu kha ha tha

ban+d+hA ni swA hA/ oM ra t+na badzra badzra hri phaT/ oM gra swA hA/ oM a Te ba Te na Te ku na Te Tha ke Tha ra ke ta ru bi ta ru be na ta ke li li lu lu hi le mi le ti le Shi le si le a the ba the na the kun the a na pa Ti ha na pa ti ka s+ya ka s+ya g+ha s+ya g+ha ma hA g+ha s+ya ma hA g+ha s+ya swA hA/ /oM ping+ga lAk+Sha ya hU~M hU~M hU~M

phaT swA hA/ /sngags 'di yis ni sgrub pa po/ /las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te/ /sngags kyi cho ga ji bzhin du/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra bA rA hi Ar+ya a pa rA dzi te trai lo kya mA te ma hA ba d+ye shwa ri sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he/ /ma hA badzre badzrA sa ne/

a dzi te a pa rA dzi te ba sh+y-I ka rin tra b+h+ra ma Ni/ bi Sha sho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni kro d+ha ni ka rA li ni/ san+t+ra sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni pa rA dza ye/ bi dza ye dzaM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni mo ha ni/ badzra bA rA hi m+wa hA yo gi ni kA me shwa ri kha ge /tad+ya thA/ pro taM ge pro taM ge /ha na ha na prA NAM kiM ki ni khiM khi ni/ /d+hu na d+hu na badzra ha ste sho

Sha ya sho Sha ya kha T+wAM ga ka pA la mA la d+hA ri Ni ma hA pe shi ta mA~M sA sha ni ma nu Sha an+t+ra pra bri t+ti san+ni d+h+ya na ra shi ro mA lA bra~M thi ta d+hA ra Ni/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ha na ha na pra NA~M/ sar+b+ba pA pa sa twA nA~M sar+b+ba ba shU nA~M ma hA mA~M sa ts+tshe da ni kro d+ha mUr+t+ti da~M Sh+T+wA ka rA li ni ma hA mu dre/ /shri he ru ka de ba s+ya gra ma hi Shi sa ha

sra shi rau/ sa ha sra bA ha be/ sha ta sa ha srA na ne/ dzA li ta te dza se/ dz+wa lA mu khi ling ga la lo tsa ne/ badzra sha rI re/ badzra A sa ne/ mi li mi li/ ti mi li/ ti mi li he he ha ha/ hU~M hU~M kha kha/ d+ha d+hu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a dwai te ma hA yo gi nI pa Thi ta sid+d+he draiM ng+haM draiM d+haM/ graM graM he he

ha ha/ b+hI me ha sa ha sa/ bI re ha ha ho ho hU~M hU~M/ trai lo kya bi nA sa ni/ sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ri te hU~M hU~M phaT/ siM ha rU pe khaH/ ga dza rU pe gaH/ trai lo kya u da re sawa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa hU~M hU~M phaT/ bI rA dwai te hU~M hU~M hA hA ma hA ba shu mo ha ni yo gi shwa ri twaM DA ki nI sar+b+ba lo kA

nA~M ban+da ni sa d+yaHpra t+ya ya kA ri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ b+hU ta trA sa ni ma hA bI re pa ra ma sid+d+he bir+ya yo ge shwa ri phaT hU~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ a A/ i I/ /u U/ r-i r-I/ li lI/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/

pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de nyid/ /lha rnams kun gyi mchog gi gnas/ /sngags rnams thams cad skyed byed pa/ /rgyud rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i

mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du

sbas pa nges bar bya/ /de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar/ /sna tshogs lte bar mi shigs dge/ /bris nas cho ga bzhin du sngags/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan la ni thim par bya/ /der gnas pa

las dpa' po ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed tu/ /ye shes longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /sprul ba 'thob gyur gdon mi za/ /'og dang steng 'grub rtag tu ster/ /bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro/ /pho nya mo de grub kun ster/ /mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang / /

tsum+ba na dang rtag par 'khyud/ /sbyor ba'i gnas kyi khyad par nyid/ /ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni/ /thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad/ /bden pa thams cad sbyin bya ste/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mor

gnas la/ /gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa/ /rang gi cho ga de bzhin bya/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu/ /pad+ma dpal gyi nags rtsa ba/ /brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nas/ /rang bzhin

de dag de 'gro ba/ /mchog tu mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis/ sangs rgyas kun tu rang nyid 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po

chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i brda'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /ye shes 'byung ba bshad par bya/ /bong bu'i cha byad rnal 'byor bdag /

yid shugs kyis ni zlog par byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mdzes ma dang / /dum skyes gzugs can rnal 'byor ma/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'di dag nyid/ /brda yi tshul gyis bstan pa ste/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya 'dod gzugs can/ /bong bu'i cha byad khrag 'dzag zhal/ /

sbrul gyis dkris pa'i mdung rtse ni/ /gsum pa mkha' 'gro'i lag na thogs/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa ni/ /steng du bstod de thogs pa dang / /mi ro'i stan bzhugs cher 'bar ba/ /skra ni kham pa gyen brjes shing / /spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis rnam par bklubs/ /phyag na zangs gri bsnams shing rtse/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras ldan pa'i/ /rin chen mthon po'i gnas su sgom/ /tshe thung ba dang shi ba yang / /'tsho ba dang ni tshe ring bar/ /bong bu'i tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lag mthil gnas pa bzhin

du mthong / /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las he ru ka'i rnam par rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par

phye ba ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sgrub po'i cho ga ji bzhin te/ /nyin re'am yang na zla re'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo re ni/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs na ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po yi lag

g.yon gyis/ /pad+ma'i snod ni bzung nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa ba dan ni/ /gsum par byas te bsgom par bya/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung / /mngon par 'dus byas legs bris pa/ /slob dpon kun la sbyin par

bya/ /lha yi rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan mas rnam par bklubs/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom skyes pas/ /skal ba bzang po'i gar chen bya/ /pad+ma mchog la reg byed pa/ /lo gcig bar du'ang ma byas na/ /sgrub pos dam tshig spang 'gyur te/ /

des ni dam tshig spangs nas su/ /slar yang mi bya'i sdom pa blang / /gzhan du sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /rim pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las brda yis rol pa dang dam tshig dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //mtshon cha kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu bshad

kyis lha mo nyon/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang / /de bzhin lag pas 'phen pa dang / /'phangs nas slar ni gzung ba dang / /lag pas 'gyed dang rnam pa lnga/ /dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang / /ltong rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur/ /'gengs

dang 'phen dang gsal ba'o/ /grims pa nyid dang sran 'dzugs dang / /mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang / /rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag /lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /'di yis lus la brgyan nas ni/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /

mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams kyis/ /nams kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul du/ /bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas/ /g.yas su rab tu skor byed cing / /mda' 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur/ /shar phyogs legs

par bsrangs nas ni/ /nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su/ /gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /thams cad 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum por ni/ /ci rigs par ni legs par bzung / /yi ge

oM gyis khar drangs te/ /ji srid yi ge a brjod pa/ /de srid bar du gzung bar bya/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ci rigs par ni drangs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung nas su/ /der ni cung zad dbye bar bya/ /'gengs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /'gengs

pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /chang pas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su/ /mig ni cung zad gdangs te blta/ /lta ba chang pa la gtad de/ /myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog /mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang / /de bzhin kun nas

zlum po ste/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su/ /steng dang de bzhin 'og tu ni/ /rim gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis/ /khams gsum rgyal sri chen po la/ /bde bar rgyal zhing longs spyod 'gyur/ /dpal khams gsum

rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las

mtshon cha thams cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi go cha'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang / /zhing skyes ma ni gang yang rung / /sgrub pos de dag thams cad la/ /

phan pa'i mchog gis bde ba bsgrub/ /'di dag gzhan pas longs spyod kyi/ /bsnyen bkur gyis ni bsten mi bya/ /skal bzang phyug cing sra ba ste/ /rang gi bkra shis rigs spyod dang / /ri mo can ni sems g.yo zhing / /'o ma 'dzin sbom pad+ma can/ /lte ba dung 'dra dung can

ma/ /de dga'i rim pa bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i shing gi rtsa ba 'bad pas khar bcug na/ ji srid bu mo'i bde ba rnyed pa de srid kyi bar du sngags pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gan du sha dang la k+Sha na'i sman btags te til mar du btsos la rkang pa la bskus na yang 'dod pa la

spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags so/ /a shwad tha'i shing kan da dang pa tha dang / pu shel tse rnams cha bsnyams te/ shing a ra ka'i 'o ma dang sbyar la des pho mtshan dril phyis byas na/ gdon mi za bar 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu myur du chu dron gyis bkrus na ji srid 'dod pa

bzhin 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags te lte bar bskus na/ bud med sra ba rnams kyang khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /til dkar po dang / nA ga ge sar dang / dpa' bo tshig 'greng gi rtsa ba rnams btags te/ sbrang rtsi dang ma he'i mar dang lhan cig

tu sbyar te lte bar bskus na/ pho mtshan mkhrang zhing bud med chags pa che ba rnams yid 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / bong bu ltar ni 'dod spyod pas/ /bde don gnyer la bde ster bar/ /'dul ba don yod rgyud las ni/ /ngas ni 'dzin pa bshad pa yin/ /ling

gas bud med bsgrub bya zhing / /b+ha gas skyes pa bsgrub par bya/ /ling ga don gnyer mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ /b+ha ga la ni spel bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyar sbyor ba yin/ /rnam par rol pas ling ga zhes/ /bya ba ru ni bstan pa ste/ /rnam par 'byed pas b+ha ga

yin/ /ma bstan gsal bar bstan pa ste/ /nye bar bstan pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /a yig ba yi yi ge las/ /b+ha ga ling ga bskyed nas ni/ /bung ba la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha'

'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las pho nya gdul ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos

mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can bsod nams med pa dang / /sngags rnams bsten par mi nus pa/ /de rnams dngos grub ji ltar 'thob/ /stobs med rnams ni stobs bskyed cing / /sngags dang bral yang bsrung 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus

nas ni bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sems can rnams ni chags bya'i phyir/ /lha yi sman ni bshad par bya/ /de ni ji ltar gzung bya ba/ /de ni de bzhin bshad par bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi dngos byas nas/ /phyi nas sa

bon bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams ni chags pa dang / /de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs byed/ /sa bon la sogs gzugs pa yi/ /las rnams sna tshogs 'byung ba'o/ /lha mos gsol ba/ ji lta bu'i sa bon la sogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

e raN+Da da dang gser shing la sogs pa'i shing gi sa bon te/ /de la sogs pa yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ /mar ngo'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /zla mtshan tshon dang dbang po bsgo/ /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bcas/ /

de bzhin lha yi lcug ma gzugs/ /pa tha dang ni rgyal ba dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub pa nyid dang / /tsakra ang ga rmongs byed rnams/ /mtshon cha thams cad zlog par byed/ /tsakra ang ga lag pas 'phen/ /pa tas 'khrul 'khor 'phen pa ste/ /'phangs nas bzung ba

rgyal bas so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lag pas 'gyed/ /rmongs byed kyis mi 'phen pa'o/ /'di dag brda yi tshul gyis bshad/ /de dag thams cad grims par ni/ /g.yon phyogs su ni bsgril nas su/ /mgrin pa'am spyi bor gzung byas na/ /mtshon cha lnga ni bzlog par

byed/ /gdol pa'i bu mo mdog sngon gyi/ /pad+ma las ni skyes pa dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgos nas su/ /nyi tshan dag la bskam par bya/ /khyi nag po yi thod pa ni/ /dur khrod sa yis bkang ba ru/ /mar ngo'i tshe brgyad bcu bzhi la/ /pha mes kyi ni nags su gzugs/ /

de ni 'bad de blangs nas su/ /dur khrod dang ni bla ma dang / /he ru ka dpal mchod byas la/ /grub pa'i sa bon gzung byas te/ /thod pa ru ni bzhag pa la/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags te/ /mgul par bcings na sbed par 'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bcing ba

dgrol/ /bya rog nag po'i thod pa dang / /mdung ngam mtshon gyis bsad pa yi/ /skyes bu yi ni thod pa ru/ /sbrul nag po yi zhag gis ni/ /gser shing la sogs sa bon la/ /yang dang yang du bsgos byas la/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag dang / /dur khrod sa yis bsregs

bkang ste/ /bzhi mdo lam gyi dbus sam ni/ /chu bo yi ni 'gram dag tu/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /thod par dgongs mo'i dus su bzhag /gtor ma sbyin zhing bcu ba dang / /bsrung ba dag ni nyin re bya/ /kha T+wAM ga sogs ldan pa yi/ /dpal ldan he ru ka gzugs

bya/ /lag g.yon thod pa bzung nas ni/ /brtul zhugs spyod par ldan pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bskyed byas na/ /sha za la sogs co mi 'dri/ /sa bon smin pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas sngon bzhin mchod byas nas/ /grub pa'i rdzas kyi phud dag

ni/ /khyad par du ni bla mar dbul/ /sgrub pos der ni khar bcug na/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su snang / /lha dang sbyin bdag gnod sbyin sogs/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gzugs bsgyur te/ /lha yi bu mo rnams dang ni/ /ji srid 'dod kyi bar du rol/ /dgongs mo

gtor ma sngon 'gro bas/ /ji bzhin lhag par gnas bya zhing / /shing bskyed cho ga rgyas pa las/ /'byung bzhin bsrung ba la sogs bya/ /gzhan du me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /drag po'i gdon gyis gtses pas na/ /'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas skra grol

gcer bur ni/ /gyur pa'i bu mo'i lag g.yon du/ /gal te smin pa'i 'bras bu de/ /sgrub pa pos ni gzhag par bya/ /gang dang gang gi khrag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du 'bras bu bsgo/ /de yi khrag gis bsgos pa yi/ /sha la sogs pa mtshon bya zhing / /de yi thal

bas bskyed par bya/ /de yi thod par gzugs pa dang / /de yi sha khrag zhag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du bcu bar bya/ /de yi sha sogs bdug pa dang / /byug pa'ang yang dang yang du bya/ /sngon du gtor ma bsrung sogs bya/ /sa bon de ni smin pa dang / /cho ga bzhin du

blangs nas ni/ /kha yi nang du bzhag gyur na/ /cho gas ji ltar bsam pa bzhin/ /de dang de yi gzugs 'gyur te/ /de bzhin 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /mi snang bar ni thams cad 'gyur/ /sa bon ma nyams stobs kyis su/ /'ug pa la sogs rnams kyis kyang / /cha

tsam yang ni mthong mi nus/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mtshon cha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /nyi ma gzas ni zin dus su/ /paN+Da ra ka zhes bya dang / /dpa' bo gcig pa stobs po che/ /snga dro nyi ma shar dus su/ /byang phyogs rtsa ba brkos nas ni/ /mnyam

par bzhag pas gzung bar bya/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rmongs par byed/ /bgrod dka'i lam ni nyam nga ru/ /stag dang seng ge sogs 'jigs dang / /rgyal po rkun po'i 'jigs sogs pa/ /thams cad bsrung ba bla na med/ /yang na de yi ge

sar ni/ /zho dang lhan cig bza' bar bya/ /ji srid mgrin par lud kyi bar/ /de srid bar du bza' bar bya/ /ji srid de ni ma zhu'i bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i lus su 'gyur/ /de lus mtshon cha phog pa yang / /chu yi thigs pa ltar mi snod/ /mtshon cha thams cad zlog pa

yi/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /sngon bzhin gtor ma sogs ldan par/ /ang ko ta ka'i rtsa blangs la/ /de las ri lu byas nas su/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkri bar bya/ /lha mo der ni khar bcug na/ /mtshon cha thams cad ldog 'gyur zhing / /rims dang glo

dang dbugs mi bde/ /nad rnams gzhan yang tshar gcod la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dug dang ni/ /lus srul la sogs gzhan dag kyang / /seng ge yis ni glang chen bzhin/ /dri tsam gyis ni 'bros par 'gyur/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad pa/ /be ti zhes bya lha yi

sman/ /rgyal dang nyi ma dag gam ni/ /yang na zla ba gzas zin tshe/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs na ni/ /gtor ma mchog sogs byas nas su/ /'bad de sngags ni bzlas byas la/ /skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yis/ /shin tu

mnyam par bzhag ste gzung / /cho ga'i bya ba 'di yis ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha bdun du ni bgos nas su/ /mkhas pas spyi bor gzung bar bya/ /rim pa 'di yis sgyu ma che/ /mtshon cha thams cad zlog 'gyur te/ /ji snyed sa stengs gnas pa yi/ /

mtshon cha gzhan yang zlog byed pa/ /nyi ma yis ni mun pa bzhin/ /bltas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /nag po chen po sman chen po/ /blo ldan gza' ni nyi ma dang / /skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa la/ /mchod rten gtor ma'i cho ga yis/ /shin

tu mnyam par bzhag pas gzung / /khyu mchog rwa yi sa dang ni/ /phyi nas gcig tu bsre bar bya/ /lo gcig bar du nus dang ldan/ /de nas gsar pa gzhan gzung bya/ /ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ /mtshon chas chod cing phugs mi 'gyur/ /sgrub po de yi

lus la ni/ /dug kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /b+h+ra ma dan ta'i sman gzung bya/ /pad+ma yi ni 'dam dang ni/ /lhan cig tu ni bsre bar bya/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /i shwa ri ni gzung bar bya/ /mtshan ma gcig gi sa dag dang / /

shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsre/ /yon tan dag ni snga ma bzhin/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab che/ /ku ma rI zhes bya ba'i sman/ /gzhon nu ma yi rkang rjes rdul/ /de yi gci ba'i sa dang bcas/ /ma he rwa yis dang ldan/ /'dam 'di sum cu gsum pas mchod/ /

de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /biTh+Nu bi zhes bya ba'i sman/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /nags kyi phreng ba gzung bar bya/ /bzlog ste 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /'jim pa 'bad de blangs nas su/ /de dang lhan cig ldan par bya/ /lus la gnas na bsrung bar

'gyur/ /rtse gcig yid kyis mnyam par gyis/ /phag mo zhes bya'i sman dang ni/ /phag gi lus las byung ba'i 'dam/ /ma he'i rwa yi nang du gzhag /lo gcig bar du nus dang ldan/ /des kyang snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo ri rtse dang / /glang chen

mche bar chags pa'i sa/ /dbang po shing gi rtsa bar bcas/ /sum cu gsum dbang 'dam zhes bya/ /de nas tsa muN+Da bshad bya/ /kha dog gcig pa bla na med/ /tsaN+Da li yi rtsa bzung la/ /sngar bstan bzhin du bsgrub par bya/ /shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig pa'i/ /

sa dang sbyar te 'dam du bya/ /de ni lus la gnas par du/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad bya/ /snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/ /mngal nas dang po byung ba ni/ /ma yi nu zho ma 'thungs pa/ /rdo rje phag mor bcas pa yi/ /he ru

ka ni mchod byas la/ /de ltar byas nas lha mo che/ /gtor ma byin la yang yang bsrung / /de yi ltag pa gshegs nas su/ /lce ni rtsa bar bcas te blangs/ /bring+gi rA dza gser shing dang / /ka ga ga dza gzhan mi thub/ /lha yi sman dang bcas pa las/ /ril bu ru ni byas

nas su/ /khar bcug nas ni bzung gyur na/ /mtshon cha thams cad zlog par 'gyur/ /ji snyed sa steng gnas pa yi/ /mtshon cha rnams kyang zlog byed na/ /kha cig la lta smos ci dgos/ /rims dang dug dang nad rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe/ /de dag

thams cad zlog 'gyur te/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /de yi sha dang zhag dang khrag /gcin dang khu bar bcas pa yis/ /yung ba nag po la byugs te/ /rgyal dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /bgegs ni zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'byung po kun gyi

gtor byin te/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sngags pa cho gar ldan pa yis/ /byis pa'i ro yi lto bar ni/ /mar ngo 'byung bo'i nyi ma la/ /dur khrod kyi ni sa gzhi ru/ /cho ga bzhin du btsugs la bskyed/ /ce spyang la sogs bsrung bar bya/ /'dab ma brul

zhing smin pa dang / /sngar gyi cho ga bzhin blangs te/ /de ni lus la gnas kyi bar/ /skad cig gis ni dpa' bor 'gyur/ /sngar bstan byis pa'i lce dang ni/ /yung ba nag por bcas pa las/ /ri lur byas te khar bcug la/ /g.yul du zhugs na dgra bcings 'gyur/ /de

nas dpung rnams thams cad ni/ /rmongs byed skud pa bshad par bya/ /skar ma rgyal la nan tan du/ /nags kyi ras bal blangs nas ni/ /zla mtshan gyis ni byugs byas la/ /sum sgril yang ni sum sgril du/ /gzhon nu ma yis 'bad de bkal/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i

sngags kyis ni/ /bzlas shing mdud pa de tsam bya/ /mdud pa dag ni thams cad kyang / /ma mo brgyad du brtag par bya/ /de ltar sngags brgyad byas pa yis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su/ /so so re re dag la yang / /brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas byas la/ /lag

pa g.yon par btags na ni/ /mda' dang ral gri la sogs pa'i/ /mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rig pa 'di/ /rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /nags kyi shal ma li yi ni/ /bal ni

skar ma rgyal la blangs/ /bu mo yi ni gci ba yis/ /btags te de dang bsre bar bya/ /bu mo yis ni bkal bar bya/ /gza' dang skar ma dge ba dang / /zla ba stobs can dag la ni/ /mdud pa'i sbyor ba byas nas su/ /so so zhing ni re re la/ /sngar gyi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub/ /'di yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi 'ching / /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'ching 'gyur te/ /'di ni ba glang lhas su bsgrub/ /su rag ta dang seng ldeng dang / /nim pa dang ni ar

ka'ang rung / /skar ma rgyal dang nyi ma la/ /shing bu de gnyis bzung nas ni/ /myos par byed pa'i rig pa che/ /rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste/ /lan brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /shing bu phan tshun drud gyur na/ /dgra bo nang na 'thab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni chu dang ni/ /mdzub

mo'i khrag dang bcas pa la/ /myos par byed ma'i rig pa bzla/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa sngon 'gro bas/ /dpral bar thig le byas na ni/ /chom po dang ni rkun po dang / /'tshe bar byed pa gzhan yang rung / /skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam

sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ stobs skyed pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang gis

sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon dag /snye ma'i rtser gnas blang bar bya/ /sngon bzhin zla phyed kyi/ /'byung po'i nyi ma gza' bzang la/ /gau ri la sogs mkha' 'gro mar/ /bcas pa'i he ru ka mgon mchog /

bud med kyi ni me tog gis/ /yang yang du ni bsgo bar bya/ /bsgegs pa 'am ni mtshon gyis bsad/ /spyang ki la sogs ma bros pa'i/ /bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru/ /cho ga de yis bskyed par bya/ /de yang rnga mo dag gi ni/ /'khrul 'khor la ni bskyon nas su/ /de

yi rtse mo blang bar bya/ /sngags pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /bu mor bsgom zhing de bskul ba'i/ /chu ni 'bad dang bcas te gtor/ /bud med ro bsregs sa dang ni/ /thal bar bcas pas de bkang la/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon nyid/ /thod pa der ni bskyed par bya/ /

bgegs dgra dang ni gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni mngon par bzlas pa yis/ /mchod dang gtor ma phul nas ni/ /ci rigs su ni bsrung bar bya/ /zhi ba'i tshigs bcad sngags kyis ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i chus/ /der ni bcu ste bskyed par bya/ /gzhan du yi

dgas 'tshe ba 'byung / /'bu la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / /shing bskyed rig byed bzhin du bya/ /de ni 'bad de smin pa yi/ /ras bal dag ni bzung nas su/ /gzhon nu ma yi khrag gis ni/ /bsgos la sngar gyi bu mo yi/ /skra dang bcas pa bu mos bkal/ /skud pa de yis

bcings gyur na/ /de ma thag tu skyes bu ni/ /'dod chags gdungs pa'i bud med 'gyur/ /bkrol na slar yang rnal mar 'gyur/ /bsgegs pa'i ro yi khrag dang ni/ /zhag gi yungs kar yang yang bsgo/ /gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru/ /tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal la ni/ /

lam dang rigs mchog thod pa ni/ /ro bsregs sas bkang ro dang bcas/ /nyi ma shis pa dag la gzugs/ /de ni shin tu smin pa blang / /ci rigs 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i mar/ bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun/ /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /sa mtha' lnga

ba yang dag ldan/ /rlung gi sa bon las byung ba/ /de yi mod la bskrad 'gyur te/ /bsgrub bya de ni slar mi ldog /bsgegs nas bsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro/ /cho ga'i rim bzhin mchod byas la/ /sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /mar des yan lag kun tu byug /he ru

ka yi spyod pa yis/ /sngags ni zlos shing kun tu gnas/ /sbyor chen de ni bgegs bskrad bya/ /sngags pa chen pos de dus su/ /bgegs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /ro yi lus las byung mthong ste/ /de nas der ni de dus su/ /grub pa'i rdzas

kyi bar chad byed/ /g.yog dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa pa pos/ /de tshe phyag rgya bcing bya ste/ /skyes gnas phyag rgya dpral ba yi/ /steng du bcings la bstan bya zhing / /drag po yi ni gzugs kyis su/ /dpa' bo'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan/ /sha dang khrag tu bcas pa

yi/ /gtor ma rnams la sbyin/ /de yi lus las 'dzag pa'i mar/ /blangs te ku ba la sogs blugs/ /de yis lus la byugs tsam gyis/ /nam mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ral gri mig sman dang / /rtsi la sogs pa rab tu

'grub/ /khrag dang mi yi zhag gis ni/ /yungs kar la ni bsgos nas su/ /mi ro yi ni khar bcug la/ /srung ba la sogs 'bad de bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin bskyed pa'i/ /yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi/ /bsgrub bya de ni rims nad kyis/ /'dzin te de ma thag

tu 'chi/ /so bya yi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag gis snum ster bsgo byas la/ /de yi thod pa ro bsregs pas/ /bkang ba ru ni bskyed par bya/ /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du ci rigs bya/ /smin pa'i 'bras bu khar bcug na/ /skyes bu bya

yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de ltar sa bon gzhan dag kyang / /dog pa la gnas 'bras bu gzung / /de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur te/ /kha las bton na sngon bzhin 'gyur/ /bya rnams kyi ni tshe dang mtshungs/ /glang po'i gzugs sogs de bzhin bya/ /bi da ri

yi sa bon ni/ /mar ngo skar ma rgyal dang ni/ /gza' ni nyi ma dag la gzung / /ma du lung ga'i yar ngo la/ /mi ro'i zhag gis byugs nas su/ /zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe/ /de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs/ /zin pa de yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de yi rus

pa rkang dang ni/ /sha la sogs pa bskyed par bya/ /de yi pags pa rus pa yi/ /phyag rgyas yan lag brgyan byas la/ /blo dang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin/ /mchod pa byas te thal ba gtor/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bcug /

bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu bzla/ /sha za la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /gzhan du na ni bton te khyer/ /sa bon de ni smin par gzung / /lcug ma gsum gyis dkris nas su/ /khar bcug na ni sbed 'gyur te/ /nyi ma zla ba sogs pas

kyang / /'jig rten gsum 'dir mthong mi 'gyur/ /ma du lung ga gcig pu ni/ /khar bcug ma du lung gar 'gyur/ /bton na slar yang snang 'gyur te/ /'bras bskyed thun mong cho ga'o/ /de nas sngags kyi cho ga bshad/ /spyan ma'i sngags kyis gzugs par bya/ /mA ma kI yi

sngags kyis bcu/ /sgrol ma'i sngags kyis bskyed par bya/ /de bzhin gos dkar mas ni bsrung / /'di dag sa la sogs pa ste/ /thams cad 'dzin cing gso ba yin/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /spyan la sogs pas bsrung bar bya/ /de nas dgongs mo'i dus su

ni/ /ku ba khan de'i sa bon dag /mi yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la/ /bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyed/ /de yi dpral bar thig le bya/ /bza' dang bca' sogs rnam pa lnga/ /mthong ba tsam gyis kha bar 'gyur/ /de nas thig le phyis na ni/ /de yi mod la

rnal mar 'gyur/ /'ol ma se yi sa bon ni/ /bram ze yi ni thod pa ru/ /skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyed/ /de nas phyung ste slar yang ni/ /tha mal skyes bu'i thod par bskyed/ /sa bon de ni grub gyur na/ /kha ru bcug pas de gzugs 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ma

ning sogs/ /bya yi cho ga bzhin du 'gyur/ /kha las bton na slar yang ni/ /tha mal gzugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal po'i sman/ /gsal shing bsad pa'i thod par bskyed/ /zhag

dang khrag gis gtor bar bya/ /de yi rtsa ba blangs nas su/ /srin lag gi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya/ /spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha la sogs pa dbang du byed/ /ba glang rna ba'i lcug ma ni/ /rnyed nas de yi sa bon ni/ /

smin pa bzung ste khar bcug nas/ /g.yul du zhugs na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bring+ga rA dza bzung nas su/ /shan pa'i bu mo sngon mo yi/ /khrag gis zla ba mar ngo la/ /yang yang byugs te sbyar bar bya/ /ba glang rna ba'i lcug dang ni/ /skyes pa'i thod par bskyed dang bcas/ /

'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyed pa yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rlag byed par/ /sangs rgyas nges pa'i rgyud las gsungs/ /bsgrub par mi bya ba dang ni/ /'grub par mi 'gyur ci yang med/ /

man ngag dag ni ma gtogs par/ /dngos grub snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ko ka na ta'i 'bras bu ni/ /sna chen gyi ni thod par bskyed/ /dur khrod skyes pa'i bring+ga ni/ /thod par bskyed pa'i rtsa dang bcas/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cig btags/ /

ril bu mdzes pa byas nas ni/ /grib ma la ni bskam par bya/ /de yis thig le byas nas ni/ /'gro kun bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /am bra'i shing gi rus pa ni/ /mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang / /de bzhin pa yi rnam lngas byug /lag par khu ba byugs nas su/ /

'bras de gang la byin pa ni/ /de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /bal po se'u'i 'bras bu ni/ /khrag gis byugs te bud med kyi/ /thod par btsugs pa smin pa yi/ /'bras bu de ni mi dbang la/ /rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur/ /ku ba khan de'i sa bon ni/ /

nim ba la sogs 'bras bus byug /ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yi/ /chags can kham phor sa bon bskyed/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung / /mar ngo yi ni nyi ma la/ /nyin phyed nyi ma cha dus bsgrub/ /de ni blugs pa tsam gyis su/ /chang sogs

brlag 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni/ /rtsa brgyad blangs nas zhag gis ni/ /bsgos te legs par thum por bya/ /bud med ro yi lto bar gzhug /nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /de yi mchin

par bcas pa'i sas/ /de yi thod pa bkang bar bskyed/ /gtor ma dang ni srung ba dang / /bdug pa dang ni chus bcu sogs/ /shin tu 'bad dang bcas pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad sngon bzhin bya/ /ji srid smin gyi bar du bskyed/ /de nas sngar bzhin

'bad pas blangs/ /bud med kyi ni khrag gis byug /'dab ma dang ni sa bon sogs/ /de yi yan lag ci yang rung / /bud med gang dang gang bsnun pa/ /de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'ol se'i sa bon 'bad de gzung / /dmar ser thod par bskyed par bya/ /de

yi lcug ma bzung nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas sgo nga bya/ /de yi nang du chang blugs na/ /snod der gnas pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /ji srid ma zad bar du ni/ /de na gnas pa'ang zad mi 'gyur/ /chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhan sa/ /de bzhin thong bar chags pa'i sa/ /grog mkhar

gyi ni sa dag dang / /mtshan ma gcig pa'i sa rnams ni/ /bskyed pa kun la shin tu bsngags/ /gci ba'i shul gyi sa bzung la/ /sngags kyis mngon par byin gyis brlab/ /bong bu'i gcin dang bcas pa las/ /mkhas pas mi yi gzugs brnyan bya/ /gser shing sngar

bzhin sbyang byas la/ /sngags pas de yi khar bskyed bya/ /de yi yan lag lnga bzung ste/ /ril bu dag ni mdzes par bya/ /las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te/ /khyad par du ni dbang du byed/ /yungs kar la sogs 'bras bu ni/ /glang po che yi sha dang ni/ /khrag

dang rus pa'i zhag la sogs/ /de yi thal ba sogs pas byug /de yi thod par bskyed pa dag /de ni kha ru bcug tsam gyis/ /glang po che yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /'di ni thun mong cho ga ste/ /de bzhin rta dang ma he sogs/ /de bzhin stag dang ri bong sogs/ /cho ga de

bzhin bskyed pa yis/ /khrag bcas bsgoms nas stag sogs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga'i dus su ni/ /grub pa'i gza' la sogs dang sbyar/ /rtag tu sgom dang bzlas la dga'/ /dam tshig spyod pa bsrung ba dag /de yis rtag tu 'grub 'gyur

te/ /gzhan du na ni 'bras bu med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las 'bras bu bcos ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas A li

kA li gnyis/ /de nyid las ni kun skyed cing / /spro zhing sdud par byed pa po/ /tha snyad kyi ni cho ga ste/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid thun mong ba/ /cho ga 'di dag ji bzhin nyon/ /a zhes bya ba mdog dmar ba/ /mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga mgo bo

dang / /gsang ba dang ni lte bar bsam/ A zhes bya ba thig ler ldan/ /mtshal dang 'ol ma se dang ni/ /ku su ma ni lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgor ni bsam byas la/ /myos shing sems dang bral ba dang / /lkugs shing rnam par nyams par bsam/ /

de yi lus ni rang nyid kyi/ /sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs bsgoms na/ /ring por mi thogs dbang 'gyur te/ /rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /i zhes bya ba skas lta bu/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa'i thung ngu ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga lte ba dang / /de bzhin du ni

mgrin par bsgom/ /I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi/ /li khri yi ni mdog lta bu/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dpral bar dgod/ /gang gi lus la gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa'i mchog ni bkod pa yis/ /myos shing cha lugs nyams pa dang / /sems dang bral bar

byas nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /lkugs pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa ni/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od/ /u zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi/ /mgrin par zhags pa lta bur bsam/ /glog dang mtshungs par 'bar ba

yi/ /dbyangs yig mchog ni drug pa ste/ /U zhes bya ba bsgrub bya yi/ /snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /lkugs shing myos par gyur pa dang / /lus ni g.yo zhing sems dang bral/ /gang du sgrub pa por gnas par/ /'khrugs pa bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /

bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas/ /dbang du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /r-i zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /dpral ba lus dang bral ba ste/ /dbyangs yig gi ni dam pa de/ /snying ga dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /de nas r-I ni mun pa'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bo dang / /de

bzhin rkang pa mgrin pa ru/ /ring po de ni bsgom par bya/ /bdun pa dang ni brgyad pa 'dis/ /myur du skrod par byed pa ste/ /sems ni rmugs shing nyams gyur nas/ /sa gzhi ma lus rgyu 'gyur te/ /mthong ba yi ni tshe 'di la/ /slar yang zlog par mi 'gyur ro/ /l-i

zhes bya ba srid pa sdom/ /bya rog gi ni gshog pa 'dra/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i mig dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /dbyangs yig ring po l-I zhes pas/ /bsgrub par bya ba dkris par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la bsgoms tsam gyis/ /sdang bar

byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems can kun gyis smad pa dang / /skye bo kun gyis brnyas pa dang / /mar khu phyung ba'i 'ba' cha bzhin/ /skye bo kun gyis spong bar 'gyur/ /cog la ma yi mtshal dang ni/ /lham bu chu gsher lta bu'i mdog /e zhes bya ba dbyangs kyi

rgyal/ /gsang dang lte ba snying gar dgod/ /ai zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /li khri dang ni nyi ma'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mig dang de bzhin du/ /kha dang mgrin par bsgom par bya/ /sgrub pa'i mchog gis yid la ni/ /las 'di byas pa tsam gyis su/ /khams

gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /mthe bo'i khyon tsam du ni mthong / /gdong dang gdong ni mngon phyogs te/ /de yi yi ge'i cha shas kyis/ /dbugs kyi ri mo lcug mas dgug /cha shas lcug ma'i dam tshig dbang / /a zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig ni/ /thig le dang ni zla phyed

bcas/ /zla ba gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yi ge mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ /sangs rgyas ri mor yang dag gnas/ /'di ltar A li kA li zhes/ /bcud len thams cad ces byar brjod/ /gtso bo la ni thim byas

nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang sbyar/ /de yi 'og tu phyi nas ni/ /yi ge thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar/ /'dis ni bsrung ba byed par brjod/ /thig le zhes bya sems yin te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa yin/ /zla ba gnyis dang

yang dag ldan/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni lha dang lha min dang / /mir bcas myur du dbang du byed/ /oM zhes bya ba nyi ma ltar/ /'od zer 'bar ba stong dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi

ni mgo bo dang / /dpral ba khyad par snying gar bsgom/ /oM zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid can/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /khyab pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /bskal pa yi ni me dpung ltar/ /dbyangs kyis khyab nas bsgom pa dang / /

dbyangs kyi me yis bsgrub bya yang / /rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms byas nas/ /dgra bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /de ma thag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /a ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ /'tshe ba zlog par byed pa'ang yin/ /A ni gshegs su gsol ba ste/ /ji ltar

'dod bzhin lha yang byed/ /bud med kun gyi mngal du ni/ /bsam na khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni gzhan dag la'ang / /dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya/ /a la sogs dang yi ge rnams/ /lus la bkod na dpyad mi dgos/ /de ltar dbyangs

kyi las rnams ni/ /khyod la bdag gis gang bstan la/ /dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni/ /lus la go char bkod de bya/ /A zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dgod/ /a ni byin pa gnyis la bsam/ /I ni brla la dgod bya ste/ /i zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas/ /u

ni lte ba'i rtsa ba ste/ /U zhes bya ba lte ba'i dbus/ /r-i ni lte ba'i steng du dgod/ /r-I zhes bya ba snying gar yin/ /l-i zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod/ /de bzhin l-I ni rkan la'o/ /e zhes bya ba kha la ste/ /de bzhin e ni sna la'o/ /o ni rna bdag la ste/ /au zhes bya ba dpral

bar ro/ /oM ni mgo la dgod byas te/ /aHzhes bya ba rgyab tu dgod/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar por te/ /gsad la thams cad sngon por ro/ /du ba lta bur bsams na ni/ /bskrad pa nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dbyangs yig kun gyis byin brlabs 'di/ /bdag

gi de nyid gsal ba yin/ /sgrub po bdag nyid dam pa yis/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yi/ /phyi nas las rnams shin tu sbyar/ /de nas rig pa'i de nyid 'byung / /las rnams rtag tu byas pa ste/ /ka nas ma yi mthar thug pa'i/ /

las ni blo gros chen pos nyon/ /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /gang gis sa gsum thams cad ni/ /sgrub po shin tu rgyas pa yi/ /dbang du de dag thams cad 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras ster ba/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams

kyi/ /mdzes ma khyod la sngar bshad nas/ /da ni ka sogs yi ge yi/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad/ /lha mo yi ge dang po ni/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing / /li khri spungs pa lta bu yi/ /thig ler ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i snying ga

dang / /lte ba dang ni mgo bor bsgom/ /de yis bsgrub bya'i lus kyi ni/ /nang du phug ste khyab par bsam/ /de yis lus ni 'khrugs nas su/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral ba dang / /brgyal bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ /de srid

dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas 'gyur la/ /kha zhes bya ba'ang brtson chen ma/ /lham bu chu gsher lta bu dang / /nyi ma 'char kha lta bu'i mdog /thig ler bcas pa gzi brjid che/ /gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa ste/ /

bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang pa kun tu dgod/ /de yis bsgrub bya phug nas ni/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral bar bsam/ /sgrub pa po yi mchog gis ni/ /de yi lus ni dkrus pa dang / /myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya/ /de yis

shin tu rgyal 'gyur zhing / /yi ge'i dbang pos che bas na/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ /ga zhes bya ba'i sa bon che/ /rang gi lha yi sdom pa ste/ /tsheg drag bcas pa gzi brjid che/ /gtso bo char

sprin lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /khyad par du ni snying gar bsam/ /de yis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus/ /yi ges kun tu phug bsam na/ /lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas na/ /'dar zhing de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid dang ni nor dang

bcas/ /sdang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa/ /khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni/ /ji srid nyi zla yod kyi bar/ /ma lus par ni 'joms par byed/ /g+ha zhes bya ba sgyu ma che/ /bskal pa'i me dang gzi brjid mtshungs/ /steng du thig les brgyan pa ste/ /ku su ma yi khu ba

'dra/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lte ba dang / /gsang ba snying ga kha dang ni/ /mgo bo ru ni bsams tsam gyis/ /bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nas su/ /sems dang bral zhing nyams nas ni/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa ru/ /shin tu de yi dbang du

'gyur/ /nga zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /sde tshan gyi ni mtha' mar gnas/ /de ni 'dod pa'i mda' yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /de ni bsgrub bya'i gsang bar bsam/ /khu ba dag ni 'dzag par byed/ /gsang ba ru ni zhugs pa yis/ /thams cad

du ni 'bigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag gi ni tshigs kun tu/ /de yis phug pas myos nas ni/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ni/ /myur ba nyid du dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /de la chags dang bral mi 'gyur/ /yi ge lnga po kun gyis kyang / /

bdag nyid go cha bskon par bya/ /ka zhes bya ba snying gar dgod/ /kha zhes bya ba mgo la ste/ /ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu/ /g+ha zhes bya ba go char bya/ /nga zhes bya ba sgrub pa po'i/ /lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni/ /dgug dang gsad la

sogs par sbyar/ /cho ga de ltar byas na ni/ /dpyad mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ /tsa zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /rlung gi gnas kyi yi ge ste/ /sgrub pos de yi snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang par bsam par bya/ /bsgrub bya rlung la gnas nas ni/ /kun tu 'pho bar

bsam pa dang / /sems dang bral bar gyur nas su/ /nam mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du/ /rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /khyer ba ru ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang / /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /

bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pas na/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge che/ /gsal zhing mig sman nag po'i mdog /cha gnyis pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bor bsam/ /de yi mgo la du ba yi/ /

tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab/ /cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi/ /lus ni de yis bskor bar bsam/ /slar yang tsha ni tsheg drag bcas/ /lte ba ru ni bsams nas su/ /lan gsum du ni brjod byas na/ /yi ge 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog /bsgrub bya

rmongs shing sems dang bral/ /dgra bo mdangs ni nyams nas su/ /sa stengs ma lus pa ru 'khyam/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dza zhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal/ /du ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che/ /'od zer ldan zhing shin tu 'bar/ /rdul

phran dag ni stong du 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /gsang bar yi ge zhugs par bsgom/ /yan lag tshigs kun phug pa dang / /sems dang bral ba bzhin du gnas/ /yi ges yongs su bkang bas na/ /de nas brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /nyin dang mtshan

du rmongs pa dang / /mi sad par ni bsgom par bya/ /sa stengs shing dang nags tshal bcas/ /thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskrad pa'i cho ga 'di dag ni/ /dge ma khyod la nga yis bshad/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi

'gyur ro/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba stobs po che/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga ru/ /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba dang / /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /thig le zla ba phyed pas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang snying ga dang / /lte ba'i steng du yi ge bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub

bya'i lus/ /'bar bas bcud dang phral bar bsam/ /de yis bsgrub bya brgyal 'gyur zhing / /bskrad pa'am ni 'chi ba'am/ /yang na smyon pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yi ge yis ni ltung bas na/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ /sa gzhi nags tshal bcas pa ru/ /

smyo zhing 'gro 'gyur the tshom med/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du bskrad 'gyur the tshom med/ /nya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /sna tshogs pa yi mdog dang ldan/ /pa la sha yi me tog gi/ /'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba ste/ /chu rgyun stong ni 'bab pa yis/ /de yi

lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis nor dang bcas pa ru/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang / /rmongs shing myur du dbang du 'gyur/ /Ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis/ /yi ge 'bar dang ldan par

bsam/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dpral ba dang / /mgrin pa dang ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i steng du nam mkha' la/ /bdud rtsi sgo yi thig le ni/ /spyi bo'i steng du rtag tu bsam/ /cung zad glog ni g.yo 'dra ba'i/ /kha ba dag ni 'bab par bsam/ /sgrub pa po

yis bsgrub bya ni/ /yan lag tshigs kun g.yo ba dang / /brgyal zhing rmongs la myos bsams na/ /ji srid nyi zla yod bar du/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ru/ /de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /de ltar Ta yi rgyal po yi/ /las ni khyod la nga yis bshad/ /

de nas yi ge gnyis pa yi/ /las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya/ /Tha zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ /dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/ /spyi bor bdud rtsi theg les brgyan/ /de bzhin glog dang 'brug gis brgyan/ /yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab pa

yis/ bsgrub bya'i lus la kun tu gtor/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /snying ga ru ni gnas par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo ni phug pa dang / /lus la kun tu khyab pa yis/ /bsgrub bya myos shig 'dar ba ru/ /sngags pas yi ges rtag tu bsgom/ /de

nas ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /brgyal zhing rmongs pas dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas Da zhes bya ba ni/ /yi ge'i rgyal po gsum pa ste/ /de yi las kyi mchog rnams ni/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gus pas nyon/ /Da zhes bya ba thig ler bcas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i dbyibs can yin/ /ut+pa

la ltar ljang ser te/ /'od zer gsal ba kun tu 'phro/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bsam pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i tshigs ni 'bugs shing 'byed/ /bsgrub bya mig yor bsgom byas na/ /lus ni kun tu g.yo bzhin du/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /rmongs dang bcas pas

dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi mchog gzhan ni/ /shin tu gnyer bar byed pa ste/ /D+ha zhes bya ba yi ge'i rgyal/ /shin tu rmad byung byed pa po/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba ste/ /bsgrub bya'i snying dang lte ba dang / /mgrin par yi ge

bsams nas su/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'dzag pas/ /de yi lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis bzi zhing brgyal nas su/ /gnyid log par ni bsgom byas na/ /'di yis ring por mi thogs par/ /rmongs shing sgrub po'i dbang du 'gyur/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /nam

yang chags dang bral mi 'gyur/ /de nas d+ha mtha' yi ge'i las/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'bad de nyon/ /Na zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /cung zad 'bar zhing gsal ba ste/ /dri ma med pa'i du ba las/ /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /

de yis rnam par khyab byed cing / /'od zer glog stong 'khyug 'dra ba/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsgom/ /'od zer brgya yis bkang bas na/ /myos nas su ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de yis ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /de ni de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ta zhes

bya ba'i yi ge mchog /'od zer glog ltar gsal ba ste/ /mdog ni rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra/ /yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi/ /snying dang mgrin pa gsang ba dang / /lte bar bkod de 'bugs par bsam/ /yi ge de yis rmongs pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral ba

dang / /rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /myos shing dbang 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de yi drung na gnas pa yi/ /tha zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /mu men gyi ni mdog 'dra dang / /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i 'od/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga

dpral ba dang / /de bzhin du ni rkang par dgod/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la dbang po yi/ mtshon cha bzhin du thim par bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos mnan pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /sa 'dzin gyi ni dbang bo bzhin/ /'gro ba dag kyang bcings par

'gyur/ /reg bya mi shes dri mi shes/ /sgra mi thos shing gzugs mi mthong / /lce yis ro rnams mi myong zhing / /dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /gang dang gang gi steng du ni/ /nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal po tha yis ni/ /skyes bu bcings

'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang da yi ni/ /stong pa'i las kyi cho ga nyon/ /da zhes bya ba mdog sngon ni/ /char sprin nag po'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam 'phro ba/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgor bsam la/ /me stag 'phro ba bsgoms pa ni/ /phyogs

kun tu ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge'i dbang phyug de yis ni/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug par bsam/ /'bar ba'i sprin ni stong phrag gis/ /de ni kun tu bskor bar bsam/ /de ni bkod pa tsam gyis su/ /sdong gog dang ni mtshungs par 'gyur/ /phug ste shin tu

bcings pas na/ /'gro ba'ang mi g.yo bar ni 'gyur/ /ji srid sgrub po 'dod bar du/ /sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas/ /slar yang sgrub pos bsams tsam gyis/ /rmongs pa las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas yi ge d+ha yi ni/ /las ni rmad du gyur pa nyon/ /b+ha zhes

bya ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /kha dog ser po gser gyi mdog /gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgrin pa ru/ /zhags pa lta bur 'bar bar bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya de/ /khrid de 'ong bar bsgom byas na/ /sgrub pa po ni gar gnas par/ /

rmongs dang bcas te 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /phyugs de sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la ni/ /rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas yi ge na yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa nyon/ /mdog ni du ba'i phung po 'dra/ /rlung gi dkyil

'khor 'khrugs dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga mgrin pa dang / /lte ba dang ni rkang par sbyar/ /de yis dgra rnams rang yul nas/ /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de ni rmongs pas rang yul du/ /nam yang phyis ni 'ong mi 'gyur/ /de nas sde tshan lnga pa ni/ /yi ge

rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /las ni shin tu grub pa ste/ /gzhan dang gzhan ni bshad par bya/ /pa zhes bya ba rlung gi gnas/ /char sprin gyi ni sprin gyis bskor/ /'bar zhing du bas 'khrigs par ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga rked pa dang / /

rkang pa dag tu bsams nas ni/ /pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge des/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni dkri bar bya/ /bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang / /khro bas brtan gnas gtso bo yang / /yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis/ /skad cig gis ni bskrad 'gyur te/ /gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag

la'ang / /slar zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas yi ge pha yi ni/ /las mchog nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /yi ge pad+ma'i mdog 'dra zhing / /'bar ba bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i gnas su bkod nas ni/ /ku su ma yi khu

'dra ba/ /'dzag pa ru ni rnam bsams te/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du/ /de yis gang bar bsgom byas na/ /bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la/ /sems med lus ni 'dar gyur nas/ /rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni/ /dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi

dgos/ /ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni/ /gru bzhi pa la stobs po che/ /dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /zla ba'i 'od can bsgrub bya ni/ /dbus su sgrub pos par bsam/ /de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing / /nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur/ /rims dang

bkres dang skom mi 'byung / /'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru/ /lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na/ /rtag tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po b+ha zhes

pa'i/ /las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste/ /nyi ma 'char kha lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo ru/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsams la/ /de yi lus ni ma lus par/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya/ /rmongs shing

sems dang bral 'gyur te/ /rdo rje yin yang brgya la gyur nas/ /mche bas zin ltar skad cig la/ /ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas/ /de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /dgra ni lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzi brjid chen po

yi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /de yi las ni ji bzhin nyon/ /tsam pa ka ltar ser ba'i mdog /bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /'od ni glog stong 'khyug pa bzhin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsams la/ /de yi 'od kyis

bsgrub bya yi/ /steng dang 'og ni ma lus par/ /lus ni kun tu g.yogs bsams na/ /gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu/ /sha za dang ni srin po dang / /khams gsum yi ge'i bdag po dang / /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /skad cig gis

ni dbang 'gyur bar/ /mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /mun pa dang ni du ba'i mdog /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /rlung gi gzugs can yi ge che/ /rlung bdun gyi ni gtso bo dang / /gnas zhes bya bar brjod pa ste/ /zla

phyed kyi ni dbyibs can la/ /ba dan brgya yis rnam par bklubs/ /rnam pa bzhi yi rten gyur pa/ /phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste/ /ra zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /'bar ba bye ba stong dang ldan/ /de yi steng du bsam par bya/ /du ba yi ni phreng bas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo

bor bsgoms nas ni/ /dgra bo lo brgya 'tsho ba yang / /sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa ltar/ /skad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni/ /bral zhing 'chi ba'i sgor gzhol 'gyur/ /lha sogs thams cad gang rung gi/ /steng du yi ge 'di sbyar na/ /myur du lhung 'gyur dpyad mi dgos/ /

gdon dang rims rnams thams cad ni/ /de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / /sbrul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab/ /de yis myur du 'chi 'gyur na/ /gnod pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /ya zhes pa dang ra zhes pa/ /rlung dang me yi gzugs can du/ /nam mkha'i

phyogs su bsams nas ni/ /nam mkha'i ngos ni g.yogs bsams na/ /nyi zla gza' skar sogs pa'ang rung / /chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho yi/ /dbus su yi ge gnyis po dag /bsams nas nyi ma brgyad pa la/ /rgya mtsho la sogs thams cad skam/ /zhing sa 'bru yi phung po dang / /

khyim la sogs pa'i gnas bsam na/ /phyi rol me lce 'bar ba yis/ /thams cad yi ge thal bar byed/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te/ /rlung gis kun tu bskor bar ni/ /yi ge mchog ni gnyis bsams na/ /las ni kun tu nye bar gnas/ /de nas gzhan

yang yi ge gnyis/ /stobs chen ldan pa bshad par bya/ /dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa po/ /la zhes bya ba sa yin te/ /sa zhes bya ba 'dzin pa'i mchog /dbang po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang / /'od zer glog ltar 'bar ba ste/ /kha

dog lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /yi ge'i dbang po sa la bsgom/ /de steng cu yi yi ge ni/ /bzhi pa legs par gnas pa ste/ /dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /kha ba'i rgyun ni 'bab pa ste/ /la yi steng du bkod nas su/ /shin tu bsil

ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzag /dbang chen gyis ni bskor ba yi/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /spyi bor thig le dang ni ldan/ /char pa'i rgyun ni stong phrag 'bebs/ /steng du sprin gyi phung po ni/ /glog dang 'brug la sogs pas brgyan/ /bdud rtsi char gyi rgyun

'bebs pa/ /nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus 'gyur ba/ /gang gi mgo yi steng bsgoms na/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis mdzes pa yi/ /lhag ma can ni

zhi gzugs bsam/ /de yi mig gnyis dbang po yi/ /mtshon chas brgyan pa'i dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i i yig dgod/ /grong khyer gyi ni mtha' ma dang / /bsgrub bya yi ni steng du dbab/ /dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs/ /skad cig gis ni zhi bar

'gyur/ /da ni skra dkar gzhom pa yi/ /cho ga bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni/ /de ltar rtag tu bsams gyur na/ /tshe thung ba yang ring 'gyur na/ /skra dkar la sogs smos ci dgos/ /bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni/ /'bad

pas yang yang g.yon bskor zhing / /rang gi spyi bo'i steng du ni/ /lo gcig bar du bsgom byas na/ /rga ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms/ /nad kyis gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ /gal te klu chen brgyad kyi ni/ /mche ba'i dug gis zin gyur kyang / /dug ni dug med byas nas su/ /

dug gis brgyal ba slong bar mdzad/ /'gron po lam gyis dub pa dang / /gdon la sogs pas gzir ba rnams/ /kun las thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsams tsam gyis/ /skad cig gis ni bkres skom 'joms/ /nad rnams kun gyis gdungs

pa la/ /yi ge bkod pas grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar las rnams sna tshogs ni/ /lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin/ /gtso mo bzhi yi rnam pa bzhi/ /las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste/ /rlung dang me dang bdud rtsi bcud/ /de bzhin drod kyi sde pa ste/ /gshin rje brtan ma phyag

gnyis pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs/ /lus ni me las byung ba ru/ /bskal ba'i me lce lta bur bsam/ /'og dang steng du wa yis brgyan/ /de yi phyogs kun thams cad du/ /'bar ba gang gi snying gar bsam/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'phro/ /

wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /nam mkha' khyab pas bcings 'gyur te/ /brtan ma yi ni 'khrul 'khor gyi/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos bcings pas na/ /sa 'dzin lta bur brtan par 'gyur/ /rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang / /rkang bzhi la sogs sems can gyi/ /

lte ba ru ni bsgom byas na/ /de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yang bskal pa'i me lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /wa ni steng du bsgom par bya/ /slar yang me yis 'bar bsam na/ /gang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /yi ge de ni dgod par bsam/ /ji

srid lag tu bsam gyi bar/ /sa steng gi ni skye bo rnams/ /rang gi gnas ni de nyid nas/ /'bebs shing 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /'di ni gshin rje brtan ma la/ /mos pa'i las rnams bshad pa yin/ /dbang po thams cad 'bebs pa yi/ gshin rje'i pho

nya'i las bshad bya/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba/ /mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab lta bu/ /gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na/ /skal ba bzang po 'joms par 'gyur/ /snying dang kha dang sna dang ni/ /mig dang rna bar de bzhin du/ /yi ge

dbu ma bkod na ni/ /dbang po thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te/ /gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos/ /dri mi tshor zhing stobs mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lce yis ro mi myong / /dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /las rnams de dag thams cad la/ /yid kyis bzlog na grol

bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje mche ba du ba'i mdog /sreg pa'i bskal ba lta bu ste/ /thams cad khyab par 'khyams 'gyur pa/ /sna tshogs 'od can bsgom par bya/ /drod kyi sde pa'i yi ge sa/ /du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog /snying dang lag pa rkang par

dgod/ /khams gsum yang ni bskrad 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /thig ler bcas shing ha dang ni/ /bcas pa gang gi lce steng du/ /bsams na phur bu lta bur 'gyur/ /yi ge dge ba de nyid ni/ /rtag tu lce steng bsams na ni/ /lan cig bzlas

pas zin 'gyur te/ /de ni snyan dang gas mkhan por 'gyur/ /de ltar sa dang sa mtha' yi/ /yi ge'i cho ga bshad pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum po 'joms byed ma/ /'od zer dmar po gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma bye ba lta bu'i 'od/ /cung zad sngo ba 'jigs chen mo/ /ma

he dang ni rta dag ni/ /'khrul 'khor sbyor ba kun la bsam/ /de yis yi ge'i rgyal po ni/ /gzi brjid chen po'i yi ge ha/ /de yi las ni sna tshogs mchog /'dod pa'i las ni bshad par bya/ /de ltar bdag lus rtag tu ni/ /yi ge lngar ni bsam byas na/ /'gro

ba rnams kyi bya ba ni/ /tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sa steng lha dang lha min dang / /mi dang bcas pa 'bebs byed cing / /sgrub pa po ni dus min par/ /'chi ba dag ni 'joms par byed/ /sgrub po yid la 'dod bzhin du/ /nad rnams thams cad gnon

par byed/ /ngag tsam gyis ni dpung tshogs dang / /chu dang rgya mtsho 'ching ba dang / /gru dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang / /rta dang glang po la sogs 'ching / /shing chen sa la sgyel ba dang / /sems can rnams ni dbang du byed/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya

ba rnams ni 'dod bzhin byed/ /ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /mgo dang bral zhing thig les brgyan/ /de yi las rnams ma lus pa/ /phan pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste/ /kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa/ /shin tu stong dang stong pa ste/ /

de ni sems med gnyid log pa/ /sad pa dang ni bral ba ste/ /de ni ci yang snang mi 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin min/ /mi'am ci dang dri za min/ /klu rnams dang ni srin po dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab min/ /chu bo'i shing dang nags tshal dang / /de bzhin sa sogs

ma yin te/ /'jigs rung dmyal ba la sogs min/ /me dang du ba sogs min zhing / /nyi ma zla ba gza' skar min/ /mi dang sha za la sogs min/ /mngal skyes dang ni drod las skyes/ /sgo nga dang ni rlan skyes min/ /thang la gnas dang chu gnas min/ /pad+ma las

ni skyes pa dang / /dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bde kan sogs/ /'byung ba'i tshogs la sogs min te/ /ha zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /rtag tu bsams na dmigs mi 'gyur/ /lo gcig bar du bsgoms gyur na/ /rga dang nad kun 'joms

'gyur te/ /de la dug kyang mi 'pho na/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa ga la zhig /dug ni khur bu brgya zos kyang / /de ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu stong nyid bsgoms na ni/ /de ni thar 'gyur the tshom med/ /mgo dang bral ba'i yi ge k+Sha/ /de nyid mchog tu thim nas su/ /

bsgoms nas skad cig mngon shes skye/ /thig ler ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rkan dang sna sgo'i lam du ni/ /ri mo dag ni zhugs pa bsam/ /ri mo mar me'i rtse lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi gzi can bsam/ /rtag tu rkan ni phug ste gnas/ /rtag tu sbyor bar gnas pa yis/ /

nyi ma bdun na mthong 'gyur te/ /'di dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin bdun gyis/ /rtse mo rgyas par mthong 'gyur te/ /de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan gyi grong sogs 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /k+Sha yi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi/ /las ni

bsam gyis mi khyab gnas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub/ /brtul zhugs ma ni khyod la bshad/ /re re yi ni las rnams kyang / /bstan pa ru ni nus ma yin/ /skye bo rang don byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin/ /yi ge sde tshan so so yi/ /yi ge

dag ni so so zhing / /re re'ang sbyor ba bzhi bzhi ste/ /gcig kyang bzhi ru sbyor ba bzhin/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya che/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/ /go 'phang mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur/ /sgyu ma che

dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /A li kA li'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste

bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshal te/ slar gsol pa/ khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang / /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /yi ge bcu drug rig pa che/ /bde mchog

bla mar bshad pa dang / /khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsa/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung dang / /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar dbye ba da ga /ji ltar nang du yang dag gnas/ /de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs/ /bka' stsal pa/

sgyu ma kun gyi rnam rol pa'i/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sangs rgyas kun la'ang gsang ba ste/ /gzhan rnams la lta smos ci dgos/ /sgyu ma chen po bcu drug ni/ /ma mo nyid du rab tu bshad/ /de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gyur pa nyid du the tshom med/ /rnal

'byor pa yi bdud rtsi sbyor/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /slar yang bdud rtsi rdzas rnams ni/ /da ni bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ra ni dmar chen po yi khams/ /ha zhes bya ba ri las skyes/ /se ni gnad pa tra ste/ /pa ni pags par bstan pa yin/ /ra zhes

bya ba dri ru gsungs/ /me zhes bya ba me tog ste/ /de bzhin ra ni chu yin no/ /me zhes bya ba pi si ta/ /sa ni kun du ru nyid yin/ /re ni sa ri zhes bya ste/ /At+ma zhes bya na la dza/ /ni zhes bya ba dri yi mar/ /sa ni so dang lag skyes yin/ /dA ni rgya mtsho las byung
