snga ma bzhin te rin po che'i cho ga'o/ /ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan srog chags dang rtsa ba la sogs pa yang ste/ swa sti'i 'dab ma'i yang ser skya'o/ /ba da si'i rlig pa'i yang bcos ma dang ser skya'o/ /sman sen mo'i ni phag pa'i rna ba lta bu'o/ /kyi skyon chen po ni nya dang thal

sman la sogs pa'i dri lta bu dang / bsregs na myur du thal bar 'gyur ba ste spang bar bya'o/ /rgya mtsho'i sdig pa'i yang cung zad ser zhing skya ba ste/ las thams cad la spang bar bya'o/ /yung ba'i ni mdog med pa dang skya bo dang phra ba'o/ /shu dag gi ni ljang gur sgrub pa pos shes par bya'o/ /

ru rta'i ni bcag na rgya mtsho'i dbub lta bu'o/ /ka ko la'i ni sbal pa'i gzugs ltar mi mnyam la sbun pa ltar yang ba'o/ /dzA ti pha la'i skyon ni skya ba dang snum med pa dang sgra chung ba'o/ /sug smel dang 'bras bu gsum gyi skyon ni sbun pa ltar yang ba ste/ /nyes pa gsum

skyed par byed do/ /re'u ruka'i ni na le sha ma ltar chu'i steng na 'phyo ba'o/ /pri yang ku'i ni ljang gu ste 'gal lo/ /gur gum gyi ni blo dang ldan pas phra ba dang seng ldeng lta bu dang / ge sar chung ba dang cung zad ser ba dang mar nag ltar mdog med pa'o/ /u shi ra'i skyon ni 'od ljang gur 'dug

pa dang / thung ba ste rtag tu spang bar bya'o/ /ke bar ti'i gla sgang gi ni chu rnyog ma can las skyes pa dang zi ma'i nang nas skyes pa ste spang bar bya'o/ /gla sgang gi ni rlan can las skyes pa'o/ /tshi tra ka'i ni kha dog ljang gu'o/ /se ha li'i ni rtsa ba med pa'o/ /ku su ma'i phra ba'o/ /tsam pa

ka'i ni kha cher bye bar shes par bya'o/ /ke ta ki'i ni bu mang ba'o/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /rtsi dang rdzas rnams skye ba'i yul/ /ri kha ba can gyi rtse mo dang / ri bo dbang chen dang / 'bigs byed kyi brag las byung ba dang / gzhan yang nags kyi tshang tshing gang nas mig sman lta bu'i

chu rgyun du 'bab pa'i brag las skyes pa ste/ gang dag gis rtsi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas kyang bshad par bya'o/ /bung ba'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i ngos su brgyan pa dang / /rlung tshogs mi rgyu de nyid rlung skyes kha ba 'bab/ /sna tshogs shing bu gel ba'i dri yis bsgos pa dang / /mkha'

las lha tshogs sangs rgyas sgra yis gsal byed pa/ /sna tshogs dri zhim dri yis rol ba'i yid du 'ong / /sna tshogs shing gi 'bras bu brul bas sa gzhi brgyan/ /de lta'i ri shod chu 'bab bcud ni skye ba'i gnas su bshad/ /de la brag dkar po las ni shel dang chu shel la sogs

pa'i nor bu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brag ser po chu ser po 'bab pa las ni byi ru dang btsag dang brgya byin gyi gzhu lta bu'i nor bu dang nor bu dzi ba ni ri dmar po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ri'i ljongs gang ljang sngon du 'dug cing dro ba dang bcas la rlangs pa du ba lta bu yod cing sa rdo gnag pa las ni

gser rdo khar ba dang gzhan dag dang lcags khab len gyi rigs rnam pa bzhi skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brag ljang sngon las ni byi ma la la sogs pa rnams dang mu men dang nor bu stam pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brag kha dog sngon dmar sna tshogs su 'dug pa las ni ldong

ros dang ba bla dang mu zi la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brag sum zhing srog chags dang bcas pa las ni tsha la la sogs pa thal sman rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag blang ba yang dang po gtor ma byin la ku ba'i snod du blang bar bya'o/ /dngul chu gang rdo las gci rlon gyi sbyor bas

bsgrubs pa de ni mchog go/ /rig pa de dag lha mo che/ /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /tshangs pa brgya byin sogs 'grub na/ /gzhan dag la lta smos ci dgos/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bskal pa dang po bde ba che/ /der ni rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /lhag pa yi ni

lha gcig bzhugs/ /lha min grub pa sogs mthong ste/ /lha yi tshogs ni skrag gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /myur du nga la skul bar byed/ /thig ler zhu las lha mo che/ /bdud kyis kun du gtor ba ni/ /thams cad rmongs par byed pa yi/ /dngul

chu zhes ni bya bar grags/ /chu gting las byung dman pa ste/ /de bzhin ri las skyes pa mchog /da ni dri yi sbyor ba dag /slar yang bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /dkar po dang ni dmar po dang / /khyad par du ni ser po ste/ /de rnams dbye ba bshad par bya/ /mchog dang

dman dang bar ma yin/ /ke ta ka ltar dri zhim zhing / /yang na snum pa gla rtsi'i mchog /kha da si ni skam skyes pa'i/ /rlig pa sha chen zlum po shis/ /sdig pa sngo zhing snum pa dang / /rgya mtsho las ni byung ba bzang / /sen mo rta yi rmig 'dra dang / /glang po che yi rna lta bu/ /ba

da ri shi ut+pal dang / /'dab ma lta bu rnam pa bzhi/ /gnyis gnyis shing ni bdug par sbyar/ /a ka ru ni lci ba dang / /snum zhing bya rog mchu 'dra shis/ /gca' ba sor mo'i dbyibs 'dra zhing / /dri ma med pa shin du bsngags/ /mu ra ser po mchog yin te/ /skya bo dag ni dman

shes bya/ /shu dag sbom zhing phyi rol ser/ /nang na dkar po yod pa bzang / /na nga dbang sha ba'i rwa 'dra bar/ /mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa yin/ /yung ba ku ta tsa ltar ser/ /sbom zhing tshigs ni che ba dang / /bcag na mig sman mdog 'dra ba/ /rtsi yi las la dge

ba yin/ /cung zad mdog ni sngo ba dang / /bcag nas ha ra yi dri/ /yung ba de ni mar nag dang / /rtsi yi las la dman par bshad/ /ra na sran ma mung+ga ltar/ /sngo ba mchog ni yin par bshad/ /pri yang ku ni nags skyes shing / /sa ha de ba'i 'dab 'dra mchog /gur gum ku

sum dmar 'dra zhing / /snum la ge sar srab pa mchog /ge sar sbom zhing ser ba dang / /sbrang rtsi'i dri ldan 'bring po yin/ /dzA ti pha la sgra che zhing / /lci la snum pa shin tu gces/ /kak+ko la ni snyoms pa dang / /lci zhing sgra med bzang ba yin/ /u si ra ni dkar ba dang / /ring zhing

sre ba de bzhin bsngags/ /ke bar ti mud gla sgang ni/ /chu bo'i 'gram dang mtsho 'gram dang / /dri ma med pa'i chu la skyes/ /zi ma 'dab bu la sogs bral/ /shin tu dri zhim yid 'ong mchog /tsha ti ba ni gi wang gi/ /mdog ltar 'tshod pa bsngags pa yin/ /gla sgang skam skyes mkhregs pa

bzang / /rlan snyoms yul nas skyes pa 'bring / /a ru ra ni 'bigs byed kyi/ /nags dang ri bo dbang chen skyes/ /nar ma dA yi chu skyes mchog /gzhan dag dman dang 'bring po yin/ /smyung po dang ni 'jigs med dang / /'tsho dang de bzhin bdud rtsi ste/ /gtsang ma dang ni 'phel

ba dang / /rnam par rgyal ba bdun du brjod/ /ri mo gsum po smyung po ste/ /'jigs med ri mo lnga pa yin/ /'tsho ba gser mdog shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi sha chen zhes bya ste/ /de bzhin gtsang ma sha med yin/ /ser skya 'phel ba zhes bya ste/ /ku ba lta bu rnam par ra rgyal/ /dri la

smyung po sbyar bya ste/ /bcud kyis len pa bdud rtsi bsngags/ /'jigs med rnam par rgyal ba 'bring / /lhag ma rnams ni don med do/ /skyu ru ra ni sha che zhing / /rus pa chung la ro dang ldan/ /rdo ba can gyi ri las skyes/ /shin tu smin pa mchog tu bshad/ /ba ru ra ni tha mal pa'i/ /

ri las skyes pa'am gzhan yang rung / /a ru rkang ni snum zhing sngo/ /lci zhing mar dang bcas pa bzang / /da ni de dag re re zhing / /gzung bar bya ba bshad kyis nyon/ /rdzas ni dus bzhin skyes pa dang / /bcud dang bcas pa gzung bya ste/ /mthun pas phan pa nyid 'gyur gyi/ /bzlog

pas gnod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /da ni tshim par bya ba yi/ /cho ga bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /ma d+hi dang ni pe Sh+thi dang / /de bzhin go d+hi dza ka la/ /de dag 'bru dang bcos pa'i chang / /ro yi bye brag sna tshogs de/ /rim pa de dag brjod pa yin/ /ma d+hi rnam pa lngar bshad de/ /peSh+thi rnam pa

brgyad du brjod/ /go di rnam pa bdun yin te/ /de bzhin dza ga la ni gsum/ /btso dang sbyor ba'i cho ga dag /da ni rab tu bshad kyis nyon/ /sbrang rtsi las byung dang po ste/ /kha rdzar yi gnyis pa yin/ /rgun 'brum las byung gsum pa ste/ /bcud tshogs las byung bzhi pa yin/ /

lnga pa dbang chen zhes bya ste/ /thams cad kyi ni gtso bor brjod/ /rab tu gdang dang ser skya dang / /myos par byed pa thams cad 'byung / /lo di las byung mdog bzang dang / /mchog tu gser dang dzi bo dang / /zhi ba dang ni rnam pa brgyad/ /de brgyad peSh+thi las byung ba/ /mdor

bsdus nas ni brjod pa yin/ /ik+Shu las byung dang po ste/ /si tu yi ni gnyis pa yin/ /gsum pa bu ram gnyis las byung / /bzhi pa skya bo zhes bya ste/ /sna tshogs dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /mi 'jigs zhes bya dang ni bdun/ /'bras bu yi ni khu ba dang / /me tog dang ni de

bzhin gzhan/ /nya du can gyi 'bras bu dang / /tsa kra ang ga bzung nas ni/ /na le sham ni drug cu bzhi/ /skyu ru ra khu srang bcu dang / /po son cha ni srang phyed bcas/ /chu bre gang du mnyes nas ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od la btso bar bya/ /sa har da dri'i me tog dang / /'u su sha ta pus pha

dang / /ma la ya dang u shi ra/ /ri las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma/ /dzA ti shing tsha po son cha/ /de dag so sor zho gnyis gnyis/ /bur shing khu ba srang brgyad dang / /chu ni de yi bzhi 'gyur bcas/ /sngon po kaN+Da ka ri dang / /rgya spos sug smel ta ma la/ /btsod dang nA ga

ge sar dang / /u shi ra dang na le sham/ /glang po che yi pi pi ling / /bu ram srang ni gcig dang bcas/ /chu ni srang bdun nang du blugs/ /rgya spos brag zhun ta ma la/ /rgya spos ru rta cha re bya/ /'bru chang bre gang nang du ni/ /thams cad bcas te nyin bdun

du/ /nyi ma'i 'od la btso bar bya/ /de nas sbrang rtsi de mnyam dang / /'dzam bu'i shing ni cha brgyad bcas/ /slar yang snga ma bzhin du ni/ /nyi ma la ni btso byas te/ /sbrang rtsi tsam zhig lus pa dang / /bdug spos kyis ni bdug par bya/ /de nas zla ba gcig tu ni/ /'bras kyi

so ba'i nang du gzhug /de nas sa yi 'og tu ni/ /zla ba gcig dang nyin bzhi gzhag /thog ma tha ma mnyam pa ste/ /bar ma bzhi 'gyur du ni blugs/ /du hi ga bur gla rtsis bdug /de ni sgeg mo zhes bya yin/ /da tri'i me tog srang phyed dang / /chang dang mnyam pa'i bu ram dang / /lhag

ma'i cha ni rdzogs nas su/ /phyi nas gcig tu bsre bar bya/ /chang gi bcu drug cha dang ni/ /da tri'i me tog ji snyed pa/ /dri zhim gyi ni skyo ma dang / /de rnams thams cad gcig tu spyo/ /zla ba re re spel bya ste/ /de yi nang du sgeg mo blugs/ /dang por mnyam por blugs bya ste/ /zla ba

gnyis la nyis 'gyur bya/ /de ltar gsum bzhi lnga drug bdun/ /la sogs lo gcig bar du spel/ /de nas zla ba drug tu ni/ /kha bcad nas ni sba bar bya/ /bu ram khu bas spel bya ste/ /rab tu myos byed gso bar bshad/ /chu shing smin pa rdog ma brgyad/ /de bzhin sgeg mo srang

brgyad dang / /phur mo'i phye ma srang gcig dang / /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas su/ /'bru yi nang du zla phyed gzhag /chags can mchog ces bshad pa yin/ /'bras bu gsum dang sha shi dang / /a ka ru dang a rdzu na/ /dzA ti me tog bcas pa'i rdzas/ /phye ma srang gcig bzung

nas su/ /slar yang sgeg mo srang brgyad bcas/ /nyi ma bdun du gzhag par bya/ /me tog myos byed zhes bya yin/ /rgun 'brum ka ta~M shing dbang phyug /kha rdza ri yi khu ba dang / /spa yi rtsa ba rnam pa gnyis/ pa ta me tog la sogs bcas/ /rnam pa brgyad ni sbyar bar bya/ /

phabs ni bcos pa'i cho ga yin/ /peSh+thi las byung myos byed de/ /zan las byung ba chu can mchog /tsu ta la sogs shun pa las/ /byung ba chang zhes bya ba yin/ /dza ga la ni 'bru chang brjod/ /rgun 'brum sbrang rtsi dpa' bo gcig /skyur po g.yon can zan mo yin/ /tsin tsa rtsa ba las

byung gang / /nya phyis can zhes bya bar grags/ /me tog gis bsgos rab myos yin/ /dri zhim dang bcas sgeg mor bshad/ /kha zas mi len rid pa dang / /mkhris pa can la dza gal phan/ /bad kan can la zan chang phan/ /gnyi ga la ni dzi bo bsngags/ /sbyor bas bcud len

ro yi mchog /tsaka kra ang ga sbrang rtsi dang / /ru rta dang ni gla sgang gi/ /khu ba dang ni tsu ta dang / /kum pa la sogs gzhan dag kyang / /chang gi phabs su sbyar bar bya/ /chang dang phabs kyi cho ga'o/ /gla sgang dang ni ku tsa dang / /yung ba dang ni sgog skya rnams/ /sings po'i nang

du zhag gsum sbangs/ /de nas lo ma lnga pa yi/ /khu ba'i nang du bskol bar bya/ /'bras phye dang ni bu ram bcas/ /shi gru'i khu ba ra gcin gyis/ /bkrus na dag par 'gyur ba yin/ /sho ban dza dang ra gcin du/ /gla rtsi dag ni sbangs byas na/ /de yis dri dang 'bral mi 'gyur/ /

kha da si yi rlig pa ni/ /dang po thal bas spu phyi la/ /de nas lo ma lnga pa yi/ /khu bar khwa tshos byas nas ni/ /slar yang shi gru'i khu ba dang / /ra yi gcin du spangs nas ni/ /ke ta ki yi nang bcug la/ /so pan tsa yi rtsa bar gzhug /de ni kha da si rlig sbyang / /shu dag

dang ni yung ba gnyis/ /yungs mar rdo rje'i 'o ma dang / /sings po cha mnyam nang bskol bas/ /dag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /e ran da yi khu ba dang / /brag zhun gyi ni chur bcas pas/ /se hal le ni bkrus nas su/ /'dab mar btums te lci bas byug /sa yi 'og tu

sbas bas 'dag /ku su ma dang 'bras bu rnams/ /dang po ta krar sbangs nas ni/ /bkrus nas shi ri pha la yi/ /nang du bcug nas bsros pas 'dag /mu zi mar khus dag 'gyur te/ /ba bla ba lang sha yis 'dag /bya g+h+ri ba lang lci bas sbyang / /ldong ros rang skyur gyis

ni 'dag /gur gum mar gyis 'dag par 'gyur/ /gca' ba glang gi gcin gyis te/ /a ka ru ni khrag gis sbyang / /sih+la pu mo'i khrag gis 'dag /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcud kyis len ni rab

sbyor ba/ /gnas ni gang du brtsam par bgyi/ /sde tshan rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /'brel pa dag ni ji ltar lags/ /sbyor ba'i rim pa khyod bshad pa'i/ /dgos pa dag ni ci zhig lags/ /mar nag btso ba cho ga dang / /yul dang 'brel pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /khams ni

brgyad bstan pa yi/ /phan tshun bsdus pa ji lta bu/ /'khrul 'khor bye brag bshad pa dag /phyi dang nang ni ji ltar lags/ /nad rnams sna tshogs byung ba dag /ji ltar smin pas 'bras bur 'gyur/ /sbom po'i bye brag du zhig mchis/ /phra mo yi ni khyad par ci/ /rdzas dang bcud

len mi 'tshal te/ /khyod kyis sbyor ba gang bshad pa'i/ /dus kyi khyad par ji lta bu/ /de rnams bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sbrang rtsi lta bur bcud bsdus pa/ /rgyud

rnams kun du gsang ba yin/ /gnas sogs ji bzhin mchod nas su/ /bde mchog sngags kyi bsnyen par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi cher mchod nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po de yis ni/ /bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i

grogs po ni/ /sngags kyi bsnyen par gus pa dang / /skyo dub med cing dogs pa med/ /dam tshig spyod la gus pa ste/ /dpa' zhing brtan la g.yo sgyu med/ /'jam zhing bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson/ /de dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya/ /sgrub pos gzhan du byas na ni/ /dngos

grub 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sngar bshad rig pa sbyang byas te/ /dang po dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /gcer bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yis/ /gnyis pas ming sogs dbang ni bskur/ /dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ /stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i/ /

ro ni mi mchog gis rtogs bya/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sbom po zhes ni bya ba ste/ /rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin //len pa snying stobs zhes byar bshad/ /snying stobs rdzas zhes bya ba ste/ /dngul ni zhu ba zhes byar brjod/ /de ltar rdzas

dang zhu ba ni/ /bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste/ /phra mo nam mkha'i khams mtshan nyid/ /phung po la sogs khyad par dang / /khams rnams thams cad 'tshod pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni/ /nga yi ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /

de dag lha mo skal chen mo/ /rdzas dang khams ni bsdus pa ste/ /brtson 'grus dman zhing tha shal dang / /bsod nams dman pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus bcud kun gnas yin pas/ /de bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /bcud ni bcing dang gso ba dag /mdor

bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /yongs su smin pa'i mchog gis ni/ /mnyam med bcud la brten pa yi/ /rnam bcing la sogs nyes pa brgya/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dgag /bcud ni nag po sngon po ste/ /bcud ni yongs su grub ba yin/ /dngul chu lhang tsher cho ga yis/ /

ji srid bcud chen grub kyi bar/ /de srid du ni 'bad de dpyad/ /'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba/ /de ni kar na rgod ma'i kha/ /'khrul 'khor gang zhig rdza rnga 'dra/ /de nyid bong bu rnga mo'i kha/ /rgod ma'i kha ni 'od ma yi/ /sbu gu yis ni brgyan par bya/ /ka ra na da yi 'khrul

'khor ni/ /ral gri shubs kyis brgyan par bya/ /'khrul 'khor bong bu'i kha zhes pa/ /kang ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar/ /rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /bya rog mchu dang mtshungs par sbyar/ /tshar gcad pa ni sbal ba ste/ /'od ma can gyis sbrang rtsir btso/ /bya

rog mchu can bung bar btso/ /rdo leb 'bar zhing 'od dang bcas/ /kang ka'i mchu can glang chen btso/ /ral gri shubs can 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /seng ge ru ni btso ba yin/ /bcud chen yi ba dang khros pa dang / /'thor zhing shin tu tshos pa yis/ /chu yi nang du 'bros par 'gyur/ /

de nas glang chen mgo bcud dang / /mu zi la sogs byin nas ni/ /bsregs pas tshar gcad mnan pa dang / /'og tu sa la bor nas su/ /'dar zhing rmongs la du bar 'thul/ /khrol khrol gyi ni sgra 'byin no/ /de nas a shwa gan da dang / /ba la tsakra mar da dang / /

ba la ta ka shi gru ste/ /pa ri cha da ku mu ta/ /ut+pal mA li ka sa bon/ /rgya shug rus pa ki sa bon/ /ku ba'i sa bon ma du dang / /po son pa la sha ba'i shun/ /phye ma skyo mar byas pa yi/ /nang du de nas brdung bar bya/ /cha ni nges dang bcas pas 'ching / /rdzas ni drug

cha sbyin par bya/ /de nas rdo yi gtun du mnye/ /dang po re zhig sbyang bar bya/ /de nas gcig ba'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag dang khrag tu bcas/ /dkrugs pas nyes pa gzhom par bya/ /'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad par bya/ /tsan+da thal sman la sogs dang / /bcas pa

rkang gi nang du gzhug /dang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya/ /phyi nas lto skyes bcas pa'i bcud/ /'od ma'i nang du bcug nas su/ /sngar bshad gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni so pan dza la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'o/ /ka tu ma dza rdza la sogs pa'i

ni me tog dang 'dab ma dang rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo / /bcud btso ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhang tsher phyogs kyi cha dang ni/ /bcud ni dbang po'i cha dang bcas/ /cha yi nges pas 'ching 'gyur te/ /cha bcus rim gyis spel bar bya/ /dri zhim zla ba re re sbyin/ /gser

gyis mdog ni bzang por 'gyur/ /dngul gyis so ni bzang por 'gyur/ /mu tig mig ni dag par 'gyur/ /mu men skra dang spu la phan/ /rdo rjes thog ni zlog 'gyur te/ /lcags kyis chu dang mtshon rnams zlog /sna tshogs dbang phyug sems dang ni/ /lhang tsher gyis ni brgya byin

dang / /me dang gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan la sogs bgegs kun zlog /nA ga par ni mar sar dang / /rgya mtsho lan tshwar bcas pa yi/ /dngul chu'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis/ /rgas pa dang ni mdze nad 'joms/ /ba lang lce yi sman dang ni/ /dngul chur bcas pa

byugs pa yis/ /gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byed/ /ka ri ke sas gso ba ste/ /gi ri kar ni ka dang ni/ /ral ba dmar pos bzhu zhing gsad/ /'dzag dang a shwa gan da dang / /nA ga ba la ba li ka/ /cha mnyam gyis ni rmongs par bya/ /d+ha du ra yi khu ba yis/ /rang

gi yon tan ma lus byed/ /de nas snying po kun bsdus pa'i/ /mar khu'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /mar khu rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /snod dang sems can las byung ba'o/ /dang po snod kyi bshad bya ste/ /'bras bu chen po gsum gyi chus/ /snum ster rnams la yang

yang bsgo/ /de ni legs par bskams byas la/ /rdul la sogs pa'i skyon bral ba'i/ /sa yi char ni sngags pas bskyed/ /legs par smin cing snum pa dang / /skya bo la sogs skyon spangs gnag /legs par brdung zhing bsros nas su/ /skyu ru ra khu char chus sbangs/ /sra

ba de yi bdug pas bsgo/ /du med me yis ran par bdug /de nas 'khrul 'khor dag gis btsir/ /dpyid dang sos ka ston dus gsum/ /nyi ma'i 'od la sman mar btso/ /dgun stod dgun smad dbyar dang gsum/ /mar khu me yis ran par btso/ /gan da pa tra dwa tsa dang / /

sug smel nA ga bus bar bcas/ /ral pa dang ni sa li la/ /de dag phye mar byas pa ni/ /til las byung ba'i nang blugs te/ /chu ni mar khu'i bzhi 'gyur bya/ /a ga ru ni srang phyed dang / /sman gyi bzhi 'gyur byas nas su/ /de nas me ni ran pas bskol/ /slar yang ral

ba gla sgang dang / /tsan+dan shing tsha ba trar bcas/ /sngar bshad phye ma mnyam por bya/ /de bzhin snga ma bzhin du btso/ /slar yang sih+la dkar min lha/ /ru rta dza la ba thar bcas/ /thams cad bsres pa srang gcig btang / /mar khu srang ni brgyad dang bcas/ /'od ma'i

nang du blugs nas ni/ /nyi ma bdun du nyi mar btso/ /yid 'ong skal bzang stobs rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don ni phun sum tshogs/ /gal te tshangs pa'i mar khur bcas/ /rnal 'byor can la mchog ster 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sba la sug smel dang / /pa ta b+h+ring ga rA

dza dang / /sen mo ru rta bi sha tsa/ /so sor cha bzhi cha drug bdun/ /cha ni bcu gnyis dag dang bcas/ /'di rnams sman gyi skyo ma ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi tshad dang bcas/ /sngar bshad 'od ma'i tshogs btso/ /gang tshe rkang gi mar khur bcas/ /nad

rnams thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur/ /de nas sha chen mar khu dang / /lhan cig bsres te sbrang rtsi yi/ /snod du blugs te nyi mar bsro/ /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /lte ba dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla na med/ /ti tra

tsa yi 'bras bu dang / /tsan+da na sih+la shing tshar bcas/ /sngar bshad pa yi mar khu de/ /rkang gi mar dang bsres nas ni/ /sngar bzhin sbrang rtsi'i snod gzhag sogs/ /de ni ga bur mtshungs 'gyur te/ /skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed/ /de nas ri skyes mar khur bcas/ /

'bras gsum gla sgang shu dge dang / /pu ti ta dkar ku su ma/ /se pa la yi ngar pa dang / /gur gum dang ni lhan cig bcas/ /sbrang rtsi'i snod du blugs nas su/ /nyin bdun nyi ma'i drod la btso/ /skal bzang stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan/ /rtag tu 'o ma btung bya zhing / /

bsam gtan bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /tshangs par spyod la rtag gnas nas/ /khu ba dag ni dgag par bya/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa ru/ /sgrub pos phra mo zla drug bza'/ /de yi bshang ba kun blangs la/ /phra mo lhan cig phye mar bya/ /rdza ma sar par bzhag nas su/ /tsha

gsum tso ra'i phye ma ni/ /nyis 'gyur du na byas pa dang / /'byin byed phye ma bcu char bsre/ /bu ram gyis ni ril bu bya/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma re re zho gnyis gnyis/ /zos na nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'jig 'gyur khyad par gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /

mes po yi ni cha bzhi dang / /sgog skya dang ni bcu drug bsre/ /'o ma dang ni lhan cig btung / /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /gzer nad klad nad 'joms par 'gyur/ /sings po dang ni lhan cig tu/ /snga ma bzhin du 'thungs na ni/ /nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /zla

drug sbyor ba goms pa yis/ /skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma 'phrog /'bras ni dmar po'i phye ma dang / /ba la'i rtsa ba 'dab mar bcas/ /sgog skya zho gnyis lhan cig tu/ /btags te ril bu byas nas ni/ /mar ram mar nag nang du btso/ /zos nas gcin dang 'tsham par

btung / /des ni rus pa chag pa dag /'byor zhing stobs dang nyams 'phel 'gyur/ /b+h+ring ga rA dza tshangs pa ni/ /rlon pa gci ba dang bcas bza'/ /de yis dug ni 'phrog par byed/ /yung ba'i khu ba zho gnyis dang / /de dang mnyam pa'i gci bar bcas/ /'thungs na rgyu

ba'i dug dang ni/ /shu ba dang ni nad kun 'joms/ /yung ba'i khu ba ba lang gcin/ /de bzhin 'byung po'i gtso bo ste/ /rig byed grangs dang mnyam pa'i srang / /de la zho ni gnyis gnyis btung / /dpyid kyi dus su cung zad bskyed/ /sbyor ba'i gtso bo 'di yis ni/ /dug dang

rims rnams sel bar byed/ /gla sgang skyu ru ra dang ni/ /dri rnon dang ni zhag chen dang / /sbrang rtsi cha mnyam phye ma ni/ /khab len lcags kyi snod du gzhag /sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /srang ni sum brgya'i bar du bya/ /ba sa~M ta zhes bya ba ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab

ster ba/ /lo gcig bar du sbyor ba yis/ /yid 'ong yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar sel/ /dus kyi rlung dang nyi tshan sogs/ /bsten kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan la brten pa ni/ /'bras bu

med cing log par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bsam gtan bzlas byas nas/ /lo ni sum brgya'i bar du 'tsho/ /pi pi ling dang gur gum ni/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas su/ /so ka'i dus su bza' bar bya/ /de rjes gci ba dro 'thungs na/ /kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing 'ju/ /nir

ku~M di yi khu ba dang / /gci bar bcas pa sna sman sbyin/ /bad kan las gyur nad rnams 'phrog /de nyid pad+ma'i dri ma dang / /bcas par byugs na glang shu sel/ /ma ra ka da'i rtsa ba dang / /so dang sen mo'i rdul du bsre/ /rma ni dang po mar gyis bkru/ /de rjes sman des byugs

na ni/ /rma ni 'drub par byed pa'i mchog /so phag rdul dang sug smel phye/ /gi ri kar+Na'i khu ba ru/ /mnyes te mig 'khyugs na ni/ /rab rib dag ni 'joms pa'i mchog /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bas sbyang / /ma ha ha ta ka yi 'dab/ /'o ma dang ni lig

bu mig /'byung po'i chu dang bcas pa ru/ /mig tu blugs nas lo d+ha yis/ /bdugs na dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yung ba gnyis kyi cha mnyam phye/ /ba yi dar ba bre dor bcas/ /bre gang lus kyi bar du bskol/ /zhag bdun du ni de 'thungs na/ /de yis lus ni rgyas

'gyur te/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di/ /dpa' bo rang nyid bshad pa yin/ /yung ba dang ni so phag dang / /de bzhin btsag dang smyo byed khu/ /rlung med gnas su gnas nas ni/ /lus la dril phyis byas na ni/ /rtag tu stobs ni 'phel byed cing / /dngul chu

bcing ba dag la phan/ /ru rta mur ba shuka ti ka/ /shing tsha cha mnyam phye dang ni/ /mang si tsha ni nyis 'gyur bcas/ /dril phyis byas na 'dod pa 'grub/ /brag zhun dang ni so phag dang / /nir gun di dang e la tsha/ /cha ni mnyam por byas pa yi/ /yung ba dag ni bzhi 'gyur

bcas/ /gser shing khu ba cha phyed kyis/ /dril phyis byas na dug 'phrog cing / /gci bar bcas pa'i dril phyis kyis/ /khyi rngo dang ni mdze nad 'joms/ /khye'u ngad bu mo gzhon nu'i sha/ /mar dang bcas pa ci rigs par/ /rgyun du zos na tshe ring 'gyur/ /mdzes ma las

byung me tog ni/ /zos na rim gyis rga ba 'joms/ /rtag tu ga bur tsan+dan dag /bsten na nad rnams sel ba'i mchog /de bzhin bzhi mnyam gci bar bcas/ /sna sman byin na'ang nad kun sel/ /sha shang ka dang yung ba dang / /kha ba yi ni snying po dag /pad+ma can gyi pad+ma

ni/ /smyung po yi ni khu ba dang / /sems kyi dbang phyug lag mthil du/ /mnyes te rim gyis bsten na ni/ /nad rnams kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed par/ /gdon mi za bar ngas bshad de/ /dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /mkhrang

ma zhes bya chen po'i chen/ /de yi gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /de yi khrag dang khu bar bcas/ /dngul chu dang ni sbrang rtsir bsre/ /sbyor ba chen po 'di dag ni/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /rtag tu nad med stobs ldan 'gyur/ /bad kan can gyi mi rnams la/ /

tsha ba'i rdzas dang lhan cig sbyin/ /thung ngu'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /dang po mkhas pas gzung bar bya/ /lce dang dkar por bcas pa las/ /sbyor ba pos ni ril bu bya/ /zla ba drug tu bsten pa yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par 'ching / /ji srid lus ni gnas kyi bar/ /dug

kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mkhrang ma las byung me tog gzung / /de bzhin khwa gdong bdud rtsir bcas/ /sha chen dag ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /rang las byung ba'i sems dang bcas/ /de ni zos shing bsten pa yis/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /rim 'di rtag tu bsten

byas na/ /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma sel/ /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med 'gyur/ /bshang ba'i phye ma zho gnyis dang / /a pa ma rga'i thal ba dag /mi yi gcin dang ma he'i gcin/ /bcas par mkhas pas blung na ni/ /

stobs rnams bde bar skye 'gyur bar/ /ngas bshad pa la the tshom ma med/ /rdo rje bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de 'og las ni brtsam par bya/ /yung ba she ka ra ra bcas pas/ /khrag dang mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/ /mi mo'i 'o ma srang brgya dang / /rdo rje'i 'o ma srang brgyar bcas/ /

skyu ru'i khu ba'ang de tsam ste/ /ba yi 'o ma kham phor gang / /yung pa sbrang rtsi tsan+dan dmar/ /srang gcig dang ni pa tha dag /sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni gzung bar bya/ /sngon bzhin ran par btso byas la/ /khyim gyi me tog dkar por bcas/ /

dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /sbom po la sogs lnga yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /nu ma med pa rtsub mo dang / /mdzer pa can te gsum pa yi/ /gci ba'i lan tshwa bzung nas su/ /mthe bo yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /'gugs par byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /rdzas

la rta dang ma he'i khrag /khro bo yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /de bzhin du ni tha chung gi/ /khrag dang bcas pas gsad pa'ang 'grub/ /thung ngu yi ni lan tshwa dang / /de nyid kyi ni khu bar bcas/ /ring po'i khrag dang bcas pa yis/ /rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /

de nyid srin lag 'byung po'i bdag /don yod dbang du sdud pa yin/ /dri yi chu ni rgyal mtshan gyi/ /khrag dang lhan cig bcas nas su/ /lag mthil du ni mnyes la bza'/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /pad+ma las byung ma rnyed na/ /ro yi lag pa las byung

gzung / /rnal 'byor don gnyer dbul po yis/ /lag pa'i mchod pas yid 'dod bya/ /rgyud rnams kun du gang sbas pa/ /de dag thams cad khyod la bshad/ /dbang bskur lag tu bkod nas ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /mdzes ma kun

du ru'i sa bon/ /phag gi mche bas mnyes nas su/ /thig ler byas na rgyu mi rgyu'i/ /'gro ba dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /gi ri kar+Na dkar po dang / /pri yang ku ru bcas te blag /nyams stobs dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bu mo gzhon nu'i mig rnag dang / /

ldong ros bcas pa bsten na ni/ /sna tshogs dug rnams 'joms par byed/ /bu mo sngo bsangs mig rnag dang / /klad pa yi ni zhag tu bcas/ /de ni bsten pa tsam gyis su/ /skra dkar 'joms par the tshom med/ /lce dang khrag ni cha bsnyams la/ /bu ram 'ol

se bzhi char bcas/ /gzhan yang khu ba mar dang ni/ /dngul chu sngar ni bshad bzhin bzung / /mu zi bzang por bcas pa ni/ /bsten na sbyor ba'i dam pa ste/ /zla drug tsam du nges par ni/ /rga dang na las grol 'gyur zhing / /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /

rkang gi zhag dang mu zi ni/ /zho ni phyed phyed sbyar byas la/ /lo gcig bar du bsten na ni/ /lha yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /nam mkha'i me ni mnyes byed pa/ /su si ra yi tshad dang mnyam/ /'di ni sbyor ba chen po ste/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel byed yin/ /rtsi bsad dang

ni bkra shis bcas/ /lhag pa'i lha yi sems par ldan/ /bldag dang gzhib dang sna sman gyis/ /rdo rje'i lus 'gyur the tshom med/ /ce myang tsha dang gser shing dang / /smyo byed dag la bzhi char bcas/ /tsag kra ma rda sen mo'i rdul/ /so ma ra dza yung ba dag /thams cad

gcig tu sbyor ba yi/ /rdzas ni srang gcig bzung nas su/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du ni/ /mar khu dag ni btso bar bya/ /mi rgyal ta la sa h+ya de/ /'bras bu yi ni chu dang bcas/ /bzhi dang lnga dang drug bdun cha/ /de dag ji snyed mar de snyed/ /lcags kyi dri ma pri yang ku/ /

so dang sen mo yung bar bcas/ /de dag slar yang mar khur btso/ /gsal zhing nad med 'phel bar byed/ /mgo bsku ba yi cho ga'o/ /pri yang ku dang tsan+d+ra dang / /kan te la ba na'i me tog /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang ku mu ta/ /ut+pal chu yi do bar bcas/ /skyer par bcas pa'i

skyo ma ni/ /srang gcig tshad du gzung bar bya/ /'dod pa'i me ni 'bar byed de/ /skal bzang stobs ni 'phel bar byed/ /tsam pa dang ni gur kum dang / /ba bla'i khu bar bcas pa bsku/ /bsku byug gi cho ga'o/ /'byin byed gcig dang mar khu gnyis/ /dbang po gsum

dang ldan par bya/ /bska ba zhes bya skyu ru ra/ /kri ri ma la e la dzi/ /tsam pa ka dang tsan+dan dang / /nA ga ge sar ru rta dang / /pad+ma rag ta pri dar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi me tog pri yang ku/ /pa na ma la phur mo dang / /a pra da di pus par bcas/ /chu yi do ba dpa' bo gcig /sha ta

pus pa dza la gsum/ /rgya spos dag ni mchog yin te/ /mar khu btso ba'i cho gas ni/ /sna sman btung dang bsku byug bya/ /sna sman srang bcu sbyin bya ste/ /btung ba srang ni rnam pa brgya/ /nyi shu lhag pa mgor bsku yin/ /dril phyis srang ni sum brgyar bya/ /sman bskol cho ga

bya ste/ /sman ni ji snyed yod pa yi/ /chu ni bcu drug 'gyur du btso/ /sman dang mnyam pa'i chu lus pa/ /bskol ba'i cho ga'i mchog tu bshad/ /ki da dang ni ma tshan di/ /sa la dzang dang gu gul dang / /kun du ru dang a ka ru/ /mar du bcas pa bdug spos kyi/ /

sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /sum cu gsum pa'ang mchod par byed/ /brag zhun ga bur ru rta dang / /tsan+dan sen mo pi pi ling / /gla sgang bcas pa sngar bshad pa'i/ /rdzas dang lhan cig bsres nas ni/ /bye ma kha ra mar dang bcas/ /bu ram

dag ni spang bar bya/ /kham phor thod pa'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ /ta la'i 'bras bu'i nang du gzhug /bdug spos kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyi cho ga'o/ /biSh+Nu kran da si/ /ral pa dmar po pri yang gsum/ /shing tsha sen mo ru rta dang / /gla sgang rgya spos 'dag gu ni/ /bud

med khrus kyi 'dag chal mchog /da ni bud med mngal gang nas/ /rnag dang thal ba nya dri 'byung / /de rnams sbyang bar bya ba bshad/ /dang po dri zhim chu yis bkru/ /de nas lo da bskol bas bkru/ /de nas khri steng bzhag nas su/ /kham phor bdug spos kha sbyar te/ /bug

pa dag ni dbug par bya/ /de ru sbu gu bcug nas ni/ /skye gnas nang du bdug par bya/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing bu ni/ /mthe'u chung tshad tsam blangs nas su/ /ba yi gcin gyi nang du ni/ /zhag gcig bar du sbang bar bya/ /de yis so ni brud nas su/ /de 'og tu rta a ru ra/ /cha

mnyam dri yis so la bsgo/ /kha yi dri ma sel ba'i mchog /gla sgang ru rta e la dang / /sug smel 'u su shing mngar rnams/ /zos na rnag dang sgog dri dang / /chang gi dri ni 'phrog pa'i mchog /pa la ba ni rnam gnyis kyi/ /sbang ba dang ni bsgo byas na/ /me tog

dang ni skyur po sogs/ /sbyang zhing dri yis bsgo ba'i mchog /ral pa dmar po ba la dang / /sug smel rgya spos 'u su bcas/ /sen mo dang ni gla sgang la/ /skyu ru ra ni sum 'gyur blugs/ /'di ni khrus kyi sbyar ba'i mchog /shing tsha gla sgang rgya spos dang / /pa tra ke par

ti yi ni/ /gla sgang ru rta sen mor bcas/ /skyu ru ra ni cha gsum bya/ /de dag bkru ba'i 'dag chal mchog /rgyal po la sogs phyi rol sbyor/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rim pa ni/ /bdag las skyes pa lnga dang bsre/ /rgyal po la sogs bcu drug bya/ /a i o a ste

dang po'o/ /l-i u e r-i gnyis pa'o/ /I a~M a o ni gsum pa'o/ /U l-I r-I ai ni bzhi pa'o/ /lha yi gzugs su byed pa yi/ /sman ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /dbyangs tshad cho ga shes pa yis/ /de dag thams cad shes par bya/ /a ni sa yi bdag po ste/ /i ni

sa ha de ba yin/ /o ni rma bya'i cod pan te/ /A ni ngan par sbyor ma yin/ /l-i ni kri ta a dzA li/ /u ni ral ba dmar po yin/ /e ni rtag tu du ba ste/ /r-i ni gi ri kar+Ni ka/ /I ni tsag kra ang ga yin/ /a~M ni sha si she kha ra/ /o zhes bya ba nyi ma'i shing / /au zhes bya ba

la dzub/ /U ni smyo byed ces bya ste/ /l-I ni mgo yi lcug ma yin/ /r-I ni ma he'i rwa yin te/ /e zhes bya ba rdo rje can/ /ka ni gu gul lo/ /kha ni rdo rje can no/ /ga ni smyo byed do/ /g+ha ni ra ma'o/ /nga dang tsa ni sar pod ka dang a ta pa ri'o/ /tsha dang dza ni sih+lA dang tsam pa ka'o/ /dz+ha ni kun tu ru'o/ /nya dang

Ta ni ang ko la dang son tsi ka'o/ /Tha ni ldong ros so/ /Da ni a ka ru'o/ /D+ha ni lug ru'o/ /Na ni dUr ba dkar po'o/ /ta dang tha ni nya dang gan d+hi ka'o/ /da dang d+ha ni gur kum dang ro tsa na'o/ /na ni pa~M sh+thi'o/ /pa dang pha ni sha khar dang li shi'o/ /ba ni bri yang ku'o/ /b+ha ni

nA ga ge sar ro/ /ma ni sen mo'o/ /yar la wa bzhi po ni/ /rlung la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mchog /pr-ing ka an dza li dang ni/ /ral pa dmar po sa ha de/ /dpral bar thig le byas pa yi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs byed/ /su ta pa ti ma yu ra/ /ti ka dza la gzhan

mi thub/ /de dag b+ha gar byugs na ni/ /lan cig tsam gyis bka' nyan 'gyur/ /badzri me sha a ka dang / /a dan dza le thal sman mchog /ral pa ka tam smyo byed dang / /kan ta'i ril bus dbang du byed/ /na ni na ra an dza li/ /la dza lar ni bcas pa yis/ /chu la

shAkya'i dbang po bzhin/ /rgyal po kri ta an dza li/ /na ri dang ni de stir bcas/ /me ni bcing ba'i dam pa yin/ /bi snu he ma badzri dang / /h+li dur bcas pa khar bcug na/ /de yi mod la ngal sos 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po la ta dang / /pa na rdo rje mkhrang ba'i mchog /

pa na sa ha shi kha dang / /me shar bcas pas dug 'joms byed/ /par+ya su pa me sha dang / /sni ha b+ha gar blugs na ni/ /mngal na gnas pa skye bar 'gyur/ /ma he'i rwa dang la ta dang / /na ri a ba nar bcas pa/ /lag pas byugs na rgyan rgyal 'gyur/ /

pri ta tsan di na ra dang / /sa ha de ba khar bcug na/ /mtshan mo dag ni 'jigs med rgyu/ /skrag dang rgyal rtsa mkhris pa dang / /ban du blon po de bzhin te/ /pu tra ar thi cha bsnyams pa/ /'dod dang ldan zhing mngal 'dzin 'gyur/ /sha ta sring ga hasta dang / /tsan+dan gyi ni phye ma

dag /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /bud med kun la bde ba ster/ /ni ta ke ke pe ya dang / /skyes bus b+ha ga byugs na ni/ /dbang du sdud par byed pa'i mchog /rtsa mkhris ral pa dmar po dang / /da la dang ni ba dur bcas/ /ril bu kha ru bcug na ni/ /'khrig

dus khu ba 'dzin pa'i mchog /ma yu ra dang a shu dang / /a ra ka me shi phye mas ni/ /dgra bo rlag par byed pa yin/ /rmongs byed kan ta gzhan mi thub/ /sa yi bdag por yang dag ldan/ /smig ma yi ni sa bon bcas/ /bya ba kun byed dge ba yin/ /ga ri du hi kra ma

dang / /bu dan tsa ri rdo rje can/ /rang khrag bcas pa'i skyo ma yis/ /sta re 'bar ba'ang gangs su byed/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M AH/ a la sogs pas lus byugs na/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mchod 'gyur na/ /sa

stengs skye bo smos ci dgos/ /yang a i o aHrnams ni/ /yid 'ong bdug pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /l-I U r-i au rnams ni/ /dril phyis sbyor ba'i dam pa yin/ /A a~M e I rnams ni/ /mig sman la sogs cho ga'o/ /u l-i r-i ai rnams ni/ /khrus kyi bya ba'i

cho ga'i mchog /ka sogs bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga mchog /tsa la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs sogs/ /skyes pa bud med dbang du byed/ /Ta la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du byed/ /ta

la sogs dang til chen gyis/ /dpral par thig ler byas na ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas rmongs byed/ /pa la sogs dang bdud rtsi lngas/ /tsan+dan bcas pas dbang du byed/ /sha Sha sa ha rnams kyis ni/ /rlung dang me dang dbang chen chu/ /ya la sogs pa'i dkyil

'khor gyi/ /cho ga ji bzhin rig pa yis/ /bskrad pa la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po

chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang / sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs la/ /gsang chen du ni legs bzhugs

pa'i/ /der ni lha mos 'di skad gsungs/ /lha khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /mtshon cha lnga yi cho ga dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i nags tshal dang / /gnas bzhi khyod kyis gsungs pa yi/ /dgos pa dag ni ji lta bu/ /bsdus

pa'i ming ni ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin gzhan yang bri ba ci/ /khyod kyis ba dan gsum bshad pa'i/ /mchod pa yi ni khyad par ci/ /de dag bdag ni the tshom gyur/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas

pa gang / /de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo legs so legs/ /nang gi sbyor ba'i sdom pa ni/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /ltong rgyud sbyor ba la sogs tshogs/ /me tog dag ni bsdus pa 'dra/ /rna drung bar du 'gengs pa dag /

lcags kyu zhags pa sogs pa'ang sbyar/ /mda' ni myur ba mgyogs pa ste/ /'phen pa mda' yi shugs yin no/ /g.yas dang g.yon ni gnyi ga yis/ /'gengs pa mchog ma'i bar du yin/ /'dzin pa cung zad gnas pa ste/ /mi 'da' bar ni 'phang bar

bya/ /mda' yi cho ga brjod mi lang / /da ni phyag rgya brjod par bya/ /sa ni phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /mnyam pa rkang gnyis gshibs pa ste/ /yangs pa rgya cher skyed pa yin/ /zlum po dkyil 'khor lta bur bya/ /g.yon pa cung

zad bskums pa ni/ /g.yas pa brkyang zhes bya ba ste/ /g.yon brkyang g.yon pa bsrang nas ni/ /g.yas pa cung zad bskums pa'o/ /mda' gzhu rig byed cho ga yis/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'phang bar bya/ /'di ni dbyibs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /da ni lus

kyi mtshan nyid rnams/ /phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya/ /grims pa ni mi lhod pa ste snying stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /sran 'dzugs pa ni brtan zhing brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ /mnyen pa zhes bya ba ni mdzes shing snyan par smra ba'o/ /yan lag brtan zhes bya ba ni

phyag rgyas rma srol cher 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag zhes bya ba la 'gengs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ tshad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus 'dzum pa dang bcas shing mthun par 'jug pa'o/ /lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /

zhes bya ba ni rab tu rdzogs pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /bsam gtan sbyor bas dbug par bya/ /khro bo'i gzugs su bsgoms nas su/ /lha yi dbang por gzhur byas nas/ /klu dbang ba su ta yi rgyud/ /klog ni mda' ru

bsam bya ste/ /me lce 'bar ba mde'ur bya/ /sgro ni rlung zhes bya ba ste/ /rnam pa lngar ni 'bugs pa yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba ni sna sgo g.yas pa ste/ de nas spro bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa ni sna sgo g.yon pa ste bsdu ba'o/ /chang pas 'ben ni

bsgribs nas su zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i don to/ /'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'o/ /de la chang pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang rlung ngo / /mig gdangs pa ni bzhin 'dzum la dang bcas pa'o/ /lta ba chang pa la gtad ces bya ba ni shi ba rnams kyang 'tsho bar

byed pa'i mchog go/ /mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /'bugs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /smin ma'i dkyus ni gzhu yin te/ /bzlog ste lta ba mda' yin no/ /'bugs pa rang gi sems kyis ni/ /gzhan sems don la gtad pa yin/ /rol

pa 'gros ni dal ba ste/ /'o ma 'dzin pa mkhrang ba ni/ /bo ni u na ta zhes bya/ /bu mo 'di ni yid 'phrog ma/ /thams cad dngos po gsum yin te/ /yan lag mi gsal 'od ldan gang / /de ni yang dag gsal zhing 'bar/ /snying gis thams cad 'dzin pa gang / /

de ni yan lag bsgrub par brjod/ /snying ni pad+ma zhes bshad de/ /pad+ma de ni kun gyis mchod/ /thams cad 'dzin pa mgo bo yin/ /klad pa nas ni kun du rgyu/ /gang gi stobs ni gang yin pa/ /de ni de tshe sbyar bar bya/ /gnas ni rnam pa du mar bshad/ /sha dang

pus kar bung ba sogs/ /'dir yang rim pa de nyid kyis/ /sems ni dgug pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bdag gi gdan la sogs pa yin/ /rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par sla/ /brda yis bshad pa brjod par bya/ /gru bzhi la sogs zhes bya la/ /gru bzhi pa

ni zur bzhi ste/ /la yig dbang chen dkyil 'khor ro/ /'dab ma can ni gru gsum ste/ /me yi dkyil 'khor ra~M las byung / /de bzhin kun nas zlum po ni/ /ba dang ya zhes bya bar bshad/ /bsgrub par bya la dkyil 'khor dag /yi ge dang bcas

bsams te bsgrubs/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor ba ni/ /bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun bsams pa'o/ /rim gyis gnon cing 'gro bya ste/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /rdo rje chags par bdag bsgoms na/ /rgyal srid thams cad longs spyod

'gyur/ /slar yang e ni gzhur byas te/ /ba zhes bya ba mda' yin no/ /mda' gzhu'i rig byed sbyor ba yis/ /sngar bshad ji bzhin gnas par bya/ /bsgrub par bya ba 'od dmar 'gyur/ /mdun du bltas pa bsam par bya/ /gsang ba'i

gnas kyi nges pa ni/ /sha yi 'bugs par ngas bshad de/ /lte ba'i dbugs ni pus ka ra/ /snying ga bung ba zhes bya ste/ /ge sar 'bugs pa dpral ba yin/ /mig sogs g.yo ba zhes bya ste/ /dbang po'i tshogs ni g.yul 'gyed

pa/ /mi yi bdag po gsad par bya/ /de dag kun gyi man ngag ni/ /bla ma'i kha las nges par bya/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang / /zhes bya ba la 'khrul 'khor ni ta la'i 'dab ma dang / gro ga dang ras la sogs pa la ral gri dang / /pad+ma dang /

'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sngags dang bcas par bris pa ste/ de ni 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen pa'o/ /mi 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i yig 'bru las sna sgo'i lam nas byung ste dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'o/ /lag pas

'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhar dmigs te dam tshig dbang du bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pa'o/ /'phangs nas slar ni gzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyar bcug ste bslang nas thal bar byas la/ slar yang gzung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ges rang nyid

bkug nas bslang ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas nam mkha'i ngos thams cad yongs su khyab pa'i du ba lta bu'i ye shes der bkug cing gsos te dam bca'o/ /de nas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ci rigs par

bsams nas rkang pa dang rkang par/ lag pa dang lag par/ kha dang khar/ lus dang lus su/ ngag dang ngag tu/ lta ba dang lta bar 'thab cing 'ching bar bsgom par bya ba 'di ni lag pas 'gyed pa ste rnam pa lnga'o/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /zhes bya ba ni/

a~M i~M u~M o~M/ oM a~M aH ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha rnams te/ /rab tu sbyor ba rgyas par ni/ /bsgrub pa sgrub po rnams la bshad/ /pad+ma gar dbang bsgyur nas su/ /bu mo'i gnas la 'dug par bsam/ /e zhes bya dang ba~M zhes pa/ /la zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ /sgrub pos

'dir ni yi ge bsam/ /me mar gyi ni rtse ltar bya/ /rtse mo lta bu zhes bya ba la/ /shi kha ni mgo ste klad pa'i gong bu'o/ /rtse mo ni me'i rtse mo ste/ des mar sar bum par bcos pa ltar thams cad du bzhu bar bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ sngags

kyi mar me 'di yis ni/ /skad cig gis ni 'dar bar 'gyur/ /bu mo chags pas gdungs nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho bar dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lugs ma 'am ni bris pa la/ /de yi ming ni bris nas su/ /blo ldan snying gar bcug ste bsgom/ /nyi ma

bdun ni tshun chod kyis/ /mar me yi ni cho ga yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gang gi dbang po rdzas yin te/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub/ /dbang po mig la sogs pa yin/ /rigs pa'i sbyor ba lam yin te/ /gang dang gang gi rang bzhin te/ /

de dang de yi dngos po yis/ /bde ba nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba sems zhes bya ba ste/ /de nyid du ni bdag bde sogs/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bde ba yis ni 'grub par bshad/ /shin tu bde ba'i sgrub thabs ni/ /thos dang bsam gtan sogs

spangs pa'i/ /dman pa dag ni gang gis kyang / /bsgrub par nus pa ma yin te/ /skye bo thabs dang bral bas na/ /tshul ngan dman pa dka' bas bsgrub/ /bdag nyid sgrub pa dang bral bas/ /skal med ngal ba don med cing / /de la dngos grub zhes mi brjod/ /

a sam zhes bya ba ni dpe dang zla med pa'o/ /a d+hi ta zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun du rang nyid 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su mtshon cing 'jug pa'o/ /pra ta ha~M zhes bya ba ni nyi ma re re zhing ngo / /

yang na zla re ste zla ba nya la'o/ /yang na lo re zhing ste gal te ma 'byor pa 'byor pa'am/ skal ba med pa dang / 'das pa'i dbang gis kyang rung ste/ de dag gis ni lo re zhing bya'o/ /de bzhin zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ltar bya ba'o/ /yang na de bzhin te slob dpon gzhan med

na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba la de la byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa ste/ de rnyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu gar bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas sdom pa ni sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa ste/ de su zhig ce na/ gzugs la sogs

pa dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i bu mo'o/ /gar zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas spyad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /des ni 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ phyag rgya la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ji ste rgyun du ma 'byor na des bde ba slar yang

rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ rim pa 'dis mchod pa bya zhing dam tshig bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan yang brdas bshad pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ pra ta ha~M zhes bya ba ni rab tu mang po'o/ /de ci zhig zhe na/ khams brgyad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba

zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /zla re zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang / dmar po'o/ /lo re zhes bya ba ni lo bcu gcig ma nas brtsams te/ nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar du'o/ /gal te de dag kyang ma 'byor na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba bdag nyid gcig pus bde ba'i sbyor bas dam

tshig bskyang bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag rgyas dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba la 'jug pa ni nyams su len pa'o/ /sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis/ /pad+ma'i snod ni bzung nas su/ /zhes bya ba la pad+ma'i snod ni dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa ste/ de la ka zhes bya

ba ni lus so/ /pA la zhes bya ba ni skyong ba ste/ dum bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni mnyams shing shin tu mdzes pa'o/ /de la pad+ma zhes bya ba ni pad+ma can nam/ rigs gzhan gyi bu mo yang rung ste/ snod ni de'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi pad+ma yin la de nyid mnyams pa ste/ rma med pa

zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /lag pa zhes bya ba ni brtan pa zhes bya bar 'jug pa'o/ /g.yon pa zhes bya ba ni zur mig g.yon du lta ba'o/ /ba dan gsum zhes bya ba ni bu mo'i bcud 'dzag pa ste de bza' ba'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba la lag pa ni lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i

bar yin la/ bshes gnyen dang ldan pa'i phyir g.yas pa'o/ /de nyid ni g.yon pa ste/ de las byung ba de longs spyad par bya ba'o/ /de la longs spyad pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bla mas nyams su bstar ba de ltar spyad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa pos de ltar nges

par shes par byas la de nas dus bcing bar bya'i/ gzhan du na ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /ltung ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sngags ni bla mas bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya de la bstan pa yin/ /de nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi 'khor

lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad mi rtog pa/ /mi rtog pa yang ma yin te/ /rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mi rtog pa ni brtags pa yin/ /dus drug tu ni bstan pa dag /rtag tu rnam par mi rtog gnas/ /rdo rje sems sogs rgyal ba ru/ /

de yi rang bzhin yongs shes bya/ /sos ka dang ni dbyar dang ston/ /dgun stod dgun smad de bzhin dpyid/ /de dag ma 'dres shes byas la/ /'dis ni las rnams thams cad bya/ /sos ka'i dus ni rta mchog ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka/ /rdo rje nyi ma ston yin te/ /pad+mas

rol pa dgun stod yin/ /dgun smad rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /dpyid ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sos ka mar mes mchod bya ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni chu yis mchod/ /ston ni mar khus mchod bya ste/ /dgun stod de bzhin me tog dbul/ /dgun smad ga bur bza' bya ste/ /

khyad par du ni bzhi mnyam gyis/ /dpyid kyi dus su mchod par bya/ /dus kyi mchod dang mnyam med de/ /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo mnyes/ /de bas 'bad pe thams cad kyis/ /mchod na mchod pa'i bdag

nyid 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de dag rdzogs par ni/ /gang zhig gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrub po rnams kyi las rnams ni/ /thams cad byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /de dag rang bzhin grub pa ste/ /dus zhes bya bar brjod pa yin/ /dus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /

rgyal ba thams cad yang dag bzhugs/ /dus kun sems la gnas mod kyi/ /de ltar na yang rnam par 'khrul/ /mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge hU~M ste/ de yang bdag nyid kyi lus la gnas pa'i hU~M ngo / /de nyid ni yi ge mchog ces bya ste/ yi ge mchog de'i phyag rgya ni rtsa

gsum nas bde ba chen po'i sgor sna'i sgo gnyis nas rlung ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin la/ de nyid ni A li kA li ste/ g.yas dang g.yon du'o/ /des 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin la/ de'i

steng du ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas ni me'o/ /de nas ni sa'o/ /de'i steng du ni pad+ma'o/ /de'i steng du gnas pa'i sa bon ni mi shigs pa dang yi ge'i mchog ces brjod do/ /dbang po kun las byung ba ni/ /dam tshig thod pa zhes bar brjod/ /mdzes pa phreng ba zhes bshad de/ /de kho na nyid dbu

rgyan yin/ /gtsug gi nor bu dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya rjes gnang yin/ /he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o/ /thod pa lus zhes bya ba ste/ /rked pa phreng ba'i ming can yin/ /dbu rgyan b+ha ga zhes byar brjod/ /sangs rgyas khu ba zhes brjod do/ /gtsug gi nor bu med par bshad/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i

dbang bskur ba'o/ /slar yang bshad par bya ba ste/ /thod pa dbang gnyis dam tshig ste/ /phreng ba sngags kyi bdag por brjod/ /bcu drug thig gis btab pa'o/ /stong pa dbu rgyan zhes byar bshad/ /a la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra ru brjod/ /de rnams dbus kyi bde ba gang / /

de ni gtsug gi nor bur brjod/ /rigs rnams kun gyis thams cad du/ /rtag tu dbang bskur de lta bu/ /dpal zhes bya ba dga' ba ste/ /bde ba sangs rgyas su ni brjod/ /pad+ma pad+ma nyid yin la/ /nags ni skya reng zhes byar grags/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems yin no/ /yang na pad+ma lte ba'i 'khor

lo ste/ /nags ni a sogs ma mo yin/ /rtsa ba thar ba ster byed pa'i/ /brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin/ /yang na lte ba mtsho skyes zhes bya ste/ /nags zhes bya ba ngag yin la/ /rtsa ba lus kyi yin/ /sangs rgyas sems kyi brda yin no/ /gcig pu nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /dben

pa rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /sbas pa gsal bar ma byas pa'o/ /nags ni sngar bshad khams rnams te/ /lhan cig mchog tu 'jug pas na/ /bsdus pa zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /lha zhes bya bar rang ming brjod/ /gza' dang skar ma la sogs lha/ /a gra zhes bya'i sgra brjod pa/ /de ni rnal 'byor

shes pa min/ /a gra gtso bo zhes brjod cing / /a gra dam pa zhes bya la/ /a gra dang po zhes bshad cing / /a gra spyi bor gnas pa'o/ /rang gi ming dang ldan pa yis/ /sdig pa dag ni sel bar byed/ /yang na sa ni a sogs te/ /de rnams a gra ha zhes bya/ /mgor gnas 'og tu bltas nas

ni/ /yi ge tha snyad char du 'bebs/ /tha snyad ces bya ba ni dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams te de rnams kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa'o/ /dbyangs zhes bya ba la swa ni rang nyid kyis so/ /ra ni mdzes pa ste des na me swa ra'o/ /ha ni skal bzang yi ge ste/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa

yi/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams kun dang ldan pa ru/ /dngos po gsum ni yang dag gnas/ /bris pas bsod nams gang mthong ba/ /bsams pas kyang ni de bzhin mthong / /

slob ma bdag nyid chen po la/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /dbang bskur dam pa bsgom byar 'dod/ /gang dang gang gi lha yi mchog /de dang de ni slob dpon 'gro/ /gang dang gang la lhag mos pa/ /de dang de yis dbang bskur bya/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhi dag tu/ /yang dang yang du so sor bshad/ /gang zhig sngar ni

bshad pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyis brjod pa yin/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs bya'i phyir/ /bcos ma yi ni sgom pa dang / /bcos ma yi ni bzlas pa bya/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur na/ /bcos ma'i sbyor ba phyi rol nas/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur pas/ /bcos ma dag ni mi bya'o/ /dper na gzings la 'jus nas

ni/ /chu yi pha rol 'gro bar byed/ /pha rol phyin nas 'dor ba ltar/ /bcos ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs las gang ni/ /bcos ma'i sems kyis gang byed pa/ /phyi rol las rnams gsal byed pas/ /dang po'i las can rnams la bsngags/ /dngos grub de kun 'dir gnas pas/ /rgyal

ba'i dngos nyid rig la min/ /gang yang sgra shes bstan bcos rnams/ /drang srong rnams kyis byas pa ltar/ /rang gi sems ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /skyes bu'i bcos ma'i bya ba rnams/ /rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ /'bad pas sdug bsngal slong bar byed/ /

de phyir dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /bya ba'i cho ga la 'bad pa/ /thar pa dang bral phyi rol te/ /skyes bu nyon mongs 'ba' zhig byed/ /mi rtog pas ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /rtog dang bcas pas kyang de bzhin/ /shin tu rnam dag yongs shes na/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi de nyid

'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ /dam pa nyid du yod min cing / /rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir/ /stong pa nyid kyang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin dbye ba thams cad kyi/ /rnam pa dag ni rnam gnas pa/ /rgya mtsho la ni rin chen bzhin/ /thog mtha'

med pa'i tshul can yin/ /'jig rten rtag tu tha snyad spyod/ /'jig rten las 'das de dang 'gal/ /yod dang med ces bya ba ni/ /rang bzhin nyid du shes pa min/ /'di yi tshul gyis rab rtogs pa/ /rdzogs dang bral bas grol ba min/ /rnal ma'i lam la brten ni/ /

thams cad byas kyang rnam par grol/ /skyon dang yon tan 'phel byed pa'i/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dngos/ /lhan cig skyes par yang dag gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de

bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / /rang bzhin nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga bcu pa'o// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje
mkha' 'gro rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / /bod kyi zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dpe gnyis la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra DA ka nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa dang / /thams cad bdag nyid la rtag bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos

sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /'di nyid gcig pu lhag pa'i lha/ /'byung gnas sgra gzugs las nges 'byung / /dam tshig spyod yul bcom ldan rnams/ /thog mtha' dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /'jig

rten gsum rnams na rnyed dka'/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs pa med/ /sgyu ma'i phyag rgya bud med kun/ /gnyis med ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod na ma yang 'grub 'gyur te/ /bde dang spro bas thams cad 'thob/ /nam mkha'

kun du spyod 'grub pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya thams cad dang / /kun nas sna tshogs sdom pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab tu grags/ /so so'i lha la dmigs pa ni/ /de nyid bsam bral rnal 'byor

te/ /dbang bskur ba las nges par skye/ /gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnal 'byor te/ /rnal 'byor chen po byang chub sems/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag po rang / /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin phyir/ /de phyir kun nas 'bad pa yis/ /sna tshogs

rang bzhin la mchod bya/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba khyab par gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang bdag dang ni/ /sems can dang ni nus ldan rnams/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor pas/ /bsgrub bya'i bdag nyid de yi phyir/ /'di yis sangs rgyas

thams cad dang / /nus ldan kun gyi de nyid ni/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin nyid du/ /skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor te/ /

khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /nam mkha' pa yi mtshan nyid du/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang / /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa rnams/ /thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba kun du gnas pa rnams/ /'ga' yang dmigs

pa ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor pa yi phyag rgya 'dis/ /'jig rten gsum du rgyu bar byed/ /rmongs pa gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /mkhas pas de yi rol pas grol/ /tshogs gnas gang ba'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan dang gzhan du gsal skye zhing / /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam

snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug /de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab tu grags/ /de dag 'byung chen gcig pu ste/ /thams cad bde ba stsol ba'o/ /

rdul dang rdul med du brjod pa/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sa ni ltung bar byed ma ste/ /chu khams gsod par byed ma'o/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/ /gar dbang phyug ma de bzhin rlung / /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rang bzhin no/ /'byung ba

lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gtso bo rdo rje de bzhugs so/ /'byung ba kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog 'bar ma'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /thos byed zhe sdang rdo rjer bshad/ /ser sna rdo rje de bzhin sna/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rjer brjod/ /reg la phrag

dog rdo rje ste/ /skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /mig gis mthong sogs stong bas na/ /'di kun stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam par rtog med mthong ba yis/ /de ni thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /'di dag nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /

thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin sems/ /bsgoms pa thogs med dang ldan na/ /rnam par mi rtog rab tu skye/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med pa don

yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par bya ba gsungs pa/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas na mkhyen pa mchog dang ldan pa bzhugs par gyur pa de srid du sems can gyi don thams cad nus pa mtshungs pa med par mi ldog ste/ 'di nyid kyis na sems can dam pa

de srid pa'i zhags pa ni rtag tu mi 'jigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can gyi don mi 'dor bar rtag tu myur bar byed pa dang / smon lam dag pa'i phyir na nam mkha'i gnas gzhi ji tsam du gyur pa dang / srid pa dag phyir sems can gyi don sems kyi 'dod pa'i nus pa can te/ de dag

ni lha'i bu rnams rtag tu chags pa'i dga' ba can rnams dang / /gzhan yang 'dod chags can rnams kyi don du chags pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir na bskal par yang mi zad pa'i bde ba chen po rnam par dag pa sbyin par bya ba'i phyir te/ gdod ma nas gnas gzhi med pa bskal pa la

sogs pa thams cad du bstan pa mngon du gdod ma nas byung ba bskal pa thog ma nas bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'ang der lhag pa'i lha gcig pur yod de/ sems can thams cad skyed par byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtse mo ste/ glu dang dbyangs sogs rol mo

dang / /dngos po kun bdag de yi phyir/ /da ni kun du bde bar bzhugs/ /sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa yin/ /'dod la chags pa rnam bral ba/ /der byung ba yi sems dpa' rnams/ /gdul bya de rnams mkhyen pa ste/ /yi ge las byung rnam par spangs/ /

ye shes 'di de mchod par bya/ /de yongs mchod na mchod par bya/ /de yongs mchod na srid pa zad/ /'o na ye shes las srid byung / /rang bzhin dngos po bems po min/ /de ltar na nga tshor ba ste/ /'gro ba rnam shes tsam du brjod/ /rang rig pas na gang 'di dag /ye shes

bdag nyid las gzhan med/ /tshangs pa'i sgong brjod rang bzhin med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam bdag med de/ /sems can mang yang 'ga' yis kyang / /sems can don gang yod min la/ /bla med sangs rgyas don yang med/ /bdag don dang ni gzhan don dang / /de las

gzhan pa'i nus pa med/ /stong pa nyid la rtag gnas na/ /de las 'gro ba'i don du 'ong / /de med sems can don kun med/ /dmyal bar yang ni 'gro 'gyur te/ /de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi/ /khams rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

'dus nas ni/ /nga la myur du bskul bar byas/ /ma hA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ nga la 'di yis bskul ma thag /kun la bde ba stsol ba'o/ /'dod pa dag pa don grub pa/ /'gro ba thams cad bde ba bskyed/ /nga ni 'dod pa mchog gi gzugs/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyis byin brlabs pa/ /nga yang chos kyi 'dod pa can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dbyangs yin/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi sems chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad dang / /mnyam pa nyid du rab sbyor phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyam sbyor yin/ /

sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu brjod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya ste/ de dbus ji lta'i tshul du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam dgod de/ /zla ba'i mdog la 'dzum bag can/ /de bzhin 'od zer

dmar po 'khrigs/ /sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /rig ma bzhi dang mnyam par ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar mdzes/ /g.yas

zhal zhi ba dkar po yin/ /de bzhin g.yon pa dmar po mchog /nub kyi yang ni ser po mtshungs/ /thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan/ /lha rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /rdo rje dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /dril bu thod pa de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang mnyam ldan/ /

rgya chen por ni bri bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang mnyam mo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma dang cha blangs ma nyid dang / /gnyen mo de bzhin bzho byas la/ /

gnyis gnyis sbyor bas 'dod spyad nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha sogs/ /thogs pa med par bza' bar bya/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon la spyad/ /'bad de g.yon pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /brtan dang g.yo la sogs pa yi/ /'gro

kun g.yon las byung bas na/ /pho nya mo la chags bral bas/ /grol ba nyid du 'gro ba min/ /rtag tu pho nya mor chags grol/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /sgrub pos de la 'bad byas na/ /brtul zhugs med na'ang brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /dam tshig gzhung lugs la

spyod cing / /zas gcig tu ni mdzes par bza'/ /rigs gcig gi ni mtshan nyid phyir/ /rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyod/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar te/ /rdo rje las byung mnyam ldan pa/ /'di dag bdud rtsi lnga yan te/ /dngos grub kun

ni rab stsol mdzad/ /sbom po mtha' ltag kha sbyar bas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor bzhin blangs te/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchog gi dam tshig 'di rnams ni/ /zhal bzang mo khyod la bshad yin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i

las rnams kun/ /thogs chags med par rtag tu spyod/ /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rtag tu bya/ /thogs pa med pas spyod pa ni/ /de bzhin dka'

thub rnams kyi mchog /thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /skra shad 'dzings pa 'dra bar ni/ /yid la yul rnams rten byed pa/ /de ni 'da' dka'i dka' thub yin/ /gang zhig las rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab kyis ni nges par spyad/ /stong pa'i man ngag can de

ni/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dka' thub 'di'o/ /shes rab gzugs brnyan lta bu la/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /don la thogs pa med spyod ma/ /de yi dka' thub bdag nyid yin/ /shes rab thabs las gzhan pa min/ /gang gis sems ni

gnas mi bya/ /de 'drar yang dag gnas byas na/ /byang chub chen po nye bar ster/ /rnam par mi rtog rjes gnas pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa la mngon ldan na/ /de rnams kyi ni 'byung ba kun/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par nges/ /shes rab me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /'dus

byas dngos po de 'dra bar/ /shes rab blo yis dran par bya/ /de yi rnam rtog med sems ni/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/ /mig 'phrul lta bur blta ba ni/ /de ni gtso bo yin par bshad/ /glog dang dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/ /'dus byas

'di dag rnam par smin/ /'di ltar dngos rnams rab gsal bar/ /gang de'i rnam grangs rtse mo mchog /des na sems ni gang zhig tu/ /gnas pa yod par gzhag pa min/ /'di dag lta bur kun du byung ba'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyu ma khyad par can rnams yang dag par rdzogs

par longs spyod pa bskyed de/ bde bas yongs su bzhu bas khyad par can 'ga' zhig tu rdzogs par longs spyod pa skye'o/ /bzang po yongs su gyur pas ni 'bras bu khyad par can 'ga' 'thob bo/ /des ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams grib ma lta bu las gzhan 'ga' ci

yang ma mthong ngo / /gang yang khyad par 'di dag bsgom pa goms pa'i stobs las bde ba mchog tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi dgos pa bskyed na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu mngon du thob par byed pa'i rgyu'i dngos por 'gyur ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das skyon 'ga' yang ma mchis

so/ /de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu mchod par kun du gnas/ /dka' thub sdug bsngal drag po yis/ /rmongs pa brkams shing sdug bsngal te/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs pa/ /g.yengs pa yis ni dngos grub med/ /bde ba kun du brtan

'gyur ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin brtan 'gyur gyi/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yo zhing / /'gog par yang ni lhag par 'gro/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par ltung

bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ mchog gi de kho na nyid snang bar byed

pa dang / yul la shes pa 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang lha mos mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /snying po gang gis gdug pa can rab tu 'dul ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bstan pa la smod pa'i gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba dang / lha gdug pa can la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad gdul zhing zhi ba'i gnas la brtul te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gdug pa byed par mi 'gyur bar gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos 'di glur blangs te bka' stsal to/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /de rjes rjod byed tha ma ste/ /rgyu ba der lhung nga yis mthong / /snying po'i spyi bor gsum pas brgyan/ /la yi mtha' na gnas

pa la/ /steng du yi ge sa dang ldan/ /gnyis pa yis ni mnyes bya ste/ /snying po de la a yig ldan/ /sa mtha' kun dngos de nyid do/ /rjod byed dang ni rjod byed ste/ /rjod byed lnga pas gdan du byas/ /zla phyed thig les brgyan pa can/ /dbus gnas pa las zha bor ldan/ /

sreg pa'i mtha' yis yongs su brgyan/ /sa yi de ma thag gnas pa/ /rlung gzugs su gnas 'og tu sbyar/ /de 'og hu~M hu~M thung ngu gnyis/ /yi ge phaT dang bcas rdzogs pa/ /a~M dngos yi ger rdzogs par ldan/ /lnga pa'i dbus na gnas de la/ /gzhan pa'i i yis

steng du brgyan/ /de nas rjod byed ra la zhon/ /spyi gtsug tu gnas dbang phyug dang / /rjod byed pa yi 'khor 'gyur ba/ /yang dang yang du gzhag par bya/ /rjod byed ra la bskyon pa dang / /e yig rna ba dag la brgyan/ /de nas rjod byed ra nyid ni/ /yang ni

lnga pa dag la bskyon/ /'di yang thams cad pa nyid de/ /rjod byed mgo bor zla phyed brgyan/ /lnga pa dang ldan nyis 'gyur bya/ /kun gyi mgon po de nyid mchog /phaT dang rin chen dag gis brgyan/ /ha ni mjug thogs nyid du'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs kun la

yongs su mnyes par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas dpa' bo drug dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yang 'dir hU~M yig las byung bar/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dkyil 'khor/ /las kyi rdo rje

dbus gnas par/ /de nyid hU~M ni rnam bsgoms te/ /'od phreng du ma ldan pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro yi ni 'khor lo spro/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs chen mo/ /'jigs pa'i dngos po'i nga ro can/ /spyan gsum dbu skra kham ser gyen/ /

na so gzhon byed phun tshogs ma/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /'jigs byed chen po ljags 'dril ma/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs mdzad ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun dang mnyam sbyor/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon gyi rim pa ji bzhin dang / /me dang mnyam pa gnyis brjod dang / /ka ra ka ra bdun pa sbyar/ /ban+d+ha de bzhin dgra snying ste/ /'di yang lan gnyis rjod par byed/ /sa sde la ni ma dang a/ /'jig

rten gzugs bral gyi mthar gnas/ /rang bzhin 'di yang gnyis su brjod/ /gzhan dang gzhan dang ldan par bya/ /b+ha dza dag dang nyer gnas pa/ /de ni lan gnyis dag tu brjod/ /rjod byed la ni gsum pa dang / /khong na gnas pas ldan par bya/ /de nas zla ba gzhon nu

phyed/ /yongs su gang bas brgyan par bya/ /de dag yang dang yang du brjod/ /nyin mor byed pa'i rang bzhin dang / /yongs su ldan pa nyid du bya/ /rjod byed dang ni gshegs gsol gnas/ /lnga par ldan pa nyis 'gyur ro/ /phe yig drag cing myur ba la/ /zla ba gzhon nu

dang ldan pa/ /yang gcig kyang ni brjod par bya/ /drag myur brjod pa phaT gnyis so/ /rnam rtog kun gyi bud shing ni/ /bsreg pas da ha da ha ste/ /de skad ces pa bod pa'i sngags/ /lnga pa'i nye cher gnyis par sbyar/ /a nyi dang yang yang dag ldan/ /rjod byed gtso dang

yang ldan pa/ /yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes rjes su/ /ba sa ru d+hi ra dang ni/ /an+t+ra mA lA ba lam+bi ne/ /grIh+Na grIh+Na dag dang ni/ /sap+ta bA tA la ka tad sbyar/ /b+hu dzang+ga dang sar+b+bam+bA/ /tardza ya ni gnyis brjod do/ /ka yig sde las ka nyid la/ /gnyis pa dang

ni bzhi pa sbyar/ /rlung gi ngo bor gnas pa'o/ /i mtha' sa mtha' zhes brjod la/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gnas par brgyan/ /rjod byed la ni bzhi pas brgyan/ /yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /ka sha o dang pa sde dang / /de 'og dang po dang ldan gzhag /ra dang har sbrel gnyis

dag la/ /thig le gnyis gnyis rab tu sbyar/ /a dang sde tshan sa bon brjod/ /sde tshan gyi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po ru ni ldan par bya/ /gsum pas kyang ni dang po sbyar/ /gsum pa la yang des mnyes bya/ /rjod byed kyang ni rjod byed ni/ /i yi stan du ldan par bya/ /sa sde la

e ra yis brgyan/ /zla dum dang ni thig ler ldan/ /de ni yang yang brjod par bya/ /de nyid e phyogs bzhi par ldan/ /de nas yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed dang ni bzhi pa sbyar/ /mtha' ru la gcig i dang sbyar/ /de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed yi ge ha yang

sbyar/ /de steng zla dum thig les bskyon/ /lnga pa yang ni mnyes par bya/ /de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rnams mang mtha' yas rab bsgrub cing / /dge ba'i me tog mang spung pa/ /'di ni lha mo sgyu chen mo/ /dngos grub kun rab stsol ba'o/ /'dir ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /

'jig rten khams ni thams cad g.yos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang skrag /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /mngon par byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ri bo kun yang g.yo zhing 'gas/ /gdug pa kun 'dul dul zhing zhi/ /dkyil 'khor du

ni bkug nas bcug /dam tshig gis bcings dbang du 'dus/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /gza' dang rims nad thams cad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po log 'dren dang / /sdig pa can dang dmyal ba kun/ /bkas shing bsgyel te rnam par bshig /bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje bri/ /

kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /phyi rol ri mo zlum pos bskor/ /de yi dbus su bcom ldan 'das/ /khro bo chen po zhal bzhes mdzes/ /cung zad mche gtsigs 'jigs bag can/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /g.yas pa dkar po zhi ba ste/ /g.yon pa

dmar po 'jigs pa che/ /nub kyi zhal ni mdangs ser po/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes/ /'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi mnan pa po/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar mdzes/ /dpa' bo g.yas na kha T+wAM ga /thod pa yang ni g.yon

na'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba bri/ /thod pa yi ni khyad par ro/ /dpa' bo gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing / /shes rab dga' mas rab tu mdzes/ /'bar ba dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gsal/ /sems dpa' 'bar ba 'khyil par ldan/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang

ni/ /dur khrod kyi ni me bzhin 'bar/ /dbu skra 'bar ba chen po gsal/ /dbu rgyan thod pas rnam par phye/ /rol pa thams cad 'tshogs pa na/ /he ru ka ni gar la spyod/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo'i gnas mchog tu/ /sa rnams kyi ni dbang phyug nyid/ /kun nas kun tu thams

cad pa/ /rang nyid rtag tu thams cad kun/ /mkha' 'gro kun kyang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i rab sbyor gyis/ /'grub par 'di la the tsom med/ /thun mtshams nas ni rab sbyor bas/ /mchog gi sdom pa bsgom par bya/ /

'bum rdzogs nas ni rdo rje che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dang mnyam 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /tshe dang mdog dang na so dang / /gzugs dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /rdzu 'phrul grub pa chen por ldan/ /sems can don byed nus par 'gyur/ /yang na gsang sngags

ting 'dzin gyis/ /cung zad tsam zhig bzlas pa bya/ /las ni brgya tsam byed par 'gyur/ /'di lta ste/ brtan pa dang / g.yo ba thams cad nges par gnon pa dang / ltung bar byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa dang / lkugs par byed pa dang

rengs par byed pa dang / dbugs 'byin par byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyes pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rnam par sgyur bar byed pa dang / smyo bar byed pa dang / rnam par 'gyur zhing skrod par byed pa dang / sdang ba dang / nor rdzas 'joms

shing 'jigs par byed pa dang / ngud mo byed du 'jug pa dang / bsdigs par byed pa dang / bdag nyid bcings nas 'tshog pa dang / brdung ba dang / long bar byed pa dang / sa bon 'joms par byed pa dang / rims dang / khong nad dang / dug gis 'dzin pa dang / rang

gis brkos nas 'jug pa dang / dmyal bar ltung bar byed pa dang / dud 'gro'i gnas yongs su sgyur bar byed pa dang / skyes pa bud med du byed pa dang / bu chung lto nas ltung byed pa dang / b+ha ga 'ching ba dang / ma ning du byed pa dang / 'dod pa la chags la snyom par byed pa dang /

rgod cing 'ching ba dang gzhan gyis rang gsod du 'jug pa dang / mtshon rdug par byed pa dang / dgos dgu byed pa dang / yud kyis skrod pa dang / gcer bur byed pa dang / b+ha ga dang bshang lam sgrogs par byed pa dang / b+ha ga dang bshang lam rang lug tu byed pa dang / khu ba khrag tu

byed pa dang / nad rnams myur du sel bar byed pa dang / khrag las gyur pa'i mdze nad la sogs pa sud par byed pa dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyis bcings shing gzir bar byed pa dang / dum bu dum bur byed pa dang / lus can thams cad phye mar

byed cing gsad pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'dar ba dang / dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad la rgyun du ca blar smra ba dang / sngon gyi gnas so sor thob pa ltar ston pa dang / dbang du byed pa'i las

thams cad la rab tu sbyor ba dang / bran du byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung

dang / nam mkha' thams cad bka' bsgo bar byed pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dag las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / chags pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang / rims dang / yams dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro

ma thams cad las grol bar byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chags pa dang bral ba 'bigs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'khor ba la skyo ba 'jig par byed pa ste/ de lta bur 'di dag ni lha mo thams cad grub par byed par brjod pa

ste/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag nyid ni ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ste rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rab tu 'grub pa de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di dag ni rdo rje

mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las las kyi tshogs thams cad kyi cho ga dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngags kyi cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gsang ba brjod par bya/ /mdor bsdus phyir na rgyas par min/ /thams cad sgyu mar mnyam

sbyor na/ /las rnams thams cad mnyam par byed/ /dngos grub chen po sgyu ma kun/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab grub pa'o/ /rig pa rnam par 'phro byed pa/ /'byung po'i gdon rnams 'gugs par byed/ /hi ma ban+ta s+ye ut+ta re Na b+ha bats+tshi bo na ma/ ma hA ma so/ so ba

i a d+ha ma si ha~M be hi ma se hi ma se hi ba ti budz+dza i/ i so/ ni do/ ma hi/ nI to/ kum+b+ha kaN+Da/ sin+na do/ sA ga ra sa sat+ya pa Da be sin+na sin+na da~M/ ban+ng+hA mi/ ku rur sas+sa bi Da la sa/ tuN+Da ban+d+ha me/ dzA ba su ra u da ni/ dza ba ra bi pa b+ha a d+hi a ha to bar+N+Na a nu ba da na sA d+hu na/ ma

ma ri a sar+b+ba si d+ha na swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /'dis lan bdun du mngon par brjod pas bsngags pa byas te/ khyim gyi thog du gzhag na rjod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /ba sa ha to la i mi dz+nya a/ ba sa

ba dza na mo hi a/ e sa bidz+dza tsa ha in man+ta i in+d+ha na/ ha a bA i dza be na diN+Na Ni/ d+ha tam+pa hi ma hA swa ba a na ne bA d+ho si/ rA dza ku la khaN+Da/ Da Ni Da/ dze bA i ba d+ha/ ta d+hi Na ta Na/ na maHsid+ha na/ na maHpu pa dza dza pA da na/ ma sa wa rA Ne/ tad+yad re ma hA daN+De da ha he dun he he

swA hA/ 'dis bye ma la lan bdun du bsngags pa byas te/ 'bru rnams la btab na ce spyang la sogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyis mi za zhing sprin rnam par zlog par byed/ rat+na ra ti/ oM a la la bar tsu li la tsor bar+g+ha ka na da sa bA mu ha ban+ng+hA mi swA hA/ shing bu sor bzhi pa

la lan bdun du bzlas te/ rna ba g.yas pa la btags na chom rkun rnams rengs par byed do/ /i da si/ a ti Ni dza ha a ka li lo hi di/ ping+ga le/ ma me ga b+ha na i/ a haM si la u sa ri mi a ba ra b+ha Na i/ a haM bA da u sA ra mi a ba ra b+ha Na mi a ham du ha mi b+hi to badz+dza

pa/ mi lo lo ka li lo hi di pang+ga li hU~M phaT/ glang gi rwa yis brus pa'i sa dbus ma blangs la sngags 'dis lan bdun du mngon par btab ste/ nags khrod dang 'jigs pa'i lam dang / rgyal pos bkrabs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ ba glang

gi gdong pa can du byas nas cho ga 'di bya ste/ sa de lag par gzhag la/ ser ba 'bab pa la sogs pa la btab na/ ldog par 'gyur te 'di yi cho ga 'di'o/ /oM dzaM pi li a ba a bidz+dzi su ti tha da si/ i su b+ha de su b+ha de o/ so Na o a tsa la hi suN+Na pa da ne/ i si la ba da ba

ra Sha badz+dza hi swA hA/ snod bzang por chu blugs te/ rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug ste/ lan bdun du bsngags nas chu de nam mkha' la gtor na/ ser ba dang rlung 'bab pa la sogs pa rengs par byed do/ /na a mo d+he/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ki b+hi ku re Na sha tra ya/ tha ma ke ha tha ka ral pA

ke/ ni ta sa~M ru bi ti b+ha tu ya/ ru dza ri Ta ram Ta ku ke to li Ta lu ya/ lu taM hiSh+Tha le ka si ra le lo ti gra le b+hi Shi Sha le Na si mu le kha a ya the sar+b+ba ha de sra na b+hu dza ku b+ha na su the ra Sha ya na pa ya ra ti Shu d+ha ya na sho pa d+ya ti ta ka su sa la ka kha se sid+d+ha ba hA la sa hi pa Na swA hA/ chu la lan bdun bsngags

nas kha gdong bkrus na thams cad 'grub par byed do/ /rim pa bzhin du he ru ka dang 'dab ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma rnams bkod de/ dbugs mi 'byung bar sbyar ba las/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /yang ni rnal 'byor pa rnams 'dir/ /pad+ma la ni rab bsams te/ /

yid ni rlabs med par byas te/ /sngags ni pho nya mor sbyar na/ /de yis rtag tu 'grub 'gyur ba/ /'di la sngags pa the tshom med/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rab tu rtogs bya'i
