dpa' bo drug /dpa' mo drug dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ /gnas rnams re re yi ge ste/ /dang po snying ga nyid du'o/ /mgo bo la ni gnyis par brjod/ /spyi gtsug la ni gsum pa sbyin/ /dpung pa go cha bzhi pa nyid/ /mig dag la ni lnga pa yin/ /drug pa thams cad la ni brjod/ /

dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyer 'dus mchog /gang du mnyes par 'gyur ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun rab sdom pa'o/ /gnas bzhir rab sbyar ram/ /yang na rgya mtsho'i

'gram du 'am/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor rab bsgrub cing / /mchog rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /ri bo phug dang nags tshal dang / /de bzhin shing gcig tu brjod par/ /mtshan mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rab bsgrubs nas/ /rnal 'byor bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /der ni rtag

tu mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang / /lhan cig 'dug par sgrub po the tshom med/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u lnga pa'o// //sngar spyod cho ga'i rim pa rnams/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /dka' thub rnal 'byor pas mi bya/ /gzhan pa kun dang gnas mi bya/ /lus la

mchog tu'ang mchod mi bya/ /brnyas pa nyid du'ang mi bya ste/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin med mnyam lta/ /gseg ma sol bas bsgos bya zhing / /thal bas 'bad de brgyan par bya/ /bza' dang bza' min la sogs la/ /sngags pas kun du rtog mi bya/ /me tog rnyed rnyed thams cad kyis/ /rtag

tu phreng ba nyid du bya/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u drug pa'o// //de nas go cha rnams kyi ni/ /las kyi tshogs rnams bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten gsum na bcud yod gang / /smyo byed 'bras skyes la bsres na/ /de la skad cig gis kun grub/ /go cha bzlas bzhin 'gro

byed na/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong zhing / /chom rkun stag sogs kyis mi 'jigs/ /go cha bzlos bzhin du rgyal po'i grong du byin gyis brlabs te/ zhugs na mi mthong bar yang 'dod pa de blangs nas slar yod pa dang / go cha bzlos bzhin bzlas pas gang la reg na de mdud bzhin du

rengs par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang mi g.yos so/ /sngags bzlas pa'i rkang pas bsnun na ni slar grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las bshad de/ sha lnga las gzugs brnyan gyi

rab tu sbyor ba las las thams cad byed pa yin te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad dang / lha'i skye gnas thams cad dran pa nyid kyis mchi'o/ /sprin rnams skrag par byed pa dang / char 'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / rgya mtsho

skems par byed pa dang / chu bo rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed pa dang / dbang po zlog par byed pas dur khrod kyi sol ba la ji tsam 'dod pa bzlas nas gang la bsnun na/ de de'i skad cig ma nyid la ltung ngo / /dur khrod kyi sol ba la yongs su bzlas te/ gang la bsnun na de de'i skad cig

nyid la sha zas 'dzin no/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi spyod pa ste/ /dpa' bo'i dpa' dang cha blangs ma/ /gang gis pho nyar shes byas te/ /dpa' bos mdzes ma spyad par bya/ /sa ni

rten du byas nas ni/ /dam pa'i spyod pa'i bzlas brjod bya/ /rim las bzlog pa'i ldang tshul dang / /kha yi rang bzhin 'jigs bag can/ /rtag tu smyon ma bsus pa'i gdong / /chos kyi rim pa myur shes pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rnam spyod yin/ /ri mo gsum po yongs zlum por/ /

rim dang rim bzlog ji bzhin shes/ /'gro dang 'ong bas mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /mtshan ma kun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /dgrol las bzhin gyi gnyer ma can/ /ji zhig gis ni slar ldog byed/ /de las rdo rje'i dgug pa gsal/ /de dbyangs ko ki la yi skad/ /rnal 'byor dam pa de lta'i dngos/ /

shes par byas na dngos grub ster/ /de la mtshan nyid bsam byas na/ /de yis de yi dngos por 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u dgu pa'o// //dngos grub kun ni rab ster ba/ /nga yis bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /lus ngag sems la rtag tu ni/ /yid kyi rdul

dang bral bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsam par/ /gang du'ang pho nya mo gnas min/ /yongs su bsgoms pas 'ong min gyi/ /dad pa tsam gyis gzung bya ste/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin no/ /gsang ba 'di gsal mi bya zhing / /rab tu

'bad de sba bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun bsdus lta/ /de phyir lus nyid du mi blta/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul te/ /dam tshig rab bsrungs rab 'grub ste/ /dam

tshig las ni sngags par gnas/ /rtag tu 'bras skyes stobs brten cing / /rnal 'byor ma rnams smad mi bya/ /rjes su 'jug rnams mi bzlog go/ /dam can mi rnams la mi smad/ /brtson ldan rnams la gnod mi bya/ /'di rnams dang ldan cig bder bya/ /grol bar 'dod pa de don du/ /

dam tshig rnams ni spyad par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa la/ /cung zad tsam yang smad mi bya/ /khros te rab sbyor 'ga' mi bya/ /sngags la sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //rdo rje mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs/ /

nga yis bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /dang por bsgom bya ro nyid de/ /chos dbyings dag tu rig par bya/ /de yi steng nus rnal 'byor pa/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom byas te/ /de nyid du ni rnam par dgod/ /rang gi snying ga'i zla dbus su/ /'od las lha mo kun phyung ba/ /phyag 'tshal mchod

sogs 'di ltar gsungs/ /dang por snying gar zla dbus su/ /yi ge a yis zla dkyil 'khor/ /rnam par bsams la de steng du/ /yi ge hU~M ni rnam par bsgom/ /de nas byams pa'i sems byas te/ /de nas re zhig dkyil 'khor bri/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /kha khyer rdo rjes

nges par mtshan/ /skud pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /'phan gyi phreng ba shin tu mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin po ches mtshan par/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /'khor

lo'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de nang du yang pad+ma ni/ /mdog dkar rab tu mdzes pa bri/ /gzhan yang de yi steng du ni/ /mdog dmar pad+ma 'od dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor bas so/ /sngags pas de yi nang du yang / /rdo rje phreng ba 'khrigs par bri/ /yang na pad chen 'dab brgyad

pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'o/ /de dbus dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan par/ /g.yas na rdo rje gtso bo bzhugs/ /ri rab ri yi steng du ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming che ge mo zhes

pa/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub ma thob par/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /

sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /

yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba ni/ /nyin re zhing ni yang dang yang / /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba

theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos rnams so sor gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can

kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa thams cad gzung bgyi zhing / /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa bdag gis dbyung / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ de nas thams cad bdag

med pa gnas gzhi dang ngan par bral bar bltas te/ de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kha dog sngon po drag po che/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /chen po gdan

du mdzad/ /nyi ma la bzhugs gar bcas mdzad/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /gzhu dang de bzhin gzhan mda'o/ /de lta'i cho ga'i rim pa 'di/ /ye shes kyi ni rnam par bsgom/ /shar du dkar po sngo mdangs can/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dril bu/ /rdo rje thod pa de bzhin gzhan/ /byang na dmar po'am

cung zad ser/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM ga zhags pa/ /phyag g.yas cang te'u thod pa nyid/ /nub na dmar ba'am cung zad ser/ /'bad pas mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /thod pa sna tshogs pad+ma dag /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag na'o/ /lho na dkar ba'am ser ba'am/ /g.yon phyag rtse gsum

rin po che/ /g.yas na de bzhin thod pa'o/ /glang po dang ni ce spyang dang / /mi dang ba lang nyid dag ni/ /thod pa rnams na cho ga bzhin/ /dang por ltung bar byed ma nyid/ /gnyis pa gsod mar byed ma ste/ /gsum pa 'gugs mar byed ma'o/ /bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /rig ma de

dag dbu skra ni/ /gyen du 'bar zhing rgyan rnams kyis/ /brgyan nas gar mdzad bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir gnas pa'i thod par ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs lngas nye bar brgyan/ /btung ba mchog dang yang dag ldan/ /dang por yi ger yang dag ldan/ /skad cig las ni

'bar bar bsam/ /lha mo de ltar bsgom byas nas/ /'bras bu nor gyi dngos grub 'thob/ /rig pa chen po sbyor 'grub pa/ /yang dag mngon sum rab tu bsgom/ /mi snang bar gnas thams cad bdag /rnal 'byor pas ni yud kyis mthong / /lha mchog las skyes bu mo rnams/ /sangs

rgyas kun la 'phrogs nas spyod/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye mnyam rnams/ /rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye mnyam sangs rgyas zhing / /sku gsung thugs rnams kyis mtshan pa'i/ /sems dngos

gar mkhan dngos po ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid du mthong 'gyur/ /rgyud dang sngags rnams rnam bsgoms pa/ /yi ge phyin ci log tu sbyar/ /mchog tu gsang ba 'di dag ni/ /khyod la legs par bshad pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes de skad gsungs/ /'di dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po bzhengs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas dngos grub kun ster ba/ /gang gis dngos grub myur byed cing / /the

tshom med par bskyed pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po bshad/ /mtshan ma gnyis la sngags mnyam sbyar/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis med/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i don 'di dag /rnal 'byor ma la rab tu bsgrub/ /de las 'grub par rab tu grags/ /lha dang

lha min mir bcas rnams/ /bsgrub bya rnams ni myur bar 'dis/ /ji bzhin rtag tu nye ba dang / /ring yang de bzhin myur bskyed de/ /'di dag nye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de yi gzugs sku 'gugs par byed/ /pad+ma'i lte bar rab gnas la/ /dbugs kyi brda yis bsgom par bya/ /

der ni sna tshogs sku bsams te/ /sna tshogs sku la mchod bya zhing / /byang chub sems ni rtogs byas nas/ /bdag nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /de la mkha' bzhin gnas par bya/ /'byung gnas thams cad de lta nyid/ /der ni mkha' 'gro ma kun

no/ /gnas sogs 'byung gnas mkha' 'gro ma/ /yul rnams kun la gnas pa yin/ /yul yul du ni skyes ldan ma/ /rang skye'i gnas su yang dag bshad/ /dkyil 'khor la zhugs mkha' 'gro ma/ /de nas mtshan mo shar nas bza'/ /de yis mnyam par rab sbyar nas/ /

sngags pas rtag tu rab bsgrub bya/ /der ni rol pa chen spyod cing / /thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgrub/ /dam tshig rang bzhin du byas nas/ /de la sdom pa rab skye ba/ /snang med dga' bar rang rig pa'o/ /de dag ni dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu gsum

pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams kun gyi sgrub thabs kun/ /pho nya rnams kyi khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon dang rig pa che/ /lus srul po ni gang zhig dang / /de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba dang / /de ltar bshad kyis lha mo

nyon/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /nye bar spyod pa lnga yis brgyan/ /ri mo mkhan ni dam tshig can/ /sgrub po mchog gis 'dri ru

gzhug /ro la dkris pa'i ras dag gam/ /yang na mtshon gyis btab pa'i zas/ /'byung po dag gi ras dag ni/ /ba glang ko ba tsam zhig la/ /nag po'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /de nas 'bum gcig bzlas byin na/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa

mo dang shis byed ma/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang / /dbang po ma dang rgan byad ma/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ma dang ni/ /byin za yi ni bdag can ma'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni/ /tshangs dang gshin rje chu lha dang / /nor sbyin dang ni dang / /byin za dang ni dbang ldan dang / /bden bral de bzhin

rlung lha'o/ /rim pa gsum pa dag la ni/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /mig dmar dang ni gza' lag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /spen pa sgra gcan 'dzin dag go/ /rim pa bzhi la sgo bzhir ni/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /drag po dang ni karti ka/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba

chen po bzhi rnams so/ /rim pa dang po'i dbus nyid kyi/ /phyogs bzhi dang por mkha' 'gro ma/ /mar me ma dang mdzes pa mo/ /'jigs byed ma dang de bzhin du/ /dbus su khyab bdag nyid gnas so/ /yang dag mtha' las mthar 'gyur ba'i/ /rang bzhin gyis ni cho ga bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pas ni

bsgrub par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bri/ /dbus su yongs su zlum po ru/ /ri mo shin tu mdzes pas bskor/ /lte ba sbas pa'i spyod yul can/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /de dbus khro bo chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /mche ba

cung zad gtsigs pa can/ /cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan/ /kha dog sngon po gtsigs pa che/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /ro gcig gar ldan nyi mar bzhugs/ /lha rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /spyan gsum gzugs mchog dang

ldan pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba phyag g.yas na/ /'phan lce gsum pa g.yon na'o/ /mda' gzhu de bzhin g.yas g.yon phyag /mkha' 'gro ma ni shar du bri/ /lho ru 'jigs byed ma nyid de/ /nub tu lha mo mdzes ma'o/ /byang du mar me ma dgod do/ /yi ge hrIHlas byung ba yi/ /phag mo zhal gcig

phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' gzhu dang ni de bzhin du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/ /phag gi gdong pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /yi ge phaT las shis byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /de bzhin kha T+wAM cang te'u/ /yi ge ha las

gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum dang ni 'phan lce gsum/ /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do/ /ho yig las ni rgan byad ma/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin ral gri cang te'u/ /ba~M yig las byung tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad+ma dang ni

thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan na gzhu dang mda'/ /g+ha yig las byung tshogs dbang mo/ /sngo bsangs mdog la phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum de bzhin thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /pa~M yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ /dbyug to dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de bzhin

zhags pa ral gri bzhin/ /yi ge las byung dbang po ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje gsal shing thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa'o/ /kun kyang dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum dang ni ro la zhon/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /

shar gyi sgo ni tshangs pa bri/ /kha dog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /gan+d+ha dang ni pad+ma'o/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /kha dog nag po lag bzhi pa/ /ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dang ni dbyug pa'o/ /lho ru drag mo bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog la lag

bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum nyid dang ka pA la/ /de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /nub tu karti ka bri ste/ /kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo gsal shing dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /thod

pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /de bzhin gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /glang po zhon pa dbang po ste/ /kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /gzhan ni thal mo kha sbyar byed/ /ra skyes zhon pa me phyogs 'dzin/ /kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa/ /me thab dang ni thod par

ldan/ /skrag nas gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /gshin rje ma he la zhon pa/ /kha dog nag po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de bzhin skrag nas thal mo byed/ /bden bral dang ni khyi la zhon/ /kha dog ljang gu lag bzhi pa/ /ral gri nyid dang thod pa 'dzin/ /skrag nas gzhan dag thal mo sbyor/ /

chu yi phyogs ni chu srin zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang ni thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo kha sbyor byed/ /rlung ni zhon pa ste/ /du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ /ba dan dang ni thod par ldan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni thal mo sbyor/ /nor sbyin na ni gter la zhon/ /kha dog ser

po lag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad ni/ /so so'i dkyil 'khor la bsam bya/ /rang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /stobs po che la rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /ma mo kun gyi yang ma mo/ /de bzhin rig par gyur pa'i mchog /nyon cig lha mo che

chen mo/ /gtor ma re res gzung bar bya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gar spyod na/ /de la 'bad pas khur byed pa'i/ /pho nya'i sgrub thabs rab bshad pa/ /rgyud rnams kun nas rnyed dka' ba'i/ /de yis ldan byas dngos grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gcig pas rtag

gnas pas/ /'khor ba'i skyon dang nges par grol/ /pho nya mor chags rtag par grol/ /mchog gi rim pas spyad par bya/ /bsnyen bkur tsam ni bya min gyi/ /skye gnas dman pa'ang dga' bde'i gnas/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma yang ni pho nyar gnas/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon pas

spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon pa dang por mchod par bya/ /g.yon pa phyogs kyis bsgyur bya zhing / /g.yon pas 'bad pas tshim par byed/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i snying po'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu bzhi

pa'o// //dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud phyi ma snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mchog gi dbang phyug gi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis grom pa ru lag rgyang phu'i lha ri mo'i mgul gyi dben gnas su bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA kAr+N+Na ba ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ oM sangs rgyas dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung gi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di

skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ b+ha ga rnams su rtsen pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /der dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug gis bka'

stsal pa/ bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang po'i dra ba bdag gis mthong / /'khor ba dang ni nges 'byung gis/ /mya ngan 'das pa so sor bskyed/ /de yi dbus su sku chen po/ /bdag gi dbang po yis rig go/ /dpa' bo rang gi rang bzhin ni/ /ye shes rgya mtshor mnyan par

bgyi/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su/ /phag mo bdag ni 'dri ba'o/ /dbang po'i dra ba ci ru bshad/ /bdag gis gang du bshad par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni chen po'i sgra/ /bde ba za ba de bzhin ci/ /ting 'dzin ming ci de la ni/ /byung ba nyams par byas pa dang / /'khor ba yang

dag byung ba ni/ /gang du thim par 'gyur ba yin/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ming / /ji ltar slar yang yongs su bskyed/ /sku brjod pa ni gsung bar mdzod/ /nyid kyi dbang pos rig pa ni/ /bde ba chen por bzhugs gyur pa'i/ /bdag gi bdag pos gsung bar mdzod/ /

dpa' bo'i dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phag mo lha rdzas pad+ma can/ /lha mo rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /sngon du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /dbang po 'jig rten mchog chos bshad/ /dra ba de la yid rol pa'o/ /bdag gi nga rgyal tsam

gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog gang byung ba'o/ /de phyir ye shes che mthong ste/ /thabs chen bde la bzhugs pas so/ /gang du dbang po rnams kyis za/ /de yis nga yi ming sngon song / /de tshe ting nge 'dzin tsam du/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /yang dag lhag rtogs ye shes ni/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha dbang pos/ /de rnams su byung ba'i sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro mchog mang gis byas so/ /bde dang mi bde gnyis nyams las/ /slar yang 'dir ni byung ba ste/ /sgra yi gzugs las byung zhing thon/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo/ /sems gsum rnams kyi dbye ba

yis/ /grub mo khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom/ /byung dang 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /yongs su gsal ba 'od gsal ba'o/ /de phyir 'jig rten 'khor bar byed/ /de ni 'khor bar yongs su brjod/ /'dir

ni sgyu ma skyes de bzhin/ /de ni thim pa'i dngos po'ang med/ /myang 'das gzhan pa'i rdzas yod yin/ /'khor ba yi ni phyi rol son/ /srid pa'i rtse mo gang 'dzin pa/ /de phyir mya ngan 'das par brjod/ /gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku/ /de yi gnas la rnam par 'phro/ /bdag chen ye shes

gzugs kyi ni/ /dbang pos gsal bar rig pa ste/ /lha dang sbyin byed la sogs pas/ /mi mthong mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /lha khyod kyis ni gsung rnams kyi/ /ye shes chen po'i ros bdag tshim/ /de ring bdag la the tshom mchis/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi rang bzhin ci/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' rnams thams cad rang bzhin te/ /rang bzhin de rnams chos can no/ /'dir ni 'dod pa'i dus brjod de/ /'dod pa sems las yongs su byung / /'dod dang sems gnyis dag las ni/ /byung ba gzugs ni gtso bo'o/ /'jig rten

gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /gang zhig mtha' ma rnams kyi sems/ /sems de ro mnyam gyur pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /mkha' 'gro de ni de phyir byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag nyid che/ /sa gsum po ni bsgrub par

bya/ /gang tshe sngon du yang dag byung / /'gro ba'i gtso bo tshangs pa'o/ /gnas dang de bzhin ji ltar stong / /mgon po sems can rnam grol byed/ /de tshe 'jig rten khams gzhan gyis/ /chung ngu 'dir ni bskul ba'o/ /gson gson byang chub spros son pa'i/ /sems can bsgral ba'i

sems med pa/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khyod bzhugs nas/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar mdzod/ /yon tan dag 'di thos nas ni/ /sems can grol byed 'di ltar bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun rnam pa/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo he ru ka/ /dpal ni sngon du mngon

brjod pas/ /rten la sogs pa bskyed pa ste/ /glu dang rol mo dri za dang / /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang / /'gro ba'i sde dang las dang ni/ /de yi rgyun las yongs su byung / /de la sogs pa mtha' med dang / /stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum mo/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa

na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug dang / /skye ba dang ni thim pa'i rgyu/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid/ /zla ba'i dbye bas 'gro ba'o/ /dga' ba rtag tu shes byas nas/ /tshes gcig zla ba 'phel bas so/ /nag po sogs dang dkar mthar

yang / /thung ngu de bzhin 'dir shes bya/ /'di skad thos pa bdag gi ngag /gsang ba'i 'dod pa thams cad ster/ /de bzhin 'dir bdag the tshom mchis/ /gsang ba la sogs gsung ni ci/ /bdag gi bdag pos gsung bar mdzod/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ /lha mo chen mo

bdag dga'o/ /sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i rgyur/ /mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis nyon/ /gsang ba khams thams cad kyi mtha'/ /dbang po'i gnas ni mchog yin la/ /rnam shes phun tshogs de rnams su/ /dgyes pa nam mkha' las

byung ba'o/ /thams cad bdag nyid khams gsum gyi/ /khyab bya'i gzugs su yang dag son/ /rtag bzhugs gnyis su med pa'i chos/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu mchog /yang na bdag med bcu drug dang / /khyad par du yang snying rje'o/ /de yi rnam pa ye shes che/ /de kho na nyid

kun du son/ /'dir ni skye bar go bya ba/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /thim pa sgrub pa gnyis dang ni/ /de bzhin bsnyen pa gnyis kyang ngo / /rnal 'byor thig ler bshad pa ste/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o/ /dus kyis phyed dang zla ba yi/ /rdzogs ldan

gsum gnyis rtsod dus son/ /'di yi rdo rje'i zhal bzhi po/ /dga' ba brgyad gnyis su 'gyur te/ /cha shas bcu drug rnam ldan pa'i/ /phyogs kyi dbye bas 'gro ba'o/ /thung ngu nyi ma'i rgyu ba yis/ /de bzhin du ni cha shas za/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /gnyis

med ye shes bla na med/ /byang chub sems 'od chen por ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po nges par 'gro/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med de/ /dngos rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/ /sad pa na yang nyams pa ste/ /de gnas kun du gnas min pa'o/ /rmi lam yul med las byung ba/ /

dbang po kun las byung ba med/ /gnyid log pa yi stobs kyis ni/ /sa gsum po ni bza' bar bya/ /gnyid mthug skyes pa'i dus de ltar/ /sad med gnyid med rmi lam med/ /'das pa'i bde ba'i dus rnams su/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang lhag par gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun

dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchog tu bde/ /las kyi yul ni bsnyen byas na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum du ltung ngo / /ma rig pas bslang nges par ni/ /'gro ba dmyal sogs 'jigs pa che/ /de phyir sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /rdzu 'phrul che 'dir rjes chags

bya/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag po/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi ni ming / /de ni bdag la sems pas gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro kun la bdag mchog tu/ /gsang ba der ni btud byas nas/ /phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med tshig gis ji ltar zhes/ /de bzhin

yang nas yang du dris/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ phra mo'i rnam pa ra gsum ste/ /rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rgyu/ /de phyir phra mor rig bya ste/ /rtsa 'byung ba ni bdag nyid che/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /re re la ni de yongs ldan/ /mkha'

'gro ma kun der bshad de/ /gzhan yang de ltar ngo mtshar che/ /ming mdor bstan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir/ /de kun ji lta bzhin bshad bya/ /zla ba 'o ma snum pa mo/ /'jam ma 'dod ma kun sbyin ma/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /sring mo'i bu mo ne ne mo/ /gnyen mo pha yi ma dang ni/ /zhang

po yi yang chung ma dang / /pad can dung can sna tshogs ma/ /glang po ma dang myos brlabs ma/ /gzugs ma sgra ma dri ma dang / /ro ma reg ma yid ma dang / /chos dbyings ma dang tshogs can ma/ /gnyid ma le lo ma gzhan gnon/ /rlom pa mo dang sgeg mo dang / /

bzang zhal ma dang drag mo ma/ /'thung ma za ma 'jigs pa mo/ /ha ha sgrogs ma dur khrod ma/ /bcom ldan dgyes mar rtag tu bshad/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /las kyi cho ga blangs pa yis/ /gzhan gyi ming yang shes par bya/ /gang zhig gang gir

mngon brjod pa'i/ /rtsa de 'dir ni brjod pa'o/ /de rnams sems dpa' bde rang bzhin/ /mthar gyur mchog tu zhi ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos po yang / /mchog tu zag med rnal 'byor ldan/ /mdog dang phyag sogs rnam pa ru/ /srid pa'i 'khor lor yang dag

byung / /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs 'dir/ /pul+li ra sogs dbus su'o/ /gang zhig gang gi lha'i bdag po/ /de ni de dang des rgyas gdab/ /nyid dang bdag tu rtsen gyur pa'i/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu de

bzhin dang po'i lha/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bde ster ba'i/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha' thog ma tha ma med/ /gang 'drar mchog tu 'du shes pa/ /de 'drar bdag ni rig pa ste/ /snang med par yang yongs su gsal/ /der ni 'byung ba'ang yod

min te/ /'jig rten pa yi tha snyad mchog /ji ltar mkha' las me byung ba/ /bla med me 'dir de bzhin no/ /ro bro ba ni gcig dngos la/ /de yi nang na dngos mang po/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin 'dis/ /thams cad ro ste ro'i khyab bdag /pho nya rnams kyi bdag po

yis/ /sa gsum po ni mchog tu za/ /thabs dang shes rab snying rje che/ /lha yi bdag po gzhan med do/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /de ltar brtag shes rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod bya kun la longs spyad bya/ /rtag tu nang

du gyur byas nas/ /kha dog rnams ni zhal las byung / /rtag tu lus kyis sbyin pa ste/ /sems las byung ba spang bar bya/ /de ltar 'dod chags sgyu mtha' la/ /rol pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /'dod chags bral ba dga' ba gsum/ /spangs pa dbu ma zag pa med/ /gzung bar bya ba

min pa ste/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dod chags min/ /bral ba'i dga' ba nyams pa ste/ /de la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o/ /de gnyis dbus na gnas pa yis/ /chos de la yang dga' dmigs med/ /dbye ba med pa yi ni chos/ /rdo rje la ni dga' bar gyis/ /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal

'byor ba dag /skad cig mngon sum byed pa'o/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnam par byas pa'i dbyibs su 'gyur/ /stong nyid rang bzhin gzugs rnal 'byor/ /rang byin rlabs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /bdag byin rlabs dang bral rnal 'byor/ /sbun skogs dum

bu bzhin shes bya/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid mchog gyur pa/ /skye bo phyugs rnams kyis mi shes/ /de phyir sgyu 'phrul 'di bsgoms na/ /byang chub bla na med pa 'thob/ /skye ba 'di la glen pa nyid/ /shes rab snyan dngags skyes bur 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i yon tan tshogs ldan

pas/ /rmi lam dang ni mnyam par ltos/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du/ /'gro ste de phyir 'jig rten pa'o/ /mngon sum rang nyid sngags kyi sku/ /'khor lo gsum rnams nyis 'gyur ro/ /gcig la 'khor lo gsum bshad de/ /gnyis pa nyis 'gyur du ni

'dod/ /'khor lo gsum po thabs shes rab/ /snyoms par 'jug par 'chad pa'o/ /de ni nyis 'gyur shes bya ste/ /'khor lo nyis 'gyur des bshad do/ /khams gsum gyi ni gnas chen po/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' dbang che/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs so/ /chos dang chos min gang du nub/ /byang chub der ni sems gzung gis/ /grub pa lha dang lha ma yin/ /dbang po dang ni yul dang ni/ /khams dang skye mched

thams cad ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa ste/ /rmongs pa 'ching zhing mkhas pa ni/ /yongs su shes pas grol ba'o/ /sems 'di rang nyid mngon sum du/ /khams gsum du ni rnam par gnas/ /bdag dang mchog khyod gnyis med las/ /tshogs pa'i

gtso bo byung ba'o/ /spyod lam la sogs bye brag chos/ /mdo sde rnam shes dbu ma pa/ /mos pa'i sems can rnams bshad de/ /bden pa ma yin rdzun pa min/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dang ldan te/ /de bzhin zhal ni bzhi pa'o/ /kha dog nam mkha' sngon po la/ /spyan gsum

brkyang bskum ldan pa ste/ /'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan/ /gzhan ni 'bum tsho stong phrag gi/ /gang dang gang gi rgyud kyi ni/ /phyi dang gsang ba nang bdag nyid/ /de dang de yi gzugs nges par/ /lha ni he ru ka'i bdag nyid/ /rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang mchog tu/ /dbye ba

mos pa'i dbang gis te/ /ming ni de 'drar shes par bya/ /'on kyang he ru ka bsres pa'o/ /kha dog de dang 'drar shes bya/ /bzhugs tshul he ru ka'i rnam pa/ /sa ni bcu gnyis rnams kyi rgyu/ /de yis he ru ka dang 'dra/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo

thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ste 'di ni le'u dang po'o// //phag mo lha

rdzas rnal 'byor mas/ /slar yang rdo rje mchod byas te/ /bcom ldan bdag pos bstan par mdzod/ /phag mo ci yis yongs su byung / /skyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin/ /rang bzhin ji ltar du ni 'dod/ /bdag byung ba yi rgyu mtshan ci/ /'dir ni dgos pa ji ltar yin/ /

dbang po dang ni yul thams cad/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab zhugs/ /spyi bo'i rdo rje gur du ni/ /steng du kha bltas rlung 'bab bo/ /'dod chags nyi ma'i dbus su ni/ /skad cig gis ni sprul thim gyur/ /der skyes pa yi phag mo ni/ /b+ha ga ling+ga yid las byung / /

bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin khams/ /de rnams las ni sngon du skyes/ /rang bzhin bdag med gcig pu ste/ /mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no/ /rgyu mtshan skye bo sgrol ba dang / /snying rje'i gzugs rang bzhin du byung / /'dir ni dgos pa gnyis rig ste/ /phyag rgya sbyor

ba rab sgrub pa'o/ /khyod ni lha mo'i bdag po ste/ /kun du spyod pa mang spyod pa'o/ /sngags kyi phreng ba brje byas nas/ /a yig la sogs de'i khyab bdag /yang na phag mo'i rtsa ba dang / /go cha'i sngags rnams kyis ldan te/ /yi ge re re'i sngags kyi ni/ /spyod pa sdom par

son pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog skye ba ni/ /rtsa yi mchog gi grong du ste/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /dbus ma a ba d+hU tI'o/ /dbu ma 'di ltar thams cad kyi/ /khyab byed du ni rnam par gnas/ /de phyir phag mo gtso mo yi/ /go 'phang mchog bzhin shes par bya/ /

rdo rje la sogs ming thog mar/ /a rdo rje dang ka rdo rje/ /sngags mthar de la sogs pa ste/ /yang na so so tha dad du'o/ /gang gis dus su sngags zlos pa/ /de'i dus rnams su rnal 'byor ldan/ /lte ba spyi bo snying gyen du/ /'di ltar 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor

ma gtso mo/ /de ni bdag nyid rnam par 'phro/ /rang gi 'khor ldan rnal 'byor ma/ /zhing dang zhing rnams su ni 'gro/ /lha mo khyod ni bdag po ste/ /nga dang lhan cig kha sbyor ro/ /dus dang dus ni ma yin par/ /nam mkha'i bu ga'i nang 'dug nas/ /de bzhin skye gnas lam

'thon nas/ /'chi ba med pa'i sa bon 'dzag /der ni 'pho med ye shes bya/ /hig phyed yi ges bsgom bya ste/ /mi mo skyes bu'i dus su yang / /mchog tu zag med mngon par bya/ /de byung ba yi rig ma che/ /sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o/ /thog mar rnam snang mgon po

ste/ /ri mo gsum bskor lte 'og gnas/ /langs nas mgrin pa'i bar du 'gro/ /sa gsum sgron ma lta bur son/ /gzhan pa'i sngags ni sa mtha' 'dra/ /de las zla 'bab g.yon nas so/ /sngags 'di thig les brgyan pa ste/ /sngags ni rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa'o/ /

slar yang sa bon gnyis pa brjod/ /g.yas pa nyi ma bskyed pa ste/ /logs su gnyis phye mgor thig le/ /ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /byang chub sems chen 'bab lam mo/ /'di ni phag mo'i sa bon yin/ /A yi yi ges mthar brgyan pa/ /bcu

drug zla phyed nyi mas brgyan/ /ya sde'i dang po'i sa bon ni/ /sbyor bas sa gsum rlung yon tan/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pas rgyas gdab/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyis mgo bor brgyan/ /thig le dang ni bcas pa 'bar/ /dga' ba bzhi po dag pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma bde

ba'i gzugs/ /o yi yi ge zhon ldan pa/ /mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan/ /sa yi pha rol gzhom med pas/ /nyi ma yi ni gdan la gnas/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa rna drung bzung / /mgo bor zla phyed thig les brgyan/ /'dod chags mtha' yi rang bzhin no/ /ye shes sa

bon nyis 'gyur dbye/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bas skyes/ /'og dang steng du gnas pa yis/ /mgon po longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa/ /snying ga dang ni chu skyes su/ /don gyi cho ga yongs rdzogs pa'o/ /yongs su skrag byed ma sa bon/ /pa mtha'i yi ge bzung nas ni/ /slar yang de

bzhin brjod par bya/ /o D+yan 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi/ /bu gar gtum mo sbor ba'o/ /byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs/ /de ltar bshad pa'i sngags gang ni/ /rim pas yi ge rnams mi mthun/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ming ldan par/ /las dus de ltar rtogs par

bya/ /re re'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /yi ge yi ni grangs kyis so/ /bdag nyid chen po rnam par 'phro/ /byang chub cha shas cha rgyu'o/ /thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba/ /chos kyi dbyings ni bya ba'i gzugs/ /ta sde'i lnga pa'i yi ge ni/ /lnga pa yi ni sde tshan no/ /rnal

'byor ma gzugs nam mkha' brten/ /pa mtha'i sa bon o dbyangs ldan/ /gti mug 'joms par byed ma ste/ /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o/ /de yi bzhi pa'i sa bon no/ /sa gsum du ni khyab pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o/ /thog ma'i sde yi gsum pa ste/ /

'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /lnga pa'i sde yi thog ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te/ /i yi dbyangs kyis mgo la reg /chu yi yi ge yongs bsngags pa/ /thams

cad byed pa'i rang bzhin no/ /tsa sde'i dbus gnas bzung nas ni/ /nyi ma yi ni gdan ldan pa/ /las kyi dus su khyad par ldan/ /phag mo yi ni sa bon ni/ /a yi yi ge rna bar reg /sa gsum ye shes rang bzhin mnyam/ /me yi sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan/ /'khor ba'i

las kyi rang bzhin no/ /sa mtha'i mgo la I dbyangs reg /rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni/ /de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /ya yig gnas pa ra dang ldan/ /slar yang I yi dbyangs sbyar ro/ /

khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spro'o/ /drug pa'i sde yi dang po ni/ /rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang bzhin/ /ra gnas pa ni a dbyangs ldan/ /sdang ba'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur/ /dza yi yi ge yongs bzung ste/ /i yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin

yongs ldan pa'o/ /so yi sa bon rna ba la/ /i yi dbyangs kyis reg pas dbye/ /klu yi sngags ni sbyar byas te/ /tre yi ge sa gsum kun/ /ye shes kyi ni khyad par sngags/ /la yi yi ge o dang ldan/ /'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin te/ /byang chub byed pa'i chos

yin no/ /thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan/ /'chi dang lhan skyes dbye ba med/ /pa yi sde yi mtha' ma la/ /a yi yi ge'i dbyangs sbyar bya/ /sa gsum gyi ni ma rang bzhin/ /ta yig e yi yi ges brgyan/ /bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o/ /slar yang pa sde'i mtha' ma ste/ /tshad

med pa yi lhan skyes kyi/ /dbus na bzhugs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sa yi mtha' ma A dang ldan/ /rdor sems ye shes gzhom med pa'o/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma i dbyangs ldan/ /mi shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o/ /t+ye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te/ /thams cad rang bzhin

du khyab pa'o/ /bu ga rnams nas 'dzag pa sa/ /'bab pa'i sa bon nyi ma ldan/ /chu srin dbang po yi ni sngags/ /ba sde bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /U dbyangs stan dang ldan pa ste/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nyams byed pa'o/ /ta yi sngags kyis dgra nyams byed/ /

slar yang pa sde'i bzhi pa ni/ /sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung gi sa bon A yig reg /sngags ni nor bur 'bab bzhin pa'o/ /chu yi sa bon rnar bzung ba/ /sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhin no/ /sa yi pha rol e yig ldan/ /sa gsum gyi ni 'khrul 'joms rgyu/ /pa sde'i

mtha' ma rkang rang bzhin/ /sa yi pha rol A dang ldan/ /ngo mtshar che ba yi ni chos/ /ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni/ /pad+ma'i sa bon mchog yig go/ /tsa yi dbus ma'i sa bon ni/ /ra ni mgo la gnas pa ste/ /e yig gis ni phye ba ni/ /lha dang lha min rang bzhin no/ /de

ltar sngags tshig drug po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs spro ba/ /las kun rang bzhin 'khor lo'o/ /snying rje'i 'dod par gyur pa yi/ /de kho na nyid tshig rgya che/ /rnal 'byor thams cad rab 'gengs pa'i/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gros 'di gsungs so/ /'khrul 'khor

'khor lo bshad bya ste/ /khyod kyi 'khrul 'khor chung rgya che/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /ri mo bcu gsum bri bar bya/ /lha mo dum bu bcu gnyis 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs kyis brgyan/ /rtsibs re re la'ang yi ge ni/ /rim pas yongs su gsal bar sbyin/ /

lhag ma nyi shu bzhi yi ge/ /thams cad lte ba'i snying po la'o/ /de rnams kyis ni bskyed pa'i rtsa/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /so so re re yi ni 'khor/ /nor dang mda' dang zla ba'o/ /kun la lhag pas dman pa ni/ /nor dang rig byed tshogs pa'o/ /der gnas pa la

'khrul 'khor btu/ /las gcig ji ltar mos pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa ni/ /rtsa thams cad du 'char dus su/ /der ni dbang po dang ni yul/ /las kyi dus su gsad par bya/ /yid ces bya ba bskrad bya zhing / /sems ni dbang du bya ba ste/ /khams dang skye

mched gzhan de bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya/ /phung po kun dang de bzhin srog /dgug pa dang ni sdang ba'o/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin sems/ /de rnams rengs par bya ba'o/ /las gzhan ji ltar rigs pa yis/ /brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya yang ngo / /yang na sa bon

ci 'dra ba/ /de yi tshad dang mnyam las so/ /de dus bdag nyid che ba yis/ /yi ges bskyed dang 'joms pa'o/ /phag mo rdo rje gtso mo yi/ /'khrul 'khor gnyis pa bshad bya ste/ /ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no/ /lce gnyis yi ge ra

yig ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma sngags A yig dgang / /sa gnas pa ni mi g.yo ba'o/ /na yi yi ge e dang ldan/ /sems can kun sprul rgyu mtshan no/ /thog gnas dbyangs ni thog ma'i mgon/ /lce gnyis e dbyangs mgo la reg /sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin

no/ /ta yi yi ge e dang ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin no/ /ya sde'i bzhir gnas pa'i sa bon/ /kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no/ /brgyad pa'i sde yi thog sa bon/ /stong pa yis ni brgyan pa ste/ /khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /gnyis par

gnas pa'i thog ma ni/ /keng rus thig le 'dzin pa'o/ /ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje snying gnas mgon po'o/ /ta mtha' e yi yi ges brgyan/ /skye gnas la ni spras pa'o/ /ta yig nyi ma dang ldan pa/ /rims 'joms pa yi

rgyal po'o/ /b+ha ni nyi ldan a yig brgyan/ /lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma gnas rang bzhin/ /Ta mtha' i yis brgyan pa ni/ /'gugs pa yi ni rang bzhin no/ /bi sho Sha Shi sngags bzhi ste/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gter chen po yi sa

bon no/ /ra yig o yi yi ges brgyan/ /rtsa drag po yi rang bzhin no/ /sha yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /snying po yi ni gzugs su'o/ /Ni yig rang bzhin gyis bzung ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi de nyid do/ /ka yig ra yig o yig ldan/ /dbu ma ro rang bzhin/ /ta pa'i

bar gnas gzung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi ni/ /rkang pa brgyad pa bsgrub rang bzhin/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma i yig brgyan/ /thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin/ /ka ru mngon brjod gzung bar bya/ /de yis las rnams zad par byed/ /ra yig

a yi yi ges gzung / /mgo bo'i dbus nas sgra chen 'dzag /sa yi sa bon i yig ldan/ /gru gsum gyi ni dbus su'o/ /ta yi mtha' ma is brgyan pa/ /sprul pa'i steng dang 'og tu'o/ /ta yig ra yig A yig sbyar/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste/ /de phyir

sa gsum skyed pa'o/ /sa gzung dbus ma bcas sa bon/ /na yig i dang ldan rang bzhin/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma a yis brgyan/ /sgyu ma'i ngo bo pad+ma'i rtsa/ /ra gang gnas pa rna rang bzhin/ /Ta sde'i mtha' ma i dang ldan/ /ma lus dbyer med sems can gyi/ /khams

'dzin pa yi mgon po'o/ /de ltar sngags tshig bcu brjod de/ /dus bzhi yi ni tshad can no/ /rnal 'byor ma kun las kyi ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba longs spyod pa/ /dus kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma gnas 'du ba ni/ /

'khor lo 'khor lor shes pa'o/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi/ /ye shes las ni de bzhin byed/ /yon por smra ba rnams kyi ni/ /de'i rdul grangs las skyes par 'dod/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bzung nas/ /phyi nas blo ldan gyis sngags sbyar/ /sngon du pa la ra stan no/ /

thog ma yi ni chos gzugs so/ /de yi bzhi par gnas pa la/ /e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags so/ /ta sde'i dbus gnas ci 'dod ster/ /na yig i yi yi ge ldan/ /sna tshogs sprul pa byed pa'o/ /pa yig spros pa dang bcas pa'o/ /

ra yi yi ge a dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor los sgyur/ /tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon gzung / /gang lta de lta'i rang bzhin no/ /rlung bsags pa ni e yig ldan/ /a haM yi ge'i rang bzhin no/ /ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan/ /

sna tshogs ye shes sngags rang bzhin/ /dza yi sa bon mtha' med par/ /'bar bar 'gyur ba yi ni gzugs/ /yi ge ya ni e yig ldan/ /theg pa kun gyi lta ba'i gzugs/ /tsa sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs zhes bya/ /pa mtha' de yi bzhi pa

la'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi bla ma'o/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsum ldan/ /ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs/ /dro ba'i gsum pa ta stan can/ /'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgrol/ /de bzhin m+b+ha'i yi ge bzung / /sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugs so/ /ni

sngags rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /brda yis su ni 'jug pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma o yig reg /sna tshogs mi shes 'dzin pa'o/ /sa mtha' rdor sems rang bzhin no/ /ni yi yi ge chos dang ni/ /chos min sun 'byin pa yin no/ /ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni/ /rnal

'byor ma ste nam mkha'i gzugs/ /dza yig ra yig stan can ni/ /khu ba'i rang bzhin shar ba'o/ /slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni/ /a yi yi ges gzi bskyed pa/ /tshangs pa pad+ma yi ni gzugs/ /ra yig a yig yi ge ldan/ /'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sa mtha'

dbyangs gsum mgo la gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'bab pa'i gzugs/ /ma ni dbus ma de nyid gzugs/ /sa mtha' a yis bkang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor ma gzugs kyi khar brjod/ /ya yig o yi cod pan gnas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ka sde'i

dbus gnas dbyangs gsum brgyan/ /de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ni yi yi ge rang bzhin med/ /gnyis pa yi ni thog ma la/ /a yi yi ge gsal bar byed/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma e dang ldan/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /

pa yi sa bon mthar sha ste/ /ya sde'i mtha' yig stan can ni/ /khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med/ /i dbyangs mgor brgyan me sa bon/ /grub pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /nam mkha' rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /sa bon de yi mtha'i yi ge/ /

e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa/ /dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin/ /de ltar rkang pa dgu po ni/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs yi ge ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni sngags rang bzhin/ /sngags kun spyod pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /

mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la bzhugs nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /'khor lo gsum pa'i nus pa yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi las dus su/ /sgyu mas thams cad rmongs par bya/ /

rdo rje ma bdag slar langs nas/ /'khor lo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor ldan/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur gtso bo la/ /bdag med ma yis dam 'khyud do/ /ta yi sngags kyis gnyis pa sbyor/ /d+ya gnas me dang rlung sa bon/ /bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags che/ /de yi gnyis pa'i sa

bon ni/ /A yi yi ges dgang ba'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rang bzhin/ /pa yig ra yig o yig sbyar/ /gsum po rlung gi rang bzhin no/ /ta yi yi ge a~M yig ldan/ /slar yang rnam shes sa bon no/ /ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa/ /e yi yi ges rnam par brgyan/ /

rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya rang bzhin/ /slar la yang ni brjod par bya'o/ /tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer med dngos/ /sa mtha' dang ni na yi sngags/ /slar la yang ni brjod par bya/ /skyed cing sdud par byed gzugs so/ /pa ra A yig sa bon gcig /don dam pa yi yi

ge'o/ /Ta mtha' A yi yi ge ldan/ /gzhom du med las skyes pa'o/ /ta yi mtha' ma kun 'joms pa'o/ /ka ka dang ni Ni gnas la/ /dbyangs gsum sbyar zhing thig le sbyin/ /rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni kha kha dang / /gsum pa Na ru gnas pa i/ /

dub pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /d+hu na yi ni sngags kyi tshig /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma yi ni sngags/ /rdo rje'i bu gar brgyan pa'o/ /tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /ra yi stan la yongs su gnas/ /gti mug

za bar byed pa'o/ /sa mtha' gzhom med dbus ma'o/ /sha sde'i gsum pa ha stan can/ /e yi yi ge rna bar brgyan/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /'bod par byed pa yi ni sngags/ /sho Sha ya yi sngags kyi tshig /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /ye

shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms/ /byang chub byang chub med de nyid/ /de ltar rkang pa bcu gnyis ni/ /sa dang rnal 'byor las rang bzhin/ /bcu gnyis sa rnams khyab bdag gi/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /yi ge rnams kyi gnas sogs kyi/ /brda yis de nyid pha

rol 'gro/ /bdag las sems can thams cad skyes/ /sems can las kyang bdag byung ngo / /bdag de rtag tu med gyur nas/ /sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin gshegs/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni stobs che ste/ /las rnams ji lta bar ni byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid

du/ /dus 'dir thams cad 'gyur ba'o/ /'khor lo lnga pa 'di rnams su/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang brjod par bya/ /lha sogs thams cad rgyun du gsod/ /de rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grol/ /bka' stsal pa/ ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs de

nyid do/ /Ta bzung pa mtha'i stan can te/ /a~M gis cod pan brgyan par bya/ /de la a yi yi ges dgang / /'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin no/ /ka sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /dug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed/ /ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin/ /na yi mtha' ma A yig

ldan/ /me 'bar ba yis dbang ldan te/ /'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni/ /bskyod pa'i khyab bdag chen po'o/ /ta yi sde yi bzhi pa ni/ /A yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /srid pa dang bral ba yi gzugs/ /nyi ma e yig ldan ro langs/ /ta mtha'i sa bon gzung bar bya/ /

dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan/ /sa gsum thams cad gsod pa'o/ /pa sde mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /yid kyi smra ba rtog med byed/ /sa mtha'iA yi ngag ldan pa/ /thar pa'i bshes ni rtog pa'o/ /ma gnyis ha gnyis brjod par bya/ /rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog

cing 'phrog /pa yi sa bon i yig brgyan/ /pha nags kun nyams gzung de nyid/ /sha yi yi ges i dang ldan/ /seng ge za ba yi ni sngags/ /ta'i sngags slar yang 'chi med skye/ /pa mtha' i yi yi ges dgang / /thig les cod pan la reg

pa'o/ /rgya la 'chi ba rtog pa yin/ /sa yig dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir brgyan/ /sngon du 'phrog par byed pa'o/ /sha gnas sa bon dur khrod de/ /ta mtha' i dang ldan pa ni/ /thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma I dbyangs ldan/ /sdang ba'i yid

ni 'dzin chen po/ /na yig u stan rtog kun sel/ /sha sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /A yig mgor reg thig le gnas/ /byang chub sgrub pa yi ni sngags/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung gis so/ /ta dang ra yi yi ge gnyis/ /sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags so/ /pa ra A yi sa

bon gcig /sum cu rtsa gsum skyo dub 'joms/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma ri mnan pa/ /ye shes kyi ni dag byed do/ /Na yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni/ /i yis rna bar brgyan pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms/ /sa yig e yi yi ges dgang / /dbugs 'chad pa

ni nyams par byed/ /na sngags dbyangs gsum mgo la brgyan/ /chos dang chos min spong rang bzhin/ /d+ha yig ya dang sbyar ba ste/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi rang bzhin no/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma gzung bya ste/ /grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med/ /ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /

gti mug rang bzhin 'bar ba'o/ /sa yig i yi yi ges dbye/ /seng ge ma he 'joms pa'o/ /nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma A dbyangs brgyan/ /sgyu mar sems can kun des 'dzin/ /'dzin pa'i sa bon a yig

brgyan/ /de kho na yi ye shes thob/ /de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po/ /sems can kun gyis mi shes gsod/ /dam pa'i sngags dngos gzugs bdag nyid/ /'byin cing sdud par byed pa po/ /'byung po thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /

'khor lo'i rnam pa'i gzugs bdag nyid/ /phag mo'i thugs kar brgyan pa ste/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas/ /gsod pa dang ni mi gsod pa'o/ /ka sde'i dbus na ra stan can/ /gsum de'i mgo la thig le sbyin/ /theg pa mchog gi chos can no/ /ta sde'i gnyis

pa'i yi ge ni/ /i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o/ /mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams byed pa'o/ /ta yig rtogs par byed pa'o/ /ta sde'i bzhir gnas A dang ldan/ /byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa'o/ /ra gnas pa la dbyangs gsum brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma kun 'chad pa'o/ /

na sngags i yig gis brgyan pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lam mo/ /sum+b+ha na yi tshig rkang ste/ /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid do/ /de bzhin du ni sum+b+ha'i sngags/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin/ /ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod/ /

sdang ba'i theg pa nyams par byed/ /pa ra A yi yi ge gcig /dbang po rang rang ngo bo gzhan/ /Na a a~M gi yi ges dgang / /sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags/ /sa yig rtsa kun 'dzag pa'o/ /ba yig ra yi yig brgyan ri/ /pa gnas nam mkha' la 'jug pa'o/ /sa yi yig

gnas kun gyi gzugs/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma A yis dgang / /rlung ni srog gi ye shes so/ /na yig A yi yi ges dgang / /byang chub gang du'ang mi rtog pa'o/ /thig le mgo la blta bar bya/ /ba sde'i mtha' ma sbrang chen gzugs/ /sa mtha' A yis dgang bar bya/ /rnal

'byor ma yi tshogs srog go/ /pa mtha' a dang ldan pa la/ /a~M gi cod pan brgyan pa'o/ /chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin/ /sa yig dam chos mi shes gsod/ /ts+tshe sngags byang chub sems dpa'o/ /song ba 'khor bar skye ba med/ /ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /

nga ni don med pa snang ba'o/ /na la i dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten ma lus 'ching ba nyid/ /kro sngags gnon pas 'khor ba gcod/ /d+ha yi sa bon 'gro kun 'joms/ /spros pa med par byed pa'o/ /mU yi yi ge sa bon ni/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las/ /de ltar

phyed bcas tshig bcu bzhi/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo yi ni mtha'o/ /bum pa can la sogs pa'i las/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed/ /'khor lo drug gi rab sbyor bas/ /ci 'dod las kyi rang bzhin te/ /bdag po sbyor ba 'grub nus can/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /gtsug tor la sogs skye gnas mthar/ /lus ngag sems shes nam mkha' las/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /de nyid byang chub rnams shes bya/ /'dir ni thabs kyi cha dang ni/ /shes rab kyi yang cha ru brjod/ /

yang na yi ge re re yi/ /bar bar du ste slar yang ni/ /d+hi sngags lhan skyes rang bzhin te/ /'khor lo yi ni khyad par gyi/ /nye ba'i las rnams byed pa'o/ /daM Sh+T+ra ka rA li yi sngags/ /'gro ba rnams kyi las rang bzhin/ /ma sngags hA sngags mu dre'i sngags/ /rna ba yi ni

rang bzhin no/ /shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya gra ma hi Shi'i/ /sngags tshig sna yi rang bzhin no/ /sa ha sra shi re yi sngags/ /dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni gzugs/ /sa ha sra bA ha be yi/ /sngags kyi yi ge lus kyi gzugs/ /sha ta sa'i sngags 'khor lo gcig /mkha' 'gro

ma'i sngags 'chi ba dang / /skye ba yi ni rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i chos las ni/ /gnyis su sems can 'dzin pa ste/ /shes rab la ni bde ster ba/ /bcom ldan bla mas 'di gsungs so/ /nyan thos la sogs mu stegs rnams/ /mi shes pa yi phyugs

thams cad/ /de rnams ye shes 'thob bya'i phyir/ /tshul lugs 'di ni bstan pa'o/ /ha srA na ne yi ni sngags/ /yul gyi gzugs la reg pa'o/ /dz+wa li ta te dza se'i sngags/ /sngags kyi tshig ni yid kyi yul/ /dz+wa la mu khi'i tshig lus yul/ /ping ga lo tsa na yi

sngags/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /badzra sha rI re'i sngags tshig /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /badzrA sa ne yi ni sngags/ /sna yi yul la reg pa'o/ /mi li te yi sngags kyi tshig /sna yi rnam par shes pa'o/ /tsi li te yi sngags kyi tshig /dbyangs kyi

bdag po yi ni yul/ /he sngags gnyis brjod sgra yi yul/ /sgra dang dbyangs gnyis kyi rnam shes/ /de ltar sngags tshig phyed bcas bdun/ /'chi dang skye ba kun gyi gzugs/ /phag mo la ni bde dga' ba'i/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs te/ /bo la

kak+kol sbyor bdag nyid/ /yul dang dbang po sogs gsod pa'o/ /sems can gang dang gang rnams kyi/ /yul gyi chu skyes las skyes te/ /sems can de dang de rnams kyi/ /rang rang las rnams kyis gsod pa'o/ /yul la sogs pa 'joms pas na/ /shes rab

'khor lo de bshad do/ /rgyud dang rgyud rnams kyi ni las/ /sgrub pa'i snying po'i ye shes so/ /sa mtha' drug pa'i dbyangs stan can/ /zla dum thig les mgo la brgyan/ /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i gzugs/ /kha gnyis d+hu gnyis

mu ru gnyis/ /las rnams kyi ni dngos po ste/ /srog dang mnyam du gnas pa'o/ /a dwI te ma hA yo gi nI/ /pa thi ta sid+d+he'i sngags kyi tshig /de yang lus mtha' yi ni gzugs/ /dre ng+ha~M tshig gnyis gra~M tshig gnyis/ /he yi tshig gnyis ha tshig gnyis/ /khro bcu'i yi ge

gshin rje ni/ /mthar byed la sogs kyir go bya/ /pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon la/ /I yig mgo la reg pa'o/ /me sa'i sngags ni tshig kun te/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar sngags tshig bcu gnyis ni/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis slu ba ste/ /ston pa dam

tshig chen po gtso/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi/ /las kyis lhan cig rmugs byed pa'o/ /pho nya rnams bskyed pa'i yi ge/ /'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'khor lo yi ge min de ltar/ /pho nya'i rang bzhin

med pa'o/ /rnam smin de las rnam skyes pa/ /so so'i ming du 'du shes te/ /'jam rdor la sogs dngos po yis/ /a ba d+hU tI'i mtshan nyid bya/ /hA sa hA dpa' bo gcig sngags tshig /de bzhin gshegs drug sa bon te/ /yon tan mtha' med 'chad pa'o/ /hA yi sa

bon yi ge bzhi/ /ho gcig ho gnyis brjod par bya/ /yi ge bdun po lpags sogs khams/ /trai lo kya bi nA sha'i sngags/ /sdang ba la ni go cha'o/ /sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti/ /ta thA ga ta pa ri bA re/ /sa mtha' U yi dbyangs kyis spras/ /zla ba'i dum bu

thig les brgyan/ /de ltar sngags kun nyer sdud pa'o/ /ha U aM sngags kyi rang bzhin/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshig ni bzhi/ /rnal 'byor ma skyed dngos grub 'gyur/ /bkas gnang dngos grub rab 'jug pa/ /bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro

sdom pa mngon brjod dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud rnams su gsungs pa'i/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub ster/ /bkas gnang 'khor lo'i rab sbyor bas/ /'grub 'gyur sbyor ba gzhan gyis min/ /slar yang sa mtha' dbyangs lnga

pa'i/ /drung na gnas pa'i stan can la/ /zla dum thig les brgyan pa'o/ /cho gas de kho na'i sa bon/ /pa drung gnas pa rnal 'byor ma'i/ /tshogs ni skyed par byed pa'o/ /Ta yig 'bar bar byed pa'i sngags/ /sing ha ru pe khaHsngags tshig /bgegs kyi gtso bo rlag

byed pa'o/ /ga dza rU pe gaHyi sngags/ /sems can kun gyi bgegs byed pa'o/ /trai lo kyo da re yi tshig /rab mchog pho nya kun skyed pa'o/ /sa mu dra me kha le gra ha gnyis kyi tshig /rgya mtsho lta bu'i ska rags spras/ /de ni sngags kyi ska rags sogs/ /hU~M dang phaT kyi yi ge ni/ /mkha' 'gro

ma yi khyab bdag go /bI rA dwI te hU~M sngags tshig /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las/ /tha mal 'dus byas skyes pa'o/ /de ltar rkang pa bdun sngags te/ /ye shes sa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs te/ /sems can las las grub pa'i mthar/ /

de yi go 'phang mchog tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba'i ming / /slar yang skye zhing lam la gnas/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa sgyu ma yin/ /rang gi bdag nyid so sor rig /hU~M hA gnyis ma hA pa shu mo ha ni/ /tshig ni 'khor ba'i rmongs pa'o/ /yo gI shwa rI twa~M gi sngags/ /zhi ba yi ni

gzugs su'o/ /DA ki nI lo kA nAM ban d+hA ni'i tshig /'jig rten byang chub tu 'jug byed/ /sa t+ya me hU~M phaTa'i sngags kyi tshig /mtha' bzhi po ni ston pa'o/ /b+hU ta trA sa ni yi tshig /mu stegs ye shes 'joms pa'o/ /de ltar sngags tshig bdun pos ni/ /las kyi dbye ba byed pa ste/ /

pad lte'i 'dab ma re re la/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams gnas pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i sngags kyi gzugs gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis de/ /bdag gi mdza' bo yis ni gsungs/ /las thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor

ni/ /bcu gnyis rnams kyis lhan cig bya/ /'khor lo chen po re re ru/ /nges par so so'i las bya'o/ /phrad pa rnams ni bcu gnyis su/ /bsgrub bya'i ming gis bsgrub par bya/ /pa mtha' sa mtha' A dang ldan/ /ya mtha' I yi dbyangs dang bcas/ /re yig na

mtha' ra yig dang / /pa mtha' dang ni sid+d+he'i tshig /pid+ye'i tshig dang shwa ri'i sngags pa'i drung ma dang Ta sa bon/ /hU la zla dum thig les brgyan/ /bskyar la yang ni brjod par bya/ /pa'i drung gnas dang Ta yig ste/ /hU~M phaT dang ni swA hA bcas/ /sngags 'dis lte

bar cho ga yis/ /bsgrub bya ming dang bcas par brjod/ /bcu gnyis rnams dang lte bcas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon yi ge nyi shu bzhi/ /pul+lI ra sogs bsres pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka rdor phag mo/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

sngags 'di yi ni mthu stobs ni/ /bye ba stong phrag gsungs pa yi/ /mtha' med gzhung las dpa' ba yis/ /de bzhin snying po bsdus pa yin/ /rgyud gzhan du ni gsungs pa'i sngags/ /sngags 'di yi ni sgrub thabs so/ /bzlas med grangs med yi ge med/ /gzugs

med bsam gtan de bzhin med/ /lha dran pa yi ye shes kyis/ /dngos grub thams cad skyed pa'o/ /dbugs 'jug pa yi dus su ni/ /yi ge thams cad gsad par bya/ /'byin pa rnams kyis sbyor kun byed/ /'byung ba'i dus su shes par bya/ /gnas dus rnal 'byor

dbang phyug gi/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dod mi bya/ /dbugs rgyu de ltar shes bya ste/ /byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi rtogs/ /gang gi slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /de nyid bzhi rnams bcas pas so/ /theg pa chen por yongs smin la/ /phyi nas sngags ni rab

bstan bya/ /sngon du phag mo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bri bya de nas he ru ka'i'o/ /rdo rje'i bu mo'am de nas gzhan/ /der ni shes rab gzhug par bya/ /rgyud gzhan du ni dbang bskur la/ /tshul 'di bstan par mi bya'o/ /ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin can/ /a ba d+hU tIr dkyil

'khor bya/ /ye shes rnam pa phag mo yis/ /shes bya dpal he ru kar 'khyud/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can ma/ /zhal bzhi mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan/ /dkar mo dang ni 'jigs byed gnon/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /

'jig dus me lta'i 'od zer can/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje dang gri gug /dgra sta DA ru de bzhin du/ /rtse gsum lus med pags pa ste/ /phyag g.yon pas kyang de bzhin no/ /g.yon du dril bu thod pa dang / /zhags pa kha T+wAM ga dang mgo/ /dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ma/ /mgo

bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /'dod chags rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ /yang na he ru ka yis so/ /yan lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs/ /zhabs gdub dpung rgyan rnams dang ldan/ /lha rdzas me tog phreng bas

bklubs/ /rtse bran zlar gnas rdo rje ni/ /dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du/ /sku las 'bar ba'i phreng ba spro/ /he ru ka mig sman nag po 'dra/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdun du'o/ /stag gi pags pa'i

sham thabs can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par bklubs/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ldan/ /spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ /zhal bzhi pa la 'jigs par byed/ /phyag bcu gnyis par rig par bya/ /brgya phyed mgo bos brgyan pa ste/ /

mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang / /'bar ba'i phreng can gtsigs pa po/ /skye gnas phyag rgya phyag gnyis kyis/ /lhag ma rdo rje phag mo'i'o/ /gal te he ru ka gtso bo/ /de tshe phag mo'i phyag gnyis su'o/ /glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa po/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid de/ /

zag med rnal 'byor bde chen bzang / /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs/ /gnyis po snying por sbyin par bya/ /lhag ma rnal 'byor ma rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji ltar/ /thod dum la sogs sngags rig pas/ /dpa' bo kun kyang sbyin par bya/ /re re yi

yang de yi rgyud/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rjes su'o/ /dang ni ro ma'i rtsa/ /shes rab dang ni thabs 'du ba'i/ /rten ni a ba d+hU tI ste/ /gang der ro mnyam son pa'o/ /'khor lo gsum gnyis 'gyur shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin/ /he ru ka dang rdor

phag mo/ /'bum tsho stong phrag phyag can te/ /phyag gnyis la sogs nas brtsams nas/ /gzhan ni gang rnams de rnams so/ /dbang po'i yul ni mi lta zhing / /phyag dang bzhugs tshul la sogs min/ /bsgoms pas spros pa kun bzung ste/ /gti mug de ni spang bar gyis/ /

skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /skad cig la sogs de'i sbyor can/ /snying gar sa bon rnam par dgod/ /spro dang bsdu ba la sogs bya/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod pa dang / /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs te/ /stong nyid la sogs ri rab mthar/ /ra ba dang ni

gur la sogs/ /sa yi char ni rdo rje'i thig /'khor lo drug tu bri ba'o/ /ji lta'i mngon rtogs mtshan nyid kyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bya/ /thabs dang man ngag thams cad ni/ /mdzes ma bdag gis kun bshad do/ /der ni gtor ma sbyin bya ste/ /sa sogs

lnga rnams kyis mchod bya/ /yi ge 'bar ba'i yig rnams kyis/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya'o/ /'bar ba'i gnyis 'phel yig rnams kyis/ /srog gi gtum mo sbar bar bya/ /steng du kha bltas rtsa bsreg ste/ /de bzhin ye shes mkha' 'gro skyes/ /mkha' 'gro

ma sogs ma lus dang / /rnam par shes la sogs thim pas/ /bsregs pas ri bong can haM 'dzag /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di

gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rdo rje phag mo skyed pa dang gtso mo dang 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'di ni le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro

ma sogs kyi/ /ji ltar bskyed pa rab bshad bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor brten nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mchog tu rtsen/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni mtha' yas pa'ang / /spros pa dra ba'i sdom pa'o/ /lus kyi dngos po'i dbye ba yis/ /mtha' yas gzugs can

mkha' 'gro ma/ /lus kyi bde ba la brten nas/ /'dod pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /dga' ba gsum dang rtsa gsum ste/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas sku yi nyams chen po/ /de'i rang bzhin las sna tshogs 'phro/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas

brten nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no/ /'dzam bu gling ni chen po yi/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyi dbus su/ /shar gyi yul du gnas lha mo/ /dus sbyor ro hi ta chu srin/ /rgyal dang nyi ma dga' skyed dang / /rtsa yi dngos po srog 'bab pa'o/ /lha mo

phyi nang bdag nyid du/ /bcom ldan gzugs can ma gnas te/ /phyag bzhi ma la kha dog gnag /spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/ /mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga mngon 'dzin pa mo/ /ro la zhon ma skra grol ma/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs dang ldan pa mo/ /

drag mo thod pa'i phreng can ma/ /g.yas pa DA ru gri gug can/ /g.yon par thod pa kha T+wAM ga /spro zhing sdud pa'i sku can ma/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/ /snying po yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas kha sbyor/ /oM

shrI oM badzra badzra he DA he ki ru nI ru ye kaM hU~M DA hU~M ki pha nI Ta dzA pha la Ta saM swA ba hA ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor pa yi lha mo rnams/ /yi ge rdo rje can du 'dod/ /mkha' 'gro ma thog 'joms pa'i mthar/ /rigs kyi rtsar ni rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas bsgrubs

nas su/ /der ni phag mo gnas par 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang gnyis med bde/ /ming gi sbyor bas shes bya ba/ /dgos pa rnam mang man ngag go/ /sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ni rgyud/ /bde ba che las skyed par 'gyur/ /gang phyir bdag

po mkha' 'gro ma/ /rgyud de mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs so/ /bdag po khyod la bdag 'di'o/ /ji ltar bdag gis bskyed 'gyur ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma la bde ster ba'i/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byas nas/ /khyod bskyed pa ni bshad kyis nyon/ /rang gi rgyud ni ma

nyams pa/ /DA yig gsang ba'i bug bdag nyid/ /gzhu yi rnam pa srog dang ldan/ /lus kyi gzugs can yang dag pa/ /yul dang dbang po'i bdag nyid can/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le che/ /rgyud i zhes bya'i ming can te/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i pad chen du/ /rtsa

yi 'khor lo la khyab 'gyur/ /ka yig ka gzugs kyang de bzhin/ /'od gsal sprul bya sprul pa'o/ /phrin las kyi ni khams kun gyi/ /zhi ba'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba che/ /dga' ba med mdzes mi 'gyur kyang / /brjod min lhan skyes tshon gyis 'tshed/ /mi gzugs

rtag tu bde chen pos/ /sgyu 'phrul nges par 'phro bar 'gyur/ /I ni 'byung po che kun dang / /dbang phyug la sogs su ni ston/ /lug dang dmar ser yid bzang gis/ /de yi gzhi ni bskyed par 'gyur/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /las kyi dus bzhin mtshon

par bya/ /klu rnams yang dag dgug bya dang / /char 'bebs gzhug phyir bzhu ba dang / /lha rnams dang ni 'byung po kun/ /rgyal po rnams kyi'ang 'phrul chen dang / /dbang dang mngon spyod rengs pa dang / /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/ /mngon spyod dus las shes par bya/ /

rang rang gling du bskyed pa ste/ /shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pas/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dbang pos sems phra zhing / /shin tu phra bas der 'jug 'gyur/ /sems can don du de dang der/ /rang bdag sbyor bas mdzad

par 'gyur/ /stong gsum stong ni chen po ru/ /gang du khyab bdag kun spyod 'gyur/ /der ni dum bu bcu gnyis su/ /rang rang gtso mo rnal 'byor ma/ /thim dang longs spyod spyod rnams su/ /rdzu 'phrul che rnams kun spyod 'gyur/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi/ /

dbugs rgyu bar ni shes par bya/ /brgya phrag brgyad srog rnams kyis/ /'pho bar 'dir ni brjod par bya/ /bcu gnyis rnams ni nyin zhag 'gyur/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis rim las so/ /dus sbyor gsum bsgyur byas nas kyang / /dus kyi pho nya mo kun spyod/ /dus

brgya'i phyed kyis pho nya mo/ /re re rnam par shes par bya/ /lnga bcu gsum gyis yang dag par/ /nyin zhag gcig la spyod pa'o/ /de rnams yi ger yang dag bshad/ /a yig la sogs k+Sha mtha' can/ /yon tan 'phar ma yin bstan pas/ /gsum bsgyur brgya phrag

phyed dang bcas/ /de rnams pho nya mor nges bshad/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma phyag rgya/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /sa 'og rnams na'ang gnas pa mo/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam gsum ni/ /zhing sngags lhan cig skyes rang ngo / /gang zhig gang gis lhag

gnas pa/ /de ni de yir gsal mthong 'gyur/ /rigs kyi khyad par la brten nas/ /'dod pa'i sbyor skyes gnas pa can/ /tsa ru'i bza' ba de rnams su/ /ye shes gzugs can phyugs chen po/ /bza' min bza' bya der yang ni/ /mtshon min gsal bar mtshon

par bya/ /mtshan nyid mtshan nyid min pa spong / /de ni spong bar rab spong ba'o/ /rjes 'dzin tshar gcod la chags pa'ang / /gang zhig gang gis rang rang dngos/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos gnas par/ /byas te mngon sbyor sbyor ba yis/ /a ba d+hU tI'i srog gi rlung / /

brtan par phag sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /ma brtan srog gi rlung rnams kyi/ /dngos grub gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha mo rnam snang gis rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje 'dzin bdag mi bskyod pas/ /pho nya mo sngags sum cu drug /dus las rang dang rang gi rigs/ /ji ltar bdag

mo'i rigs dang ni/ /phyag dang mtshan ma rim ji ltar/ /yang na nges par brjod pa ru/ /mngon rtogs mtshan nyid las shes bya/ /bol+la kak+ko la sbyor las/ /lha mo rang nyid zhu bar zhugs/ /skad cig de la ma lus pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad ro mnyam lta/ /

lha mo nam mkha'i nang snang bas/ /'di yis mnga' bdag bskul bar bya/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rol cig rol/ /shes rab thabs kyi dgongs pa rab tu grub par mdzod/ /'jig rten rnams la khyod kyi thugs rje bsgoms pa yis/ /ji ltar lha dang lha min ma lus

sangs rgyas mdzod/ /byang chub rdo rje 'dzin pas bde chen gyis mnyes mdzod/ /khyod ni stong nyid ting nge 'dzin la zhugs sam ci/ /rdo rje pad+ma rol pas deng ni nges rtogs mdzod/ /gang gis lhan cig stong nyid ting 'dzin la khyod bzhugs/ /mnga' bdag khyod kyis khams bzhi'i

sa bon 'dzag par mdzod/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rang bzhin gtum mo ldang bar 'gyur/ /sa gsum sreg par byed de gang du'ang mi mthong ngo / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bos 'bar zhing 'bar bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams lhan skyes rang bzhin gyis dgar mdzod/ /dga' ba dang

ni 'chi bar snang ba mi mthong ngo / /thugs kyi rgyal ba mgon pos 'di dag sad par mdzod/ /sgyu ma yi ni sems can khams ni bsgral bar mdzod/ /glu chen po ni 'di gsan nas/ /rnal 'byor 'khor lo can rab sad/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i 'gro ba kun/ /brtan pa la sogs

'gro ba ni/ /mthong bzhin rang gi 'khor lo can/ /nam mkha' thim pa sku cher 'gyur/ /lhan skyes sogs kyis sprul pa can/ /gnyis po gcig pa'i sku chen po/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin can/ /thams cad kyi ni chos kyi sku/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud thob nas/ /rnal

'byor rgyud rnams la yid ches/ /slob dpon sems kyi rdo rje yang / /dbu ma'i tshul gyi spyod yul lo/ /de nyid phyir bstan thob pa las/ /dbu ma chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /grub mtha'i man ngag spyod yul ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min/ /

grub mtha' mngon sum las shes bya/ /man ngag kyang ni rjes dpag las/ /shes bya bla ma'i zhal las kun/ /de mkhas sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /byis pa'i rigs kyi rnam shes kyi/ /mngon nga rgyal can spyod yul min/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mkha' 'gro ma skyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la kun du spyod pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi

rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste 'di ni le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lA ma ji ltar gnas pa ni/ /ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /gsungs pa bdag gis gsal bya tsam/ /rdo rje sdom pa bcom ldan 'das/ /phag mo rnal 'byor

sdom pa ste/ /'khor lo sdom pa mkha' 'gro ma/ /de bzhin dam tshig sdom pa ni/ /lA ma yis ni yang dag bstan/ /pad+ma'i sdom par 'dod pa ni/ /dum skyes ma can gzugs can ma/ /rin chen sdom pa'o khyab bdag la/ /lA ma rang nyid kyis zhus pa/ /rdo rje sdom sogs ji

lta bu/ /ngo mtshar bdag gi bdag po kye/ /rdo rje dam tshig de bzhin sbyor/ /pad 'khor de bzhin rin chen gyi/ /sdom pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /de nas rdo rje can mchod nas/ /mnyes pa bdag la yang dag gsungs/ /rdo rje pug 'pho med ye shes/ /rtogs nas rdo rje

gsum rnams su/ /sdom pa rdo rje gsum rnams la/ /bskyed pa rdo rje sdom pa ni/ /dam tshig rtsa rnams thams cad kyir/ /shes bya lam gyi rjes skyob pa'i/ /sdom pa'o 'khor lo mchod pa ni/ /dam tshig sdom par 'dod pa yin/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po ni/ /sbyor

drug nam mkha'i bu ga ru/ /sdom pa bden pa'i dngos po kun/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor sdom pa'o/ /pad+ma a ba d+hU tI'i rtsa/ /'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni/ /sdom pa'o 'khor lo de rnams su/ /pad+ma'i sdom par brjod par bya/ /'khor lo bde bar gshegs pa'i lam/ /

dbang sogs rnams su bskyed pa yis/ /sdom pa'o chos de rnams su ni/ /'khor lo sdom pa yin par bshad/ /rin chen rdo rje mgo bo yi/ /nor bur 'bab pa 'ongs pa yis/ /sdom pa'o srog gi thig le yang / /rin chen sdom pa yin par 'dod/ /ma bshad pa las de

rnams kyis/ /mkha' 'gro bdun pa ye shes mchog /khwa gdong la sogs brgyad dang ni/ /'dren pa gnyis med mtshan nyid phyir/ /de ltar thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /gcig tu sdom pa'i mkha' 'gro yin/ /gtum mo 'bar ma la ni gzugs/ /rtsa so so dang dbu ma ste/ /

ye shes mkha' 'gro de las bskyed/ /rnam pa kun rig skad cig las/ /byang chub sems kyi dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gzugs can gang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bshad do/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba yi ni mchog /blo bur byung ba bdag med pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po chu

skyes gzugs/ /rnal 'byor rang sems sems med kyang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid do/ /'khor lo nang gi bdag nyid gzugs/ /thig le kun tu sbyar ba yis/ /mtshan nyid gnad dang mtshams la ni/ /kun du sangs rgyas skye bar 'gyur/ /'du ba phyi dang nang

bdag nyid/ /ye shes dngos rang bzhin las so/ /dam tshig sems dpa' gsum rig pa/ /skye dang 'chi dang bar rnams kyi/ /srid pa kun las shes par bya/ /spong bas dam tshig mkha' 'gro skye/ /bdag nyid kun gyis mi shes kyang / /'gro ba mkhas pa'i lam gyis

'gyur/ /'dod chags sgyu ma bcas nam mkha'/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro rang nyid gtso/ /dbyangs yig de bzhin rnal 'byor dang / /phyag rgya lhan skyes 'dod rnams kyi/ /bgrod bzhin du ni rtag tu skye/ /'bar ba rin chen dbang mkha' 'gro/ /de bzhin khams ni rnam pa bdun/ /

rnam shes bdun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /chu gter ri dang gling rnams kyang / /rgya mtsho che der rab tu zhugs/ /de nyid nyi shu lnga bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgyus/ /'khor yug la sogs stong nyid dang / /rang bzhin skyes bu de bzhin du/ /'od

gsal ba dang thams cad ming / /chos kyi dbyings dang rang mtshan nyid/ /thar dang sangs rgyas de bzhin du/ /ye shes rdo rje sems lam bdag /chos 'byung dang ni theg chen dang / /gsang ba sngags tshul khyab bdag dang / /lhan skyes dang ni 'dus de bzhin/ /thugs rje chen

po rang nyid dang / /bdag med ma dang kun de nyid/ /rang bzhin can stong yang nas yang / /de phyir rgya mtsho'i ming dang yang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /A kun 'jigs gzir sems can rnams/ /ngang gis sangs rgyas yon tan ldan/ /r+N+Na/ de rnams dge ba

mngon 'dod la/ /dub dang yongs su ngal ba med/ /wa/ rtog pa thams cad spangs pa las/ /thob pa sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /ma/ gsang sngags tshul gyi bdag nyid kun/ /hA/ bskyed pa yi ni gzugs can no/ /sa/ de yi chos ni mi bden te/ /mu/ dngos po skad cig 'jig

phyir ro/ /dra/ rdzas dang sna tshogs rang bstan chos/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /lA ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid sa/ /ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis te/ /rol pa'i myos las bskyed pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya/ /ma sogs kun gyi 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa yi lam nas rjes 'gro

ma'o/ /yang na sgyu ma 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ni sgyu ma che rang bzhin/ /bum pa'i rA si spyod pa yis/ /'pho ba'i grangs kyang gnyis pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo can lha mo/ /kun du spyod pa lA mar gnas/ /kha dog ljang snang lha mo ste/ /lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs/ /sred pa dang

ni sdang ba'i dngos/ /thams cad de yi steng du gnas/ /he ru ka yi mdog dang gzugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro rnams/ /lhag ma 'khor drug rnal 'byor ma/ /dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad 'byung / /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su sbyin/ /thugs sogs

kha dog drug tu grags/ /'khor lo cha mnyam la bri bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor de bzhin/ /ral gri rin chen gri gug gi/ /phreng ba rtag tu rim shes bya/ /phyi rol sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng / /mgo bo'i phreng ba thams cad du'o/ /lA ma byang gi sems las bskyed/ /rnal 'byor ma

tshogs gtso mo ste/ /dus kyi rjes mthun sems can don/ /smon lam gyi ni mtshan nyid do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i dbus su yang / /rdzogs ldan la ni rnam gzigs sogs/ /de yi dus su shes bya ba/ /de bzhin rnam gzigs byang gling du'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni chu dun

du'ang / /bdag ni shAkya'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /lhag ma'i gling lnga rnams su ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rim pas so/ /de phyir lA ma 'gro ba kun/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas mtha' len/ /ma ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi/ /snying stobs bya ba byed pa gsal/ /sa yi dbang

phyug zhag la ni/ /mchu yi zla ba can du 'dod/ /thur sel zhes bya'i rlung dang ni/ /'gro dang zla ba zhes bya'i rtsa/ /ji srid 'chi ba'i dus nyid bar/ /'dzin bzhin du ni mi nyams so/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis/ /zla ba nyin zhag rlung rnams so/ /rtsa dang rtsa nas 'bab pa

ste/ /mi ni skyed pa rnal 'byor ma/ /rtsa yi tshogs ni thams cad la/ /skad cig las ni srog 'pho 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de la shes byas nas/ /sdang sogs yon tan gyis rim pas/ /des ni sna tshogs sprul bdag dang / /las kyis gnas ni mang po'o/ /rnal 'byor pa

yi dngos gcig ni/ /lA ma mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /mya ngan 'das dang mtshon pa na'ang / /gnyis po zhugs gyur ming med pa/ /ji ltar mi shes de la ni/ /bdag gis mchog tu 'du shes so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems med 'gyur/ /chos kyi sku sogs dngos

po'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi drin gyis ni/ /skye ba can kun 'thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po'i dngos po bden min yang / /de tshe mi bden pas 'thob 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis kyi dngos nyid ci/ /grib ma yi ni skyes bu mtshungs/ /grib ma'i dngos po de bden kyang / /skyes

bu'i gzugs ni bden ma yin/ /de bzhin dbang po mi bden kyang / /de dngos bden pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /man ngag rnam pa mang po gzhan/ /mchog tu bsngags par shes par bya/ /btung ba la sogs bdog pa kun/ /bla ma la ni 'bul ba bden/ /

de ni mi bden pas spyad bya/ /de la brnyas par mi bya'o/ /'di la sngags kyang bshad bya ste/ /lha mo kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /nye ba'i snying po sngags rnams la/ /kha sbyor mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /nye snying rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /

lugs 'byung lugs la bzlog pa yis/ /de bzhin dbus su lugs 'byung min/ /oM oM ba hrIH/ dzra he lA he mA hU~M yai hU~M hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha Ta pha hU~M Ta hU~M swA hA hA he hrIHoM oM hU~M he hU~M he hrIHphaT oM zhes bya ba'o/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma rim las/ /rtsa

dang tshig ni shes bya ste/ /yi ge brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi rtsa bskyed de/ /yi ge re re yi yang ngo / /yang na thams cad bsdus pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dus 'di'o/ /de phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rtag re re skye/ /gal te sems

dpa' che khros na/ /spros pa'i khro bo rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin gti mug 'dod chags sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu spros/ /tshegs chung ba yis las 'grub pa/ /yum mchog lA ma'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs te/ /yi ge

re re rnal 'byor ma/ /ming ni de dang mnyam zhes bya/ /khyod la rdo rje mchog bsres pa'o/ /de ltar de nyid rtag brten nas/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya dang lhan cig /rtsen cing rgya cher rol par bya/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das dbus su/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las lA ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang sngags dgod pa dang / 'khor los

sgyur ba drug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya/ /sems can rnams la phan brtse bas/ /khaN+Da ro hi'i gnas bzhugs nas/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje

mkha' 'gro dang / /'khor lo bzhi yi pad+mo ru/ /rtsa ni brgya dang nyi shu'o/ /de rnams ming ni ci rigs par/ /de kho na nyid snod la bshad/ /yul dbus ma dang ka ling ka ma dang / /o Ta ma dang kar+N+Na Ta mo ma ru mo/ /sau rASh+Ta mo ma la yam bing ga ma/ /'gro lding ma dang ta liM ga

ka mo/ /mA la ba mo ma ha raSh+Thi ma/ /ba ren dra mo kA ma ru pi ma/ /DA hA li mo a Ta li yul ma/ /b+ha Da ri mo lA DA dbus 'gyur ma/ /ti ra hu da ti mo dang dad da ra na Ta ma dang bal yul ma/ /mnyan yod ma dang rA D+ha mo dang Di ka ka ri ma dang / /b+hang ga lA mo kha Da ma dang ha ri ke la ma/ /

gser gling ma dang sing ga li mo dang / /Da ma Da mo kan to ra ka mo/ /sin d+hu kha ba'i gnas ma tsUM Di mo/ /ku lu ta mo dza Da ra mo pa tha ma/ /dza dz+dza yu ta ma dang ba ru Na ma dang / /o Di yA Na ma dang lam pa ka ma dang / /dzA lan d+ha ra ma dang ar bu da ma dang / /kha che ma dang ko sa la mo

kAny+tsi ma/ /dza yan ta mo tri shaka ta mo tsam b+ha ma/ /lu ha ra ma pu ra ho ri ka mo dang / /mum+mu nam kAm po dza ma dang / /b+haT+To ma la gri ha de ba mo/ /pre ta pu ri ma dang bab b+ha ra ma dang / /pi la mo dang nye ba'i pi la mo/ /dur khrod ma dang nye ba'i dur khrod ma/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram ma kha

sa mo/ /kla klo ma dang thams cad yul ma ste/ /rim pas drug cu bzhi lha mo/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma/ /rigs kyi rtsar ni shes par bya/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo de bzhin brgyad/ /pho nya mo kun 'gro ma ste/ /pra ya ga mo de bi ko Ta ma/ /'phags rgyal ma dang dpal chen mo/ /

'bar ba'i gdong ma grub pa srim ba li mo dang / /ma hi la ma kau ma ri mo sau ra ma/ /de ltar thams cad snying gnas su/ /sgyu ma'i rnam par nga zhing ma'o/ /mgrin par 'khor lo'i lha mo yang / /gtso mo mchog ni bshad par bya/ /cha chen bcu drug nyid yin te/ /khams rnams bcu drug

de bzhin no/ /khrag dang khu ba rkang dang ni/ /rngul dang tshil dang pags pa dang / /sha dang rus pa rgyus pa dang / /rnag dang rgyu ma rang byung dang / /bshang gci mkhris pa mchil ma'o/ /ra ha s+ya sogs tshil gyi khams/ /de rnams myos byed 'bab ma'o/ /mgo
