bo ru ni lha mo che/ /'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa/ /zhag gi rim pa thams cad du/ /mtshams kun rmad byung chen mo'o/ /nag mo gtsigs ma 'jigs rung ma/ /dga' ma 'das ma log 'dren ma/ /tsA muN+Da dang drag gzugs ma/ /lha mo dka' zlog dbyangs can

ma/ /nag bzang mo dang nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang gzhan mi thub/ /rgyal ma dang ni rnam rgyal ma/ /mi pham ma dang rgyal ba mo/ /drag mo sdang ma dbang mo dang / /zla ma lam gyi bzhi mdo ma/ /grong gnas ma dang drag mig ma/ /kam po dza ma Dom bi ma/ /

gtum mo dang ni gdol pa mo/ /bram ze mo dang dmangs rigs mo/ /rgyal po'i bu mo 'phrul chen mo/ /lha rdzas chang gis 'gengs byed ma'o/ /de ltar rtsa yi 'khor lo ru/ /khaN+Da ro hI nang 'gro ma'o/ /bdag 'dir 'gro ba mo yin ci/ /rang gi bdag pos bka'

stsol cig /lus rnams thams cad la ni khams/ /mkha' 'dra dngos po gcig tu 'gyur/ /sa gzhi cha bzhin shes bya ste/ /yul gyis phye yang sa gzhi gcig /dum bu dum bur gyur pa'i khams/ /yang na yul dang zhag dag 'gyur/ /Da yi yi ge bstan de'i

phyir/ /sgo nga mngal gyi mtshan nyid las/ /'dir ni rnam shes bskyed par 'gyur/ /gang 'dra'i gang gi khams rnams la/ /bzhir ni rnam par shes bya ste/ /las la dum skyes ma rang nyid/ /sdig pa chen po 'phrog bzhin ma/ /bsad pa khams ni thams cad do/ /des

ni sems can pral dum skyes/ /shin tu las kun mdzad pa mo/ /gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ /rang gi 'pho ba las bzhengs mchog /nya ni 'char ba'i dus dang ni/ /'dod dang rgyu skar gre mchog dang / /nub kyi ba lang spyod gling du/ /'dod chags chen po'i

rang bzhin ma/ /dngos med byed pa min lha mo/ /gnyis med go 'phang la brten ma/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /bskyed 'gyur rang gi sngags las skye/ /oM ba sa dzra rba kha bu N+Da d+d+ha ro ba hi dzra kA DA yai ke hU~M nI hU~M ye phaT ba phaT r+N+Na swA nI hA ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA ha oM/

sngags 'di rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad la/ /lha mo re re rnams kyi ni/ /dbus su 'khor lo bzhi skyes ma/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /thams cad chos 'byung dbus su ste/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta babs kyis ni de

rnams brgyan/ /sha chen po ni za bzhin du/ /'jigs byed sgra ni bsgrags pa'o/ /lA ma'i 'khor lo ba lang sha/ /mkha' 'gro ma la glang chen sha/ /phag mo la ni sha thams cad/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i sbyor bas so/ /gsang sngags bden par shes byas nas/ /

sngags kyi yi ge brjod pa min/ /sems can kun gyi ngag gang de/ /sngags ni rnal 'byor ma ru grags/ /gal te yi ge pa sngags yin/ /go Di'i yi ge pa dang mtshungs/ /rtsa yi bu ga bu ga ru/ /dbugs ni yi ger 'du shes pa'o/ /sngags kyi btung bas sems

la ni/ /ji srid rkang mthar 'gog pa las/ /yul dang yul du kun du spyod/ /yul dbus su yang 'ongs pa las/ /tshim bya rang gi 'khrul 'khor du/ /bum pa bzhin du btung ba 'bab/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi stan gnas nas/ /srog gi 'khor lo bzhin du

bskor/ /sems dpas 'khor bzhin pa ru ni/ /nor bu'i bu gar btsir bar bya/ /bu ga dgu ru sa bon kyang / /rdo rje sogs pas bsgom par bya/ /yang na rtsa rnams thams cad du/ /sngags kyi yi ge 'di dgod bya/ /ma ka oM kA ma sau ma bi dra ta mA ma b+ha kA DA a b+ha lA

ma ti da ne srA rA Di ba khA ha su si DA ka si hi tsu ku dza pa dza ba au laM dzA a kA ko kAM dza tri tsa lu pu mu~M/ kAM b+ha gri pre ba pi u sma u kha m+me zhes bya ba ni lte bar ro/ /pri de u ma dz+wa su ma kau zhes bya ba ni snying gar ro/ /ra shu ma swA me tsa mAM a snA pU a swa bi mU pi sh+le zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i'o/ /

kr-i ka b+hI nA ti bi tsA gau o sa b+ha ma b+h+ru a dza bi a dza go du i tsa tsa grA rau kAM Dau tsa mA brA sU rA zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i 'khor lo la'o/ /yang na mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i ming can te/ de rnams kyi yang yig dang po/ /thams cad mgo bo'i 'khor lor sbyin/ /'khrul

'khor 'di ni blo chen po/ /srog gi rlung ni rnam 'dzin 'gyur/ /pad+ma bzhi yi 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /re'u mig 'khor lo rim thig gdab/ /thams cad zlum po'i rnam par ni/ /thig lnga rnams ni gdab par bya/ /brgyad dang bcu drug drug cu bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis re'u

mig 'dod/ /lte ba'i gnas ni thob nas su/ /srog gi nus pa rnams kyis 'khor/ /ji srid a ba d+hU tI'i rlung / /de srid 'khrul 'khor 'dir brjod do/ /gal te ngag gis de ltar byed/ /sngags ni 'jam snyan gyis glu len/ /sgras ni srog nges phur btab nas/ /

rtsa dgu po ni dgag par bya/ /nad med mi rgas mdze med cing / /rtag tu bkres dang skom pa med/ /de ltar la sogs mtha' yas pa/ /nad dang 'chi ba'i mthar thug med/ /dkyil 'khor lngar ram yang na ni/ /'khrul 'khor can kun 'bab par bya/ /khams dang skye

mched gzhan la sogs/ /bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bza'/ /mdog dmar 'du shes lhag ma ni/ /lA ma'i phyag dang gzugs can no/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dum skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang skyed pa dang / 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming mdor bstan pa dang / sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i

cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan mchog bshad par bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /dpal he ru ka'i kun sbyor las/ /gzugs can ma yi mtshan nyid dge/ /lus ldan dang ni las dang tshigs/ /sngon du gzugs can ma

la brten/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can gzugs su/ /bde la gnas pas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rkang lag thams cad la/ /tshigs ni bcu gnyis nyid yin no/ /lnga lnga ru ni shes bya ste/ /bcu gnyis la rtsa drug cu'o/ /dkyil 'khor rnams la'ang 'bab pa mo/ /

'pho ba bcu gnyis su 'dod do/ /g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa la'ang / /sngon du lug sogs sngags rig pas/ /lhag ma bu ga bzhi rnams so/ /lte ba mdoms dang rtsib logs gnyis/ /gru gsum de bzhin shes bya ste/ /de yi sgo rnams rtsa drug cu/ /mtshams ni

rnam pa lngar rab gsungs/ /nyi ma rgyu bar gang 'gro ba/ /de 'gro zla ba zla rnams su/ /drug lnga sum cu'i cha rnams su/ /snying gar grags pa de bzhin gsungs/ /rtsa dgu ji ltar 'gro ba'o/ /mig la sogs pa'i bug rnams su/ /sgo la brten nas gnas par 'gyur/ /

mgrin par gang 'dra ba yi khams/ /de ru gyur nas gnas pa'o/ /mi phyed ma sogs sum cu gnyis/ /rgyud mang por ni bsngags pa'o/ /de yi gzugs su gnas lha mo/ /gzugs can ma de'i rnam rtog pas/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'dri'o/ /gzugs can ma

yi ming ci gsungs/ /'gro ba thams cad gzugs med mdzod/ /rtsa yi bde sogs ming gis so/ /'gro ba'ang dbang po'i lam rnams su/ /gang 'dra'i gzugs kyi gzugs can ma/ /pha las thob pa'i bde ba ni/ /dbang gnyis rnam pa'i sbyor las so/ /gang

dang gang gi rigs gang ni/ /de dang de yi 'gro bar bshad/ /bden pa kun las 'dren par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi tshul las gzhan mi 'gro/ /de phyir gzugs can ma 'grogs las/ /lhan skyes rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol/ /lha mo chen mo kha dog ser/ /lhag

ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs/ /'du byed phung po'i gzugs dang ni/ /ming dang bud med sogs gzugs can/ /mnyam med sems can don las phyir/ /gling 'di ru ni skye 'gyur ro/ /lug dang bya ku la gnag pa'i/ /zla ba rA si'i rang bzhin can/ /thabs dang shes

rab bde bas kyang / /dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs pa'o/ /yang dag sum cu bdun bdag nyid/ /ji lta'i rim pas dpa' rnal 'byor/ /gsang sngags kha dog sbyor ba ru/ /gzugs can gtso mo'i shes par bya/ /oM badzra graM rU na pi

maH/ nI hi yi oM ke swA hU~M hA hU~M hu/ pha oM Ta bau pha Sha Ta Ta he swA hA hU~M hU~M hoH/ oM phaT phaT haM/ de ltar rang bzhin las shes bya/ /sngon gyi cho ga'i las kyis ni/ /dbus ma'i bu gar phyin nas ni/ /dbugs ni rnam shes ngo bo can/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa/ /ma lus

skad cig de la mthong / /ma lus rang bdag ngo bo can/ /bsgoms dang thos dang mthong ba yang / /bgrod bzhin pa na rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'di ni sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rnam gsum ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /de ni 'dod dang

gzugs gzugs med/ /me long du ni gdod rdzogs pa/ /ji bzhin khams gsum la gnas nas/ /de yi gzugs dang gzhan gzugs can/ /gzugs dang gzugs las gzugs brnyan te/ /grangs med pa yi 'jig rten khams/ /gzugs can sgyu mas

bud med dang / /thabs ni skyes bu'i las can gyi/ /gnyis med bud med skyes bu gcig /gcig min gcig min min gzugs can/ /gzugs kyi yul la sogs dngos la/ /mtshon byed mtshon bya med gzugs can/ /mtshon dka' mtshon bya'o mtshon bya la/ /

mtshon bya gzugs med mtshan nyid ma/ /mtshon med spyod yul de yang ni/ /mtshon pa po de'i spyod yul lo/ /ji ltar la lar rmi lam mthong / /rang nyid shi ba mthong 'gyur na'ang / /mthong bzhin du yang ngu bar byed/ /gzugs dang gzhan gyi gzugs can no/ /de ltar kun gyi

rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dang / /sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin dang / /dam tshig sems dpa' chen po pa/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul sems dpa'/ /brtan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs so/ /de lta'i gzugs ni ji ltar sngon/ /rtog ge pa rnams kyis

mi shes/ /byis pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs bya min/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mchog thob pas/ /skye ba 'di nyid la shes 'gyur/ /skye bo thams cad byang chub rang bzhin te/ /rmongs pa'i byis pas shes pa ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid/ /mi gang yin

pa de ni rdo rje 'chang / /glu 'di blangs pas thams cad ni/ /skrag ste sa la brgyal bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyel nas kyang / /chos kyi spyod yul ngo mtshar to/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs gtso/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bskul mdzad nas/ /gson cig

gson cig srin mo khyed/ /sems can khams kyi rang bzhin grol byed ma/ /khyed dang sems can rnams la dbye ba med/ /dpa' bo thams cad sgrol bar mdzad pa mo/ /slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ /sku la thams cad rab tu zhugs/ /slar yang spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /

gtso bo'i zhal nas spros par 'gyur/ /rnam snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rgyu/ /slar yang zhal nas spro bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan thams cad bsdu mdzad nas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud la ni/ /ched du brjod pas ched brjod mdzad/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kun la yang ngo / /rnam

snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang / /'dir ni 'dod chags don yod grub/ /mi bskyod pa dang spyan ma'i rgyud/ /mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma dang ni gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin/ /reg dang chos dbyings su grags dang / /sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang / /

phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang / /sgrib kun sel dang bzang po dang / /'jam dpal dang ni byams pa dang / /gshin rje'i dgra dang shes mthar mdzad/ /pad+ma mthar mdzad bgegs mthar mdzad/ /mi g.yo ba dang dbyug sngon can/ /'dod dang stobs chen gnod mdzes dang / /

gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /lhag ma rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /de ltar rgyud kyi ming 'di ni/ /thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid do/ /shes rab rgyud ni rang byung nyid/ /rang gi rang bzhin rtag tu gnas/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos

rnams su/ /mi 'jig go 'phang rjes 'gro ba/ /bskal pa bsreg pa'i dus su ni/ /gzhan du song nas yang dag gnas/ /thod pa'i dum la sogs dpa' bo/ /ming ni mi bskyod la sogs so/ /dngos po'i dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis/ /rigs ni du ma

'byung ba'o/ /gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nas/ /dpa' bos la bsgyings par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i gzugs/ /bde mchog dang ni mnyam par 'khyer/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin/ rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa

dang rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis te/ /gang gis khwa gdong ma byung ba/ /de yi cho gas thar 'gro ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste/ /khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma/ /

sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste/ /sa lnga par ni 'dod pa yin/ /lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo/ /kA ni chos dbyings mar 'du shes/ /gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni/ /de las longs spyod rdzogs 'byung ba/ /s+yA ni sprul pa'i sku yin te/ /lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las/ /bu

ga bzhi rnams shes bya ste/ /bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can/ /de la rtag tu mngon spyod ni/ /srog chags rnams ni skad cig gsod/ /klu rnams dgug par bya ba dang / /char dbab pa dang rengs pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang byang chub che/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rang

bzhin ma/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa la/ /bde ba 'dod pas 'gro ba mo/ /sngags bden las kyi bdag nyid can/ /bya rog gtso mo de la brten/ /rdo rje phag mo de la ni/ /bya rog ma ni gnas su son/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin/ /

oM ba na dzra mo kA b+ha kA ga s+yA ba ya te ke bI hU~M re hU~M shA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hU~M hA hU~M/ 'di ni ring thung dbye ba las/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /thung ngu thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / /ring po shes rab mngon par brjod/ /kha dog nag mo drag chen mo/ /lhag

ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs/ /gang phyir byang chub sems zhu ba/ /de tshe bya rog las rgyal ma/ /nam mkhar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba/ /bya rog gdong ma'i rlung gis so/ /gang phyir 'phur zhing steng 'phur ba/ /de phyir 'og dang steng du lta/ /bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur

nas/ /bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o/ /der son pa ni bde chen po/ /lus kyis nyams su myong ba'o/ /bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o/ /bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'dir/ /dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can/ /pha rol phyin

tshul rnams kyi yang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa/ /bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkres/ /de yi de ltar las dus su/ /mi gang ngang gis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas/ /bde chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun kyang / /rang gis rang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /las ma byas na gang gi ni/ /las can med cing las byed med/ /rang sems 'pho ba las yin te/ /las de las byed pa yang de/ /lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid/ /sems med pa ni

sems dpa' mchog /lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis/ /gang byas las byed pa rang ngo / /de kun gyi nar khyer ba ni/ /yang dag las mtha'i mtshan nyid do/ /las kyang dge ba rgyu don gnyer/ /mi dge rang gis spang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa'am/ /de

bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni/ /grong dang grong khyer gnas pa dang / /ri la sogs pa'i rtse chen du/ /dam tshig don du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab ster/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs brnyan kyang / /khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te/ /srog dang thur sel

mnyam gnas dang / /khyab byed ji lta'i rim gnyis kyis/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /'ug gdong khyi dang phag gdong ma/ /rim pas klu dang rus sbal rtsangs/ /lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal/ /rtag tu brtan

ma pho nya gnyis/ /dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba/ /mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog /mdor bstan pa yi tshig 'di yang / /rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya/ /phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ /ji srid srog sogs rlung rnams kyi/ /

so so re re'i ming 'du shes/ /bdag gi ston pa ngo mtshar che/ /dus kun du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por gtso bo can 'dzin pa/ /stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya/ /rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o/ /

gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba/ /de yi dbyibs tshul kyang med pa/ /de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang / /'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan/ /mnyam gnas rigs su song nas ni/ /sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis/ /ngag tu brjod pa smra bar 'gyur/ /sngon du bag chags

ma lus pa'o/ /khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la/ /rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung / /klu ni khro bo'i ngo bo nyid/ /khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te/ /rus sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni/ /smra ba yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnas so/ /thur sel

phrag dog lha sbyin no/ /nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do/ /srog gi rlung ni grangs gnyis las/ /dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya/ /skyo ba de yi btags pa'o/ /de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes pa yis/ /gang phyir srog gi rlung ni thams cad bdag nyid skye/ /ji ltar

sa ni bcu gnyis las/ /thog ma de nyid bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya/ /gang phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ /sa gcig rang bzhin rnams kyis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mor 'dod/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang / /lhan skyes yang dag byang

chub nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni nang son pas/ /rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog /bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun byang chub tshul can no/ /slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo/ /de nas byed pa'i gzugs can ma'o/ /byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste/ /

rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga'o/ /thim dang de las langs bsam gtan/ /khwa gdong ming du 'du shes so/ /de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad/ /bla ma'i zhal las gsal 'thob 'gyur/ /bla ma gang de mi brnyas shing / /ston byed de nyid 'dod par bya/ /'phags

pa'i go 'phang ma thob na/ /mnar med la sogs rnams su 'tshed/ /kun nas bla ma gus pa las/ /byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan

bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i srog skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mchog /'ug gdong

la sogs gang gsal ba/ /byed pa yang dag bya ba dang / /thams cad mtshams ni bshad par bya/ /'khrig pa sdig pa snron rnams ni/ /zla ba'i sbyor bas rtag tu gnas/ /'ug gdong ye shes thob nas ni/ /rtsa ni lam gsum 'gro ba mo/ /u/ drag shul gzi brjid

gtsigs pa mo/ /ye shes lam dbang bza' ba las/ /lU/ 'dod la dga' ba sgyu 'phrul che/ /lha min la sogs skye rnams la/ /rkang pa'i mtheb mthar bcu gnyis su/ /ka/ mda' yi shugs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'ug gdong ma yi ming la yang / /u ni o

D+yan bu gar 'dod/ /la/ pul+lI ra ma la yar grags/ /U ni mum+mu ni zhing ngo / /kA ni kA ma rU pa ste/ /de bzhin s+ya 'dir zhing kun 'dod/ /zhing kun dbugs su gyur pa ni/ /gru gsum rnam pa'i bde ba'i mtha'/ /gang phyir gnas lnga'i bdag nyid kyi/ /mi zad he ru ka'i go

'phang / /yang na bdag gi gdan sogs su/ /dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang / /skye gnas gnas lnga'i bdag nyid de/ /snying lte rkan dang mgo bo dang / /gsang ba ru yang rtsa kun gyi/ /skye gnas bu ga lnga'i bdag nyid/ /sgong skyes dang ni drod gsher skyes/ /mngal

skyes brdzus te skyes pa rnams/ /sems can sangs rgyas yon tan bdag /rigs lnga rab tu ston pa'o/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma yang / /gtso mo'i gzugs can yang dag gnas/ /sngags kyi phreng ba las skyes rnams/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid skyes/ /oM ba ma dzra hA u ka lU

lpa kA a s+yA g+ni ya saM ke ni hU~M b+hA hU~M ya pha hU~M Ta hU~M pha pha Ta Ta swA pha hA Ta oM swA hU~M hA/ de ltar sngags de kho na'i bdag /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /kha dog ljang ser drag chen mo/ /lhag ma lA ma dang ni mtshungs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgoms byas nas/ /dur khrod gnas

dang gnyis med pa/ /kun spyod rtsa rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyas pa'i dga' ba'i spyod yul lo/ /'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid do/ /bskrad pa'i las dang rnal 'byor ma/ /'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa mo/ /rang bstan chos las gsungs pa yi/ /

sna tshogs las kyang bya ba'o/ /kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas/ /rgyud 'di yi ni spyod yul lo/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor de kun kyang / /mdor bsdus tshul ni tshig 'di yin/ /so sor sdud dang de bzhin du/ /bsam gtan srog rtsol 'dzin pa dang / /rjes su dran dang

ting 'dzin te/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnam drug go/ /so sor sdud pa khwa gdong ma/ /'ug gdong ma ni bsam gtan 'dod/ /srog rtsol du ni gnas pa khyi/ /'dzin pa la ni phag mo'o/ /rjes dran gnas pa pho nya mo/ /ting nge 'dzin ni brtan mar 'dod/ /mche ba ma ni rgyas

bstan thob/ /'joms ma 'bras bu kun bdag skyes/ /'khor ba las ni grol gyur pa/ /rang gi sku ni sgyu ma mnyam/ /bdag byin rlabs 'di phra mo dang / /rdo rje bzlas rang mtshan nyid do/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gter/ /de las lhag ma zung 'jug go/ /mya

ngan 'das zhes bya ba'ang 'di/ /lam thams cad kyis mya ngan 'das/ /theg chen kun la rab 'jug pa/ /sngags kyi theg pa ru ni byed/ /bya ba bstan bcos dge sna tshogs/ /snying rje mnyes gshin pa yis byed/ /gang 'dra'i dngos dang dngos po la/ /ye shes rnam pa'i

rang byung gis/ /de 'dra ba yi sems rgyun las/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong / /lus kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ /rtsa yi gur ni bshad par bya/ /spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i mthar/ /mtshams dang mgrin pa rnam gnyis 'dod/ /rkang pa'i mthe bo

mtshams mtha' dang / /smin dbus de bzhin sgro ba ste/ /mtshan ma'i rtsa ba dpral ba dag /mig dang rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis/ /ming med pas ni pus mor shes/ /byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang / /rkang pa'i mthil dang snying ga dag /lte ba dang ni rgyab gzhung dang / /bshang lam

dang ni rkan shes bya/ /rkang pa'i tshigs dang mchu dag dang / /mkhur ba mkhur tshos dag dang ni/ /mdoms dang mchan khung gnyis dang ni/ /lag pa'i tshigs dang rkang pa dag /dpung pa'i tshigs dang nu ma gnyis/ /mjing pa thal gong 'dir mtshams so/ /mjug ma nor bu

gnyis dag dang / /rked pa'i tshigs dang mgrin pa dang / /dpral ba dang ni tshigs gnyis dag /rna bug dag dang rtsa ba dang / /brang dag gnyis kyi mtshams su 'dod/ /stan dag dang ni smin khugs dang / /lce dang mi yi sna gang dag /de bzhin du ni rkan dang lce/ /bol+la kak+ko la

gnyis dag /de la sogs pa du ma ni/ /rtsa dang tshigs kyi gnad du 'gyur/ /rang rang spyod pa btsir bya ste/ /byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /btsan thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru/ /shes bya bla ma'i gsung gis so/ /zla ba zla ba'i tshes gang du/ /tshes grangs de la rtsa

ba'i rtsa/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ /ji srid nag po'i mthar thug par/ /shes byang chub 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /'ug mo sgo la spyod pa mo/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi/ /de 'dra'i sor mo'i phyag rgya ni/ /dbugs ni de dang 'dra bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid

'dod/ /yang na rtsa rnams thams cad ni/ /btsir bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i/ /brgya yi tshigs rnams thams cad ni/ /ji ltar gdong gis rim pas so/ /de dang der ni A li 'bar/ /drag po'i sgyu ma dus kun du/ /de phyir a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ /tshig

tu rtog pas brtags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung bar/ /rdo rje 'chang ltar brtag pa'o/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /rtsa ni gti mug chen por 'gyur/ /de yis de yi rang bzhin gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /rmongs dang mkhas

rnams kyi dag la/ /mnga' bdag thar pa chen po bzhugs/ /byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /dbang phyug skye bos sna tshogs rnams/ /de phyir rtag tu las nyams pa/ /sngon byas sdig pa'i las kyis te/ /nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni/ /bgrod bya sangs rgyas nyid 'thob

'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'ug gdong

ma'i nges pa'i tshul dang yang dag pa'i cho ga las skyed pa dang srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan ni don che ba/ /khyi gdong rgyu yi dbye bshad bya/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis mchog 'grub

'gyur/ /shwA/ khyi ni rnal 'byor ma dbugs 'byin/ /rang gis 'jug dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dus kun du ni gnyid log dang / /sad pa bde ba yon tan che/ /na/ sna tshogs gnas su song nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bde reg 'gyur/ /brgya la nyi shus lhag pa ni/ /nges

tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar khyi yi ming du ni/ /bde ba sbyin pa por shes bya/ /pad+ma'i skye gnas de rnams su/ /As+ya/ pad+ma'i kha ni rab rgyas pa/ /gtong ngang longs spyod gar chen po/ /glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang / /reg dang gos dang rgyan dag dang / /me tog

la sogs bsung can 'dod/ /mthun par lte ba'i ma la sogs/ /mdzes ma rnams kyi ngag can te/ /sangs rgyas mchod sogs thams cad du/ /su ra'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang / /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs kyis/ /tshim dang ston

mo 'dod pa ltar/ /bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen po/ /mi dang mi mo'i sgeg pa dang / /dgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang / /mkhas pa rnams kyi yid dam pa/ /skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /mchod dang phyag byed la sogs pas/ /bla ma gus

las bde ba ste/ /yon 'bul ba dang bud med do/ /spyod lam la sogs chos rnams la/ /las thams cad la mi 'jug go/ /rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhag pa dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang / /sgom dang dga' ba bskyed

pa dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi/ /las kyis skyid pa btsal bya dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang / /ye shes rnam shes smra ba dang / /dbu ma'i tshul ni gzhag pa las/ /kun la

dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang / /skur pa 'debs pa dgag pa dang / /dge ba bcu yi las dang ni/ /klog dang kha ton byed mchog las/ /byang chub lam la gnas pa yi/ /dpa' bo gnyis med blta ba'i phyir/ /lus la ltos pa med pa yis/ /grong dang grong du gnas

rnams kyi/ /de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o/ /gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud la dga'/ /don dam rnams la gsal ba yis/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su/ /dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang / /chos ni don chen 'du

shes la/ /dus su 'du shes sgom pa po/ /'gro drug spong ba'i 'du shes ni/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i ming can no/ /dngos rnams sgyu ma'i 'du shes dang / /zhi sogs las kyis bde ba dang / /pha dang bu las gcig min dang / /gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can/ /nyon

mongs phung po yongs gtong dang / /ye shes phung po skyed pa dang / /slar yang 'khor bar mi 'ong dang / /'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas/ /rtogs ldan min pa'i tshig spang bya/ /dbang po rnams kyi mi mthun

min/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mdzes pa yi/ /lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa dang ni chos sku yang / /'du shes sad pa la sogs su/ /gang phyir srid mtshor kun spang bya/ /lhag ma dga' ba bzhi po ni/ /smon lam rdzogs ldan la sogs la/ /rdzogs

ldan dus su rang bzhin skye/ /dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang / /sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes/ /rig pa de la sbom po skyes/ /gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med/ /rtsod dus cha yi rags pa'o/ /thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob/ /smon lam gyis ni

rang gi 'bras/ /de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che/ /gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la/ /dga' ba bcu drug rtag brtags pas/ /khams bcu drug tu shes par bya/ /rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal/ /sman dang 'dra bar

shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro/ /pad can dung dang sna tshogs can/ /glang po ma dang bung ba'i ming / /'khor lo rdo rje skya snar ma/ /du ba mo dang bu skye tshe/ /nyang rtsi spras dang ngo tsha dang / /glog dang tsan+dan nyi ma skyes/ /dmar po de bzhin sbrul gyi mig /

sman mchog tu ni shes par bya/ /bde bas dga' ba'i dus su ni/ /khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las/ /bya ba de dag zhar la dran/ /sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o/ /gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa ni/ /yid can rnams kyi grangs brgyad de/ /'gro dang 'pho

'gyur de bzhin du/ /skyug 'gyur gnyid yur 'gyur de bzhin/ /ltung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir/ /g.yo 'gyur 'gyel bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad dkar mo sogs/ /bde ba'i rgyu yis gnas skabs so/ /de ltar gnas skabs rnam bzhi la/ /

khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur/ /yang dag dran pa'i go 'phang 'dir/ /gang dang su yir gnas par 'gyur/ /yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas/ /khyi ni gzhan gyi grong du'o/ /sngags bden sbyor ba'i bdag nyid de/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su sgom pa'o/ /oM ba dza dzra TA

shwA ma na ta A ku s+yA Ta ya u ke ta hU~M ka hU~M TA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngags/ /shes rab thabs te dngos grub ster/ /kha dog dmar po drag chen mo/ /lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs/ /chu stong karka Ta yugs sa/ /rang gi

bdag po rab gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste/ /sems can rang rang bzhin du skyes/ /dbang gi las la lha mo ste/ /lha dang lha min sogs sngags rig /bdud rtsi lnga dang sgrol ma che/ /mchod pa las rnams thams cad la'o/ /snying gzhi pad+mar yongs bkug nas/ /

bdud rtsi tshig kun las skyes pa/ /rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas/ /sbar dang bsro ba la sogs pas/ /sku rdo rje sogs sngags kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro

de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas phag gdong

ma yi ni/ /nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya/ /dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang / /dngos po de las ldog pa'o/ /phag mo rengs pa'i las rnams la/ /mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o/ /sU/ khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang / /skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma/ /byang chub

sems kyi dga' chen po/ /ka/ keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun/ /bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur ma/ /de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad/ /mngal sogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon/ /ma yi pad+ma la

ltung ba'o/ /nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis/ /phyi nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra/ /zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni/ /khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las/ /phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can/ /brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las/ /pho nya byis pa dang 'chi

phyis/ /mche ba mo ni las bcom pas/ /'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma/ /yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di/ /gzhan gyi lta ba nya sogs kyis/ /'jug pa thams cad bden pa ste/ /'jug med de dngos spyod yul lo/ /rkang gnyis

rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i/ /rtsol ba'i yan lag 'joms ma'o/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang / /'jug med de nyid rtag tu'o/ /kha dog ser mo drag chen mo/ /lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin

can/ /seng ge gro bzhin chu srin la/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /sngags las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams/ /rang rang zhing dang nyid zhing ma'o/ /oM ba daM dzra Sh+T+ra sU ka ka rA rA lo s+yA gra yai mu hU~M kha hU~M b+hi pha Sha Ta NA pha ya Ta hU~M swA hU~M hA pha oM Ta phaT swA hA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi/ /gtso

mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ /dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni/ /bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba'i ma yi ste/ /thig chen gnyis ni btab nas su/ /shar dang so sor 'dod thig dang / /zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas/ /phur bu gdab par bya ba ste/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi

logs nas ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gdab/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /lte ba'i pad+ma de dang mnyam/ /snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni/ /cha gsum du yang de shes bya/ /de yi cha gcig 'khor lo gsum/ /lhag ma tshon gyi sa gzhi'o/ /de yi sum

cha phreng ba ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ /rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbus ma las/ /dman te gnyis gcig bsdams pas sbom/ /ka ba rnams ni kun du sbyin/ /brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o/ /sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te/ /sgo khyud sgo yi cha can no/ /stegs

bu rnams ni de'i phyed de/ /'gram dang logs ni de bzhin no/ /gzungs kyi snam bu dang ni 'dir/ /rin chen phreng phyed snam bu'o/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba de yi phyed/ /mun pa'i snam bu de bzhin no/ /ka ba'i rtse las 'thon rtse mo/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'o/ /dril chung dra

ba gos rnams dang / /ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /de'i phyi chu skyes thams cad du/ /snying po la sogs yang dag bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir/ /lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/ /de yi phyi rol khor yug ni/ /sa gzhi'i rim pas bri bar bya/ /gri gug

phreng ba sbyin bya zhing / /mgo dang lag pa dag de bzhin/ /snying po'i pad+ma'i phyi rol du/ /rin chen phreng ba yang dag bri/ /dur khrod brgyad po bri bya ste/ /kun nas gtum drag la sogs so/ /sa bon rnam par dgod par bya/ /thams cad gri gug las byung ba'o/ /yang na

sku sogs rnams kyi ni/ /yi ge rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kun/ /de bzhin skad cig rnam pas kyang / /sa bon rnams kyis dkyil 'khor dbyung / /mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni/ /bum pa'i steng du sbyin bya ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun gzhan bya'o/ /

gnag dang rtsa ba spangs pa ste/ /mchu ni 'phyang zhing mgrin pa mtho/ /mgrin pa rnams su gos zung ste/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman/ /dri yi chu dang 'dab ma'i rtse/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis dgang bya/ /gtor ma las rnams kun la ste/ /kun nas sgom pa la

sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams dang ni/ /zhing skyong dang ni khro rnams la/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs rdzas rnams 'bul/ /tshim bya phyi la sogs rnams kyis/ /bgegs med yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/ /du ma'i dud 'gro'i zhal lha

mo/ /sum cu rtsa bdun gzugs can rnams/ /las kyi rdo rje 'joms byas nas/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor ldan/ /bdun cu gnyis phyag drag mo ste/ /zhabs brgyad ni rnams kyis ldan/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni phag zhal te/ /ngos gnyis dag tu dgu dgu'o/ /de

yi steng du bdun bdun te/ /phyi nas gsum ni gzhag par bya/ /g.yas su khyi dang ce spyang dang / /byi la stag dang seng ge dang / /'jigs byed mche can rta bong bu/ /de ltar ji ltar rim pas so/ /g.yon du ba lang ma he spyang / /rus sbal chu srin ri bong dang / /

bse dang g.yag dang mun dza dang / /ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya/ /sbrul dang sre mo rtsangs pa dang / /sram dang byi ba dang ni dom/ /mkha' lding bya rgod bya rog dang / /'ug pa bya gar khra dang ni/ /srin bya dang ni ngur pa dang / /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug pud can/ /phug ron

'di rnams thams cad la/ /rang bzhin mdog tu 'dod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyis bya nges par ni/ /rang bzhin gang gi khams la'o/ /yon tan sum cu gsum bdag ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal/ /'gro la byang chub

byed bdag nyid/ /zhabs rnams kyis ni 'byung po'i tshogs/ /me yi dbus su son pa gnon/ /g.yas pas khyab 'jug drag po dang / /tshangs pa nyi ma me dang ni/ /dbang po rlung dang bden bral dang / /nor sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o/ /g.yon pas gshin rje 'dod pa dang / /

zla ba chu lha nor rgyas dang / /sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang / /smin drug bu dang 'khor sgyur te/ /de ltar brgyad dbyibs rnams ni/ /'dus pa rmad byung bsngags pa'o/ /'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni/ /lha mo'i zhabs ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas par mtshon cha'i

tshogs kyang ni/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung dbal can/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo Dam ru chu gri dang / /dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu dang / /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin te/ /bya rog sgro dang pir

dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang sgrog dang nya rgya dang / /mgo gcad 'bar ba mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon par dril bu

phub mche/ /tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho kaM Da ka lpags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /skul byed ro yi shing

bu dang / /brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin te/ /mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa dang ni phur pa dang / /sa bon gang dang sog le dang / /khab dang lus kyi pags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing ral gri/ /de ltar rim pas shes

byas pas/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o/ /gnyis lhag pa yi phyag gnyis kyis/ /glang po'i pags pa steng bgos pa'o/ /khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa/ /dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o/ /kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te/ /yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin/ /

mgo bo'i phreng sogs thams cad dang / /gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o/ /de ltar yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i/ /gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya/ /yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do/ /ting 'dzin dra bas kun bkang

nas/ /'od gsal ba la kun thim byos/ /rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o/ /rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni/ /rang rigs skyes la ston par 'gyur/ /sU yi yi ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin de

nyid dran par bya/ /slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo / /phyugs gang yin pa'i skye bo rnams sangs rgyas/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di

gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phag gdong ma skyed pa dang dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas brtan ma'i sbyor ba 'dir/ /bshad kyis sgom pa po rnams nyon/ /

kun nas dus ni bzhi rnams su/ /zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi/ /bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings pa yi/ /mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya/ /byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa/ /brtan ma la sogs mtshams gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du

gnas pa mo/ /mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu/ /mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i/ /las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste/ /sgom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i/ /'chi ba mche bas gcod ma gang / /de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya/ /thog mar yi ge gnyis can no/ /bcom ldan dus

min 'chi ba ni/ /mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung / /gang gi drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur/ /su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni/ /sems can rang rang las kyis so/ /skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi/ /

sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa/ /de yis de ni dus min 'chi/ /khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur/ /gzhan rnams kyis ni gcad pa yis/ /bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin/ /dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa

rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /lus dang bsam pa las kyang ngo / /g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni/ /zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis/ /bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rlung rim pas/ /de yis ya yi yi ge bshad/ /ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o/ /dA yig g.yas su

song nas ni/ /re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur/ /a yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob/ /slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo/ /rtsa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams/ /D+hi yi yi ge'i ming du shes/ /mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod/ /de rnams dngos las

khyod bskyod de/ /dus min blu bar rig par bya/ /de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po/ /gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can no/ /'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur/ /'dir ni kha dog gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus bsgom pa ni de bzhin

no/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas/ /mtshan ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro/ /spong ba'i chos shes bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo'o/ /rnal 'byor sum cu bdun bdag nyid/ /sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /oM AHsa hU~M ha ba sra dzra/

b+hu ya dza ma b+hA dA su D+hi rA kA ya yai hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT/ swA swA hA hA oM/ 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso/ /gshin rje mche ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang skyed pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste

le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chad/ /gang gis 'chi ba dbang 'gyur ba'o/ /brish+tsi ka ru yang dag byung / /smin drug can dang bzang por ldan/ /dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyis ni/ /pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do/ /gshin rje gsod ma de

yi ni/ /'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo la/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cher/ /lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya/ /lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /bcu gsum bar du bri bar bya/ /slar yang sum cu gnyis rnams su/ /gsum gnyis gcig ni lo yin no/ /dus tshod me dang

gnyis zla ba/ /zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mda'/ /gsum gnyis gcig gi skabs su ni/ /rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed sogs/ /nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis/ /gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs/ /nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o/ /

srog gi nus par shes bya ba/ /bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do/ /bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni/ /'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no/ /nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par/ /skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba/ /gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las/ /rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob/ /bar gyi nyi

ma rnams nyid ni/ /bcu drug grangs su shes byas la/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis/ /lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyor/ /de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang / /dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya/ /gang du rtsa ni srog spangs pa/ /der ni 'di de 'bab par bya/ /

steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba/ /gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o/ /de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te/ /mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o/ /de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pa/ /ma yi yi ges thams cad bshad/ /'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas/ /rnon po'i

me ni rab 'bar bya/ /nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams/ /las kyis rang nyid nyams par 'gyur/ /der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya ste/ /ba lang ma he zhon sogs so/ /byang chub sems kyi lam du ni/ /mdzes ma rnams kyi de tshe btung / /der yang rang gi yan lag las/ /byung ba'i sna

sman gtang bar bya/ /'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste/ /glo ba la sogs ma tshos pa'o/ /g.yul ngor rang nyid 'gyel ba yi/ /gal te rnyed na khrag chen po/ /the tshom spangs nas btung bya zhing / /de yi sha yang bza' bar bya/ /yang na gang gi sa gnas su/ /'chi ltas zad nas

song bar du/ /bza' ba 'o mas byas na bde/ /yang na sha rnams thams cad do/ /gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs g.yogs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni dus kun du/ /der ni gnas pa bsro bya zhing / /me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya/ /der ni chu dron kyang btung zhing / /bza' ba chung ngu

nyung ngu'o/ /gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang / /gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can/ /ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can/ /ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed/ /dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed/ /lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub

dngos kyis/ /lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams/ /zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba/ /phan tshun phug rnams su 'du 'gyur/ /de phyir kha T+wAM ga bsgom ste/ /yan lag kha T+wAM sbyor bas so/ /snying ga'i pad dbus su sems kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no/ /lha mo

mo'i mdog ni sngon can te/ /dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /oM ba pa dzra ra ya shu ma pA dU shwa tI d+ya ye ta hU~M shU hU~M la phaT kha phaT T+wAM swa ga hA d+hA ri Ne hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA oM hU~M/ shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor

ma ni 'di rnams kun/ /bdud rtsi'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /de rnams snying gar dkar ba ni/ /'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /de rnams nang du rang ming yang / /kha dog dkar po 'od bcas pa/ /rtsa yi bu ga so so yi/ /nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya/ /

rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang rang byung ni/ /rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang / /dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur/ /zag med de nyid thob pas na/ /de la dus min 'chi ming ci/ /de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i/ /chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar

shes/ /rdo rjes btung byas rab bshad pa/ /las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad de/ /gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba/ /rtsa drug dus ni rgyu ba mo/ /ngang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog /'og

gi chu ni 'thung ba yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad/ /de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros/ /rdo rje 'chang gi gdams ngag go/ /gshin rje'i pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs/ /de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa

'thob/ /'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med/ /rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams mi ldan no/ /de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las/ /g.yon dang g.yas dang dbu ma yi/ /rtsol ba g.yo med dngos po las/ /slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod/ /pho

nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa/ /dbu mar zad pa'i go 'phang ngo / /de ltar rnam pa mang po ni/ /brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya/ /'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa/ /dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste/ /lus gcig lus mang po

can no/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing / /dpa' bo rnams la rjed par bya/ /gang zhig gang slong la yang dag /de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro

de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje pho nya mo skyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'chi ba bslu ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u

bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gshin rje mche gtsigs ma/ /bshad kyis da ni mnyan par gyis/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi/ /skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang bsreg /gang zhig gang la las byas pas/ /de yi dus su 'bigs par

'dod/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad rnams ni/ /gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang / /'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste/ /dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya/ /mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas/ /gnad du na bas mtshon par bya/ /gal te dus ni gcig la ni/ /rkan gsum

du ni gzer ba na/ /de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar/ /rig bya 'di la the tshom med/ /rkang pa'i brang bar gzer ba dang / /gal te lte bar gzer ba na/ /lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar/ /skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba'o/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi brang mthil dang / /gal te mig

tu gzer ba na/ /de tshe zla ba gsum du yang / /'chi byed kyi ni dbang du 'gro/ /rkang pa'i mthil ni gzer ba dang / /gal te sna ni gzer ba na/ /zhag gsum na ni 'chi 'gyur bar/ /'di la yang ni the tshom med/ /bshang dang gci ba'i dus su ni/ /gal te sbrid pa byung ba

na/ /de yi de ltar dus tshod kyi/ /lo na nges par 'chi ba'o/ /snga dro yi ni nyin lnga dang / /dbus ma'i gung la bcu de bzhin/ /gzhan gyi gung la zla phyed gcig /nam phyed la yang zla ba ste/ /'di tshe'i de ltar dus su ni/ /gal te sbrid byung sngon bzhin te/ /dus kyi

nges par 'chi 'gyur bas/ /'di la the tshom med pa'o/ /ltag pa yi ni bdud khung du/ /gzer na lo ni lnga rnams na/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni/ /shes bya 'di la the tshom med/ /lha mo lce rtse ma mthong na/ /de phyir zhag ni gsum na 'chi/ /nyan pa yi ni rtse mor gzer/ /

'chi ba zla ba bzhi na'o/ /mig g.yon pa yi 'bras bu ni/ /me long la ni ma mthong na/ /de tshe zhag bdun na 'chi bar/ /sngon gyi skye bar bshad pa'o/ /dkar po yi ni tshes gcig la/ /gal te khu ba dkar min 'gyur/ /zla ba drug na de 'chi ste/ /dmar pos nang du nges

par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling ga yongs sbyar ba'i/ /mtha' ru gal te sbrid pa ni/ /byung na zla ba lnga na ni/ /de tshe ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sbyor ba'i dus su dril bu'i sgra/ /rna dag la byung 'chi gsal bar/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur pa/ /zla ba lnga na the tshom med/ /

de bzhin dus ni gcig gi tshe/ /gal te zla ba nyi ma dag /gang gi sems can la gzer ba/ /zla ba gcig tu 'tsho bcas pa'o/ /rkang lag dag gi tshigs bzhi dang / /mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo la/ /gang gi dus gcig la gzer ba/ /nges par zla ba gcig na

'chi/ /bsnun pa gsum gyis gzer ba na/ /gal te nus stobs bdag mnyam pa/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong dag las dpa'/ /sa gsum du ni skye bo rnams/ /mdud pa'i rgyal po lta bu'i tshul/ /dpe des rtag tu bshad pa'o/ /de tshe zla drug na 'chi bar/ /gal te drag

po mnyam kyang 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus dang de bzhin sngon/ /'dir yang mgrin pa'i spyod yul te/ /zla phyed gsum na 'chi bar ni/ /rnam dpyad spyod yul 'di la med/ /slar yang mgo bo'i rtse mor gzer/ /grong khyer gsum gyi rgya mtsho bsreg /'phral du

'chi bar shes bya bar/ /lus kyi gur du bshad pa'o/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar de bzhin gzer/ /'phral du 'chi bar nges par bshad/ /smin ma'i dbus su de bzhin gzer/ /de yi skad cig la 'chi 'gyur/ /sna yi rtse mor rlung grang mor/ /gyur na yongs rdzogs

dus yin no/ /de ltar 'chi ba thams cad ni/ /mche gtsigs go 'phang gis bslu'o/ /gang gi dus su 'di 'gyur ba/ /gzer ni de tshe'i dus 'dir 'gyur/ /gzer ba'i gnas ni gsal mtshon nas/ /rtsa ba bcu yis mnye bar bya/ /khyab 'jug

ces bya'i mar khu ni/ /mgo bor rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /sna nas rnam snang mar khu dang / /mar dang khrag tu yongs ldan pa'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gdung ste/ /skye bo dang bral khyim dron por/ /sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho che gzung bas/ /rnal 'byor ma de yang bsgom bya/ /ya/

gang gi dkyil 'khor chen por ni/ /ma/ dbu ma'i mtha' yi mtshan nyid las/ /g.yas su bgrod pa'i dus su ni/ /daM yig tshigs mtshams kun du'o/ /bu ga gzer byed phug nas ni/ /de'i skad cig la dbyug gu dbyug /Ta/ hril hril por ni 'gyur bzhin pa/ /Sha/ snying

ga'i rdzing bu la sogs pa/ /shes bya mtshams kun du yang ste/ /gzer ba'i 'chi ba slu ba la/ /i/ dbang po yis ni thams cad la'ang / /yid ni de bzhin nges par gnas/ /Sh+Ti yi yi ge zhes bya ba/ /de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs/ /der ni ting

'dzin zhes bya ba/ /dbang po sbyangs pas thob par gyis/ /pad snal skud pas nor bu dang / /spyi gtsug kyang ni gcig tu bya/ /rnam shes brgyad po der gnas par/ /bsgom bya myos byed 'bab pa mo/ /kun du skud pa de btang bas/ /gshin rje'i mche ba 'joms pa mo/ /

de yis nI yi yig bshad do/ /gzer ba thams cad rnam 'joms ma'o/ /kha dog dmar dang sngo ba ste/ /'chi ba 'joms ma byang chub 'gro/ /de yi mtshon char 'gyur ba ni/ /dum skyes rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag

nyid mchog /oM ba byA dzra g+h+ra ya dzi ma na daM a Sh+TI m+ba NI ra ya d+ha ke rA hU~M ya hU~M hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha pha Ta Ta phaT swA swA hA hA oM/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du'ang / /skud pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /tha skar zla ba de bzhin du/ /srang dang khyu mchog rA si'i'o/ /'dis

ni byed bzhin pa yis ni/ /'chi ba slu ba dge ba'o/ /gzhan ni de la de ltar bya/ /pho nya ma ni gsal bar brjod/ /gzhan gyi 'chi ba blu ba yang / /brgya phrag 'bum rnams shes par bya/ /'on kyang kun stong gnas byas nas/ /bla mchog mnyes par byas pas so/ /dpa'

bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab

tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa 'chi ba bslu ba la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas 'joms ma'i 'jug pa ni/ /gang gis pha rol 'gro bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus byas nas/ /gzhi las 'dri bar byed pa ste/ /'jug pa zhes bya ci ru

bshad/ /khyab bdag pha rol ming ni ci/ /shin tu ngo mtshar ston pas gsungs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin mdzod/ /nyon cig sgyu ma'i 'jug pa yang / /mi bden pa ni bden btags te/ /lha mo dbang po'i dra ba ltar/ /'joms ma yi yang 'jug pa ste/ /mthong

ba na yang de la med/ /chu yi zla ba lta bu mchog /rang gi rang bzhin la 'jug 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dzin rnams kyi'o/ /dus kyi 'chi ba'i dngos po yang / /las kyis su ni blu ba ste/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol 'gro/ /'chi med blu ba yang ni med/ /ston gyi nam

nyin mnyam dus su/ /sna yi nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rlung ni rnam par 'dzin bzhin pas/ /'chi ba'i dus ni blu ba'o/ /brgya phrag drug dang nyi shu gcig /stong phrag rnams kyi srog rnams ni/ /a ba d+hU tIr rab zhugs pa/ /de ni 'joms mar mngon brjod pa'o/ /

byis pa'i mkhas pa rmongs pa yis/ /blu ba bshad pa de ma yin/ /de min blu ba rab bshad pa/ /'di ni bdag gi rang mtshan nyid/ /slar yang lha mo des gsungs pa/ /ya sogs de ltar don bstan pas/ /gang gang ting 'dzin dmigs nas ni/ /nam mkha' mnyam

sogs 'dus pa'i mtha'/ /rgyud ni de bzhin srog chen po/ /rdo rje lta bur yang ni bshad/ /dal gyis dal gyis 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshigs rnams kun du thim pa'o/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gis ni/ /byang chub 'chi ba'i spyod yul min/ /rdo rje'i

sar ni 'khrid par grags/ /go 'phang chen po 'dzin mchog go/ /de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags pas/ /mi rnams kyi ni mi dge 'dzad/ /nor chen go 'phang thob pa ni/ /yang dag spong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /srog ni yang dag rgyu byas nas/ /dus kun du ni nye bar bya/ /rtag tu

'chi ltas 'chi ba slu/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhan cig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dang mjal ba/ /bsod nams dbang gis brgya lam 'thob/ /de rnams dang byas dga' chen po/ /myangs pas 'chi ba bslu ba yin/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /mchod pa rnal

'byor pa yis bya/ /rdo rje 'chang chen go 'phang ni/ /de rnams mnyes pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smod byed pa/ /de yi dngos grub mchog med do/ /de rnams la ni smad pa las/ /mnar med dmyal ba chen por 'gyur/ /de yi bsod nams byas pa ci/ /

smyung bar gnas pa'am dka' thub ci/ /rnal 'byor ma la rtag gus pa/ /skad cig yud tsam sogs kyis so/ /lha mo kha dog gnyis ma ste/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das gzugs can/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams dbus su ni/ /bsgom bya mtshan ma lA ma bzhin/ /sngags kyi

yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor mas/ /bskyed bya thabs dang bcas pa ste/ /lhan skyes sbyor bas rdo rje 'dzin/ /oM ba ma dzra hA ya d+hU ma mrA man+d+ha tha kA nI ra ye ba hU~M pu hU~M ShA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ de ltar yungs kar tsam gyi ni/ /thig le'i

dbus ma bsgom par bya/ /snying ga la sogs 'khor lo ru/ /gang du yid ni yongs sbyor gyis/ /bu mo rus sbal zla ba yang / /khrums can nye ba'i gling ma'o/ /sems can don byed de nyid du/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs byed ma/ /phag mo'i sprul pa'i bdag nyid du/ /

skyes pa srid pa 'joms byed ma'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ches/ /lha rnams thams cad bzhugs pa dang / /'khor lo sgyur chen ngo bo las/ /thams cad kun ni sprul pa dang / /sangs rgyas nyid bdag 'du shes kyis/ /de'i bdag nyid du sdud par 'gyur/ /

bsdu de de ltar yod min pa/ /'byin pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'di kun sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma med cing stong nyid med/ /ngo bo kun du sbyor ba tsam/ /sangs rgyas nyid sogs 'du bcas pa'o/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan sogs dngos nyid/ /rang gi rang bzhin mtshan nyid

do/ /rnam gzhag tsam du gsungs pa ni/ /dngos po ma 'khrul ngo bo nyid/ /rnam par rtog pas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa med par gyur pa na/ /brtag pa nyid du mi bya'o/ /rtog dang rtog med las grol 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyis bas bstan/ /

gang zhig gang dngos skad cig mthong / /de mthong ri bong rwa bzhin no/ /'di yis 'gog pa med par ni/ /skye ba la sogs yongs rtogs bya/ /sna tshogs lung dang rgyud rnams la'ang / /rigs pa can 'dir rnam par dpyod/ /rnam dpyad gyur pas rigs pa ni/ /de rigs

bdag gi che ba'o/ /sems ni de yi gzhi rtogs par/ /rna ba'i drung du brjod pa'o/ /slob ma'i phyir dang bla ma la/ /gus phyir 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /deng sang skye bo tshe thung la/ /rigs pa gzhan bdag la yod min/ /g.yo can rtsod pa'i dus su ni/ /blo chung bsod

nams shin tu chung / /de phyir bsod nams ldan rnams kyi/ /ye shes sangs rgyas spyod yul min/ /yun ring dus nas snying rje ni/ /bsten 'gyur rtog pa ma byed cig /bsod nams grangs med ma byas par/ /slar yang ye shes smra ba ci/ /byang chub sems ci sangs

rgyas ci/ /'di la khyad par yod mi 'gyur/ /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas dang / /de dngos byang chub sems dpa' rang / /dbang po rnams ni byang chub sems dpar bskyed/ /yul rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid du gyis/ /phung po dang ni sangs rgyas lhan cig

zung / /khams rnams rdo rje 'dzin par gzung bar byos/ /srid par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ngo bor zung / /snying rje yi ni sbyor bas khyod bzhugs shig /gang dang gang gis gzhan gyi dgos pa gyis/ /

brjod med kun la'ang nan tan byos/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi/ /'joms ma 'dus pa thams cad dang / /bgegs sogs 'byung po 'dus pa ma/ /'jig rten sdang ba thams cad dang / /sogs dang dmyal ba'ang rung / /gshin rje la

sogs khro ba 'dir/ /sngon gyi bag chags 'joms ma'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor

ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje 'joms ma 'jug pa skyed pa dang dus su 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas 'di las gsang chen bshad/ /yang dag ting 'dzin

mtshan nyid do/ /dpal he ru kar gnas gang gis/ /gus bcas las gzhan la yod min/ /'jigs pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar/ /bstan pa sprul pa'i sku gsal ba'o/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sogs 'dir/ /thams cad bsdus pa byas par

'gyur/ /thog mar gnas ni kun bsgrub bya/ /skye bo med dang ri sogs dang / /dur khrod du bya de ru ni/ /gtor ma zhing skyong rnams la'o/ /rnal 'byor kha yi gtsang sbra sogs/ /sngon song mchod yon la sogs 'bul/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi skur dmigs nas/ /ras

bris sogs bsgom bshad ldan par/ /gdan can drag chen po/ /bsgom pa 'gro ba'i don dang ldan/ /kun nas kun du skad cig gis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs par bya/ /shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /'di dag

kun rdzob gzugs dang ni/ /'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can gang / /e ba~M la sogs gnyis med pa'ang / /shrI zhes bya ba'i yig nges brjod/ /he yig snying ga nas kun tu/ /he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro/ /bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las/ /'dzin pa la

sogs rnam bskyed 'gyur/ /de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/ /rgyu'i bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid/ /de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas/ /bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni/ /ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/ /de

ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o/ /slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang / /gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa/ /de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod/ /dngos po mngon sum stong pa min/ /dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpal he ru ka gnas lha

mo/ /snga nas bsgom pa kun 'gro ba'o/ /snying la pad+ma nyi dbus su/ /ye shes sa bon rang byung las/ /'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar spro bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs nas/ /nam mkha'i khongs

kyi dbus su ni/ /'gro ba'i bdag po bzhag byas la/ /zla nyi shar bdag nyid skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi sogs kyis mchod byas nas/ /sdig pa bshags sogs byas nas ni/ /snying rje la sogs rjes dran bya/ /stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dag pa rnam

bsgom bya/ /sa bon lnga yi rang bzhin las/ /khang pa brtsegs pa rnam sprul bya/ /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang ba phyis/ /ri rab pad+ma'i steng du gsal/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid/ /byis pa'i rgyan

gyis brgyan pa'o/ /dkar dang ljang gu dmar ba dang / /ser po g.yon nas bskor bas so/ /zhal gyi ral pa'i cod pan la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ /'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu

glang chen gyi/ /pags pa cang te'u gri gug dang / /dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/ /kha T+wAM ga snod zhags pa dang / /mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas par ro/ /'dam skyes kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang / /'khor lo'ang bcu

gnyis bdag nyid can/ /sgo ni bcu drug bdag nyid dang / /nyams dga' dur khrod so gnyis na'o/ /gri gug rin chen rdo rje dang / /pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang / /mgo bo keng rus 'di rnams dang / /zhags pa'am lcags kyur shes bya

ste/ /'khor lo 'khor lor phreng ba'o/ /re rer rtsibs ni sum cu drug /rdo rje pad+ma nyi ma can/ /rgyu yi rdo rje yongs gyur pa/ /lnga brgya bzhi yis lhag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'o/ /rtag tu glu ma'i sgra yis so/ /mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba

mgron 'bod na/ /khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid du zhugs/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ /gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub/ /'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin

du 'gyur/ /bdag gi pad+ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun bder 'gyur bar byos/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag la rol cig rol/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa 'thob/ /sems can 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas/ /ji ltar khyod kyi

stong pa don med 'gyur/ /khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ /ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs/ /bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod/ /de ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnams mthun bzhud/ /glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis/ /rang nyid he ru

ka rab sad/ /oM AHkA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra hU~M phaT hoH/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa na/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /skad cig sngags las byung bdag nyid/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo dang / /lte ba nyi ma

che mchog la/ /gar du mdzad pa yi ni sku/ /gnag dang ljang gu phyed phyed do/ /bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni/ /zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa/ /dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas

dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni/ /ser ba dang ni ljang gu grags/ /nub ni dmar po de bzhin te/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed/ /rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya/ /glang chen pags

pas phyag gnyis kyis/ /skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung dang / /rtse gsum ji lta'i rim pas g.yas/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang / /dbyug to dang ni mtshon rtse

gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyi gu dang / /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang du b+hu sa nya rgya/ /

mgo med 'bar ba'i mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon pa dril bu phub mche/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang

dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho kaM rnga dang pags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /ro sreg skul pa'i shing bu dang / /'phongs dang phub mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin du/ /mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa yi ni phur bu dang / /sa bon

gang ba sog le dang / /khab dang slud bshus pags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /phyag gi mtshon cha bdun cu gnyis/ /de lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /mgo bo lnga yis rgyan du byas/ /phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas bklubs/ /de bzhin mgo brgya'i

phreng ba dang / /dpung rgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang / /sku la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan/ /de yi mdun du lha mo che/ /rdo rje phag mo sngar dang mtshungs/ /shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan/ /sku yi tshigs skabs kun la'o/ /sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas/ /

rnam par 'phro bcas rnam bsgom bya/ /dbu rnams kun la dar dpyangs kyi/ /phreng ba brtul zhugs can gyis bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar shar sogs kyi/ /bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug drug go/ /shar

la sogs nas byang gi mthar/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug de bzhin/ /dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar/ /slar yang lA ma la sogs drug /nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar/ /dum skyes ma la sogs pa'i rigs/ /dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar/ /de nas gzugs

can ma sogs drug /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid/ /'o byed ma dang gzhan sgyur ma/ /byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ /phyed nag phyed sngon can rnams so/ /lA ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /bzang mo thod pa can nag mo/ /rgyal mo skor ma phyed ljang

gu/ /gang phyir phyed dmar rim pas so/ /dum skyes ma dang dur khrod ma/ /rnam par zhu ma ku ru ku la ma/ /ngu ma gar mar grags ma rnams/ /phyed dmar ba la phyed ser mo/ /gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug pud ma/ /thor tshugs ral pa can drag mo/ /

lha mo phyed ser phyed nag ma'o/ /phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du/ /thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma/ /g.yon skor du ni shes bya ste/ /ri

rab steng gi char skyes ma'o/ /de'i rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ /sngo nag pa yi dbus su ni/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /rab gtum mo dang gtum mig ma/ /'od ldan ma dang sna chen mo/ /dpa' blo mo dang mi'u thung ma/ /

lang ka'i bdag mo shing grib ma/ /sa srungs ma dang de bzhin 'dir/ /'jigs byed chen mo ru ni dran/ /rlung shugs ma dang chang za mo/ /sngo sangs lha mo rab bzang ma/ /rta rna ma dang bya gdong ma/ /'khor lo'i shugs ma dum skyes ma/ /chang 'tshong 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ /

shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma/ /'khor los sgyur ma brtson chen mo/ /gshin rje ma skyes gshin rje ma/ /de bzhin g.yo byed skrag byed ma/ /gtum mo dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /'dod 'grub ma dang 'bar chen mo/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /phyag bzhi ma

la zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /gdan can drag chen mo/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /

sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang / /de bzhin shes rab thabs ldan pa'o/ /de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni/ /de yang gnas su nges par brjod/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o/ /slar yang gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /de ltar sa yi dbus su yang / /sa

bcu gnyis su 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar thams cad du shes bya/ /khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad de/ /sum cu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams/ /gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin/ /de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin can/ /khor yug

tu ni sems can rnams/ /rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so/ /de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /yul dang yul rim pas phye'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /slar yang snying po'i 'khor lo 'di/ /dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin/ /

'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma/ /rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang / /pad+ma gar ma don yod ma/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro/ /reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /sa snying ma

dang mkha' snying mo/ /phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma/ /sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo/ /rin chen sgron me bdag med ma/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /gshin mthar byed ma shes mtha' ma/ /pad mtha' ma bgegs mthar byed ma/ /mi g.yo

ma dang dbyug sngon ma/ /'dod rgyal ma dang stobs chen mo/ /gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te/ /zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang

bsam par bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang / /gzugs kyi khams dang dri med dang / /gling dang po ru 'dod pa yin/ /'dren par rnam par shes bya dang / /chung ngu'i he ru kar 'dod dang / /gsum par pad+ma'i he ru ka/ /bzhi pa nam mkha' par 'dod dang / /lnga

par 'thor rlung he ru ka/ /drug par sa yi he ru ka/ /bdun par 'bar ba'i he ru ka/ /brgyad par gsher ba'i he ru ka/ /dgu par ye shes he ru ka/ /bcu par thugs kyi he ru ka/ /bcu gcig gsung gi he ru ka/ /bcu gnyis par ni sku yir 'dod/ /bcu gnyis de rnams

rdo rje che/ /he ru ka ste rgyud gzhan med/ /'khor lo gsum sdom he ru ka/ /de rnams dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba/ /sku mdog rang rang 'khor lo las/ /blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de rgyab yon tan

kun/ /zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar ba/ /rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa/ /pho nya ma mchog sum cu drug /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mo/ /dmangs mo gtum mo khyi 'tshong ma/ /g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can/ /nya pa mo dang smyig dkar ma/ /dung mkhan mo

dang tha ga mo/ /khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma/ /phreng ma kha ma tshos ma dang / /srin bal byed ma pho nya mo/ /bshang 'phyag ma dang rtsi mkhan ma/ /chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer pa mo/ /rgyal pos bkrabs ma shan pa mo/ /so rtsi 'tshong bar byed ma dang / /gser mgar mo

dang lcags mgar mo/ /nor bu brgyud ma nags pa mo/ /kla klo o Di tshong pa mo/ /rdo bzo ma dang zhing las ma/ /ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma/ /'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /lhag ma thams cad snying po yi/ /'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya/ /'dir ni

zhing du shes bya ste/ /'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang / /gnyis pa'i gling zhes bya bar bshad/ /rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'od byed pa yi sa de bzhin/ /bla ma rang nyid mchod par bya/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /thog mar phyag 'tshal

rab tu grags/ /hU~M hU~M phaT kyi yi ge mthar/ /de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya/ /de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin/ /ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo/ /sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes/ /shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang / /mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa

gdong ma/ /byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /nub tu khyi gdong can ma dang / /lho ru phag gi gdong can te/ /kha dog lA ma sogs 'dra mchog /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /mche gtsigs

'joms ma rim ji bzhin/ /kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya/ /zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru/ /gnag dang sngo dang ljang dang dmar/ /ser po yi ni mdog tu bya/ /lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin

du/ /gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis par ri mo gsum/ /gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi/ /bzhi pa ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /dur khrod kun nas rim pas te/ /phyi rol la

sogs sa gzhi ni/ /zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod/ /'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /grwa bzhi pa la kun du 'bar/ /de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi/ /dur khrod rnams ni bshad bya ste/ /gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du/ /'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can/ /

'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi/ /phyogs su g.yon skor yongs su gnas/ /aT+Ta T+Tar rgod dbang ldan du/ /dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te/ /mun pa drag po bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs/ /dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /

ro langs 'byung po ce spyang sgra/ /rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad po rnams su yang / /shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste/ /shir shing khyab nas ka~M ka li/ /tsu ta'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /de bzhin ka rany+dza ka nyid/ /la tA par ka Ti dang pi tha ba/ /dbang

po nor sbyin de bzhin du/ /klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag /dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po/ /nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo / /sgrogs pa

dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang / /drag po 'khyil pa mthug de bzhin/ /gang ba char 'bebs gtum po ste/ /'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po'o/ /'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin/ /thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya/ /phyi dang nang du 'dod

pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o// //de nas phyi rol nam mkha' yi/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs/ /sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang / /mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams/ /mi'am ci mo dri za mo/ /

hu Tu ka ma bA Ta ba ma de bzhin du/ /pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang / /rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag ga ri/ /cha lang ma dang shA+e len dri ki ma/ /glu ma ka ra Da dang ta ma DA mchog dang / /gar ma sgeg mo Taka ka ma dang ni/ /tA li sha ra Na mo rnga chen ma/ /mau dri rgyud

can ma dang ma ru ma/ /na la ba mo de bzhin D+ham ba ki/ /Dam ru ma dang Dun DU ki de bzhin/ /zangs dung ma dang rwa dung ma de bzhin/ /b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma/ /g.yer kha ma dang de bzhin Da ko lika ma dang / /dung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin/ /

'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug mo/ /kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo/ /gling ni gsum pa mo mchog go/ /mkha' la spyod ma'i rigs su byon/ /gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas/ /sa ni 'od 'phro can

de dang / /rang rang gnas sogs zhing ma'o/ /yang na Dam ru kha T+wAM ga /'dir ni slar yang spangs nas su/ /rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la/ /rang gi bdag pos bya ba'o/ /'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /

rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o/ /ji ltar rgyan la sogs mang po/ /lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun du spyan gsum dang / /phyogs kyi gos 'chang rjes 'gro ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// //de nas phyi rol rlung

'khor lo/ /sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /rdo rje'i rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /nam mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming / /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /mkha' lding ngang mo bkra ba mo/ /bya rog bya gar sreg pa mo/ /rma bya zangs kyi

gtsug pud ma/ /gu da bu li 'jam pa mo/ /phug ron bya rog chen mo dang / /ga Di ni dang gong ma sreg /ne tso sngags ma bzhad mo dang / /bya rgod 'ug ma mchil pa mo/ /shing bye'u mo dang ngur pa ma/ /bri k+Sha ra NI kak+ka pa'i/ /so bya mo dang byi la mo/ /lcug ma'i mgrin

dang sA ri mo/ /khra mo gur gum lce can ma/ /bA Ti rI kA ka~M dzaM g+ha mo/ /hor mo kaM ka mo de bzhin/ /dat+na ri mo dgra/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo/ /'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog /yang na rang rang las shes bya/ /phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang

mtshungs/ /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'dun sa la ni gnas ma mchog /sbyong dka'i sar ni shes bya ste/ /gling ni bzhi pa mar 'dod do/ /'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang / /yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum pa yi/ /

'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can/ /bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod/ /zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya/ /'khor lo sa yi ming can mchog /kha dog

ser po'i rang bzhin la/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug /sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /seng mo stag mo b+him+b+ha ri bong ma/ /glang chen byi la mo/ /ba dang ma he mo rta mo/ /ce spyang mo dang se mo 'bri/ /byi ba bong mo b+hi

Di ma/ /ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin/ /khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang / /Da na Da ri mo mau dz+nyA ka/ /dred mo dang ni sgeg mo dang / /nags ma dang ni khyi chen mo/ /bya rog chen mo kha sgo ma/ /sbrul mo spra mo rnga mo dang / /sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo/ /grong na gnas pa ma mchog go/ /de

ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin ma/ /yang na rang rang kha dog go/ /lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun sar gnas pa mo/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang / /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /lnga pa'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /lus

ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs/ /gdong pa rang gi dngos por 'dod/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba/ /tshangs ma dbang phyug chen po ma/ /gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin/ /phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang / /dpal chen mo ni grwa rnams su/ /sgo ru

gzugs dang mtshan ma ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags/ /grwa ru brtan ma la sogs bzhir/ /shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste/ /me yi 'khor lo'i

dbus su ni/ /gsod dang kun du skrag byed dang / /'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed dang / /drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du/ /g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod/ /skrod byed dang ni sdang byed dang / /lkugs byed dang ni rengs byed slar/ /dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o/ /shing ni

rim pas sbyin bya ste/ /go yu star ga nA li ra/ /se 'bru bil ba'i shing de nas/ /skyu ru bi dz+nyA rak+sha'i shing / /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod/ /dbang po gshin rje ma chu mo/ /gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma/ /srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste/ /'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par

bya/ /klu mo srin mo thams cad ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa kun du sbyin/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin/ /las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can/ /der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa sa'i dkyil

'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o// //de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir/ /me yi 'khor lo bdag gis bshad/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar chen mo/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la/ /rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba/ /lha sogs rigs las byung

ma ste/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /'byung mo ngo bo tsam po'o/ /de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci/ /lha yi rigs byung bshad par bya/ /ma dang chung ma sring mo dang / /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /pha yi sring mo de dang ni/ /zhang po yi ni chung ma dang / /chung ma'i spun zla ma

dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma/ /chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang / /ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang / /ma yi spun zla'i bu mo dang / /rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang / /spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo/ /pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang / /khu bo yi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang / /slar

yang chung ma'i spun zla dang / /rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang / /de nyid kyi ni rang rigs skyes/ /spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang / /bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i khyo yi ma yi ni/ /bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang / /bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad/ /pho nya sum cu drug rnams so/ /

kha dog dmar por yang dag grags/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngar dang mtshungs/ /sa ni ring du song nyid dang / /drug pa'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste/ /shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can/ /nus pa'i 'khor lor 'di rtag tu/ /shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes

ma'o/ /kun du rdo rje'i phreng la sogs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/ /'dir ni mchod pa byed pa yin/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad/ /kun du son par dbul bar bya/ /btung ba rnam pa

sna tshogs dbul/ /bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin/ /rang rang stan las langs nas ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi/ /mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o/ /zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'phar ma'i me'i 'khor lo dang

po'o// //de nas de yi phyi rol bshad/ /chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom/ /ma ka ra mo rus sbal nya/ /sbal mo rus sbal chu sram mo/ /sdig nag gag+gar ma shrI li ma/ /chu yi phug ma srin bu'i

gdong ma dang / /cha ga pa mo ka ka ru mo su sa mo/ /chu byi mo dang grog mo'i gdong ma dang / /chu yi mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang / /glang chen mo dang stag mo ce spyang mo/ /chu sbrul mo dang dung mo 'gron bu ma/ /nya phyis ma dang nor bu dzing gu ra ma dang / /li sa mo dang dud du ra ma kar+N+Na TA/ /

pha Taka mo dA ba ka ma kri ma mo/ /dzu Sha dzu ShI ma dang sha sbrang ma ka lA ma/ /lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so/ /de ltar kha dog rang bzhin ni/ /dkar mo'am rang rang rigs skyes pa mo/ /gdong ni rang rang gzugs kyis te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no/ /nye ba'i 'du ba nyid

dang ni/ /sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go/ /bdun pa'i gling du gnas par ni/ /shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhin no/ /yang na gang ba'i ri sogs kyi/ /mi rnams sum cu drug lha'o/ /gnas sogs rim pas de rnams su/ /mi mo dngos su yang dag bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di de

yis ni/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ /ba tsha zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni/ /de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams/ /drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las/ /skyes pa'am mngal nas skyes par bsam/ /'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes/ /me yi 'khor lo mngal skyes

so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid rang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog /lha min

mo yi rigs rim pas/ /til mchog ma dang phul du bde/ /lha yi bu mo dga' chen ma/ /dga' dang dgar grags pad+ma can/ /dung can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ /gzugs chen ma dang gzugs mdzes ma/ /'od chags rnam sgeg bde ba mo/ /me tog 'dod ma

ut+pal dkar/ /ut+pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang / /'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che/ /rol grags ma dang rol chen ma/ /myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma/ /'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen ma/ /bde las byung dang bde ldan ma/ /mthun mchog mo dang byams pa mo/ /

skal bzang ldan ma skal bzang mo/ /dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo/ /skye gzugs mar ni grags pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo mchog /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shes/ /legs

pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin/ /dur khrod rin po cher snang ba/ /rang 'byung bde ba byed pa po/ /de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ /kun nas ri mo bzhi can no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /rnal

'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za phod ma yang rnam par dgod/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /sbos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin/ /gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste/ /rim pas sngon bzhin rtag shes bya/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni/ /chu

yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /byis pa 'chi dang lhag ma za/ /g.yul drag mo dang mche ba kun/ /shar la sogs par g.yon skor du/ /de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam/ /du ba mun nag dang ni me/ /hA hA'i sgra dang sgra chen no/ /shing ni tsan+dan ga pur dang / /dzA ti pha la dang

e la/ /nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang / /kun du ru dang lha'i shing ngo / /phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba/ /nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu/ /ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid/ /ngan spong nyi ma'i bu de bzhin/ /lha min mgo bor shes bya ste/ /drag po'i gdong

rnams su bya'o/ /'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang / /mdung ring spu gri brag de bzhin/ /glog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs par/ /dur khrod kyi ni dbus su bya/ /ral gri mig sman ri lu dang / /rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang / /mchil lham dngul chu sa 'og gi/ /

dngos grub sgrub pa mkhas pas bya/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /thugs kyi 'khor 'di gsal ba'o/ /mdog nag sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs/ /

thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog /klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo/ /dmyal mo mnar med ma/ /ltung ba mo dang bar med ma/ /bum mo gshin rje mo de bzhin/ /thig nag ma dang me mdag mo/ /tsha ba mo dang rab tsha ma/ /ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che/ /
