byang du dga' ba'i mchog ma dang / /nub tu shin tu rtse ma dang / /lho ru rol pa'i rdo rje ma/ /snying rje la sogs grwa bzhir ro/ /oM badzra sa twa gu ru pA de b+h+yaH/ sarba sa two pa kA ra NA ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang ming ni/ /brjod bya thog swA hA mtha'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor

las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang slob dpon mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u

nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa ni/ /sgrol byed rab gnas bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud rgyal du/ /nye bar mkho ba thams cad rnams/ /slob dpon gyis ni rtag gzung bya/ /bya bar 'os pa gzhan de bzhin/ /'jig rten smod pa

bsrung phyir yin/ /slar yang rang bzhin las skyes pa/ /rab gnas sgyu ma yis gzung bya/ /lugs ma 'am ni thang ga 'am/ /rang gis gzugs ni phyi rol spro/ /gang gi dus nyid la 'byung ba/ /gang gang lha ni lhag gnas pa'i/ /de yi gzugs ni de'i dus kyi'o/ /bde ba'i bdag

nyid spros pa ste/ /sa bon gang gi dang po'i yig /'char ba dbugs rgyu ba'i bdag nyid/ /rlung dang rnam shes 'dus las so/ /de tshe dus su gang gi gzugs/ /phun sum tshogs kun byed pa yin/ /gnyis med ye shes bral min la/ /lugs ma rab tu gnas

pa med/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las/ /'khor ba pa yi rab gnas bya/ /thar bde mngon par 'dod rnams kyi/ /'di la bde ba'i bde ba che/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dgar gnas la/ /de las byung bar bya ba yin/ /lugs ma'am ni thang sku la 'am/ /yang dag rig pas

ro rnams byug /bdud rtsi lnga yis rdzas rnams la/ /bsreg par gyur pas khrus bya'o/ /blo dang ldan pas bum pa gzhag /lha ni dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas/ /dam chos la sogs thams cad rnams/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ste/ /bzhugs pa gang gi

gnas rnams su/ /dus thams cad du rab gnas pa'o/ /e yi yi ge'i gnas bsgrubs nas/ /ba~M yig rdo rje sems dpa' can/ /ma yig rab tu gnas pa der/ /bzhi pa thog ma med yAr grags/ /thos pa gcig pa sngags kyi don/ /brda yi yi ge'i sngags

can no/ /dus su bcom ldan 'das rang gis/ /rab bzhugs rab tu mi gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshig /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi tshig rnams kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma'i gtso gzhan gyi min/ /b+ha ga rnams su rgyud

lnga rnams/ /bya ba la sogs bla med mthar/ /bzhugs pa de ltar du ni ci/ /rab tu gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'o/ /sems can bsgral ba byas nas ni/ /rab tu gnas pa rgyud kun du'o/ /gang tshe lhag mos rnal 'byor ma'i/ /rgyud du gnyis med rab tu gnas/ /las dang

las bya gnyis byas nas/ /'on kyang rang gis rig pa can/ /rang gis rig pa'i ye shes che/ /rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid lha/ /rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin las/ /rab gnas de ni rab tu bsngags/ /skye bo rnams la snying brtse bas/ /gzhan yang de bzhin rab smra bya/ /

yang dag ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha yi rnam par dag pa'o/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis phyag rnams ni/ /rgyud dag par ni rnam par brjod/ /phyag bzhi dgod pa la sogs pa/ /bzhi po rnams ni dag par 'dod/ /zhal rnams dag pa'i dngos po ni/ /lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub

bcu drug /bcu bdun pa'i zhal yid du bshad/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das zhabs gnyis/ /thams cad rgyan gyi dag pa ni/ /chos dang chos pa'i skye rnams so/ /lhag ma 'jig rten khams kyi ni/ /rnam dag gsal dang mi gsal ba'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dag pa

yang / /theg pa thams cad don ston pa'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma sogs thams cad/ /'dir ni mngal skyes brjod pa po'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag pa thams cad kyang / /chos bsdus ston pa po yin no/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rnam dag pa/ /'khor los sgyur ba bcu gnyis so/ /

cha shas bcu drug rnams kyi bar/ /dur khrod dag par shes par bya/ /rgyud gang bdag las byung ba de/ /thams cad dag par shes par bya/ /kun mkhyen ye shes can thams cad/ /de yi dag pa mngon brjod pa'o/ /rdzas 'du shes nyid dang ye shes/ /so so'i ye shes

smra rnams kyi/ /ming brjod pa yi dag pa ni/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i skye 'gro kun/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sgyu ma'i ngo / /gsungs pa rang gis rig ye shes/ /gang dang der ni mngon brjod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i grub mtha'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bla ma'i

zhal las kun shes bya/ /man ngag gis ni bgrod bzhin pa/ /so so'i mtshams la bde ba che/ /de tshe'i dus su dag pa gang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul las de dag /de phyir rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang / /bde ba 'dod la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yi ge re rer btags pa las/ /

dngos po'i gzugs kyi de dag 'gyur/ /phag mo'i gsang sngags nyid bshad pa/ /dngos po thams cad de'i dag pa'o/ /dbang po dang yul mi bden par/ /ro mnyam de nyid sbyor rnams kyi/ /chos kyi sku can dag par 'gyur/ /ngag ni longs spyod rdzogs sku can/ /sems ni sprul

pa'i sku yi ste/ /lus ni lhan skyes sku can no/ /dri med la sogs slar yang der/ /bzhi rnams kyi yang dag par 'dod/ /go cha'i sngags kyi dag chen ni/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi spyod pa'o/ /snying po dang ni nye snying du/ /kha sbyor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor

ma'o/ /'byung dang 'byung las byung 'dus pa/ /gtor ma'i sngags kyi dag par 'gyur/ /gnod mdzes sngags kyi dag pa gang / /rnam rtog kun la phur 'debs pa'o/ /sna tshogs las kyi dag pa gang / /de yi dag pa don dam can/ /khams thams cad kyi lha

rnams ni/ /pags dang sha sogs dag par 'gyur/ /'dir ma smras pas ci bya ste/ /bde ba thams cad rnam dag pa'o/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam rnams su/ /gang gang de de'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams cad sangs

rgyas rang bzhin mnos/ /dag pa mchog tu shes bya ste/ /gzhan gyi dag pa mi smra'o/ /dbang phyug la sogs lta bar ni/ /mdor bsdus dag par shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du/ /de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /byang chub lam du gnas

pa gang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po can/ /de yi ma rig mngon skyon gyis/ /dbang phyug la sogs su blta'o/ /de phyir rang gis rig rang bzhin/ /rnam dag 'di ni bshad pa yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i

mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dang de bzhin du rab tu

gnas pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya lhan cig skyes/ /byed rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /mi phyed ma sogs rtsa rnams la'ang / /bzhi yis lhag pa bshad pa yin/ /mi phyed ma dang phra

gzugs ma/ /bzang mo g.yon ma g.yon phyogs ma/ /rus sbal skyes ma sgom pa mo/ /dbang ma skyon ma non ma ma/ /spyi ma dang ni rgyu sbyin ma/ /dngos ma su ma na de bzhin/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /a ba d+hU tI spro ba'i ngag /pra ban dro ma grub ma dang / /rgan mo skye bo kun

mthun ma/ /'dar ba mo dang snying po ma/ /ngang pa sum skor 'dod ma klu/ /gtum mo bdud kyi bu mo dang / /zla ba nyi ma me rA hu/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsa rnams la/ /re re la ni bcu gnyis te/ /thams cad dbye bas phye ba ni/ /slar yang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa'o/ /sor mo gcig ni

bstan bya ste/ /de yi sor mo gnyis bstan bya/ /'og dang steng du mnyam par gnas/ /slar yang mthe bong bstan par bya/ /'di rnams rtsa ni thams cad rnams/ /'og dang steng du mnyam rengs pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'gro bya mchog /sna tshogs rim pas shes par bya/ /de

yi mthe'u chung rab bstan bya/ /de dang yang dag gnas byed pa'o/ /gang gi ming med ston pa na/ /de yi rab tu ston pa ster/ /rdo rje nyi ma he ru ka/ snying ga'i pad+mar ro/ /gang gi sdigs mdzub ston pa na/ gung mo rab tu bstan par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rab sbyor bas/ /bde ba

steng du 'phang bar bya/ /gang gi dpral bar ston pa na/ de yi dar dpyangs rab bstan bya/ /rang gis rig pa'i bde ba der/ /phyag rgya dang bcas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /gang gi 'khor lo ston pa na/ /de yi sa gzhi rab bstan bya/ /gtsug tor dang ni lter 'gro ba/ /lag pa gnyis

kyis rengs par bya/ /gang gi mig ni ston pa dang / /de yi me long rab bstan bya/ /lha rdzas dbang po rnams kyi rgyus/ /'od gsal ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gi lto bar rdeg byed pa/ /de yi lte bar rab bstan bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du/ /rnam shes brgyad

po snang bar 'gyur/ /gang gi nam mkha' ston pa na/ /de yi nyi ma rab bstan bya/ /stong nyid snying rje yang dag par/ /rtsa yi rnal 'byor nyid kyis mthong / /gang gi khro gnyer ston pa na/ /de yi mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /bdag nyid yang dag sbyor rol cing / /rang gis

rjes su myong ba shes/ /gang gi chu bo ston pa na/ de yi rgya mtsho rab bstan bya/ /sa gcig gi ni rab sbyor bas/ /thams cad sar ni rab tu bsngags/ /gang gi pus mo ston pa na/ /de yi rkang pa rab bstan bya/ /bde 'gror 'gro ba'i dus su ni/ /dbang po'i dngos po

de 'gro'o/ /gang gi nu ma ston pa na/ /de yi gdan ni rab bstan bya/ /bde ba longs spyod bdag nyid skyes/ /kun nas srid pa 'dzag bar du'o/ /gang gi dpung pa ston pa na/ /de yi lag pa rab bstan bya/ /'bar ba dbyug pa bzhin snang la/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsreg par bya/ /gang

gi brla ni ston pa na/ /de yi gsang ba rab bstan bya/ /gzhu yi dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog /dbu ma rnams su'ang thim pa'o/ /gang gi lce ni ston pa na/ /de yi rkan ni rab bstan bya/ /gtum mo thams cad rtsa ru ni/ /bsdus nas rnam par gnas pa yin/ /gang gi mchu ni ston

pa na/ /de yi kos ko rab bstan bya/ /thams cad chos nyid brjod med pa/ /dbang po kun gyi dran pa bral/ /gang gi sor mo'i rtse ston pa/ /de yi sen mo rab bstan bya/ /srid pa'i rtse mor bde ba'i gzugs/ /gcod par nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gi skra ni ston pa na/ /

de yi phreng ba rab bstan bya/ /g.yo can sems can gyi ni ste/ /ye shes gzugs can du blta'o/ /gang gi spyi gtsug ston pa na/ /de yi rkang mtheb rab bstan bya/ /nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du srog /dbu mar 'ong ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gi mgrin pa ston pa na/ /de yi skye

ba rab bstan bya/ /spyi blugs bdud rtsi ji lta bar/ /pad+mar skye 'gro thams cad mthong / /gang gis nyi ma ston pa na/ /de yi nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /snying ga las byung 'jig rten kun/ /mchog tu zag med las shes 'gyur/ /gang gi sa ni ston pa na/ /rkang pa'i mthil ni rab bstan

bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i chu yis ni/ /bdud rtsi'i myu gu 'dzag par 'gyur/ /gang gi mur gong ston pa na/ de yi mkhur ba rab bstan bya/ /sems can kun gyi rtsa rnams kyi/ /nus pas nam mkha'i gnas rnams su'o/ /gang gi ling ga ston pa na/ /de yi rlig pa rab bstan bya/ /'gyur med

'gyur bar 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de ni rlig mtshams phyag rgya skyes/ /gang gi spyi blugs ston pa na/ /ri bo de yi rab bstan bya/ /ri las thur du chu bo bzhin/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /bud med gang zhig rna bar reg /rgyab kyi rgyud ni rab bstan bya/ /gang gis lhan skyes rdzogs byang

chub/ /thos pa'i spyod yul du 'thob 'gyur/ /gang gi gos ni ston pa na/ /de yi tshon rtsi rab bstan bya/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du/ /skad cig gis ni bdag med mthong / /gang zhig so yis mchu 'dzin ma/ /so ni krig krig bstan par bya/ /bza' ba thams cad med pa nyid/ /

bag chags stobs kyis rnam par 'phel/ /gang gi lce ni bskyod pa na/ /za ba'i lag pa rab bstan bya/ /bde ba kun gyis tshim pa ni/ /don yod pa las 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi lag pa'i mkhrig ma ston/ /de yi thal gong rab bstan bya/ /srog gi rlung rnams la brdung ba/ /bum

can 'khrul 'khor sogs kyis so/ /gang gi rtsib logs ston pa na/ /de yi mchan khung rab bstan bya/ /nang du lhan cig skyes pa dang / /snying rje la yang rig pa'o/ /gang gi lag pa'i dbus reg pa/ /lag pa'i rgyab ni bstan par bya/ /bdag gis gzhan dang rang gi dus/ /mchog

ma kye he mi shes pa'o/ /gang gi rgod pa ston pa na/ /de yi du ba rab bstan bya/ /mchog tu gnyis med zhugs pa las/ /'dod chags 'dod chags bral ba'ang nyams/ /gang gi gar ni ston pa na/ /de yi glu ni rab bstan bya/ /khams gsum thams cad sgyu ma ru/ /gnyis kyi

dngos po las mthong 'gyur/ /gang gi keng rus ston pa na/ /de yi rtse mo rab bstan bya/ /rtsa gsum po ni 'bar ba yis/ /'chi ba blu bar 'ong ba yin/ /de ltar phyag rgya sum cu drug /phyag rgya'i lan ni de bzhin mchog /spun dang sring mor spyod par ni/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lor shes par

bya/ /rab gtum rigs kyi bdag mor ni/ /gnas kyi gtso mor shes par bya/ /rab tu gsal ba'i mthar gyur gzugs/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji srid gnyis su med spyod yul/ /g.yo ba'i chos kyang shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma tshogs ma lus pa/ /

lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor 'dus/ /rab gtum yi ge shes par bya/ /thams cad bud med sgyu ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya kun gyis 'dun pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rang bzhin du/ /gsungs pa'i de bzhin ma lus pa/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang par 'dod/ /

phyag rgya'i brda ni ma lus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma bskyed mtshan nyid do/ /sngon bshad chung ngu bde mchog gi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ste/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /sngags 'di thams cad rnal 'byor ma'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcu gnyis kyi/ /

dus sbyor chu srin la sogs te/ /rab gtum la sogs nyi shu bzhi/ /dus de rnams su 'byung ba yin/ /skad cig yud tsam la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyi ni 'pho ba gcig /shin tu phra dang rags rnams kyi/ /skye bo rnams kyi dus kyis ni/ /lor 'gyur ba yi

tshad kyis ni/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rtsis/ /kha ra sogs su dus byas nas/ /ldog pa gnyis dag gis ni mtshon/ /gnyis dag bcu yis bsgre byas pa/ /lo yi chu tshod de bzhin no/ /brgyad cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i brgya/ /chu tshod lnga la shes par bya/ /nyi ma

gcig gi tshad kyang ni/ /nam mkha' mig dang lag pa mig /zla ba gcig gi tshad kyang ni/ /mkha' mkha' ro dang dus tshod ro/ /lo gcig gi ni tshad kyang ni/ /mkha' stong mig dang bug de bzhin/ /bug pa dang ni ri bo'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun shes par bya/ /

gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid de/ /rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi ni yang / /rkang pa gnyis gnyis mnyam par ni/ /rnal 'byor ma'i de rkang pa gcig /de rnams las ni lhag gyur gang / /hU~M phaT la sogs spang bar bya/ /oM tri na b+hu maHba shrI Na ba ka~M dzra pa DA ka~M ka pA

ma ba hA NA bI ya ra hU~M bI hU~M rI phaT shwa phaT rA swA ya hA hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA o~M pra tsaN+Di hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni sngags so/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /skra grol 'jigs par mdzad pa mo/ /lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /lhag ma sngon bshad mtshan nyid do/ /lha mo 'di rnams

thams cad ni/ /slar yang rtag tu rgya mtsho mnyam/ /rab mchog bde ba thob pa na/ /dgos pa mang po yang dag rig /ye shes zla ba'i rang bzhin du/ /'di ni 'char dang nub pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i 'od gzugs gang / /'od zer mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma/ /

'od zer zhes bya rab bcings pa'ang / /ye shes 'bab par rab tu nus/ /ri mo'ang nam mkha'i dbus rnams su/ /bgrod bya rang gi ma las skyes/ /de ltar rab gtum ma'i yon tan/ /rab mchog la sogs su mtshon bya/ /dus thams cad du kun spyod pa/ /

sngags las byung ba shes par bya/ /mchog gi dngos grub rgyu yis ni/ /'du ba rnal 'byor mar rab gsungs/ /dngos grub rmi lam du ster ma/ /stes na dus kyis shes par bya/ /las ni gang dang gang 'dra ba/ /de dang de 'dra'i 'bras bu ste/ /rgyu dang 'bras

bu'i 'brel nyid pas/ /rang nyid rnal 'byor pas skye 'gyur/ /rgyu med cing ni 'bras bu med/ /mngon sum mngon sum min de bzhin/ /'di 'dra'i bden pa smra rnams kyi/ /tshad ma'i bstan bcos las shes bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rab tu gtum mo bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo

rnams kyi phyag rgya'i brda yis gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i spyod yul gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gtum mig ma'i phyag rgya/ /rgyud gzhan na med bshad par bya/ /mig gi brdar ni shes bya ste/ /'di thams cad kyang kha

sbyar yin/ /btsums pa dang ni ma btsums pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang g.yas 'gro dang / /gyen du bskyod dang sna rtser dang / /sar lta dngos po'i mig can dang / /khro dang zhum dang mthun bud med/ /bu dang gnyen dang spun rnams dang / /gti mug zhe sdang chags

phrag dog /skyon dang nga rgyal cher rlom dang / /'dod dang snying rje glen pa dang / /sgyu mar lta dang ring du lta/ /'gro dang bsam gtan phyed phyed dang / /thams cad phye dang dga' ba dang / /tshad dang nad dang g.yul ngo dang / /chos dang bcas

par lta ba mchog /gal te sum cu drug lta ba/ /'di nyid rnal 'byor mas ster na/ /de nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtag sbyin pa/ /me long chu dang mchod pa dang / /ral gri mar me mthe bong dang / /nam mkha' pad+ma ku mu da/ /mda'

dang zla ba nyi ma dang / /nor bu mu tig byi ru dang / /bzhu ba'i gser dang dra ba dang / /'bar ba grib ma ras bal dang / /bla ma rta glang sa ra b+ha/ /gar dang skrag dang 'dar ba dang / /'khrig pa rtsod smra nye bar dang / /gtor ma ri mo dkyil 'khor dang / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /

gsad pa dang ni bskrad rnams kyis/ /lta ba ru ni bshad gyur pa/ /brda ni sum cu rtsa drug po/ /ji lta'i rim pas sbyin par bya/ /'di nyid rnal 'byor pa'i 'brel pa/ /de rnams dgos pa bshad par bya/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar son pa'i srog /g.yon par rgyu ba yi ni

mchog /sum cu rtsa drug sems 'bab pa/ /de rnams ngo bor shes par bya/ /mig gi phyag rgya gang 'dra bar/ /de 'dra'i srog ni rgyu bar bya/ /mgo la sogs pa'i tshigs kun du/ /rtsa rnams gnas ni bsgrubs byas nas/ /mi phyed ma sogs steng 'og tu/ /der ni blta ba

chen po bya/ /de ltar bdun cu gnyis shes bya/ /phun sum tshogs kun 'thob par 'gyur/ /gtum mig rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo/ /sdang ba tshar gcod mdzad ma yin/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos su yang / /rnal 'byor ma kun shes 'gyur ba/ /gtum mig rnal 'byor ma

rtag tu/ /brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnyis/ /gtum mo'i rnam par rtog kun la/ /mig gi lta ba za ba yin/ /g.yo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /sems gcig tu ni 'ching ba yin/ /tho co'i sgyu spyod 'jig rten du/ /'joms pa phyag rgya mkha' 'gro

skyes/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam par/ /long med par ni gnyis med byed/ /gnyis med mig ni 'dir de nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni snang ba byed/ /rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /tshul 'di

bsgom par bya ba yin/ /gtum mig ma ni thabs ldan pa/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can/ /de yi tshul ni mngon brjod pas/ /thams cad byang chub rang bzhin can/ /sngags kyi yi ge las skyes pa/ /kun spyod rtsa yi bdag nyid can/ /de yi ji ltar kha dog

gzugs/ /rab gtum rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /oM sha dA~M ta Sh+T+ro sa t+ka ha Ta sra b+hI ne Sha trA Na ya b+hai hU~M ra hU~M bA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA phaT swA hA/ o~M tsan+DA k+ShI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ gang ba'i ri yi gnas su yang / /rab tu gtum mo dus kun skyes/ /zla ba nya la dpral ba

ru/ /ri bo chen por zla ba 'char/ /'bar ba 'dzin par gtum mig ma/ /rA hu yis ni zas su byas/ /tshes gcig tu ni yang dag bshad/ /nyi ma'i rjes 'gror nges bshad pa'o/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma re re'i/ /rang gi zhing du ming rgya che/ /re re yi yang nyi shu bzhi/ /slar yang

gnas dang nye gnas so/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang med/ /yi ge las byung spangs pa yin/ /dus dang dus min ngo bo'i bdag /hU~M phaT yi ges 'dod par gyis/ /yi ge las byung ba'i gzugs kyi/ /he yi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'byung / /spun gyi

spyod par ts+tsham pa gang / /'jug dang ldog par byed pa mo/ /snying ga'i 'khor lor shes bya ste/ /mig gi rang bzhin can snying ga/ /snying gar gnas rang rnal 'byor ma/ /gtum mo lte ba'i steng nas 'bar/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gtum mig ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //

de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ji lta'i cho gas brda'i yig ge'o/ /rnal 'byor 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las/ /shes nas myur du nges par grol/ /DA dA li ka/ nA ma dang naM pi Shi taM/ rA dzi kA/ ba Tab+ba ki pi Ta ka/ DI/ kun tu ru/ ka ra pU ra/ sil+la kaM/

swa yaM b+hu/ ka stu ri kA/ ha hau sa ma/ bol+la/ kak+ko baM/ kA li nya dza raM/ shA li shI raM a pya kaM/ pi trI ba naM byany+dza naM/ mA la tin d+ha naM/ rat+na sam+b+ha baM/ go/ ku/ da/ ha/ na/ bi/ mU/ shu/ ra/ ma/ de ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /de bzhin dpa' bo spun rnams brda/ /rnal

'byor ma de'i dgongs pa ni/ /kha yis rjod pa byed par 'gyur/ /skyes bu/ rnal 'byor ma/ bud med/ chang / sha/ lce/ pa Du ba/ cang te'u/ bud med kyi/ 'khrig pa/ khu ba/ khrag/ sha las skyes/ khrag/ bud med kyi gcin/ bshang ba/ ling ga/ pad+ma/ 'dus

pa'am/ skal ldan/ skyes gnyis kyi sha/ shi ba'i ro/ /rgyal po'i skyes bu/ /dur khrod/ nya'i sha/ bya'i sha/ g.yul ngo'i khrag/ ba lang / khyi/ glang po che/ rta/ mi/ bshang ba/ gci ba/ khu ba/ khrag /rkang mar/ de ltar yang ni brda yi lan/ /sngags pas rtag tu shes par

bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos po shes rnams kyi/ /dus rnams kun tu bskyed pa ni/ /sprul pa sems can sgrol ba po/ /zhing dang zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni zhu ba'i khams/ /sum cu rtsa drug grangs kyang ni/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /nam mkha' dang ni ye shes

khams/ /de'i yang khams ni drug drug 'gyur/ /mngon pa'i gzugs sogs shes mthar ro/ /nges par bshad don smra ba po'i/ /rang bzhin gyi ni brdar shes bya/ /re re'i bar du lha mo ni/ /'od ldan ye shes gzugs can no/ /sum cu rtsa drug khams rnams kyi/ /

'char ba'i dus mtha' mkha' spyod ma/ /ye shes 'od zer de bsgrubs nas/ /bde ba kun gyi gnas la bzhugs/ /gos kyi mtha' nas bzung nas ni/ /gnad dang gnad du rtse bar bya/ /ye shes kun rdzob spangs pa las/ /bsgom pa'ang rnam rtog bdag nyid do/ /rdo rje sa 'og

sbyor bdag nyid/ /rtsa thams cad ni gzhig par bya/ /rnon por sreg pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /mkhas pas 'od ldan yi ge'o/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste/ /au D+yan gnas su de bzhin du'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /lha yi bdag mo mchog bsgom bya/ /

gsang sngags bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs yi ge rnams dbus son/ /sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nyid/ /oM kaM bi kA da la yu mA ta lA dzi b+ha ha ra bA Na ya u hU~M grA hU~M ya phaT hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA phaT swA hA/ oM pra b+hA wa tI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT

swA hA/ kha dog gzugs ni sngon bzhin no/ /rang gi 'od kyis rnal 'byor 'grub/ /oM yig phyi mo 'byung ba'i bdag /srog gi rlung ni bskyod cing bskyod/ /skar ma'i bdag po kun mkhyen rnams/ /dbang po sogs kyi'ang spangs pa yin/ /ya yig dang ni a yig gzugs/ /

rkang pa'i mtha' dang mgo bo can/ /nA da tsam la thams cad brten/ /rang 'byung chos brjod pa yin no/ /de ltar yi ge bzhi rnams ni/ /chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang yin/ /mi ni yid de'i cha'i ye shes/ /de yod pas ni dpyod pa ste/ /'jig rten dbus dang sa la ni/ /rdzu 'phrul

rkang pas spyod lam byed/ /yon tan kun gyi 'khor lor yang / /thar pa'i rgyu yis ster bar 'gyur/ /yon tan kun bdag stong pa nyid/ /'khor bar 'di las thabs gzhan med/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha'

'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'od ldan ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ma

mchog gtso/ /mtshon cha'i brda ni bshad bya ste/ sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'di la dril bu phub mche ba/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti/ /phub chung dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng

dang lcags thag dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /mdung dang rnga dang pags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa dpyangs pa dang / /ro sreg skul ba'i shing dang ni/ /ga ta'i dbyug pa phub dang mgo/ /keng rus dang ni zor ba nyid/ /mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa yi

ni phur bu dang / /sa bon gar dang sog le dang / /khab dang slud bshus pags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /de ltar rnal 'byor mas ster na/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod bya ba/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung ring dang / /rtse gsum dgra sta gri gug mda'/ /gsal shing phub

dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang / /dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu gsum/ /der ni rma bya'i mjug ma dang / /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug thung me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag mgo glo ba dang / /rgyu

ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang skogs dang nya rgya dang / /mgo med mar nag 'bar ba dang / /'jigs byed gzugs can zhes bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i lan du mngon brjod yin/ /rlung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa/ /de'i rigs rnal 'byor ma'i khyim du'o/ /gang dag gang gi

phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /de de rnal 'byor ma yi lus/ /de yi rang bzhin rjes bzung ngam/ /tshar gcod pa yang byed par 'gyur/ /stong pa nyid ni brgyad dang / /khyad par du yang snying rje dang / /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres dang / /de bzhin du ni khams brgyad/ /rnal 'byor ma

yi rgya mtshan nyid/ /skye bo thams cad shes par bya/ /sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bar/ /rang gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin/ /'byung po thams cad kyi ni ma/ /mngon par sna tshogs nor bu bzhin/ /hA yig bskyod pa'i nA da'i bdag /de bzhin kha 'og bltas par 'phyang / /nA dar

gnas pa'i skud pa yang / /bde gzugs gnyis med phreng ba can/ /sgrub thabs man ngag sbyor bdag nyid/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed las sngon byung / /chos dang las dang dam tshig dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin can/ /yi ge bzhi yi rtog pa las/ /phyag rgya bzhi mngon brjod

nyid do/ /gnas ni a ra bu dar zhes bya/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang de bzhin/ /lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lor grags pa yin/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid de yi/ /bdag mo sna chen ma yin no/ /sna yi thog ma tha mar dbugs/ /'jug dang

gnas dang ldang ba can/ /dbus su mtshon bya mtshan nyid bral/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rtse bar 'gyur/ /nu baM la ni dbyangs can 'gro/ /dbus su gang gang 'bab pa mo/ /gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /srog dang thur sel can 'dzin pa'o/ /rnam shes brda ru shes byas

nas/ /mtshon bya de yang gzhom par bya/ /gang du sems ni gtong ba na/ /der ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag bya/ /ye shes ma yi mngal nyid do/ /thams cad du ni rnam par dpyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /'dir ni slar yang bsgom par bya/ /shes rab

thabs kyi rang bzhin ni/ /gsang sngags yi ge rnams las byung / /mdog dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste/ /'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo can/ /oM dza ko bA Ti lA la bak+Sha lI b+hu D+ha dzA la ya ga hU~M nA hU~M ya phaT hU~M phaT hU~M swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM hoHma hA nA se hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes

bya'i gsang sngags las rdzogs pa/ /'dod pa kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor

ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sna chen ma'i mtshan nyid kyi brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas lus kyi ts+tsho ma ni/ /mdzes pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya/ /dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i sbyor bas/ /lha rdzas lus skyes 'thob par 'gyur/ /mgo

dang spyi gtsug dpral ba dang / /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rna ba dang / /rgyab kyi rgyud dang dpung pa gnyis/ /sna dang smin ma mig dang kha/ /rkan dang snying ga lag pa dang / /mchan khung nu ma rtsib logs dang / /lte ba mdoms dang 'phongs ling ga /brla dang pus mo byin rkang pa/ /sor mo mtheb

chen long bu dang / /rkang pa'i mthil du thams cad du/ /rlig pa lag pa glang po'i pags/ /mkhrig ma dpral ba'i ngos dang ni/ /mtshams dang lto bar shes bya ste/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor mas ster na/ /phyag rgya'i lan gyur rnal 'byor pas/ /ji lta'i rim pas sbyin

bya ba/ /gling bu pi wang 'khar rnga dang / /glu dang rdza rnga rol mo dang / /phreng ba sgeg pa gar zangs dung / /spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang / /'bras bu ma chags 'bras dang snod/ /zhabs bsil mchod yon mar me bum/ /gos dang me long gdugs dang ni/ /bla re rnga yab de bzhin du/ /

ba dan me tog phreng ba dang / /rgyal mtshan dang ni dri gtsang khang / /mdung thung phreng ba phreng phyed dang / /slar yang dril chung dra ba dang / /seng ge gdan dang cod pan dang / /rin chen sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /go dA ba ri'i nye gnas gzhug /dad pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin can/ /dpa'

blo ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab tu bshad/ /lhan skyes skad kyis bI zhes bya/ /sum cu drug dngos bdag nyid can/ /phung po khams dang yul dang ni/ /dbang po las dang las can te/ /yul gyi sgra ni de bzhin 'dir/ /kun la drug drug rim ji bzhin/ /de rnams

nang du song ye shes/ /lhan skyes gzhan gyi dngos po min/ /mtshan mo nyin mo'i rab sbyor bas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid do/ /lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye/ /dam tshig chen po 'dus pa ni/ /pad+ma'i lte bar rig par bya/ /de las skyes pa'i

rang phyag rgya/ /yul dang yul du rnam par gzhag /rang rig rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba/ /'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul yin/ /'jig bzhin pa ni chen po nyid/ /bcu gnyis mi rnams nang du son/ /rdo rje'i rlung ni rab zhugs pa'i/ /der ni kun dur rnal 'byor skyes/ /'od zer slong ba'i

bde ba yi/ /'pho med rnams kyis bgrod par byos/ /de ltar go dA ba ri shes byas nas/ /dad pa'i dbang po'i rdo rje can/ /dpa' blo ma yi rang bzhin shes/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo yin/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid rdo rje/ /rang ming gsang sngags ldan par ro/ /sna tshogs

rnam rtog zas can ni/ /lhan skyes brtson 'grus ming gis so/ /oM ka pA la ra pAM shu ta pA d+hU sho mru d+ya u ta gra shU ba lA pu ya ShA hU~M ya hU~M hU~M phaT hU~M phaT phaT swA phaT hA swA hA/ oM bI ra ma tI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ kha dog dang dbyibs sngon gyi ru/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gyi ni bya/ /gang phyir

brtson 'grus yang dag 'pho/ /mngon par brjod pa yang dag 'byung / /nam mkha' lding gi sbyor ldan pas/ /'dir ni the tsom med par byed/ /sngon du bstan pa'i ts+tsho ma ka/ /mchog gi lce ru shes par bya/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni gzhan med de/ /lan gyi lce ni dbang gnyis kyi'o/ /

sna tshogs rgyud dang lung rnams su/ /nga yis khyod la ma bshad do/ /rgyud 'di yi ni rab sbyor ba/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa dang sdang sems dang / /skye bo rmongs gang yul spyod na/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni mi 'thob cing / /nges par dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de

phyir gus pa'i sems bdag gis/ /bya ba gus pas legs rig bya/ /sngon gyi rmongs pa med 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid 'thob yun mi ring / /mos pas rgyun tu gzhol gyur pas/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel ba yin/ /rlung gi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma/ /stobs ldan

dpa' bo'i blo gros ma/ /rdo rje'i rlung dbye rab ldan pas/ /sems chen por ni thim par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya

mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi ming zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu pa'o// //khams thams cad kyi ts+tsho ma ka/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ /gang zhig dri med dngos

po'i brda/ /bshad kyis sgrub mo mnyan par gyis/ /so yis mchu ni yongs bzung nas/ /bde bas bol+la 'jib par byed/ /phyin nas ye shes rab ston pa'i/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /phyi mo'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /bcu po gsum la drug ldan pa'i/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i

lan gyis ni/ /'di las dam tshig dbye bar bya/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga kaM/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya tsaM/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na TaM/ ta tha da d+ha na taM/ pa pha ba b+ha ma paM/ ya ra la wa ha yaM/ /zhes bya rnal 'byor mas ster na/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni slar yang 'di/ /kA khA gA g+hA ngA kaH/ tsA tshA dzA dz+hA

nyA tsaH/ TA ThA DA D+hA NA TaH/ tA thA dA d+hA nA taH/ pA phA bA b+hA mA paH/ yA rA lA wA hA yaH/ de ltar phyag rgya'i khyad shes nas/ /lus can kun gyi sgo glegs yin/ /bu ga gnyis kyi rab sbyor bar/ /thams cad kyang ni yi ge 'dra/ /'og dang steng du 'dus byas nas/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma

gnyis med/ /skad cig bzhi yi bden rnams kyis/ /de nyid dga' ba bzhi de bzhin/ /sde pa bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi/ /e baM ma yA sku rnams ni/ /rgyud 'dir mdo ru bstan pa ste/ /rgyas bshad gzhan du rtogs par bya/ /mi'u thung ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /cho ga sngags pas

shes par bya/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sgo glegs phreng / /mkha' spyod ma ru spyod pa rang / /ngag kyang skad kyi rang bzhin bdag /'gog par nye bar 'gro bar gyis/ /gsang chen sems dang sems byung rnams/ /mtha' ma gsal bar 'thob pa yis/ /rin chen rdo rje las dga'i

gzugs/ /bltas pa'i mtshams su mthong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /bzhi po bzhi yi bdag nyid can/ /rA me shwa ra dang dbang por/ /mchog tu rmad byung shes par bya/ /'dod chags chags bral rnam bsres pa/ /de'i skad cig las byung ba min/ /

'byung ba lnga'i bdag can yin las/ /me ni dbus su bdud rtsi'i gnas/ /dbugs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bde'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bza' bar bya/ /lha dang klu rnams bud med la/ /mkhas pa yis ni rol pa yin/ /de rnams kyis ni dus kun du/ /lus can kun gyi 'pho

ba yang / /sgo dgu'i bdag nyid nam mkha' la/ /de rnams bzhi 'gyur du shes bya/ /de ltar sgo glegs gnas rnams ni/ /rtag tu sum cu rtsa drug 'gyur/ /sgo yi dbye ba mi shes la/ /skyon dang yon tan ji ltar lags/ /'pho ba'i dus tshod kyi ni tshad/ /yang dag rab tu sbyor ba nyon/ /

mdzes pa'i gnas ni lam bzang pos/ /lam ngan gyis ni srid pa'i skyon/ /thig le lte ba steng rnams dang / /mig dang sna dang rna ba dag /bshang ba dang ni gci ba'i sgo/ /sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /lte bas 'dod pa'i mtho ris dang / /thig les gzugs kyi lus can rnams/ /

steng gis steng gi gnas kyi ni/ /'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu grags/ /gnod sbyin dngos po sna las so/ /rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mi gnas ye shes bgrod/ /mi rnams mi bdag sgyur rnams 'gyur/ /srid pa'i sgo yis rnams/ /gci bas dud 'gro de bzhin

no/ /dmyal ba brgyad kyi dngos rnams kyi/ /lus can rnams ni bshang ba las/ /gzhan gyi sgo ni gsum gsum ste/ /mkhas pas rtsa yi kun spyod can/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyang ni/ /smin drug la sogs rgyu skar ro/ /rnam dag ye shes gsum po ni/ /re re'i sgo

ma rnams kyi'o/ /brtson 'grus dbang po'i dngos rnams kyis/ /thams cad nyer spyod mtshan nyid do/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /sngon gyi mdog can bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkar mo sogs sa bon/ /sgo glegs gnas su gzhag par bya/ /shes rab thabs

bdag nyid lha mo/ /sa yi 'khor lo'i sbyor bas so/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams su gyur pa ni/ /oM mA bi tri ka ga Ta Na mu pa kha ri hA pU hA ri ra ta bA ma yan+t+rA hU~M ya hU~M hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha phaT Ta pha swA Ta hA swA hA/ oM kharba rI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung / /don dam sbyor

ba las skyes pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mi'u thung ma'i

yi ge'i brda'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //slar yang mchod pa byas nas ni/ /yang dang yang du zhus pa nyid/ /dngos po ye shes kyis phyag rgya/ /bcom ldan gtso bo ji ltar lags/ /bdag gis mtshan

nyid bshad bya yis/ /yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/ /lhan skyes bde dang stong ba dang / /rang gis rig dang bde ba che/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa dang ni rmad byung che/ /'od gsal sems dang bsam pa dang / /zhi dang myang 'das sbyor skyes

dang / /pha rol phyin dang gnyis med dang / /thar pa dang ni don dam dang / /ye shes rnam shes byang chub dang / /chos dbyings grong khyer de bzhin du/ /pad+ma dang ni chos 'byung dang / /slar yang bdag med mtho ris dang / /zhi dang sgra dang bla ma dang / /rig dang 'khrul med rtog spangs

dang / /bcud len dang ni smra bshad de/ /mkhas pas ts+tsho ma'i rnam grangs so/ /ji ltar de ltar yig dang po/ /thams cad lan gyi ts+tsho ma yin/ /ji ltar yi ge de bzhin don/ /dmyal ba la sdang shes par bya/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i sbyor bar/ /rnal 'byor pa khyod

kyis bya'o/ /'phyang bar gyur pa'i sa bon gyi/ /der ni ts+tsho ma thams cad de/ /ge sar ye shes khams kyi ni/ /rang gi rang bzhin du mtshan nyid/ /rang yod de mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /pad+ma'i snying po ri ni gnas/ /ri ni rnam shes 'gro ba ste/ /yid kyi khams rnams

thams cad du'o/ /lang kar bdag nyid skye ba ste/ /dngos po'i ye shes rnams kyis byung / /dbang phyug 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /ye shes min pa dngos kun skyes/ /de bi ko Ta'i gnas su ste/ /slar yang byang chub dran dbang po/ /gang du ye shes bsam med pa/ /der ni

bstan pas thos par 'gyur/ /'dod chags bral bas gang dag gi/ /bi ni kun 'gro'i ye shes so/ /rlung rnams kyi ni mkha' rnams su/ /dbang po rnams kyi bde de bzhin/ /Ti ni rdo rje'i nus par grags/ /yul rnams kyi ni grong du bgrod/ /dran pa lhan cig skyes ye shes/ /

gang du yid ni rab brjod pa/ /der ni dbang po'i byang chub kyang / /shes nas rdo rje'i tshul bdag nyid/ /de ltar de nyid nges shes nas/ /rang gi rang bzhin du gnas bya/ /chos dang 'jig rten bcas pa spang / /cung zad mig med gzud par bya/ /yang na dngos po kun bdag

nyid/ /yang na thams cad rnam par spang / /dngos dang dngos po can yod min/ /dngos po med pa gsal mthong 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /thams cad mi bden las skyes blta/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin zhal las/ /brgyud pa'i rim pas phrad par

gyis/ /me yi dkyil 'khor du lha mo/ /de phyir de yi rang bzhin lus/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /sngon gyi gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /thams cad thabs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba'o/ /oM hU~M sa hU~M ha kA dza ro su/ ts+tshan+da ra rI Na

pa mul+la khA ba ya ka hU~M rA hU~M ya phaT hU~M phaT hU~M swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM lang+ke shwa rI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar shes byas gsang sngags che/ /dngos grub yang bas byed pa yin/ /las thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ /brgya la na yang gzhan du min/ /dngos grub ri yi ming

can ni/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad sman du'o/ /smin drug dang ni snar mar 'gyur/ /mgo bo dang ni lag de bzhin/ /nab so dang ni rgyal nyid dang / /skag dang mchu dang gzhan pa ni/ /shar gyi gre dang byang gi dbo/ /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dang ni lha mtshams dang / /snron dang

snrubs dang chu stod dang / /chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dang / /gro bzhin mon gru de bzhin du/ /mon gre dang ni khrums stod dang / /khrums smad dang ni nam gru dang / /tha skar de bzhin bra nye dang / /zla ba nyi ma rA hu dang / /sa'i ma nyid dang spen pa rnams/ /rang rang dus nyid shes par bya/ /

the tsom med pas bzung bas so/ /thams cad zla ba'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /nam mkha' la ni mnyam par gnas/ /'chad bzhin pa yi rab sbyor bas/ /sngags pas cho ga shes par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha'

'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'i brda'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang ming gi cho ga'i ye shes

kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //slar yang gzhan pa bshad bya ste/ /dgos dang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma gzas gzung bar/ /rnal

'byor ma yi sngags mtshan nyid/ /po taM gi ni gsang por smra ba ste/ /pra ti po taM gi ni lan yin no/ /ga mu 'gro ba'o lum pa ni/ /'ong ngo zhes ni bya ba nyid/ /de hi grong khyer ro tsa Tu kaM zhes bya/ /zung shig pa'o hrI da ya ni dpa' bo yin/ /kau ra ba ni song cig pa nyid de/ /kar+N+Ni

ka ni dril bu'o a li byed pa'o/ /shi ra 'khyil pa'i skra yin te/ /sra ba rna ba'o gzhan pa ni/ /man tha na ni bdud rtsi ste/ /na ra phrad pa'o tA li ka yang ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma'o na ra kaM dkyil 'khor/ /a mu kaM ni dur khrod te/ /kA khi la sgo'o swa sa naM/ /bram ze'o ba ri rgyal

po'i rigs/ /bir ti rje'u rigs kru ra ni/ /dmangs so an ta gdol pa can/ /A li ka phyugs DA ki ni/ /sring mo'o mu da ka tshil/ /lce yis so reg de bzhin du/ /zas kyis ltogs par rig par bya/ /tre sna dri yis bsgos pa ste/ /A ga ma na zhes bya gnas gang nas/ /

che ge mo'o ki ra Na me tog go/ /lam pa lto ba dan ta rgod pa ste/ /ni ro d+he char ro bi dz+nya pa ti tshim pa'o/ /d+hu mra zhes bya sprin de bzhin/ /d+hu mra pri ya ri bo ste/ /sA nu sA ri ta chu klung / /ang gu l+ya ni cha shas te/ /ba da na rA dzi ka lce/ /a d+ha ra so yin paM ka ti/ /rgyal mtshan tshan do phreng

de bzhin/ /tsa la rlung ngo mrig pa ti phyugs/ /maN+Da la ni mnyam pa ste/ /swA sa lam gyi bzhi mdor shes par bya/ /skye ba phal gu sham mo ma hA k+Sha raM ni/ /phyugs chen no ts+tsha ni ra skyes so/ /na ni mi'o ba ni glang yin no/ /ma ni ma he b+ha ni za ba ste/ /si ni seng ge byA ni stag de bzhin/ /

s+thA ni gnas pa'o kha la reg pa zos pa yin/ /so la reg pa tshim pa yin/ /hri ka ngo tsha stong pa la reg pa/ /'khrig pa'o brla la reg pa ni/ /de ltar da ltar gyis zhes par/ /mchog tu mthun ma shes par bya/ /'dir ni dgos pa slar bshad pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsrub

par bya/ /byed pa rnal 'byor mar shes bya/ /dpa' bo kun tu dgos pa'o/ /sna tshogs dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag /bskyed pa srid pa'i sbyor ba dang / /sbyor bral kun rdzob de bzhin du/ /sgyu ma mthun pa 'khor ba dang / /brtse ba

rang bzhin brtags pa dang / /gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub dang / /tu ri ya~M 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / /sems dga' byas dang tshul khrims dang / /gtong ba brtul ba dpa' de bzhin/ /skar rtsis mkhan dang sman pa nyid/ /bzo dang khams dang smra ba po/ /lhag ma rten

'brel yan lag ni/ /bcu gnyis ma rig sogs shes bya/ /mA la ba yi nye gnas su/ /shing grib ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /ting 'dzin dbang po'i phyogs rnams su/ /'jug pa med dang 'jug pa mtshungs/ /dbang po 'dod chags chags bral dag /yang dag phun sum

tshogs bdag po/ /mA ma kI rdo rje'i bu gar ni/ /spyi gtsug gnas su yongs gnas bya/ /'phyang bzhin pa kha 'og tu ste/ /kam po dzi yi phyag rgya'i tshul/ /ba ni yang dag rig pa'i rgyud/ /rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /de ltar byas dang ma byas kun/ /mkhas

pas dbu mar mi snang ngo / /zhi ba'i dngos po'i ye shes 'dir/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sku can te/ /smig rgyu dang ni 'dra ba'i gzugs/ /bdag nyid gzugs can mthong bar 'gyur/ /ye shes shin tu bas g.yogs pas/ /kun 'gro ba yi lhar dran bya/ /gang 'dra'i

snying rje gnyis byar med/ /de 'dra'i dngos por skye dran bya/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /sngon can grags pa bsgom par bya/ /gsang sngags bden pa'i gzungs bdag nyid/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus son pa'o/ /oM sam rba hA b+hU sh+ma ta shA sa~M na trA pri sa yA na ya ka hU~M rA

hU~M ya pha hU~M Ta hU~M pha pha Ta Ta swA pha hA Ta swA hA/ oM dru ma ts+tsha ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags gzugs bdag nyid du/ /kun du 'gro ma can shes bya/ /mchod pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du/ /lhan skyes mdzes ma 'dus pa'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos bdag /rnal 'byor nam

mkha' gtso bo yin/ /dbugs ni sba ba byas nas ni/ /slar yang o D+yan kun du 'gro/ /sa gsum po yi ris su ni/ /gzugs kyi gtso mo bsgom par bya/ /yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya/ /slar yang rdo rje phag mo

yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rigs ldan mchod/ /lha rdzas mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas pa bas de mchog go/ /ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' ba/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /'di 'dra'i dus kyis ye shes ni/ /mkhas pas a ba d+hU tI'i nang du'o/ /rnal 'byor

pas bsgoms sems bdag nyid/ /stong pa nyid gzugs dmigs pa can/ /de yis thams cad rig byas nas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang mtshan nyid/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom

ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las shing grib ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag

pos/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab bdag che/ /phyag rgya yang dag rig pa'i gzugs/ /ji lta'i rigs pas bstan du gsol/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /re re la ni dgu dgu ste/ /las dang chos dang dam tshig dang / /phyag rgya chen po bzhi pa yin/ /pad rtsa ltar dkar bud

med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni gtong ba yin/ /pad+ma dang ni ut+pal dri/ /kha dog tsam+pa ka yi yin/ /dza ti dang ni tsam+pa'i dri/ /de yi gzugs dang mdog 'dzin ma'o/ /ga pur dang ni tsan+dan dri/ /pad+ma dkar po'i pags can ma'o/ /lte ba dang mnyam dri/ /ut+pal sngon

po'i mdog can ma'o/ /ut+pal sngo 'dab ljang gu la/ /dri ni de nyid kyis mtshon bya/ /mal+li ka dang ut+pal dri/ /mu men dang ni mtshungs ma'o/ /ke ta ka yi dri shes bya/ /dmar po ban d+hu ka lta bu'o/ /pa Ta li mal+li ka'i dri/ /slar yang nam mkha'i kha dog go/ /de ltar las kyi

phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /bde gshegs tshogs pa la dga' ba/ /mthar skyes rnal 'byor ma mchog yin/ /bsam gtan bzlas la rgyun du dga'/ /bram ze mo ru rab tu bshad/ /rtag tu khrus dang gtsang sbra dga'/ /rje'u rigs kyi ni bud med

do/ /rnam rtog med bdag nyid ni mo/ /rtul cing dpa' bo la rtse zhing / /rgyal rigs kyi ni rang bzhin te/ /'di ni mchog tu gtam dga' ma'o/ /las la yongs su rtse ba ste/ /dmangs rigs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma'o/ /bde gshegs 'dus la rjes su chags/ /mchog tu

mthun ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o/ /mkhas pa yi ni phyogs su gzhol/ /chos kyi gnas su khro med ma'o/ /dpa' bo yi ni rigs su skyes/ /rtag par sha ni za ma yin/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lam srung ma/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam par byed/ /khro ba rnams la mi

khro zhing / /mnyes par byed pa'i khur khyer ma'o/ /de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /dam tshig phyag rgya mngon brjod bya/ /gtor ma mchod pa la dga' ma/ /dam tshig can du de mngon brjod/ /rab gnas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /don dam pa la dga' ba ma'o/ /'gro ba

rnams la dbang bskur ma/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig can mar grags/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing / /rtag tu dam tshig skyong ma'o/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /mchog tu rmad byung rtsen ma'o/ /dus thams cad du dga' dang bcas/ /rab tu rgyas

pa'i bzhin byed ma'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bu bzhin snang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor mar de shes/ /dus kun du ni dub med ma/ /mtshon cha 'bebs pa'i ming can ma'o/ /mi mo rtag tu 'gro bzhin du/ /dam tshig brda ni skyong ma ste/ /de ltar dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /phyag rgya chen

mor rab bshad bya/ /lhan skyes zhing skyes lha mo dang / /sngags skyes 'jig rten mgon po dang / /sbyor skyes gnas skyes de bzhin du/ /dam tshig lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma/ /pad can ma ni dus kun du/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsngags pa'o/ /de ltar phyag rgya'i rang bzhin te/ /

de mngon tshul bdag phyag rgya'i lan/ /gang zhig gang gi mdog dang dri/ /de yi de ltar tshul dran bya/ /sa srung ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /kA ma ru pa shes rab dbang / /sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bsgrub par bya/ /e yig ye shes rlung

rnams ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab bzhugs/ /'dod chags me yi rang bzhin bdag /thugs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma/ /rdo rje gsang ba las bzhengs rtsa/ /khams thams cad ma 'pho med ma'o/ /'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dag sems can cha can

no/ /sems ni re re la yang ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug las can ma'o/ /lus can gzugs ni des de bzhin/ /zhing du ka la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /chen po'i sngags kyi tshul bdag tu/ /sa la da ltar nyid rol 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs la yang / /gzugs

dang gzugs med shes mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gzugs su byas lha mo/ /sangs rgyas lam ni shes byed ma'o/ /dbang po kun du 'gro sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de ltar de nyid nges shes pas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs dang mtshungs/ /ye shes 'khor

lor lha mo rnams/ /bdag mo 'dod pa kun sbyin ma/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sngags kyi gzugs can du byung ba'o/ /oM dza ma TA hA ka ka lA la pa pA mun+tA ku ga TA ni ya te hU~M dzA hU~M ya phaT hU~M phaT hU~M swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM ai rA ba tI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i

sngags kyi sa bon du/ /mchog sbyin ma ni byung ba ste/ /kha dog dbyibs ni sngon gyi can/ /ji ltar kun nas thams cad du'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag

pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sa srung ma'i sku'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /'di skad kyi

ni tshig smras so/ /gang gis 'byung po thams cad sogs/ /mthong bas kun tu skrag pa yi/ /thams cad bden pa yi ni brda/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro nyid kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya kun gyi nang son pa/ /snying po'i phyag rgya de nyon cig /rgyud gang du yang ma bshad pa/ /

de ni khyod kyis bskul ba ste/ /rdo rje me yi rab sbyor bas/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab tu brjod/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor lha mo gang / /shing reg mtha' yi spyod yul can/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i rim pa ni/ /sna tshogs rtsa yi rim pas so/ /thig le nyi mar son phyag rgya/ /bsam

dang sems ni dbyangs gsal te/ /sum cu rtsa drug ring dang thung / /phyag rgya de ni mngon ster ma/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /byang chub sems son pa yi dbugs/ /'di kun sems can la thim pa'o/ /'jigs byed chen mo'i

sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /phyi mo de nyams myong byas nas/ /gang dang gang gi dag las byung / /hA hA rnams kyis rgod kun rnams/ /ljon shing rtsa ba can du bya/ /dga' bas der ni 'du ba ni/ /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang ngo / /bag chags

thams cad dang bral ba/ /'jigs byed 'chang bzhin pa yin no/ /o Di'i gnas su dad pa'i stobs/ /ji lta'i grangs kyi spyod yul can/ /nye bar 'jal ba'i khyim dbus su/ /de'i phyir brtan dang 'gro ba ni/ /thim pa'ang dngos po kun gyi bdag /mkhas pas phyag

rgya rnams kyis brlan/ /nam mkha' ru ni 'phur bzhin pas/ /'gro ba kun las ye shes mchog /dad pa'i shugs las shes byas nas/ /lus can kun gyi stobs ldan yin/ /sha chen po la za bzhin dang / /yid kyis khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /he ru ka mar

byed rig ma/ /ljon shing drung du yang dag zhugs/ /de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor dbus su/ /'jigs byed chen mo rnam par bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sngags rnams yi ge las byung ba'o/ /oM ma kha hA Ta sa bA~M mu ga dra ka me pA kha la lA shU ya la hU~M pri

hU~M n+na pha d+hA Ta ri phaT Ne swA hU~M hA hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i gsang sngags sbyor chen las/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sku thugs can/ /yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /dpa' bo thams cad

mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'jigs byed chen mo'i nang gi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid

kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas 'dod ma'i rnal 'byor ma/ /phyag rgya yi ni brda yi rgyud/ /snying rjes bshad bya rnal 'byor pa'i/ /mthong ba yis ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /snang ba rnams su gang tshe dngos/ /dbang po'i spyod yul du mthong

'gyur/ /gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang dmar ser ljang gu dang / /ser dang sngo skya khra bor snang / /sna tshogs pa dang du ba'i mdog /sngo dang dmar ser 'dres pa dang / /slar la yang ni dkar nag mdog /dmar ser dang ni ljang sngo skya/ /sngo ba dang ni

dmar ba'i mdog /dkar sngo dang ni dmar ljang dang / /sprin dang sna tshogs mdog can dang / /sna tshogs dang ni ser po'i mdog /du ba dang ni gser mdog can/ /ser ljang dang ni ljang ser dang / /dmar po dang ni dung mdog can/ /dud kha dkar po sna tshogs sngo/ /ser

dang dmar ba bsres pa can/ /dud kha dang ni sngo skya'i mdog /dkar dang sna tshogs pa'i mdog can/ /skya bo dang ni du ba'i mdog /skya dkar dang ni dmar skya dang / /sprin dang skya bo ljang skya dang / /sna tshogs pa dang skya bo'i mdog /thams cad mdog gi kha dog tu/ /khams bcu

gnyis kyi kha dog can/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags/ /'khar ba dang ni ra gan te/ /phan tshun 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/ /brtse ba chen po de bcu gnyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi khams thams cad/ /der ni snang ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de yis snang ba'i dus su

ni/ /'phrul chen mo ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gnyis dag rnam shes pas/ /kha dog mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngon dang phyis ni bsdus pa las/ /gal te lhan skyes sbyor bdag nyid/ /rlung shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /tri sha ku ni'i gnas su ni/ /lha

mo brtson 'grus stobs su ste/ /de ltar yi ge'i don rnams kyang / /ba ni dbu mar 'bab pa ste/ /bag chags stobs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dus 'dzom thams cad chos rnams su/ /slar yang mthong lam bdag nyid yin/ /be ni yul dang ldan pa nyid/ /bdag nyid

rnams kyi bsgom pa'i lam/ /de kho nyid mas dam 'khyud pa/ /skyob pa rnams kyi grol ba'i lam/ /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gi/ /'gro ba rnam pa gsum zhes bya/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba mthong 'gyur ba'ang / /rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshams na gnas/ /bum pa can

sogs byas gang phyir/ /gtum mo phra ba'i rtsa can no/ /pad+mar rtsa ni thams cad can/ /de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes med/ /de phyir brtson 'grus 'byung bar 'gyur/ /stobs su ye shes ye shes can/ /de ltar shes byas rtag rnal 'byor/ /'dod can ma la 'dod spyad kyis/ /

dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag mo dang / /gsang sngags yi ger yang dag byung / /lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub mchog tu/ /lha mo chen mo skye bar 'gyur/ /oM be byA tA g+h+ra la tsA sa~M rmA g+ham+ba ma ra r+d+ha d+hA Na ri ka Ne rA hU~M ya hU~M hU~M phaT hU~M phaT phaT swA phaT hA swA hA/ oM bA yu be ge hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/

kha dog gzugs ni sngon ji bzhin/ /sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dbus su/ /khams gsum snying po'i phyag rgya yis/ /gang de nus pa rdzogs par grags/ /gsung gi 'khor lo gsang ba cher/ /bdag gis gang zhig rim pa yis/ /thams cad bden par shes par bya/ /

de phyir rdo rje 'chang dbugs dbyung / /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen

po las rlung shugs ma'i kha dog gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas rdo rje phag mo yis/ /ji lta'i cho gas mchod byas pas/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad bya ba/ /bla ma rang gis lha'i

phyag rgya/ /'o byed de bzhin lA ma dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma/ /yongs 'gyur ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ /rnal 'byor phar phyin drug de bzhin/ /lag pa g.yon pa yi ni brda/ /rnal 'byor dbye bas ston byed pa/ /re re la yang rnam gsum 'gyur/ /

dpa' bo'i rnam pa gsum nyid de/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje nyid/ /A ro lika dang rta mchog dang / /he ru ka rnams lag g.yon la'o/ /mkhas pas gnyis sbyar rnal 'byor te/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /sgrol ma gos dkar bdag med ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbyings

dbang phyug /pha rol phyin drug tu shes bya/ /de ltar rnam gsum shes bya ba/ /dpa' bo 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /sa yi snying po la sogs der/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro sogs gtso bo/ /lha mo lag pa'i rgyab son te/ /sor mo rnams la de bzhin gshegs/ /de

bzhin lha mo dbus tshigs su/ /lag pa'i mthil du de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo de bzhin sen skogs la/ /lag gdub gnas su rnal 'byor ma/ /lag pa'i rtse mos brda bya ste/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs gsol bya/ /gang zhig gang gi bdag po

nyid/ /de yi de nyid kyis mtshon bya/ /chang 'thung ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /ko sa la dang sna'i rtse mo/ /dran pa'i stobs kyi bdag nyid kyis/ /bza' ba dang ni ston mo bya/ /gnyid log dus kun las skyes par/ /phyag rgya chen po legs par zung / /rA hu dus me nyi ma ru/ /zos

pa sna yi rtser de bzhin/ /phra mo gnyis su med gzugs las/ /yul kyang bza' bar byas nas ni/ /me tog sems kyi sa bon las/ /k+Shi ni bdud rtsi'i skud pa 'dzag /de ltar nges byed rnal 'byor pa/ /lte ba'i chang sngon song las so/ /gzhu yi dbyug par son

pa'i sems/ /rang gzugs yang dag rig pa tsam/ /ro mnyam pa ni myong ba yang / /the tsom med par 'dir byed 'gyur/ /'i bde ba'i nus pa yis/ /sa bon zag pa med par son/ /dus de nyid du rtag phyag rgya/ /dpa' bo'i brda yis 'thob par

'gyur/ /byang chub 'khor lo dga' bcas su/ /'jug 'gyur mchog gi zhal can ma/ /brda dang bral na 'khor ba ru/ /grol ba'i thabs gzhan yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs bdag mo/ /chang 'thung grags pa chen mo yin/ /sum cu rtsa bdun 'khor lo cher/ /

gsang sngags las byung mchog zhal mo/ /oM sha ma trU hA ni bi su g+ha m+b+ha na na ni ka bA rA ri ya Ne hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA/ oM su rA b+ha k+ShI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags rgyal mngon par ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'byin dang sdud pa dag gis

ni/ /gnyis gnyis kyis ni rkang par gsungs/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo/ /kha dog dbyibs ni sngon can no/ /kun mkhyen bgrod bya phyag rgya'i lan/ /mngon par shes pas sbyin mi bya/ /ma shes pa yis rnal 'byor ma'i/ /phyag rgya chen po 'di 'grub 'gyur/ /

sbrul dang rkun sogs pas bsad nas/ /dmyal ba sogs su 'gro ba yin/ /sna tshogs lung 'dzin dpa' rnams la/ /yang dag yid ches bya phyir ster/ /bla ma'i drin gyis yod pa der/ /mkhas pa de yi rkyen gyis brda/ /dngos grub dngos po bdag nyid kyis/ /byed 'gyur

gzhan du ma yin no/ /de yi drin gyis grol ba ste/ /mkhas pas zhing du gnas par bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag zhing yin te/ /de ni gnas dang byang chub phyogs/ /gnas pa ts+tsho ma ka rnams te/ /rang bzhin med pa ts+tsho ma'i lan/ /yang na 'di kun bla ma 'am/ /bla ma thams cad

thams cad pa'o/ /man ngag dang bcas ye shes che/ /ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul can/ /sku yi 'khor lor dngos grub che/ /theg pa kun gyi bde bar bzhugs/ /bde med bde ba med pa'ang med/ /thams cad der ni gnyis med che/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam

sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i brda'i rang bzhin

gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas phag mo pad bzung mo'i/ /lha mos mchod pa byas nas ni/ /las dang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag po/ /rdo rje chen pos bdag la gsungs/ /sems can kun gyi dgos

byed pa/ /lha rdzas las ni bshad par bya/ /gang gis thams cad dbang sogs su/ /lha sogs thams cad de bzhin 'ong / /thog mar rdo rje phag mo yi/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi ni las/ /ka ling ga ru ljang lha mo'i/ /mngon par bka' bsgo byed par 'gyur/ /de yi

rigs rnams su skyes pa/ /bdag dang bdag gir gnang bas so/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /mchog gi dbang phyug ma bsgom bya/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa sngags su/ /sa bon yi ge las skyes pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de dang bral bas dngos

grub med/ /oM sha tri ta sA sa ha ha sra sra ma mu hA khA sa ya ha hU~M sre hU~M ka phaT ro swA mA hA ba l+yA n+ta brti Ne hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog 'di ni/ /bsgom bya bzlas dang bsam gtan no/ /rdo rje phag mo gnyis byar med/ /'bad pas rtsa

ba'i sngags rnams su'o/ /zla mtshan gyi ni me tog gis/ /brlan pa'i gos ni legs bskams la/ /garga Ta yi brun gyis ni/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bdug spos sbyin/ /sngags pas bdug spos 'di yis ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nye bar bya/ /phag mo yi ni sbyor ldan pas/ /

'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /mthun pa'i rtsa dang 'dus pa las/ /'gro ba thams cad g.yon las byung / /rang gi rgyud ni mdzes bzhin pa/ /zla mtshan gyi ni rdul gos so/ /brun kyang 'jig rten gsum po dang / /ye shes bsres pas spos su 'gyur/ /byi la bzhin du

bzhag pa'i sems/ /h+yA yi yi ger tshig 'di'o/ /ljang gu'ang snying rje'i sbyor ba ste/ /lha mo de bzhin dbu ma'o/ /ci zhig bde ba rig pa ci/ /ci zhig don dam pa'i spyod yul/ /gos bzhin pa ni rnal 'byor cher/ /rnam par shes pa lha mor 'dod/ /skye bo kun

gyi bdag nyid ches/ /bgrod pa mtshams rnams kun du'o/ /thod pa kha sbyor bcing byas nas/ /skra rnams kyis ni sbyin sreg brjod/ /'di ni me tog tu grags te/ /dam tshig so sor skyong bar byed/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /zhi ba'i btung ba nyin rer ro/ /de

ltar byed pa'i sngags shes pa/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster po/ /ba lang sha ni chang btags pa/ /lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya/ /lha thams cad dang rgyu skar bcas/ /klu sogs sum cu'i gnas pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na/ /phra mo'i

mi ni slar yang ci/ /lud pa dang ni so shing dang / /rang lus dril phyis de bzhin du/ /ming gis chang btags sbyin sreg gis/ /'jig rten dang bcas dbang du byed/ /zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni/ /bza' ba zos pa'i skyugs pa ni/ /mi yi skra dang yongs ldan pas/ /

da lta nyid du 'gugs byed mchog /rang lus mar gyi skyugs pa dang / /rang gi skra ni mkhas pas bsreg /nim pa'i me ni 'bar ba yis/ /mod la sdang bar byed pa'i mchog /bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg byed/ /mnyam gzhag d+ha du ra yi mes/ /mar nag tshan de

yongs ldan pas/ /mod la gsod dang skrod pa yin/ /stong phrag dgu yi sreg blugs kyis/ /yun mi ring pas rgyal po 'thob/ /gang zhig bsreg pa'i sreg blugs ni/ /mkhas pas brgya ni sha yis te/ /de la zla ba gsum rjes la/ /skad cig la ni phongs pa 'joms/ /

gang gis rgyun du dran byed na/ /de ni skye bo'i mthun par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lus med tshogs mchog bud med rnams/ /myos pa'i bsam can 'grub 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas myos pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /

mi 'jigs pa ni sbyin par byed/ /bud med bye bas yongs bskor nas/ /grub pa sa yi steng du rol/ /rdo rje phag mo sbyor ldan pa/ /dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor mnyam/ /rdo rje slob dpon gzhan dang 'dir/ /dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byed de/ /dam tshig spyod

pa srun pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum la dngos grub ster/ /sngon bshad rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /de ltar sbyin sreg byas pas 'grub/ /rnal 'byor las gzhan las med de/ /las dang bral bas sbyor ba med/ /'pho ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi las/ /rlung 'bab pa ni de rnams son/ /

gnyis kyi mtshams ni 'dus pa las/ /sbyin sreg thab kyi nang du blta/ /lte ba gnyis ni 'dus par te/ /slar yang mtshams rnams thams cad du'o/ /de yi dus su shes bya ba/ /sngags kyang yi ge la 'bum phrag /bzlas byas bskul ba gsang ba yis/ /byas pas kun nas

dngos grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab byas te/ /de nas gcig gis dman lnga bcu/ /re'u mig sa la gzhag par bya/ /sngags pas gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags/ /de la thog mar rnam snang mdzad/ /bdun pa la yang slar de'o/ /dgu par su yi ge sbyin/ /bcu gsum pa

la gri yig go/ /bcu bdun pa ni b+ha yig ste/ /slar yang bcu dgu pa la h+Na/ /sum cu gcig par gri yig sbyin/ /sum cu gsum par ni yig go/ /sum cu bdun par sbyin bya ba/ /mkhas pas h+Na'i yi ger sbyar/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa 'dir ni/ /de bzhin su yi yi ge sbyin/ /bzhi

bcu rtsa gsum par de bzhin/ /ye shes sa bon sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par sbyin pa/ /thams cad shes pas sam+b+ha'i yig /dum bu gnyis par sbyin bya ba/ /rig byed rnams kyi thog dbyangs so/ /dum bu drug par de bzhin 'dir/ /rlung ni dus thams cad du'o/ /bcu par gri

yi yi ge sbyin/ /bcu gnyis pa la ba yig go/ /brgyad pa la h+Na yig ste/ /sum cu gnyis par ya yig go/ /sum cu brgyad par h+Na yig ste/ /bzhi bcu pa la ya'i sa bon/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhin 'dir/ /gri yi yi ge slar sbyin bya/ /bzhi bcu brgyad par sngags pa

yis/ /rtag tu hU~M yig gzhom med pa'o/ /brgyad par de bzhin du ni 'dir/ /slar yang yi ge kun dbang phyug /bzhi bcu pa ru dza yig ste/ /bcu drug pa la b+ha yig go/ /nyi shu pa la A'i yi ge/ /nyi shu bzhi par ga yig go/ /nyi shu drug par na slar sbyin/ /sum cu pa la

wAn sbyar bya/ /sum cu bzhi par ya sbyin te/ /rA yig sum cu drug de bzhin/ /bzhi bcu gnyis par hU~M sbyin bya/ /rdo rje 'khrul 'khor bsdus pa'o/ /dum bu bcu gnyis rnams la ni/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i ming gzhug bya/ /hU~M yig dum bu thams cad kyi/ /bsgrub bya rnams kyi

dbus su bri/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje yi ni phreng ba bya/ /'khor lo zung ni bri bya ste/ /dbang la kham phor sa mthil la'o/ /'khrul 'khor rdo rje las byung ba/ /dbang gi rdzas kyis yang dag bri/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba yang / /de tshe myur du byon par 'gyur/ /

bdud rtsi lnga rnams phab pa las/ /dam tshig der ni bya ba yin/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /sngags kyi gtso mo shes par bya/ /dpa' bo gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /de las las mchog bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang mchod pa/ /rtag tu 'khyud pas

mchog rab byed/ /mtshan mo kun du sgrub pa po/ /de nas pho nya mchod par bya/ /sha za'i rtsa ba khar bcug nas/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du ni/ /de srid ling ga las rung 'gyur/ /gzhan du nga yis ma bshad do/ /sa yi lcug ma til mar du/ /btsos pas rkang pa byug par bya/ /

mkhas pa de yi mtshan ma ni/ /dus thams cad du rengs pa mkhas/ /pA tha ka Tu ka ro hi ni/ /rta yi dri dang 'di rnams ni/ /cha rnams mnyam par bya ba ste/ /brtse chen cho ga'i lhag ma ni/ /arka'i 'o ma dang btags nas/ /de yis ling ga dril phyis bya/ /gang gi tshad du 'dod pa

yi/ /de yi tshad du 'gyur zhes bya/ /myur ba ru ni chu dron gyis/ /bkru ba byas na sngon gyi tshad/ /pad+ma dkar po'i ke sa ra/ /sbrang dang btags pa'i byung ba ni/ /byin na ling ga brtan pa ru/ /de 'gyur 'dod ma la spyod do/ /pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar ni/ /til dkar po dang de bzhin gzhan/ /

mar sar dang ni dpa' gcig gi/ /rtsa ba sbrang dang lhan cig tu/ /btags nas lte bar byug byas na/ /de srid ling ga mi ltung ngo / /rdul can ma dang yung ba gnyis/ /yongs bzung ba yi dar ba dang / /bre do gdu bar bya ba ste/ /bre gang ma gyur bar du'o/ /de ltar 'thungs

pas nyin bdun na/ /bcud len rdzogs par byed pa yin/ /de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo/ /yang dag dpa' bos gsungs pa'o/ /spre'u'i mchin pa bzung nas ni/ /phye ma zhib mo ru ni bya/ /rang gi dbang po yang dag ldan/ /dbang du byed pa bla med pa'o/ /gang dang gang du gnas

nas ni/ /rdo rje phag mo zlos gyur nas/ /lan cig bzlas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis/ /g.yon dang g.yas su bskor bar bya/ /gang gang bsam pa thams cad rnams/ /de ni thams cad rab ster byed/ /so ba gos dang gser dang ni/ /bza' ston zas dang btung ba ste/ /de thams cad

ni 'thob byed de/ /sngags pas de bzung yongs rdzogs byed/ /rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag /sgrub pos gcig tu byas nas ni/ /rig pa lan bdun bzlas pa yis/ /de nas mi la bskus pa yis/ /reg pas skyes bu rnams phye bar/ /'gyur te tshig ni gzhan du min/ /'di yi rig

pa lan cig ni/ /bzlas pa'i chu yis grol ba yin/ /de ltar gang dang gang gi ni/ /sems can gyi khrag khrag gis ni/ /bsgos pa'i skud pa bcings pa yis/ /bzlas pas gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste/ /'di rnams thams cad chus grol bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med/ /bud med

gzugs mdzes rgyal po dang / /sa yi bdag po la bltas na/ /sgrub pos ma mthong ba yang ni/ /de rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas na/ /de yi mtshan mo 'ong ba ste/ /nub bdun ni mda' shugs kyis/ /'ong ba la ni the tsom

med/ /de ltar bya dang bya min pa'i/ /las kun rdo rje'i nor son par/ /rang gis rig pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /ye shes pha rol son pa 'grub/ /'khrul 'khor khams kyi re'u mig tu/ /rtsa ni phra mo'i gzugs can ma/ /yi ge rlung chen po yin te/ /lha ni kun du 'gro ba'o/ /

ljang gu gnyis med bdag chen mo/ /lha mo ye shes rgya mtsho yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal

'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i ljang lha mo'i dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg dang 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan mkha' 'gro

yi/ /bdag po yis ni slar gsungs pa/ /lam pa ka yis rab sbyor bas/ /shin bzang rnal 'byor ma'i sbyor ba/ /shes rab stobs su shes bya ste/ /'khrul 'khor rta yi 'gros de bzhin/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor bas bzhugs/ /rtsa sngags rnal 'byor pa yis so/ /ye

shes ldan pa dbugs rgyu'i bdag /kun rdzob bden pa kun nas 'dzin/ /rtsa yi kun du spyod lugs las/ /stobs ni las rnams thams cad du'o/ /gnyid log pa yis rab zhugs pa'i/ /srog thams cad ni de'i nang du'o/ /las chen po la za bzhin pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis

byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi dron mo bzhu byas nas/ /de'i dbus rtsa rnams kyis 'khor lo/ /de ni sum cu bdun bdag nyid/ /'phyang bzhin pa ni byang chub skyes/ /me yi rnam par rtag lha mo/ /gtso mo rnams kyis snying bdag nyid/ /keng rus rlung dang rnam shes la/ /phyin nas dur khrod bdag

nyid rnams/ /de yi sa bon yig shes nas/ /pho nya rnams kyis rtag tu bskyed/ /re re yi ni sa bon gyi/ /mtha' ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM ma dz+nyA hA na pi sA shig ta ra ru pra d+hi b+hA ra ya ba hU~M swA hU~M hA pha ri Ta Ne pha hU~M Ta hU~M swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM su b+ha dre hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags

las yang dag byung / /las kyis kha dog dang ni gzugs/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can/ /gsang ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg bya/ /phyi nas las ni 'di dag brtsam/ /sngags pas lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /'bum phrag bzlas pa byas

nas ni/ /sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i/ /'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /'khor lo sngon ma'i gzugs can ni/ /byas nas gsang sngags 'dir dgod bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thog mar te/ /gnyis par de nas ni dgod bya/ /gsum par

hU~M yig sbyin bya ste/ /lnga par oM gyi yi ge'o/ /drug pa gri yi yi ge sbyin/ /hU~M gi yi ge bdun pa ru'o/ /brgyad par m+b+ha'i yi ge sbyin/ /bcu par su yi yi ge'o/ /bcu gnyis par ni hU~M yig sbyin/ /bcu bzhi par ni gri yig go/ /lngar m+b+ha'i yi ge ste/ /bcu drug de bzhin hU~M

yig go/ /bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste/ /bcu dgu pa ru h+Na sbyar bya/ /nyi shur phaT yig sbyin par bya/ /h+Na yig nyi shu rtsa gcig par/ /nyi shu dgu par rnam snang mdzad/ /sum cu pa ya'i yi ge gnyis/ /sum cu gcig par slar de'o/ /rig byed dang po sum cu gsum/ /sum cu bzhi

par ya yig ste/ /rA dza'i yig dag sum cu lngar/ /sum cu drug par h+Na yig sbyin/ /sum cu brgyad par gri yig go/ /bzhi bcu par ni wan sbyin bya/ /bzhi bcu gnyis par A de bzhin/ /bzhi bcu gsum pa ru ni h+Na/ /bzhi bcu bzhi pa hU~M hU~M dag /bzhi bcu lnga pa ru ni gri/ /bzhi bcu

bdun pa ru na ni/ /bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyin bya ba/ /hU~M hU~M gi ni yig gnyis so/ /b+ha ga'i sgra ni slar sbyin te/ /bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o/ /lhag ma la ni rtsa sngags bri/ /'khor lo bzhi ru bsgrub bya'o/ /kun nas yongs su 'khor bar ni/ /sngags pas rta mgrin bri bar bya/ /

gnyis pas g.yon du bskor ba ste/ /'khrul 'khor kha sbyar 'khrul 'khor bya/ /gsang ba'i yi ge las skyes par/ /shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor pas/ /klu dgug pa dang dbang dang ni/ /lha la sogs pa gsad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor brtse bdag nyid can gyis/ /rang sems rtag tu

gsad par bya/ /gar yang de'i yang sdang ba ni/ /de yis thams cad bsad pa yin/ /sdang sems can gyis gzhan du na/ /bsad pas dngos grub rnams mi 'thob/ /bde mchog phyi ma'i las gang ni/ /de kun nges par byed par 'gyur/ /re re yi ni las cung zad/ /mdor bsdus

'di ni bshad par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po de bzhin brgyad/ /mtha' yas rim pas bsgom par bya/ /nor rgyas srog tu shes par bya/ /thur du sel ba dung skyong ngo / /mnyam gnas pad+ma yi ni klu/ /bsam gtan pad+ma chen po'o/ /khyab gnas 'jog po yi ni klu/ /klu ni slar yang

hu lu'o/ /rus sbal mtha' yas shes par bya/ /rtsangs pa rgyal ba yi ni klu/ /lha sbyin rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /mtha' yas nor las rgyal ba'o/ /'jug pa yis ni dgug pa ste/ /btang ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /bum pa can gyis char dbab pa/ /mnyam pa'i rlung

gis bsal ba'o/ /rnam shes brgyad po de bzhin du/ /'dir ni klu mor shes par bya/ /ye shes nam mkha' dang gnyis gzhan/ /rnam par shes pa bcu yi rgyu/ /phuHyi yi ge brgyad sbyin bya/ /ting 'dzin sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /phan tshun skyes pas dkris pa ste/ /klu mo de yi

mchan khung du'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs chen gyis/ /klu yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /ji lta'i rim pas kha dog rnams/ /thun mtshams gnyis kyi thun tshod brgyad/ /rtsa sngags mngon par brjod pa nyid/ /klu dang klu mor shes par bya/ /dbang po thim par byas nas

ni/ /yi ge la 'bum bzlas pa nyid/ /gang gang las ni phyi rol gyi/ /de de'i las kyi dbang tshul bya/ /gzugs ni gang 'dod par bya ste/ /khro bo'am zhi ba'i gzugs dag tu'o/ /sems ni gzugs su yang dag grags/ /de phyir shin bzang ming can no/ /rnal 'byor dbang

phyug kun gyi bdag /de yis lha ni byed par 'gyur/ /slar yang phyi nang bdag nyid kyi/ /gzhan pa'i lha ni ma bshad do/ /de yis thams cad mngon brjod pas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gang 'dod 'gro/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags skyon/ /phyi rol du yang sprin mthong

'gyur/ /bag chags zad pa'i dus su ni/ /sprin dang klu rnams mthong mi 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho

rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang / shin tu bzang mo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can rta'i sngags mdor bstan pa rigs kyi klu'i las kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //

de nas de phyir slar la yang / /lha mos mchod pa 'dir byas te/ /phag mo'i 'dod chags bcas pas so/ /mnyes nas lha yis ston pa mdzad/ /rta rna ma yi rab sbyor nas/ /dus kun du ni kAny+tsir ro/ /ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag dang / /snying ga ru ni yang dag bzhugs/ /ha

yig nA dang lus kun du/ /snying ga'i dbus las kyang ni langs/ /yi yig bskyod pa yi ni srog /rdo rje'i rlung gis bskyod pa yin/ /du tsam de bde dang bcas pa/ /slar yang 'dab 'dab la gsum gsum/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma brgyad/ /

bcu gnyis lte ba'i pad+ma ru/ /rnal 'byor ma rtag sum cu drug /de tshe re re'i 'dir rnams kyi/ /mtshams kyis rta la sogs pa rnams/ /Na yig lha mo de ma yin/ /gsal dang mi gsal rang bzhin can/ /'dod pa'i khams su'ang skyes pa mo/ /thar pa'i gzugs kyi las can no/ /

ts+yA yig 'pho ba yi ni chos/ /thams cad rig pa'i mtshams las grol/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /gsod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /gang gang gsod pa'i las rnams kyis/ /bla ma gsod la byed par 'gyur/ /bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa'am/ /de

bzhin mtshams med lnga byed la/ /dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang / /d+ha dur dur khrod sol ba dang / /rang gi sdigs mdzub khrag gis ni/ /'khor lo 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor rtag tu de'i/ /byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no/ /sngon bshad re'u mig shes

byas nas/ /gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de/ /gnyis par su ni rnam par brjod/ /gsum par m+b+ha'i yi ge brjod/ /rig byed dang po lngar de bzhin/ /drug par gri yig de bzhin te/ /slar yang bdun par h+Na yig go /brgyad pa la ni

hU~M yig gnyis/ /dgu par phaT yig de bzhin no/ /bcu par ni yig de bzhin te/ /slar yang bcu gnyis par hU~M yig /bcu gsum par ni phaT yig ste/ /gri yig bcu bzhi par de'o/ /hU~M gi yi ge lnga par/ /m+b+ha'i yi ge bcu drug par/ /bcu bdun pa ru su yig

ste/ /hU~M yig bcu dgu pa la'o/ /nyi shu pa la hU~M yig sbyin/ /h+Na yig nyi shu rtsa gcig par/ /rnam par snang mdzad nyi shu dgur/ /sum cu pa slar gri yig go/ /sum cu gcig par h+Na yig ste/ /sum cu gsum par rnam snang mdzad/ /sum cu bzhi par A yig dang / /

na yi yi ge der sbyar bya/ /sum cu lnga par ya'i sa bon/ /ho yig der ni sbyin par bya/ /sum cu drug par hU~M gnyis sbyin/ /sum cu bdun par phaT yig go/ /sum cu brgyad par pa ya gnyis/ /bzhi bcur hU~M gnyis de bzhin no/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la phaT/ /bzhi bcu

gnyis par b+ha ga gnyis/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la ni/ /pa ya gnyis dag yi ge'o/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa la h+Na/ /bzhi bcu lnga par gri yig go/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la ni/ /ra dza'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /bid+yA'i sgra ni slar sngags pas/ /dum bu bzhi bcu brgyad par ro/ /wAn

yig slar yang sbyin bya ba/ /bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o/ /lhag ma rnams la go cha'i sngags/ /bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa'o/ /gshin rje'i gdong ni grwa kun du/ /lag pa rkang pa phyogs su dgod/ /snying ga gshin rje'i sa gzhi ni/ /de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /

ye shes rnam shes sbyor bdag nyid/ /mkhas pas sngags kyi kun spyod bya/ /bla ma dam tshig la brnyas pa'ang / /rnam par shes dang blo dman pa'o/ /bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa/ /mig la sogs pa'i skye mched do/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa ni/ /phung po khams dang

de bzhin gzhan/ /sems can thams cad gcig pa yi/ /rigs ni phung po sogs dang khams/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis te/ /bsad par sems can khams bsad pa'o/ /gang dang gang gi gdong bltas nas/ /de dang de'i bdag nyid gzugs can/ /

bag chags ye shes kyis bsad par/ /'gyur ro sems can gzhan bsad min/ /de rnams gsod pa'i las sam yang / /byas pas bsad pa de dang 'dra/ /sbyin sreg dug la sogs rdzas kyis/ /yang dag rig gzugs can gyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor

'khor lo der dran bya/ /bsreg pa gtum mo la ni'o/ /sa bon yi ge las skyes pa/ /dkyil 'khor rta rna ma yi'o/ /kha dog dang ni dbyibs sngon gyi/ /shes rab thabs kyi mchod pa che/ /oM shrI saSh+Ti rba sa~M mA hA ra ra ba kA la ra ng+hA~M kA si ya ne hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT

swA swA hA hA/ oM ha yA ka hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'khor rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas ni/ /skrag nas sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /kye ma tshul 'di mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pa nyid/ /gang gi bde kun la gnas nas/ /srog gis 'di la tshar gcod pa'o/ /

mtshar nas sems can sar 'gyel bas/ /lag na rdo rje sogs bzhengs nas/ /pus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs nas/ /bdag nyid chen po bdag 'dri'o/ /ci yis bdag dang gang gi nyid/ /de rnams bsad pa'am las sam yang / /'bras bu dang ni rgyu'i rang bzhin/ /

bcom ldan gang du rnam par gzhag /gal te nyid kyi 'bras rnams kyis/ /gsod pa de dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /yang na rgyu ni bcom ldan la/ /'bras bu skyes bu gsod pa yin/ /bdag gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig /the tsom bsal bar mdzad du gsol/ /bka'

stsal pa/ rtse gcig pa yis tshig de la/ /rdo rje khyed kyis mnyan par gyis/ /'bras bu las kyi rjes su mthun/ /bdag ni bde ba kun gyi gnas/ /de'i las dbang gis sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams so/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ /

gnyis su med pas gcig tu gyur/ /de ni dngos po kun gyi rgyu/ /mkhas pa las ni rkyen yin no/ /dmag dpung la sogs sa chen la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba yis/ /thams cad gnyis med bdag nyid bya/ /de'i phyir gsod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /

bdag nyid bsad pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /skye bo gzhan kun gyis ma yin/ /dus kyi dbang gis rgyal srid na/ /tshegs chung las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na sngon gyi las/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis brtags byas nas/ /khams ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin

du/ /de dang der ni gdags par bya/ /de yis bdag nyid bsad pa yis/ /sems can khams rnams de nyid do/ /'bad pas brtse ba bskyed byas nas/ /nges par gsad par bya ba yin/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /brtse ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /

dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rta rna ma dang dpa' bo

gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas go cha dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi bsad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas smyo bar byed pa yi/ /sbyor ba kun du rnyed dka' ba/ /bya gdong ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par

bya/ /brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos/ /hi mA la yar yang dag zhugs/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya/ /mkha' gzugs nyid bdag pho nya mo/ /rkan dang rdo rje chu skyes dbus/ /rnam shes rlung dang lhan cig tu/ /mda'

yi shugs kyis gyen du 'phangs/ /lus ni 'dar 'dar bya ba ste/ /drag shul sbyar bas bya ba yin/ /rtag tu byed bzhin rnal 'byor pa/ /mchog tu zag med 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ji srid mi 'dod par/ /rlung dang rnam shes g.yo mi 'gyur/ /sna yi bu gar

son srog la/ /lte ba'i dbus su bskyod par bya/ /lte ba sna gnyis sbyor ba yis/ /'dzin bzhin pa yis g.yo mi 'gyur/ /rlung dang rnam shes lhan cig tu/ /de ni smyo bas 'khor ba yin/ /de'i dus sbyor ba'i bdag nyid la'ang / /dngos po thams cad mthong ba gang / /

de dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ /d+ha du ra'i me'i sbyin sreg gis/ /shing la dpyangs pa'i skra dang ni/ /sha za'i rtsa ba bsreg par bya/ /'di yi las kyi rab sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas skad cig gis smyo 'gyur/ /de phyir brtson 'grus byang yan

lag /de rnams las ni mngon par bya/ /brtson 'grus rdzogs byang chub mthong bas/ /rtag tu myur du thob par 'gyur/ /hi yig 'phyang ba'i ye shes su/ /rang nyid dpa' bos bshad pa yin/ /mA yig kyang ni rang rig pa/ /bdag nyid rnam pa'i gnas bzhugs de/ /

thim dang longs spyod rnam pa'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas sku can skye bar 'gyur/ /rang gis rig bdag rig pa rnams/ /sems can don byas nas gshegs 'gyur/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /las kyi rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /mdog dang gzugs ni

sngon gyi bzhin/ /gsang sngags sbyor las yang dag byung / /oM a sa n+t+ra rba mA nA lA gA d+hA nA~M ri sho Ne Sha hU~M Na hU~M sta phaT m+b+ha phaT na swA bi hA d+h+rA ba NA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM kha gA na ne hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i sngags kyi sbyor bdag nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /

ji lta ba ni sngon gyi bzhin/ /'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /'khor lor rtag tu ni/ /sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de/ /gnyis par m+b+ha sbyar bar bya/ /gsum par de nyid de ltar sbyin/ /lnga par rig byed rnams dang

po/ /h+Na yig drug par sbyin par bya/ /hU~M gi yi ge bdun par dgod/ /brgyad par su yi yi ge ste/ /dgu par de nyid sbyin par bya/ /bcu par hU~M gnyis sbyin bya ste/ /gri yig slar yang bcu gnyis par/ /bcu gsum pa la h+Na'i yi ge/ /bcu bzhi pa la hU~M yig go/ /
