bya/ /a yig thig le dang bral ba/ /dmar po phyi mo rnam par spangs/ /a yig thig le dang bcas pa/ /de phyir mtshal gyi rigs can no/ /guny+dza'i me tog dang mnyam par/ /i yig la ni brgyan par 'dod/ /I yig sin+d+hu ra yi mdog /bzang po lnga par shes

par bya/ /u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od/ /U yi yi ge drug pa nyid/ /glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o/ /r-i yig du ba'i kha dog ste/ /phra mo lus ni spangs pa'o/ /r-I yi yi ge mun pa'i gzugs/ /l-i ni bya rog gshog pa mtshungs/ /l-I yi ge mtshal gyi mdog /

i yi yi ge dmar skya ste/ /ai sin+d+hu ra dmar mdog ma/ /o yi yi ge nyi ma 'dra/ /'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar/ /au yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od/ /zla phyed de bzhin du thig le/ /aM yig sngon du bshad pa can/ /zla ba gnyis dang tsheg drag

ste/ /aHyig rgyal po de bzhin no/ /de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug /las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i rgyu/ /myos dang brlab gdol rmongs pa dang / /sems bral dang po'i stong nyid do/ /rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni/ /myur du thams cad ster

ba'o/ /bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang / /brlab gdon du ni bsal ba'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas/ /de ni rmugs dang dbang du 'ong / /yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur/ /lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral/ /dbang du 'od dang dgug pa

dang / /ye shes shes bya can mchog go/ /bskrad pa dang ni bzhu ba'i las/ /rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin/ /sa yi zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang / /bsngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems/ /skye ba 'di la nam du yang / /de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o/ /rnam par

sdang dang thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o/ /'jig rten kun dang mthun med la/ /skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni thams cad rnams/ /de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur/ /bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas/ /dbugs med ri mo

'dzag pa nub/ /phyi mo'i yal ga rnams kyis bya/ /dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med/ /sangs rgyas ri mo steng 'og tu/ /pad+ma'i snal can rab tu gnas/ /A li kA li mdor bsdus pa/ /bcud

len khams kyi lus las so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/ /zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o/ /de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du/ /yi ge thams cad nges par gnas/ /so sor snang ba ma byung bar/ /srung ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad/ /sems ni rjes mthun dbyangs

su 'gyur/ /sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin can/ /zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o/ /slar yang thams cad byed pa yi/ /stong pa nyid ni so sor dgod/ /thog ma gnyis ni

rkang gnyis dgod/ /brla dang gsang ba rked pa dang / /lte ba snying ga steng dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin/ /kha dang sna dang rna dag dang / /dpral ba mgo bo rgyab tu ste/ /rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do/ /slar yang re re yi yang

ni/ /las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid/ /stong nyid de nyid rig byed pa/ /rgyun du nang du bsgom par bya/ /ka yig la sogs ma yig mthar/ /lha mo bdag nyid chen mos nyon/ /gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lha/ /thams cad lha ma yin dang mi/ /sgrub po'i legs par nges

par ni/ /de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ka yig sogs su 'du shes so/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni/ /lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags/ /rnam shes ye shes snying po dang / /dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin/ /dbugs dang

bcud len las dang ni/ /gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan/ /dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang / /mtshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te/ /lung ni rjes su rig pa dang / /mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar/ /de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa/ /shes rab chen pos shes par bya/ /

rang bzhin gyis ni brjod pa'i las/ /dus kyi me yi mdog can no/ /ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las/ /lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin/ /dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin dkar/ /ser dang ljang gu de bzhin no/ /sgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni/ /de rnams de nyid 'gyur

gyis 'ong / /ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyi/ /ji lta'i cho gas yi ge rnams/ /phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang / /yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa'o/ /ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis/ /dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya/ /las ni de rnams shes bya ste/ /'dus

pa bde mchog bla ma dang / /bde mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / /'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed saM bu Ta/ /ji lta'i cho gas gzhan du yang / /de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsum las/ /phyung ba bde mchog chung ngu ste/ /a yig la sogs k+ShaHyig

mthar/ /le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /de kho na nyid ldan par sbyar/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes/ /mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i/ /de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /ji ltar dbus ma'i pad+mar ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal

bar bsgom/ /sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang / /'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste/ /phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya/ /pad 'dab rnams su rnal 'byor ma/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma/ /pad+ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma/ /g.yon skor du ni

bsgom bya ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la thod pa ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs/ /dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o/ /slar yang grwa bzhi po rnams su/ /ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na/ /thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon skor du'o/ /gzugs dang

sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg dang chos dang yid dang sems/ /kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyis da god par bya/ /sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni/ /rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste/ /ye shes shes bya'i rgya mtsho dag /sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya/ /

sgo skyong ma yi lha mo che/ /g.yon skor du ni dgod bya ba/ /glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho/ /seng ge rgya mtsho ma he mtsho/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma/ /gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin/ /byang chub chung ngu

bdag nyid che'i/ /dkyil 'khor de yir shes par bya/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni/ /sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni/ /pad+ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po/ /pad+ma 'dab ma stong phrag can/ /de yi dbus su

bsgom bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste/ /phyag stong pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /zhabs brgyad kyis gar du mdzad/ /spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog /ral pa'i cod pan can gyis gzugs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /rgyab tu

dbang phyug chen po 'dzin/ /lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo/ /bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o/ /shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad te/ /g.yas par rgyun du thabs yin no/ /khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs/ /gshin rje

dang ni log 'dren dang / /bden bral dang ni thags ris/ /dbang po tshogs bdag kar ti ka /dgra gcan zla ba nyi ma dang / /bla ma skyob pa bla de bzhin/ /nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me/ /myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste/ /rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang mtshon

cha yang bya'o/ /phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste/ /de'i gzugs can nam phyag gnyis skyes/ /sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma/ /slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o/ /'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba/ /rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te/ /bcom ldan kha dog

gang 'dra ba/ /de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya/ /thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phar/ /a yig la sogs sde brgyad de/ /phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba/ /stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo / /ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste/ /khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so/ /'khor lo drug

bdag rnal 'byor can/ /de thams cad ni gar du mdzad/ /thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon/ /phyag gnyis pa'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin ma/ /bde chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka nas spro ba/ /'khor lo gsum spro 'od zer

phreng / /srog ni 'og dang steng lta bas/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par bya/ /slar yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag /thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su/ /ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o/ /de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis/ /phyag

rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya/ /gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya/ /dam tshig gi ni spyod pa can/ /sdom pa chung ngur rab tu bshad/ /thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la/ /thams cad sdom pa gzung bar gyis/ /mche ba rnams

gtsigs rab sbyor bas/ /gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang / /sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /'og dang steng gnyis mche ba gnyis/ /bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags

la/ /hU~M phaT yi ge mthar sbyor gyis/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi/ /gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o/ /thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang / /sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no/ /bdag gi bdag pos rgyud 'di ni/ /gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /

nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas/ /phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags/ /khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya/ /rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che/ /thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o/ /'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas/ /de ni phyag rgya mngon brjod 'gyur/ /

zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba/ /ngag gis bsgos pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang / /rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong / /zhu ba'i gzugs ni snying ga ru/ /'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis/ /de ni theg pa cher sdom pa/ /bdag nyid chen po ye

shes gzugs/ /de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs/ /de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mche ba rnam

par gtsigs pa'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /sems can rnams kyi sdom byung ba/ /bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs/ /lha dgra yi ni rab sbyor bas/ /rab bshad bya yis lha

mo nyon/ /byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi/ /bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa/ /sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro/ /'dod chags chags bral rnam 'dres pa/ /sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can no/ /gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa/ /sngon gyi

spyod pa'i sdom pa'o/ /bai yi nam mkha' nam mkhar te/ /sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa/ /gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis/ /rang rig

bdag nyid byang chub ldan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'thob 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa/ /gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis/ /de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom ma min/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa/ /de ltar de nyid nges

shes bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang / /de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'i/ /A li kA li sogs sde tshan/ /dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs/ /gang du ming ni nges par mthong / /rigs ni de ru shes bya ste/ /ang ka'ang sems

can yang dag ldan/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang / /nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog byas nas/ /ma mo de rnams su rab grags/ /lha rnams kun gyis bskyed pa dang / /sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi'ang / /'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te/ /

de yis ma la yang dag brten/ /rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las/ /srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya/ /a A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang / /ya sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu/ /i I kha tsha Tha tha pha/ /ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa'o/ /u U ga dza Da da ba/ /la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o/ /e ai g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha/ /

wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o/ /o au aM aHnga nya Na/ /na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid/ /bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste/ /nyi can lnga rnams kyis de bzhin/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de/ /sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas/ /sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis/ /sa bon gzugs kyi

tshogs dran bya/ /de rnams rA sir yang dag grags/ /rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i chas/ /'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis/ /rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad/ /srog zung ngu ni de bzhin grags/ /ring dang thung ngu rgyal dang pham/ /

steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad/ /'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin/ /rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir/ /nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur/ /srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan/ /rA si kun gyis

shes par bya/ /kang+ka Ta seng bu mo dang / /bum pa rigs drug yang dag ldan/ /'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang / /ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis/ /brish+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang / /bum par yang dag ldan/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni/ /gza' shar ba yis 'char

bar 'gyur/ /ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang / /skan da ru ni son de bzhin/ /cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid/ /'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur/ /zhag gi 'char ba ma lus pa'ang / /'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan/ /nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar/ /yongs

su rim pas nyi shu bzhi/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'o/ /de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya/ /nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang / /dbang po rnams kyi cha dang ldan/ /thob pa zhag tu shes bya ste/ /bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang / /gzhan

rnams la yang de ltar sbyar/ /de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su/ /dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya/ /sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya/ /gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya/ /dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o/ /dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin

skar/ /rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o/ /dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po/ /yang dag sbyor dang bral na med/ /g.yo ba'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las/ /nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams

rgyus/ /lha rnams grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas/ /lha yis dgra ni bsgom par bya/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso/ /kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs/ /las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya/ /lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi/ /dgra ni 'khor

lo sdom pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha yi dgra/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni lha dgra yi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ma thams

cad/ /'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags/ /gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa/ /dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba/ /de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs/ /sems can kun ster po ci lags/ /'di la bdag ni

the tshom mchis/ /gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kye/ /phag mo la sogs mang po yi/ /lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon/ /rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med/ /byang chub chen por zhu las yod/ /

rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid/ /bdag gi las kyis yang dag 'byung / /de phyir dge dang mi dge blta/ /sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed/ /de yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams/ /gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can/ /rang gi las 'bras la za ba/ /ster ro gzhan du ci yang med/ /

ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur/ /glu 'di yis ni dgyes par byed/ /a mi tA b+ha dza ni tA ma sa mA d+h+ya mA ga mA ga mA d+hA nya/ ma pA nya rI sA mA nya ri ga mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hU ya te/ sa rI re sA rI re sa rI rI sA nI sA nya shru ta ni sA mA nya sA nI/ shI rI b+ha ga mA d+hA m+mA d+ha m+mA sA nya pA yA ma pA pA ma da mi te/

'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya/ /a ba d+hU tI'i dbus su ni/ /rnam shes grol ba la mtshon bya/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad/ /rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya/ /rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang / /khams thams

cad kyi bcud len te/ /'thungs pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po rnam bgrod mtshan nyid las/ /rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce/ /a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad/ /cha shas can gyi tha ma yi/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rtsa thams cad du bkang ba

ste/ /yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim/ /mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste/ /gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod/ /dbang chen la ni me yis bsreg /chu yi dbus su rab tu thim/ /myur du zhu nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so/ /chu yi tshogs

ni bskams byas pas/ /de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro/ /sems ni stong nyid la son bya/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o/ /nam mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag /de ltar 'od dpag med pa bsgom/ /rtsibs

brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi/ /shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya/ /bu med bri ba mi u ku/ /d+ha si mer ro ma ga 'drer/ /rlung du tu ka bi mi te/ /dbang ldan du ni rA si'o/ /de rnams 'khor lo rim ji bzhin/ /de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod/ /a i u e o'i sa bon/ /

bkra shis la sogs gza' lnga ni/ /shar la sogs par dgod par bya/ /ring po de nyid du dgod bya/ /aM aHnyi ma zlar shes bya/ /nyi ma zla ba 'dir grol ba/ /ku li re la nyi ma ste/ /gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas/ /mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi/ /so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur/ /

rA si rnams kyis brgyan pa yi/ /'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de/ /de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ /rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag /lug rnams ro hi ti sogs dang / /zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /rgyu skar

dus tshod yang dag ldan/ /gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te/ /do la rA si'i tshad kyis ni/ /skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin/ /kArti ka dang bzang po'i tshe/ /mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste/ /de la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa med na'o/ /mr-i ga shiR+Sha mgo dang ni/ /

gza' lhag nyi ma la smyo ba/ /mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhi na/ /khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi/ /rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang / /gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o/ /ku li ra mchu'i tshes brgyad kyi/ /tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o/ /gre dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang / /tshes bcu spen

pa seng ge la/ /nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang / /bu mo nyi mar gul mas 'chi/ /sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /gzhu dang phur bu'i re mo dang / /gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa/ /srang la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /snron dang bcu gcig nag

pa dang / /phur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o/ /chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang / /gro bzhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi/ /gro bzhin tshes bdun zla ba dang / /rgyal dang chu srin lag nor med/ /khrums stod khrums smad bcu gsum pa/ /zla ba mon gre bum pas 'dzad/ /tha skar brgyad pa nam gru

dang / /spen pa dang ni nya la 'chi/ /sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis/ /dus smra bas ni shes par bya/ /sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan/ /gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so/ /rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas/ /de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya/ /sngon las rnam pa sna

tshogs kyis/ /mkhas pas de'i rigs su skye'o/ /de yi 'bras bu shes bya ste/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas/ /rA si sogs 'khor 'brel pa de/ /rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /

dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po/ /lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so/ /de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar/ /las kyi 'bras bu de dran bya/ /thams cad bde ba kun sbyor las/ /de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i/ /'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa/ /bcom ldan ston pas

'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// //rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya/ /lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas/ /de kho na nyid ye shes zhus/ /sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas/ /'chi ba'i

mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba/ /de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis/ /rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon/ /lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni/ /de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye/ /rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ /de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /dbyangs

rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod/ /der ni snying po dgu po mchog /lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so/ /dbugs

ni rnam par spros tsam gyis/ /lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na/ /snga dro ro hi ta yi char/ /de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar/ /lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni/ /mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du/ /snying

gi gur dang lte ba dang / /brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /mdoms dang ling ga dag de bzhin/ /mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs/ /mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du/ /dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o/ /lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te/ /'chi ba'i dus ni

bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni/ /'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'/ /gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon/ /gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin/ /der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te/ /sum brgya drug cu rnams de bzhin/ /cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad/ /mdor

bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas/ /gang tshe rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang / /dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang / /nyi ma rnams ni brgyad kyi/ /gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod/ /zhag brgyad rnams su yongs gtong

pas/ /rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par/ /de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs/ /nges par de tshe 'chi ba ni/ /de yi zla ba rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad/ /'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so/ /lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na/ /lo gnyis su ni

de 'tsho ste/ /zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi/ /tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no/ /lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis/ /lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'o/ /nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du/ /gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na/ /lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas/ /zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis/ /nyi ma

brgyad rab tu bshad/ /the tshom med par bshad pa'o/ /zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can/ /nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes/ /bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa/ /g.yas su bgrod pa 'bab pa na/ /lor

ni yang dag bshad pa ste/ /zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/ /lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su/ /rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad/ /zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags/ /nyi ma rnams ni

bcu gnyis te/ /de yi 'tsho ba'i tshad yin no/ /gang tshe lnga bcu nyi mar ni/ /rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa na/ /de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba/ /lo gcig na ni the tshom med/ /nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi/ /gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na/ /'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni mchog

grangs kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyi rnams kyi/ /tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o/ /nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du/ /nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na/ /de tshe de yi tshad kyis ni/ /zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni/ /nyi ma brgyad na de bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la the tshom med/ /nyi ma

brgyad rgyu ba yis/ /zla ba yang ni brgyad na yang / /nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs/ /dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o/ /gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur ni/ /dri la zhon pa spyod pa na/ /nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad/ /

dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can/ /gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod/ /zla ba drug na tshe dang 'bral/ /nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su/ /gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na/ /zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab/ /zla ba'i rig byed

na tshe 'gro/ /nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi/ /zla ba rig byed du bshad do/ /lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum/ /rlung ni rgyun du 'bab pa ni/ /de ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma dus rnams su dran bya/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas/ /zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste/ /nyin bcu gcig

na de bzhin du/ /'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod/ /dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus nas/ /gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir/ /bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang / /bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni/ /cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bar ni gsal bar byed

pa yin/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du/ /dus 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i/ /mthun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad/ /lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches/ /khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/ /sna yi sha ni rnam chad cing / /steng

bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab/ /de yi 'tsho bar shes bya ba/ /nyi ma bdun na the tshom med/ /mig gis gos ni yang dag chad/ /gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin/ /cha shas dgu la yang dag zhon/ /lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin/ /go dA ba r+ya mkhur ba yi/ /ngos su steng

du 'gro ba mo/ /nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste/ /nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin no/ /rna ba g.yas la yongs brten nas/ /bzang mo steng du yang dag brten/ /bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te/ /'chad pa brgyad na de bzhin/ /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /lce la ri mo nag po

can/ /lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni/ /nam zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya/ /bcu gsum so yi bar du ni/ /gdong nag mo ni reg de bzhin/ /nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis/ /'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa yin/ /rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa/ /steng bltas mar ni rab tu

grags/ /bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon/ /bcu phyed kyis ni the tshom med/ /snying ga'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang / /steng du lta ma de mchog ma/ /gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo/ /zla ba phyed du the tshom med/ /lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo/ /bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs/ /

sen mo'i khrag med de bzhin zhag /nyin rnams bcu ru the tshom za/ /bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni/ /brla yi steng du skams pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags/ /nyin gzhan nyin la the tshom med/ /byin pa zung gi gang zhig rtsa/ /steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog /brgyad

pa ru shes bya ste/ /nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis/ /gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms/ /'chi ba'o steng du kha bltas mchog /mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la/ /'di yis 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma/ /steng bgrod mchog

gi dbang phyug ma/ /bcu gnyis su ni yang dag grags/ /nyin rnams dus tshod the tshom za/ /bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa/ /bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med/ /lo yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis/ /drug dang sum cu brgyad bcu/ /'di

ni zla bas rim ji ltar/ /shes bya de ltar lha chen mo/ /rim gyis rim gyis dbye ba'o/ /lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar/ /'tsho ba yir ni shes par bya/ /yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis/ /rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /rab tu sbyor bas srog bkang pas/ /sangs rgyas

lus la 'chi ci smos/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas/ /mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog /snal ma bcu gnyis mtha' bar du'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas/ /'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur/ /gsang sngags chen po'i 'od

la ni/ /gnas nas kun du bgrod par bya/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur/ /rnam pa dri za'i ris can no/ /rtswa yis kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa/ /dngos po kun la gnas pa yin/ /skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni/ /ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed/ /chos bdag

med pa 'dzag par 'gyur/ /gang zag rnams la dgod par 'gyur/ /gnyis ka sgyu ma chen mo ste/ /snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin/ /mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems/ /mtshams rnams kun du 'chi ba yin/ /'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs/ /rnal 'byor

rnams la bde ster byed/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gzung ba yi/ /thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /bde ba dam pa yang dag myong / /rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma/ /lha ni mngon

rtogs gzugs can te/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las/ /mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'od kyi

cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// //de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs/ /byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /mchod pa byas shing phyag byas nas/ /'di skad du ni gsol ba'o/ /gtso bo lha rnams sgrub thabs dang / /de rnams rang sngags bdag la

gsungs/ /gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa/ /gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags/ /lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon/ /gang gis yang dag cho ga yis/ /myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug /dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni/ /sku

bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de/ /de la ma mo lha rnams dang / /pho nya 'byung po gza' de bzhin/ /lus srul po ni chen po dang / /rig pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya/ /dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa/ /srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin/ /dus thams cad du bskyed

pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can/ /ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang / /lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba/ /gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /lus srul po ni nam mkha' ste/ /rdo rje'i sku yi rab sbyor bar/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor cha

yis ni/ /a ba d+hU tIr 'bab pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma/ /de yi dus su shes par bya/ /de bltas nas ni phyi rol du/ /ras bris la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod/ /nag pa'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /'bum

phrag bzlas pas de nas ni/ /ster 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o/ /tshangs ma zhi ba mo de bzhin/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo nyid dang tsa muN+Di/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo me gdan mo/ /gnyis pa'i dum bur dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / /

dbang dang mi stan can/ /bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin/ /dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba/ /nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang / /gza' lag phur bu pa sangs dang / /spen pa dang ni rA hu'o/ /bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jug de bzhin/ /drag po gzhon nu nges par bskor/ /sa

dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang / /kam po dzI khyab bdag de bzhin/ /'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun nas phyi yi dkyil

'khor bri/ /ri mo sum skor dbus byin pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sku/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /bzhad pa'i

zhal la khro dang bcas/ /kha dog sngon po drag chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs/ /sum cu pa rnams 'jigs par mdzad/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin/ /bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ /thod pa dang ni

kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du rim pa ji lta bas/ /mkha' 'gro kam po dzI nyid ma/ /'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o/ /de ltar rdo rje sku yi don/ /mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya/ /lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur/ /

pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i/ /snying ga gsang ba mgrin pa ru/ /de nyid rnam par slar dgod bya/ /de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas/ /bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min/ /lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang lus skyes/ /las dang po yi

sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs bcur rnam par spro bar 'gyur/ /hrIHyig las byung ba'i lha mo/ /phag mo phyag ni bzhi ma ste/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs rung ma'o/ /pheM yig gis

bris zhi ba mo/ /kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /kha T+wAM Da ma ru de bzhin/ /hrIHyi yi ges gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no/ /hoHyi yi ge sa tsa muN+Di/ /

kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wAM ga nyid thod pa dang / /cang te'u chang snod de bzhin no/ /oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog /gaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo/ /kha dog ljang gu

phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum po dang thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /bi yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ /'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang / /zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog /I yig las byung ba dbang mo/ /kha dog ser mo phyag

bzhi ma/ /rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub bcas zhags de bzhin no/ /thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes skra/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /ro la zhon ma spyan gsum ma/ /rked par stag gi pags pa dkris/ /shar sgor tshangs pa bri

bya ba/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni/ /kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ /ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no/ /lho ru drag po bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog

can phyag bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du/ /zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin/ /nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin/ /thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin de bzhin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa/ /kha dog

dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang po la zhon pa/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang / /thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog /me ru lug la zhon pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi

pa/ /me yi thab dang thod pa dang / /skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar/ /gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa/ /kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /kun du skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin/ /bden bral mi la zhon pa ste/ /kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa/ /ral

gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog /chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan/ /rlung lha la zhon pa/ /du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste/ /ba dan dang

ni thod pa dang / /de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog /lus ngan du ni gter la zhon/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin/ /thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan/ /thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'/ /rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom/ /rang

gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che/ /ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po rig ma de bzhin gzhan/ /de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /de phyir re re bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su/ /sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis/ /

rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la/ /pho nya'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /zla ba rdo rje'i go cha yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/ /de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed/ /gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /de phyir rim pas mchod

par bya/ /de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing / /sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste/ /rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ /oM hU~M phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas/ /der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang

du/ /bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te/ /ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar/ /lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te/ /lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don/ /

nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can/ /gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa/ /bcom ldan gzugs kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba

ni rdo rje sku'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po/ /rnal 'byor ma yis sad mdzad nas/ /ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad/ /blo gros chen po dus ci lags/ /kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus/ /myu gu can gyis skyes

pa'o/ /sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po/ /myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad/ /gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni/ /sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod/ /gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu/ /'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du/ /thub pa skyes mchog

rnams kyis gsungs/ /de tshe myu gu can bsgom pa/ /sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid/ /myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te/ /sems las byung ba myu gu can/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas/ /gang zhig tu ni myu gu skyes/ /de yis myu gu can nges bya/ /rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang

bya/ /dge ba'am ni mi dge kun/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba/ /de rnams thams cad dus rnams su/ /thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom/ /ro kr-i ma ni rnyed byed pa'o/ /ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spong / /ku swa A dus byed gzugs su ste/ /tshes grangs de ni

yongs su spang / /mo bu mo bzang dang bkra shis so/ /ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o/ /b+hu bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so/ /b+ha pU gu rnyed pa byed pa'o/ /mi gu d+ha nor la sogs par 'dzad/ /tra gu a dus kyi gzugs can no/ /br-i shu pU dge ba rnams byed do/ /b+hi shu pU nad dang

'joms pa yin/ /b+hu b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can no/ /kU ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob/ /byA ma A gdung ba byed pa'o/ /pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no/ /me'i gdan can du mi ki ra/ /slar yang gshin rjer raN+Da spang / /srin por bcu lnga pa nyid dang / /khyu mchog chu

lhar spang bar bya/ /sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du/ /gter du rmi lam can de bzhin/ /bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du/ /'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin/ /zla ba dang ni nyi sogs tshes/ /de rnams res mo rab bshad bya/ /bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin/ /

sems g.yengs 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas/ /skye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi/ /cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya/ /khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang / /rmi lam lnga pa de bzhin/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags/ /rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod/ /nyi la me ru yang dag gnas/ /stong la

rlung gi gnas su'o/ /de ltar de dbus gnas pa ni/ /phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas/ /zla ba nyi las byung ri mo/ /mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro/ /zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis des de spangs/ /mche ba dang phrad ma bltas pas/ /

bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa/ /rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin/ /dkar dang cig shos cho ga yis/ /blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur/ /rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed/ /skye bo rang gis

byas pa yis/ /las 'di shes par ma gyur to/ /las de yis ni dus rnams ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa/ /de srid du ni dus rab 'jug /rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong / /yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur/ /

de ni myu gu can du grags/ /kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can ni/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa/ /gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs/ /ye shes myu gu rnam bsgoms pas/ /las rnams thams

cad mthong mi 'gyur/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las/ /sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa/ /rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje myu gu can gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// //de nas

rdo rje'i gar byas nas/ /rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so/ /ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che/ /las dang 'brel pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las ni rnam nyams pas/ /rgyun nyams pas ni 'ong med pa/ /'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /snying rje mnyes

gshin pas bka' stsal/ /sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang / /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis/ /khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon/ /rdo rje ral pa can sbyor bas/ /las kyi nang du bsgrub par 'gyur/ /re re yi ni sbyor ba yi/ /

de ni rang 'byung du gnas so/ /shin tu dad pa la gnas pas/ /dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya/ /de yi ral pas rtag 'jig rten/ /ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin/ /dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir bag chags thams cad

dang / /dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur/ /skye bo chen po de 'byung ba/ /gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur/ /rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'gyur/ /dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas nas/ /de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rtse dgu

rtse mo gcig pa dang / /rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can/ /de ltar la sogs dril bu che/ /rtse mo stong gi bar du'o/ /sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis/ /spros pa med cing yi ge med/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung / /de nyid kyis ni

rtog pa med pa'i bdag /gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin/ /sngon bshad rtse can de rdo rje/ /gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba/ /chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can/ /de nyid du ni gsor bar bya/ /phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya/ /

ril bu rtag tu cha gsum can/ /lha yis yang dag brgyan par bya/ /re re yi ni lha'i bdag po/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas/ /de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o/ /lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan/ /dril bu de la pad sogs bya/ /ji ltar

de rnams kyis ni brgyan/ /de bzhin dril bu'i ska rags so/ /lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su/ /phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon bya/ /de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon/ /bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang / /steng du rang rigs mtshan

ma can/ /'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che/ /tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin/ /de ni nang gi gzugs can dag /de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon bya/ /thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che/ /rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya/ /de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sems can thams cad bsgrub

par bya/ /ral can dril bur yang dag grags/ /rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur/ /rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun/ /de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug /thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las/ /

rdo rje ral pa can byung ba/ /rdo rje dril bur yang dag brten/ /bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ral pa can gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che/ /dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas/ /bdag gis mngon

sum du bshad kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis/ /lus can kun gyi lus gang la/ /gnad ni stong phrag gnas pa ste/ /de rnams la yig dgod pa ni/ /ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin/ /yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig /khams re re la yi ge rnams/ /

slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya/ /gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can/ /mtshams kun du ni gnas pa 'bar/ /khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las/ /dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po/ /bdag med pa yis bdag tu gzhag /gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o/ /de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce/ /dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /sman thams cad dang nye ba yin/ /sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o/ /phyi rol rnams

kyi 'ang yi ge'i bdag /de'i ming nyid du shes par bya/ /me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi/ /dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can/ /de rnams kyis ni bcud len bsgrub/ /gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi/ /ka sogs thams

cad sman chen te/ /las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan du/ /der ni nges par gsal rig bya/ /dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms nas/ /rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin/ /yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams kyis/ /bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba/ /des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /bla

med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las/ /bdud rtsi'i tshigs mtshams gzugs rnam pa'i/ /grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo chen po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu

gcig pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo/ /'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba/ /ston pa rdo rje che ci lags/ /gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags/ /sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags/ /chos nyan pa yi dus su yang / /

ci zhig gis ni brtan par bya/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi/ /ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong / /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni/ /sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni/ /ji lta'i rim pas bshad kyis nyon/ /shin tu zab mo'i

don chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes/ /sems can rnams kyi rang snang can/ /bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas/ /rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du/ /khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can/ /lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi/ /grong khyer gsum

rnams su byung ba'o/ /sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ong / /nges par las chung bar 'gro'o/ /yang na dus rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong / /sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas/ /sems kyang de yi gnas la'o/ /rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha

la sogs pa de rnams rmongs/ /de yis rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi/ /rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul/ /rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul/ /'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste/ /hU~M gi yi ge'i sgra yis ni/ /ston pas 'khor lo can mchog byas/ /chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru/ /nyi shu'i

lhan cig skyes gdan du/ /ngag gi spyod pas mnyan par byed/ /der song nas ni de la thim/ /de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi/ /slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya/ /rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan bdag nyid/ /mi

'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs/ /mthun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la/ /bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang / /gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol/ /ji ltar smras

pa de bzhin byed/ /'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag /sems can kun la thugs brtse dang / /lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyin/ /kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang / /bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son/ /mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma/ /phyag rgya brda ni byed pa po/ /de sogs

yon tan rnams kyis gang / /skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste/ /bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma/ /sgra rnams su ni sgra'i ye shes/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad can khyab bdag /

'phos pa'i lhag ma 'gyur ye shes/ /dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no/ /sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni/ /de phyir phra mo'i rang bzhin can/ /spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags/ /de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par/ /sa gsum de yi rang

bzhin byas/ /de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo/ /shing srin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin/ /'di yi bgrod pa ma shes pas/ /byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings/ /mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba po/ /bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa pa po/ /bcom ldan

ye shes kyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gang gis sgrub pa po/ /'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad bya/ /de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya/ /

lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa/ /dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya/ /phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid/ /spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags/ /kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la/ /dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag brten/ /grong de rnams su spyod pa dang / /yid kyis brtul zhugs

bstan par bya/ /sring dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya/ /bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/ /yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas/ /lus ni lus la thim par gyis/ /sdom par bdag nyid kyis

bsdams nas/ /phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za/ /lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan/ /chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste/ /mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro/ /gzung dang

'dzin pa'i dngos po yis/ /yid 'di la ni gos pa med/ /'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro/ /sa bzhi gang du spyod pa na/ /rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya/ /lnga ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni/ /bde ba can du de rtsen to/ /

dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas/ /phyi nas yid kyis rab tu bshad/ /srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yi/ /ye shes sbyong ba'i brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i

cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni/ /khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas/ /de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de la dang por lnga dang bdun/ /brgyad dang bcu gsum lnga

dang / /bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog /tha skar la sogs shes bya ste/ /lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya/ /bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum/ /gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin/ /byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum/ /mi yi tshogs

su dran par bya/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang / /dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ /brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa/ /srin po'i rigs su dran par bya/ /ra'i rigs gsum pa dang brgyad pa/ /klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o/ /

drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o/ /bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste/ /byi la de bzhin dgu pa'o/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ /rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o/ /bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga/ /khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo/ /thog ma tha ma bong bu yin/ /

rigs su de rnams rab tu grags/ /bcu gsum pa dang lnga pa/ /de ni ma her mngon par brjod/ /thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug /rta yi rigs su rab tu brjod/ /nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ /spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o/ /gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin/ /glang po yi ni

rigs su 'gro/ /nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi/ /mi ste stobs ni che ba yin/ /nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste/ /mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad/ /stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar/ /bshad kyis da ltar mnyan par gyis/ /mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te/ /gzhan du rab tu 'thob

pa min/ /skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par/ /'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi/ /lug dang srang dang karka Ta/ /chu srin mthon po la dran bya/ /kI Ta bum seng khyu mchog ni/ /brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan/ /nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir/ /gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o/ /bla ma nyi

ma sa'i skyes bu/ /ngan spong rA hu zla bud med/ /gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste/ /mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin/ /de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du/ /byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bzang por de bshad de/ /rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /g.yon

pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems/ /dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan/ /byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab la/ /byang chub sems rnams kyi rigs so/ /snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni/ /las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin/ /yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan/ /rigs med

rigs can kyang med do/ /srid par rtsed mo tsam du ni/ /bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa/ /me long gi ni yul la gzugs/ /gang 'dra mthong ste de med do/ /de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no/ /de yi nang du zhu ba'i

sems/ /de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min/ /nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su/ /rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can/ /dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid/ /dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs/ /

byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzang po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis/ /bde kun bdag nyid du skye bshad/ /don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de

bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya/ /'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad/ /'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni/ /sa yi dbus su bya ba yin/ /thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig /bzhi

bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya/ /de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni/ /srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can/ /yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni/ /spangs nas dbus mar gnas pa yin/ /stong par nges par thim byas nas/ /'og dang steng du blta bar bya/ /rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru/ /

rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed/ /khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la/ /sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos/ /de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa/ /dpa' bo chen po'i don can no/ /dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi/ /bsnun dang bsgrub pa la sogs spangs/ /'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin

pa yis ni/ /nyi ma dang po zad med can/ /rdo rje'i lam ni langs pa'i sems/ /gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas so/ /de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can/ /dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams/ /sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya/ /

ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams/ /bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son/ /gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis/ /de dang de yi gnas su bri/ /gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sku la sogs pa'i bzlas

kun dang / /de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can/ /sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul pa yis/ /de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su/ /me

yi gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis/ /'byung po'i tshogs de kun spyod bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang / /drag po rengs par byed yi ge/ /las dang rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms te/ /'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya/ /'chi

ba slu zhing de nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro/ /nA da nA dar 'dzom bya zhing / /thig le thig ler thim par bya/ /de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bu gdab/ /'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de/

oM hU~M hU~M phaT kyi yi ge mtha'/ /ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o/ /na maHshrI badzra DA ka ma hA bI ra bI rI shwa rA ya/ tri b+hu wa Na kam+pa kam+pA ba NA ya/ daMSh+T+rot+ka Ta b+hI Sha Na b+he re bA ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ne trA ya/ bi ng+yu ta dzi hwA ya/ kaM kA la mA lA b+ha ra No grA ya/ ko Ti la k+Sha bU dzA ya/ dz+wA lA ba

lI D+ha lag nA ya/ par shu pA sho d+ya ta shU lA ya/ kalpAM ta ng+hU mrU gra puShA ya/ bi ka Ta mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/ mA tr-i ga Na pa ri pU ri ta man trA ya/ sa ha dza sun d+ha ri bal+la b+ha ka rA ya/ hU~M hU~M kA ro ts+tsha ra Na mu khA ya/ ma hA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta saM trA sa na ka rA ya/ ma hA kalpAn

tA g+ni te dzA ya/ dza TA ka lA pa mu ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la b+hin na d+hA ri Ne/ ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya/ byA g+h+ra tsa rmAM b+ha ra d+hA ri Ne/ be tA la saM g+ha ma r+d+ha Na ka rA ya/ ma hA big+h+na ni bA ri Ne/ sha tru ni suM b+ha na ka rA ya/ tri sA hA sra ma hA sa ha sre ka ro mA ba lAn+ta brti Ne/ sha ta sa ha sra mu

khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma hA pi shi ta ru d+hi ra ba sA hA ri Ne/ sarba mA ra ba la d+h+waM si ne/ shriSh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA nAM Sho Sha na staM b+ha na bi d+h+rA ba NA ya/ an tra mA lA d+hA ri ne/ su me ru kaM pi ta nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi g+h+ra ha d+hA ra NA ya/ ma hA kA sha ti la kA t+ma ne/ bud d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra k+Sha

NA ni Sh+bA da nA ya/ dz+nyA nA mr-i ta baR+Sha pa NA ya/ sarba karma pra bar+t+ta nA ya ne/ baM da na ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+haM dza Na ka rA ya/ muM DA ba li lag+na sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kr-i ta yaM tra maM tra nA sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+ShA ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nAM bi dA la ne/ d+harmo d+ha ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+phA ra s+phA ra NA ya/ iM dra dzA la sarba

satwAt+ma ne/ grasta bA da pra bA da ma hA ma te/ /de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang / /rab tu mang ba rgya che'o/ /sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming / /sems can ming gis shes par bya/ /sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /khams gsum rnams su yongs

bzhugs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// //de nas mig la sogs dbang po/ /kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad/ /

mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya/ /gang du byang chub sems gnas pas/ /der ni mig gis nges par blta/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog /sems ni mig tu shes par bya/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /so sor rlung

ni dbab par bya/ /gang nyid du ni skyes dus su/ /de yi dus su thim nas 'gro/ /de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi/ /sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs/ /yid kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni/ /

lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya/ /lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas/ /lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis/ /lce yi mngon shes la brten nas/ /dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin/ /lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis/ /mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya/ /sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la/ /de nyid rnal 'byor

ldan par 'gro/ /nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas/ /chu tshod drug cu nyid dang ni/ /chu'i srang drug cu tham pa dang / /g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya/ /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la/ /dpang sa su sor brgyad nyid yin te/ /guny+dza drug cu'i tshad la ni/ /sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o/ /skad cig thang

cig yud tsam dang / /kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang / /se gol gtogs par shes bya ste/ /dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so/ /pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya/ /dus dang dus min sel ba po/ /mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya/ /mtshon

bya mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid/ /sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te/ /srog chags rnams kyis gar bgrod pa/ /bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur/ /mdud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas/ /gzugs

su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po/ /mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya/ /thur sel lam la rtag brten nas/ /slar yang re re'i nang du ste/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis/ /mig ni lnga

ru shes par bya/ /'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan/ /sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi/ /mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa/ /de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi'ang mchog yin no/ /dngos

po'i ye shes can ma lus/ /ring du yongs su spangs pa yin/ /thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa/ /dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mig mi bzang

gi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// //de nas lha mos phyag byas nas/ /de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas/ /stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni/ /bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol/ /mkhas pas rgyun du nang bdag gi/ /

sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas/ /khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te/ /bde ba thab tu yang dag 'thob/ /nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzar ro/ /slob dpon gnyis med de de la/ /yang dag rigs pa'i

gzugs su bsreg /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di me/ /gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do/ /yam shing rtsa ru yang dag grags/ /gang phyir sA li las skyes 'bras/ /tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin/ /'di ru mar ni byang chub sems/ /khrag ni sbrang

rtsir shes par bya/ /srog sogs rlung rnams dUr ba'o/ /gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar/ /tsan+dan dang ni gla rtsi'o/ /me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags/ /mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin/ /bud shing so sen rus pa'o/ /mdor bsdus pa yis pags pa gos/ /

me yi thab kyi dbus su ni/ /skra dang ba spu lha ru 'gyur/ /sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni/ /sna tshogs 'bru ste de la bsreg /rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs son pa/ /gang ba'i sreg blugs su shes bya/ /dbang po thams cad gar byed de/ /de yi bag chags

glu len no/ /sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo/ /snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin/ /srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi/ /stobs po che ni bsgom par bya/ /las thams cad pas sbyin sreg ni/ /des mnyes pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /'jig rten mchog gi

khams kun du/ /yid ni de ru yang dag rol/ /gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa/ /de tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas/ /sbyin sreg rang bdag nyid mthong bas/ /smod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes/ /de rnams dbus mar 'thob par

bya/ /mtshams rnams kun du khong khro ba/ /sems chen po ni gsod par 'gyur/ /rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /de las byung ba bza' bar bya/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas/ /gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan

nyid ni/ /de la thim par byed par 'gyur/ /khams kun yang dag sbyor ba las/ /ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid/ /me yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs po che'i cho ga ste rab tu

byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo rje pad 'du ba/ /ji bzhin bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /a ba d+hU tI can dngos grub/ /rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag rol/ /don dam pa yi nyams la gnas/ /de

yi sbyor bas grol bar ni/ /gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'od/ /ha yig drug pa dang ldan pa'i/ /sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rtsar 'bab ste/ /steng du kha bltas

dpral bar son/ /srung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis/ /rang gi lag pas rdo rje gzung / /byang chub sems la rtsen byed la/ /rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin/ /srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis/ /srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i

rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya/ /de yi dus su gang mthong ba/ /dngos po kun la ltung bar bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid/ /rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du/ /bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni/ /sems can don ni nges par byas/ /sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod/ /pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya/ /'dod chags

me yis dgyes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rtag gzung ba/ /lce yis bya yi lag pas min/ /lhan skyes 'phos pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung / /phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te/ /de nas btung bar bya ba yin/ /stobs thams

cad kyi bza' bar bya/ /sA li skyes sogs 'bad pas so/ /sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed/ /de de'i thod par bya ba ste/ /de nas sa bon gdab par bya/ /de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang / /gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya/ /

de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur/ /ril bu 'am ni skud pa ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o/ /b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom pa/ /rin chen rdo rje can de sman/ /dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste/ /spangs pa rab tu

bstan pa yin/ /gang dang gang gi las kyi ni/ /de dang de'i ming can sngags so/ /sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las/ /de ni rtag tu sman rnams te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rin chen rdo rje'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa

brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya/ /ha yig skye gnas dbus su ste/ /ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o/ /b+h+yi yig dbus ma'i

pad+mar te/ /ba yi yi ge snying ga ru/ /rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa/ /dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed/ /rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog /gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/ /mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni/ /mgrin par dag tu gnas pa nyid/ /'tsho ba rta

yi dbyibs 'dir ni/ /gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin/ /de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba/ /sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du'o/ /nyi de rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas/ /byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar

'gyur/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs/ /rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog /sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang / /lam mthong ba ni thams cad la/ /de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar/ /mtshan mo mun pa drag po 'phrog /rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son

par/ /rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin/ /gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba/ /sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te/ /sprin la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur/ /kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed/ /rang gi

dga' ba shar mtshan nyid/ /mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du/ /thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur/ /khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis/ /de tshes 'og dngos grub 'gyur/ /bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo/ /yan lag gcig gi rol par byed/ /

sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste/ /sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin/ /ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags sgo/ /me yis tshig la gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags/ /bsten

par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo / /de nyid thabs so yid kyi las/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o/ /nang du byed pa ma yin te/ /gus pa yid kyis dbu mar gnas/ /phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyis ye shes/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs/ /sems

can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba/ /de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med/ /mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par/ /kun du dbye ba yod ma yin/ /lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste/ /tshad ma pa rnams tho cho can/ /thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas/ /ye shes

can rnams de'i phyir shes/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par/ /rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu dgu

pa'o// //de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan/ /bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de/ /'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su/ /gang zhig stong pa de srog chags/ /

khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste/ /dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas/ /zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i/ /rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag /rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang / /de ni rab 'joms la brjod do/ /dus

thams cad du g.yo ba med/ /g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo / /de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung / /bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o/ /do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po/ /sgra dang thig ler de shes bya/ /'od

gsal ba dang snang ba gsum/ /de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang / /mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya/ /nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /de yang kun gzhi shes bya ste/ /me long du yang rab tu bshad/ /

chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de/ /dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi lhag med 'pho/ /de'i dus rnam par

gzhag med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min/ /nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /de yi snying por rab tu bstan/ /de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so/ /gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do/ /srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid/ /

dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams/ /sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang / /rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun/ /gnyis po nyid ni

gnyis med 'gyur/ /dbu mar lta rnams kyis 'grub ste/ /ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod/ /chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog /gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi/ /tshul chen chos de 'dod

pa dang / /gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag /tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin/ /'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste/ /chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo / /

nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya/ /shan pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs/ /gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa/ /de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar/ /lam rjes skyob rnams kyi grol 'thob/ /

nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ /gzugs su sdom pa bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob/ /rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid/ /stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa/ /bcom ldan

rab 'joms rnam pa yi/ /rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas te/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to/ /rang gis rig pa'i

mtshan nyid ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod/ /rang rig ye shes las byung ba/ /ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa dang / /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ /

ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur/ /thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /gsum par mda' yi dbyibs dang 'dra/ /bzhi par 'ben gyi gzugs can no/ /lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /drug par

khams drug 'byung ba yin/ /bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs/ /brgyad par pad+mar brjod pa yin/ /dgu pa ru ni bcud len te/ /bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so/ /bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs/ /

bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste/ /bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no/ /lnga pa nyid rA hu ste/ /thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa'o/ /rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni/ /rang gis rig par shes par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya/ /rgas pa med

cing 'chi ba med/ /nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin/ /lte bar shrI yi yi ger gyur/ /he yig snying gar dgod par bya/ /ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lor te/ /thod par ka yi yi ge'o/ /thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur/ /

de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med/ /gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid/ /dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug /'khor lo bzhi yi 'dab son nas/ /rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog /rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /byung bar rnam par

shes par bya/ /sems can po ni sad bzhin pas/ /don yod mthong ba thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te/ /dus thams cad du nges par gnas/ /longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du/ /gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong / /bzhi pa rab mang bdag med de/ /de

phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas/ /nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas/ /nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can/ /rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste/ /nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang / /bcu drug rnams

kyi cha rnams kyi/ /nyi ma nyid ni bar du'o/ /stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnams su/ /dpal he ru ka bsam par bya/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro

bar 'gyur/ /gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor/ /gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar/ /rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de

nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi/ /ston mo mngon par bshad par bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i de byung ngo / /rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags/ /srog gi rlung gis gar byed do/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste/ /de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs/ /rang

gis rig pa bza' bar bya/ /snying rje'i kha yis btung bar bya/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol/ /sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub/ /thams cad de yi rang bzhin du/ /bza' ba bza' ba med par bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang bsgom par bya/ /ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya/ /pa yig

gzhan gyi grong du 'gro/ /brtan pa thams cad t+ma yi yig /na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ /rte yig bde ba'i lha can yin/ /shwa yig ta la sogs pa'i stobs/ /ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la/ /de yi rab tu sbyor bar bya/ /mtshams kyi skad ni 'di

rnams kun/ /bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya/ /bgrod pa 'di rnams la brten nas/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang / /he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo/ /pad+ma gar dbang phyug de yang / /sbyor ba kun la shes par bya/ /pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags/ /

gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can/ /gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung / /lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin/ /shes po thams cad de la gnas/ /khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug /gar byed pa yi sku chen la/ /de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro/ /rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su/ /lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol par gyis/ /'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las/ /de rnams kyis ni dga' ba byed/ /gang dag gang gi las rnams la/ /de dang de yir bsgom par bya/ /sgrub po rnams

kyi byang chub rtsar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong / /de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas/ /gar byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing / /che son pa rnams gnas par byed/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rnal 'byor

rnams kyi srid la sbyong / /rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o/ /gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sems thams cad ni rab 'jug pa/ /'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams/ /bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya/ /bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs

nas/ /phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya/ /bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas/ /bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni pad+ma gar dbang gi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //

de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang / /de ni ye shes chen por brjod/ /rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no/ /spu khung rtse mo thams cad las/ /de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen

po/ /de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa/ /'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son/ /ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa/ /de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs/ /g.yo ba 'gog par byas pa yis/ /de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid/ /gdong gis gdong ni blta bar gyis/ /

mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi/ /gzugs ni pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin/ /srog chen po der shes bya ste/ /shi ba'i lus las nges par 'thon/ /oM gyi yi ge yid la bya/ /dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya/ /bdag nyid kyis ni hU~M yig spro/ /gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan/ /sems la oM

gyi yi ger 'gyur/ /lus la gnas par mtshon par bya/ /haM yig mchog gi dang po yis/ /ye shes dngos po rnams su sprul/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis/ /sngags pa

la ni 'bar bar bya/ /bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste/ /'dod na bde ba rnam par spro/ /de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas/ /dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed/ /sdug dang mi sdug

rnam dpyod pa/ /rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o/ /myur bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs/ /rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya/ /sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos/ /de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang / /rin chen dbang dang A ro

lika/ /don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang / /de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig /'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang / /bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po/ /blo ldan so sor sems can don/ /

gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur/ /mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du/ /tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya/ /khams thams cad kyi til mar ni/ /dogs pa med pas bya ba yin/ /rnam snang sbyor bas btung bya 'am/ /byug pa yang de nyid kyis bya'o/ /de yis sna nas

sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o/ /rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong / /gnyis pa thams cad kun sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol/ /bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku/ /rab grol mdzad pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya

ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang chen bshad bya ste/ /mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te/ /sems dpa' snying po ston

pa'o/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya/ /pul+lI ra las lte bar 'bab/ /dzA lan d+ha rar yang dag gnas/ /o D+yan du ni kun du spyod pa 'grub/ /ar bu dar ni bza' dang btung can no/ /

go dA ba ra'i gnas su rol ba ste/ /rA me shwa rir rgyal dang pham pa'o/ /de bI ko Tir rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ /mA la wa ru rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /kA ma rU par tshig ni 'grub pa'o/ /o Dir mngon sum dngos grub ster ba ste/ /tri sha ku nar dbang po rnams kyi ni/ /myur du dngos

grub rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /ko sa la ru rnal 'byor dngos grub ste/ /ka ling ka ru phra mo'i dngos grub skye/ /lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /kAny+tsi ru ni bsad pa'i dngos grub bo/ /hi ma la yar mthun par 'grub pa ste/ /pre ta pu rir rang gi lta ba'o/ /gri ha de ba tAr ni bkas gnang ba/ /

lhan skyes 'pho med sau rA Sh+Ta ru/ /gser gling du ni rang gi don 'grub bo/ /nA ga rar ni gnas kyi dngos grub ster/ /sin d+hu ra ru stobs 'grub de bzhin du/ /ma rul 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub bo/ /ku lu tar ni rang bzhin dngos grub tu/ /de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye ba'o/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' rtag bsgoms nas/ /thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos/ /gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su/ /khams su gyur pa'i ro chen po/ /gsang ba'i tshig tu shes par bya/ /mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran/ /dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste/ /thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas/ /

rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste/ /sems can 'jig rten las la ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis/ /nA da'i dbus las yang dag byung / /de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro/ /gnas par de ni mngon par brjod/ /de ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /dpa'

bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag /de ni nus par rab tu bshad/ /skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i/ /nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis/ /dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis/ /dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa/ /thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa'

che/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso/ /sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni/ /'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu

rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi/ /las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya/ /nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'/ /thams cad gsang chen gyis gnas su/ /gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can/ /kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes

ni/ /gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can/ /de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya/ /dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi/ /re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /zlum pa'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du/ /thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya/ /de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /bskor

bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur/ /shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sogs par 'phro/ /dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad/ /rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya/ /bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya/ /nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'pho bya/ /re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun

phyed bcas pa'o/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni/ /nyin zhag la ni shes par bya/ /lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa/ /de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug /rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la/ /sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor/ /'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams/ /gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can

la/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas/ /dus dang dus tshod za bar byed/ /'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /kun du gnas pa bdag ma yin/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo/ /de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du/ /bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul

med/ /yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa/ /gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o/ /de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten rmongs/ /de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub min/ /rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du/ /de dang de yi mchog ye shes/ /'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni/ /sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la

bshad do/ /kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan/ /lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms la 'dud/ /dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis/ /las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das par

ston pa ci/ /sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas/ /sems can theg pa da dung nyams byed ci/ /de ltar yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur/ /bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /byang chub dus su blang bar gyis/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //

de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag /bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa/ /khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs/ /chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur/ /chos

dang chos min pa yi gzugs/ /chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med/ /bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis/ /'jig rten kun gyi'ang don can te/ /bdag nyid chen po ster ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa/ /khyod kyis dam tshig bstan pa ste/ /gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung / /bdag

gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas/ /byang chub mchog tu yid bsgrubs so/ /ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs/ /de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o/ /hU~M gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /nga rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur/ /khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni/ /de rnams la ni skye

'chi med/ /bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen/ /byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod/ /khyod dang thabs cig 'dres par 'gyur/ /gong bu gcig pu gnyis med bzhugs/ /de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che/ /mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid/ /mchod pa rnams ni

gnyis med byed/ /phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas/ /gnyis pa yi ni mchod par dran/ /bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa/ /gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag /'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o/ /de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas/ /thams cad byas pas las rgyal

por/ /'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du/ /pad+ma yi ni bskor nas snod/ /sngags pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya/ /sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni/ /skra grol ba yis gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni/ /

kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya/ /de yi lag par son pa'i dpal/ /gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus/ /ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya/ /spun gyi spyod pa'ang bsten par bya/ /snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing / /dbang po rnams ni mi rtag

par/ /bsgom bya snang ba med pa yi/ /rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas/ /rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog /stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos po thams cad spang bar bya/ /don dam can de nyid 'dir bya/ /rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya/ /man ngag gcig ni bsgoms
