chu'i mdog can gyi hU~M las byung ba'i kha T+wA~M ga dkar po bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can thur du bltas pa rnam par zhu bar bsams te/ de bcud kyi rang bzhin du ro gcig par gyur par bltas la/ A li kA li yongs su gyur pa las/ oM AHhU~M gi yi ge rtseg mar yongs su gnas pa ste de dag las

dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams spros la 'gro ba'i don byas te/ mnyam par sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas zhu bar gyur cing ji lta ji lta ba'i sa bon la rab tu bcug ste/ yi ge gsum ci 'dod par brjod pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /

mthe bo rdo rje brtan par rab tu sbyar/ /de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas/ /bskor zhing bskor bas kun du bskor bar bya/ /rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta/ /gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrogs shing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams

'gugs/ /de nas yang lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa bskor bar bya ste/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ha/ sa ma ya hoH zhes pa lan gsum brjod cing / g.yas dang g.yon du bskor zhing bskor bas/ mchod bya dang mchod byed kyi dbye ba med cing shin tu grol ba sngon du 'gro ba

yis/ mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i bde ba'i dam pas lha rnams la mchod par byas te/ shar du/ in+d+ra sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ lhor/ ya ma sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ nub tu/ ba ru Na sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ byang du/ ku be ra sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ dbang ldan du/

ma hA b+hU ta sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ mer/ ag+ni sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ bden bral du/ rAk+Sha sa sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ rlung du/ bA yu de ba tA sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ steng du/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya brah+mA d+yA de ba tA sa pa ri bA rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ sa 'og tu/ bai ma tsi trI pr-I thi wA de ba tA sa pa ri bA

rA nA kar+Sha ya dzaH/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsan+t+r-i p+ta sar+b+ba de ba tA sA d+ha ka s+ya shIn+taM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ sarba kar+Than+tu sid+d+hir+b+ha ba tu/ /ya thA su khaM su khe/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraHhraH/ pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha k+Sha

b+ha k+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba la~M bi ne grIh+Na grIh+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbam+bA/ tardza ya tardza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrIM hrIM/ dz+nyau dz+nyau/ k+Sh+mA~M k+Sh+mA~M/ hA~M hA~M/ hIM hIM/ hU~M hU~M/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan cig brjod pas bcom

ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa rim bzhin du bskor ba byas te/ oM A ral+li hoHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM drI sh+ya hoHzhes bya ba 'dis lan cig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lngar

brjod de dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas nye reg dang / so rtsi la sogs pa phyag tu phul la pad+ma'i lag bskor sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod de bstod nas/ srid dang zhi ba mnyam pas chags pa bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'joms/ /khyed kyis dngos po thams cad mkha' dang

mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan/ /mgon po thugs rje'i chu yi ljid kyis brlan par 'gyur ba'i thugs kyi chus/ /bdag la mdzod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba 'dis dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /de nas dur

khrod brgyad kyi phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams la sngon bzhin bskor bar byas te/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha/ rak+Sha sa/ b+hU ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tson+mA dA pa smA ra DA ka DA ki n+yA da ya i ma~M ba liM gr-ih+NaM tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu/

ya thai ba~M/ ya the Sh+Ta~M/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha/ dzi g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sar+b+ba kAr+yAM sat+su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa hA yi kA b+ha wan+tu hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ rkang pa brgyad kyi sngags kyis yang dag par bstod la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya zhing brda'i lag pas brda bstan

par bya ste/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba brjod cing pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya'o/ /nye bar bsdu ba'i phyag rgya mi phyed par 'khyud pa sngon du 'gro bas mthe bo dang srin lag se gol brdab par bya ste/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun

mdzad/ /rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /ji ltar bde bar bzhugs su gsol/ /oM badzra muHzhes brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams thams cad bdag nyid la gzhug par

bya'o/ /de'i rjes la lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus pas dam tshig bsgrub pa bstan par bya ste/ kha ni myos byed kyis bkang nas/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /hU~M gi sgra ni drag po yis/ /lhag ma'i snod du sbyin par bya/ /me tog spos la sogs byin pas/ /mnyes

byas sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba kha kha khA hi khA hi uts+tshiSh+Ta ba liM/ u ts+tshiSh+Ta b+hak+Sha ke b+h+yaHswA hA/ snying rje la sogs nyams ldan pas/ /de bzhin bkra shis glu blang bya/ /rnam kun don ni yongs dag cing / /rnam pa med pa'i bde ba che/ /sgrub po shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /

las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byor na nyi ma re re 'am/ /de bzhin zla ba'am lo rer ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gzugs/ /de bzhin nyid du yongs su bsngo/ /sbyin pa la sogs thams cad kyis ni 'gro ba yid kyi 'dod pa mchog ni kun rdzogs

mdzad/ /he ru ka dpal mkha' 'gro ma sogs rnam rtog gti mug grong khyer thams cad phye mar brlags/ /gang zhig 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bla ma rgyal ba'i ye shes 'byung gnas mthar sbyin mdzad/ /de ni snying rje chen po'i dbang gyur 'phags pa rnams kyi rtag tu myur bar

bkra shis yin/ /'di ni gtor ma'i mchod pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste so gnyis pa'o// //de nas ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /dngos grub sdom pa bshad par bya/ /sna tshogs tshul gyi thabs rnams ni/ /dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu yi mchog /phyi

dang nang du bcas pa'i lus/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /'di ltar bdag nyid mkha' mtshungs par/ /rtag tu grol ba'i bdag nyid mthong / /lus med thog ma tha ma med/ /sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan bral/ /gnyis pa las ni rnam grol ba/ /rnam pa kun du cir

yang gnas/ /dngos med dngos po la brten nas/ /brten pa med par dngos por bya/ /yid med yid ni byas nas su/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bsam mo/ /stan la gnas nas bla ma yi/ /brgyud par brtan par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi/ /ro gcig

sems ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rtog ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs/ /sems byung sems su brtan gyur pa/ /'gro ba'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin/ /mkha' mtshungs nam mkha' yang dag gnas/ /shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin/ /

thog ma tha ma med pa'i gzugs/ /spros bral dbang po'i spyod yul min/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /thams cad stong ba nyon mongs med/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma srid pa yi/ /'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral/ /yid kyi 'ang spyod yul ma yin te/ /gnyis ldan rnam

grol nyon mongs med/ /don dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i/ /'pho med de nyid la phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar de nyid la reg nas/ /bsam pa kun gyis bsam du med/ /gang tshe bsam du med sems pa/ /de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /sems can ji bzhin bsam med

de/ /bsam med ji bzhin rgyal ba'ang de/ /gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis/ /bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bshad/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la/ /bsam pa kun gyi bgrang las 'das/ /sna tshogs rtog pa'i rtog pa med/ /chags

med bde ba chen po ste/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog /dbang po kun 'das rnam pa med/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /mi shes rnam par mi mthong ba'o/ /gzugs med

gar yang mi gnas pa/ /'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /blang dang dor ba gang la zhig /blang bya dang ni dor bya yi/ /chos kun rmi lam ji bzhin no/ /dga' ba yongs su shes pa yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /

dga' ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa/ /'di ni dngos med byang chub bo/ /gnyis po ro gcig dbyer med pa/ /dga' ba'i bde ba chen po nyid/ /shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba ni/ /sgron ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin/ /'di gnyis mi phyed bdag nyid ni/ /ro gcig

dngos po'i sems yin no/ /shes rab thabs ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa/ /de nyid la ni bla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun rnams rab tu bzhugs/ /dbyer med rnam par yang dag rig /gang zhig gnas pa rdo rje sems/ /ji srid

rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur/ /bde bas sdom par byas na ni/ /sgrub pos bde mchog rdzogs bar du/ /de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur/ /mdzes pa'i sgyu ma rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid/ /dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu sbyang / /'jigs par

byed pa'ang med cing bde ba 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin/ /de nyid kyis ni sgrub bo de bzhin nyid bdag rjes su 'gro/ /e ma'o bde chen 'dod pa yis/ /sa gsum po ni gang ba ste/ /e ma'o zhi ba'i bde ba 'bab/ /sna tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas/ /e

ma'o bde ba'i bde chen po/ /e ma'o ji ltar ji ltar bza'/ /e ma'o lhan skyes bdag nyid che/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /'gro ba chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang / /thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug /sems kyang mya ngan smig

rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing / /'di ltar bza' dang btung ba nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /dri ni nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang / /yid ni nyi ma zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya/ /yang dag gnas de'ang ri rab dang ni mtshungs pa yin/ /gzhon nu ma yi

rmi lam de bzhin dmigs par bya/ /tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur bgrod/ /'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes bde 'byung de bzhin te/ /srid pa rang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/ /rtag tu 'char ba bde gshegs lam mchog phyag

'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs spangs te/ /bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na/ /de

yi bsod nams ma byas ci/ /dka' thub ma bstan ci zhig yod/ /'jigs dang sdig pa spangs pa dang / /bde ba dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa/ /de la rim pa rab bstan bya/ /he ru ka dpal mngon brjod rgyud/ /klog gam

'chang ngam bris nas ni/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul skal bzang dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /dpal sdom 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni/ /gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed

na/ /longs spyod che zhing bde ba che/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur/ /mos pa du ma'i sems can la/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba la/ /thabs kyang yang dag bstan pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos

ni bstan pa la/ /gang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang / /smad pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa'i/ /chos nyid thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs

brten pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor/ /sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams/ /de dag kun la dga' ba ste/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas/ /'di ni rim par phye ba ste so gsum

pa'o// //dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtog pa las btus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal sdom pa 'byung

ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi/ /rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas/ /rang don tsam du bsgyur ba gang lags pa/ /'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa

mdzod// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba rgyus ban+de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //slar yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i paN+Di ta
chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i rgya dpe la gtugs nas lots+tsha ba gzhon nu dpal gyis kyang zhus so// //
